story:
Do you know that your home is actually a hidden paradise for bacteria? Not only are your toilets ridden with germs, your kitchen sponges, the bowls of your beloved pets, or even your phones and laptops are also considered daily objects with a high germ count. Not to mention everything you touch in the public areas.

 

The research below shows the percentage of certain surfaces that have high levels of contamination by animal, yeast, bacteria, and mold cells. Germs lurk, and everything we come in contact with every day requires countermeasures to be taken thoroughly and effectively.

 

UVCliin Sterilizer can effectively sanitize your surroundings, and it’s an ideal size for sweeping over doorknobs, handles, and all the uneven surfaces often shared by many hands. With a press of a button and five seconds, you can create a bacteria-free environment anytime and anywhere. It’s also built with a power bank for urgent needs.

 

UVC, the deep ultraviolet light whose wavelength ranges from about 100 to 280nm, cannot reach the Earth, for most of them are absorbed by the ozone layer, making it necessary to produce UVC light artificially. UVCliin takes pride in its high-power UVC LED beads which especially focus on sterilization.

Bacteria and viruses proliferate by replicating the genetic materials in the nucleus of living cells, and UVC light is able to modify and rearrange the helical structure of DNA/RNA, stopping the cell division. And since our LED lies within the range where DNA/RNA is most sensitive to, UVCliin is able to show way better results on sterilizing than other products. 

 

 

Most people are made aware of various hygiene risks due to the pandemic, but the expert team of UVCliin has started the research and development of LED beads years ago. The core member of our team, Dr. Kevin Chen, is an expert in LED components and semiconductor manufacturing technologies, allowing UVCliin to achieve what other sterilizers can’t.

 

The LED beads are the soul of the UVC sterilization products. UVCliin team went the extra mile in making sure our LED beads are the best on the market, achieving excellent sterilization performance.

 

All of our efforts and expertise were compressed into a small piece of LED component. It’s only 0.35cm thin but is surely an indispensable element that helps UVCliin achieve what it can do and to make it extraordinary.

 

High Radiant Flux

The higher the radiant power, the shorter time needed for killing germs. Unlike many UVC products that utilize LED beads of 2mW, our LED beads produce 10mW radiant power, sterilizing better and faster.

 

Optimal Wavelength

DNA has peak sensitivity to UV light at around 265nm, and we carefully made our LED wavelength fall within this range to produce higher sterilizing efficiency.

 

Long LED lifespan

Unlike the existing UV lamps, UVCliin LED can withstand about 10000 hours of usage, making it a better product for sterilization.

 

Massive Sterilizing Range

The light-emitting angle of UVCliin LED is 120°, delivering more efficient sterilization, and with 8 LED beads, UVCliin can completely cover the required sterilization area.

 

Germs are ubiquitous and can accumulate easily, and the fact that they are invisible makes killing them an even more complicated task. However, with UVCliin, ridding germs from your life becomes possible. Our product has been put through rigorous third-party lab testing to make sure the effectiveness of our product.

 

 

During tests of the UVCliin sterilizer, the research proved that within 5 seconds, the bacteria colonies (Escherichia coli) exposed to the light were 99.8% destroyed, and 5 more seconds after, 99.8% eliminated. 

UVC LED disinfection technology was first utilized by NASA to sterilize space gloves and allow astronauts to drink pure and clean water and has been used successfully as a germicide and bactericide for decades. At present, this technology is within your reach and UVCliin can be your daily sterilizing companion, leaving your device free of bacteria and you with some peace of mind.

 

Despite its complicated technology, UVCliin is easy to operate, and we added some convenient features to keep you safe. Simply hold the UVCliin two centimeters above the surface for five seconds, and you can easily reduce the spread of germs.

UVC light is invisible, so we’ve added in blue light beads for safety concerns with LED light flashing every five seconds, helping you track the sterilizing progress.

UVCliin LED will turn off with the lid closed, providing extra protection.

UVCliin is foldable and easy to carry, you can slip it into your crossbody bag or pockets, keeping the bacteria away from you at all times.

UVCliin offers various advantages over the traditionally used mercury lamps and UV lamps. It is the most effective, environmentally-friendly, and chemical-free way to eradicate harmful germs without harming your belongings.

 

UVC LED Sterilizing Advantages

 

From personal belongings to public facilities countless people touch every day, UVCliin enables you to keep a healthy and safe life. 

 

Nothing is worse than finding your phone low on battery and you're nowhere near any chargers, UVCliin with its 5000mAh capacity can function as a power bank for your emergency needs.  

 

 

 

Besides UVCliin Sterilizer (Power Bank), we've also designed the UVCliin Sterilizing Wand. It is not only lightweight and portable but also can effectively damage the genetic material of bacteria in seconds.

 

  • Powerful: Powered by 4 UV-C LED, provides thorough sterilization.
  • Easy to use: 5-second color-changing reminder.
  • Fast & Effective: 5 seconds is all you need!
  • Convenient: Covers every angle when expanded, small when folded.
  • Lightweight: Portable and easy to carry.
  • Chemical-free: No radiation, no ozone, and no toxic chemical release.
  • Safe: Shuts down automatically when flipped it over, equipped with child lock safe design.

 

You can bring back both the UVCliin sterilizer (Power Bank) and the UVCliin Sterilizing Wand with the best price on Indiegogo. Pledge now and keep yourself safe at all times!

Antimicrobial Effectiveness Testing Report

Our products have undergone rigorous testing to confirm the disinfection effects. The report above reflects the efficacy of UVCliin's disinfection of Escherichia coli. 

 

 

 

 

UVCliin Sterilizer was designed for the one-year-old son of our founder and we aimed to produce a sterilizer that is functional, environmentally-friendly, and chemical-free. From brainstorming, designing, to prototyping and manufacturing, it has taken us about a year. 

 

 

UVCliin team members major in photonics and optoelectronics, led by Dr. Kevin Chen, we have dedicated ourselves to the research and development of UVC LED technologies, and we aim to design functional and safe products to meet people’s daily needs. We hope that our design can enable people to bring back home good memories instead of unpleasant germs after a trip, and can feel safe and stay healthy at all times.

 

Press Kit

 

View on YouTube

story:
About Life Basics Organics

Life Basics Organics teas are inspired by ancient, traditional recipes passed down for generations in health conscious communities around the world. We are committed to offering premium black tea, green tea, and yerba mate blends that are 100% organic & non-GMO and sweetened with pure, monofloral honey.

 

We introduced our new tea products at the World Tea Expo in California this year and were nominated for the “Best New Product of the Year” award. The response was amazing. Today, we are selling teas in the top premium grocers in the Midwest and have orders to take our premium products to the national level.

 

 

 

Soon you will be able to find Life Basics Organics in a grocer near you, but to reach new communities, we need to go for a new production run. Our co-manufacturer has a large minimum order so we are calling on the health conscious community to pre-order our teas and support an ethical and responsible beverage startup.

What We Have Done

In the past two years, we have built a strong foundation for the Life Basics Organics company. We spent significant time and capital on ingredient sourcing and created our own food quality standard along the way - Bee Friendly - which means that our products are 100% Organic, non-GMO, Fair Trade (if applicable), and chemical free.

Our branding came naturally but we had our hurdles. When designing the product, we learned that the most cost effective beverage packing solution - Thermal Packaging - adds significant heat to the bottles. We refused to add extra heat to our teas, to protect product quality, so we bought our own bottles, designed our own packaging, and avoided what seemed like the only viable packaging solution.

We have fulfilled hundreds of orders in the past two years and have produced multiple production runs of the seven Life Basics Organics tea lines with our co-manufacturer in the Midwest. We are working with a major distributor in the Midwest and selling in many of the top premium grocers. We have orders from grocers around the United States and planning to go national as soon as possible.

 

Why We Seek Funding

In order to brew our next batch of teas and introduce new 16oz bottles on the national level, we will need to do a new production run. We have seven tea lines and a large minimum order we must meet with our co-manufacturer for each one. We are calling on the community to pre-order our teas. We have always believed in looking to the community to grow. We will use the funding for:

 

  • Sourcing 100% Organic & Fair Trade Black Teas, Green Teas, Yerba Mate
  • Sourcing 100% Organic & Non-GMO Herbs and Spices
  • Sourcing 100% Organic & Non-GMO Monofloral Honey
  • Procuring New 16oz Glass Bottles & Bottle Caps
  • Printing New Product Labels for 16oz Bottles
  • Production & Packaging of Seven Lines of Life Basics Organics teas
  • Product Shipping & Storage Fees

 

We Are 100% Bee Friendly

 

 

We understand the important role that honey bees play in our lives so we made a commitment to create products that go beyond the quality standards that exist today. We use 100% Bee Friendly ingredients in all of our iced tea blends. 

By supporting our Indiegogo campaign, you are supporting a company that is consciously raising product quality standards in the food industry and spreading awareness about the importance of honey bees on the entire human food supply.

     

    Why We Care About Bees

    BEES PLAY A MAJOR ROLE IN NATURE
    • Bees pollinate 80% of flowering plants on Earth. tweet this (USDA)
    • Bee pollination helps to provide nourishing habitats for animals like birds and other insects. tweet this (One Green Planet)
    BEES ARE VITAL TO THE HUMAN FOOD SUPPLY
    • Bees pollinate 70 of the top 100 human food crops. tweet this (Greenpeace)
    • 1 in 3 bites of food we eat is from plants pollinated by bees. tweet this (USDA)
    • Almonds are totally dependent on bee pollination. No bees, no almonds. tweet this (American Beekeeping Foundation)
    BEES MAKE HONEY
    • One of the biggest reasons to care about bees? HONEY! No bees, no honey. tweet this
    BEES HAVE HISTORICAL SIGNIFANCE
    • Bees have been producing honey from flowering plants for 10-20 million years. tweet this (Scientific American)
    • Honey is mentioned in the Vedic texts and Sumerian and Babylonian cuneiform writings. tweet this (National Honey Board)
    BEES ARE GOOD FOR BUSINESS
    • Honey bees provided for over $19 billion dollars in added value to the agriculture business in 2010. tweet this (USDA)
    • Many commercial beekeeping businesses are family businesses passed down for generations. tweet this (National Honey Board)
    MODERN AGRICULTURE IS KNOWN TO BE KILLING BEES
    • In 1947 there were 6 million bee hives in the US. Today, there are under 3 million. tweet this (USDA)
    • 1/3 of the 77 million acres of soybean crop use seeds coated in pesticides linked to killing bees. tweet this (TakePart)
    • The chemical industry has spent millions on PR to deny a link between pesticide use and bee deaths. tweet this (Greenpeace)
      Learn more reasons to save the bees: Why Are Bees Important?

         

        About The Tea Blends

         

         

         

        Life Basics Organics teas reinvent traditional teas from around the world. Our spices are always organic and non-GMO and come from the highest quality sources. We sweeten our teas with pure, organic mono-floral honey.

         

        The Original Brazilian Tea™ is a spicy yerba maté blend based on a traditional herbal drink in Latin America that supports rainforest conservation. The organic yerba maté in this blend comes from a pristine farm in the Amazon Rainforest.

        Filtered Water, Organic Yerba Maté (from the Amazon Rainforest in Brazil), Organic Monofloral Honey, Organic Ginger Root, Organic Cinnamon, Organic Licorice Root, Organic Cardamom, Organic Lemon Juice Concentrate

        Learn more about The Original Brazilian Tea --->

        The Original English Tea™ is a full-leaf Earl Grey black tea blend with honey and lemon based on traditional English tea. The Early Grey in this blend is harvested and infused with local, organic Bergamot citrus at organic tea gardens in Southern Italy.

        Filtered Water, Organic Black Tea (from Southern Italy), Organic Monofloral Honey, Organic Lemon Juice Concentrate

        Learn more about The Original English Tea --->

         

         

        The Original Indian Tea™ is a zesty and stimulating black tea blend with ancient Indian Spices based on a traditional Indian tea called Masala Chai. The organic black tea in this rich and delicious blend is harvested in the finest tea gardens in the eastern state of Assam, India. We curate Indian spices and herbs from the Midwest.

        Filtered Water, Organic Black Tea (from Assam, India), Organic Buckwheat Honey (from Wisconsin), Organic Lemon Juice Concentrate, Organic Cinnamon, Organic Cardamom, Organic Ginger Root, Organic Black Pepper, Organic Cloves

        Learn more about The Original Indian Tea --->

         

         

        The Original Mandarin Tea™ is a bright Wulu Green Tea blend with ginger and honey based on an ancient Chinese tea tradition. The Wulu Green Tea in this smoky blend is harvested in the summertime in organic tea gardens in the mountains of Central China, using traditional sun-drying or charcoal-firing methods.

        Filtered Water, Wulu Green Tea (from Hubei Province in Central China), Organic Monofloral Honey, Organic Ginger Juice, Organic Lemon Juice Concentrate

        Learn more about The Original Mandarin Tea --->

         

         

        The Royal Persian Tea™ is a smooth and savory black tea blend with turmeric based on a traditional Iranian tea. Our turmeric is 100% bee friendly and comes from Hawaii, which is known to be one of the best turmeric sources on earth. 

        Filtered Water, Organic Black Tea (from Southern Italy), Organic Buckwheat Honey, Organic Lemon Juice Concentrate, Organic Turmeric

        Learn more about The Original Persian Tea --->

         

         

         

        The Original Thai Tea™ is a Bee Friendly black tea blend with spices and vanilla based on a traditional Thai tea drink called Cha Yen. We source the black tea in this delicious blend from pristine organic tea gardens in Thailand.

        Filtered Water, Organic Black Tea (from Thailand), Organic Buckwheat Honey from Wisconsin, Organic Cardamom, Organic Anise Seed, Organic Vanilla Extract, Natural Vanilla Flavor, Organic Lemon Juice Concentrate

        Learn more about The Original Thai Tea --->

         

         

         

        The Original Turkish Tea™ is a premium black tea blend with pomegranate juice based on a traditional Turkish tea beverage. We source the Rize black tea in this delicious blend from the eastern sea coast of the Rize Province in Turkey.
        Filtered Water, Organic Rize Black Tea from Rize Province, Turkey, Organic Buckwheat Honey from Wisconsin, Organic Pomegranate Juice Concentrate
        Learn more about The Original Turkish Tea --->

         

        Perks

        $5 - Bee Friendly Stickers

        $15 - Organic Cotton Work+Shelter Tote Bags

         

         

        $40 - Organic Cotton Work+Shelter Tees

        We plan to deliver stickers, tees, totes, teas & cleanses before December 24, 2015.

        Risks & Challenges

         

        Life Basics Organics teas stand out in the marketplace and offer clear tea choices. No more fishing out a bottle among hundreds of (artificial?) flavors in the tea aisle.

        We are excited about the future of our brand and confident in fulfilling the perks in this campaign. We will be a national company serving 16oz teas by 2016.

        The greatest challenge we see is consumer education. To get the word out, we are serving our teas at conscious events throughout the US. Hope to see you soon!

story:
Help us save Lilian’s life!  / He has cancer, and need aStem Cell Transplant.   

Ajută-ne să salvăm viața lui Lilian. / El are cancer și are nevoie de transplant de celule de stem.

Помогите спасти Лилиана! / Лилиану был поставлен диагноз рак и он нуждается в транспланте стволовых клеток.

Lilian was a healthy young man living a normal life, when he was diagnosed with cancer (non hodgkin lymphoma). His father dies in a few month after the son diagnosis, from lung cancer. This story is told by his mother in a letter she wrote as a tribute to him

”My name is Valentina, my son, Lilian, that is 30 years old has been diagnosed with cancer. Everything started with abdominal pain, on April 1st 2015, he was taken to the hospital to take a treatment, one month later doctors found a tumorinabdomen, they agreed that a surgery is needed, thus my son has been taken to a complicated surgery, that lasts 3 hours 45 minutes. At that, time, on April 7th, my husband, had convulsions at work and he was taken by ambulance into the hospital. After some investigations, doctors confirmed that he also had cancer, lung cancer with 3 brain metastases. The doctors told us that my husband has no chances to survive. It was so hard to realize that I am losing my beloved husband and son. My husband died some weeks later on May 13th, 2015, at that time Lilian was after the surgery and received a lot of blood transfusion, he was so weak that he could not even get to the funerals to see his father for the last time. Lilian was transferred to the Oncological Hospital in Chișinău, to receive a chemotherapy, after 3 sessions, doctors diagnosed brain metastases, in July his left side of the face and body was paralyzed. Lilian fights, because he is a fighter, and with the help of his family, he start walking again. The only possibility to help Lilian, now is a Stem Cell Transplant, unfortunately in our country like Moldova, the doctors are not performing such procedures. The good news is that we were accepted for treatment in a hospital in București (Romania), but the bad one is that we are not having enough finances to pay for the whole treatment. Lilian state allowances for his disability of 1st grade is 100 MDL per month, and this is less than 6$, which is not  covering almost anything. I am working in Chisinau, and I don’t have the possibility to stay there with him in Bucuresti. He is a fighter and he has all the chances to survive, but he really needs your help, a good word or prayer, anything could help. ”

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Lilian a fost un tînăr plin de viață, cînd nenorocirea s-a întîmplat în familia sa, Lilian a fost diagnosticat cu cancer, iar tatăl său a decedat în doar citeva luni după de aceași boală. Această istorie ne este relatată de scrisoarea îndurerată a mamei sale.

”Mă numesc Valentina. Băiatul meu pe numele Lilian cu vârsta de 30 ani are nevoie  de ajutorul  vostru. Totul sa început  din decembrie când avea dureri mari in abdomen, medicii credeau ca e ceva la stomac, însă nu a fost așa. Pe data de 1 aprilie 2015 a fost internat in spitalul din Chișinău ca sa primească tratament, o luna medicii au făcut investigații până au depistat o tumoare în abdomen, medicii au hotărât ca trebuie intervenție chirurgicala. In acel moment soțul  pe data de 7 aprilie a făcut convulsii la serviciu si a fost luat cu ambulanța. După multe investigații a fost confirmat diagnosticul de cancer pulmonar cu 3 metastaze la creier. Medicii ne-au spus ca nu are șanse. In acel moment băiatul era după operație foarte complicata cu durata de 3.45 min. Era foarte slăbit, după autopsie sa confirmat diagnosticul de limfom nonhodkin ( cancer la sânge).A fost foarte dureros sa știu ca pierd 2 oameni dragi in același timp Lilian a primit foarte multe perfuzii si sânge pentru ca era foarte slăbit. Pe data de 13 mai 2015 soțul a decedat, in tot acel timp tatăl cu fiul nu se puteau vedea pentru ca erau foarte gravi ambii. La înmormântare Lilian nu a putut fi era prea grav si asta la întristat foarte mult. A fost transferat în spitalul  oncologic pentru a urma tratamentul de chimioterapie însă după 3 ședințe iau dat metastaze la cap si in luna iulie a fost paralizat partea stânga a corpului. Lilian a luptat pentru ca este un băiat tânăr si prin masaj si încurajare sa ridicat pe picioare si a început sa meargă. Medicii ne-au sfătuit să apelăm la tratamentul prin transplant  de  celule  stem, însă cu părere de rău la noi in Chișinău  nu se face asemenea procedura si am fost acceptați de medicii  din București. La momentul  dat Lilian  se afla acolo la tratament  avem nevoie de susținere financiara pentru ca sau adunat prea multe cheltuieli. Asistenta sociala iau dat gradul 1  de invaliditate si se plătește lunar cu 100 lei ceea ce nu este suficient pentru întreținerea tratamentului. Eu sunt in Chișinău si nu am posibilitatea  sa  merg la el sa stau acolo pentru nu am adăpost .El are nevoie de susținerea  voastră! ”

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Лилиану исполнилось 30, когда на его семью обрушились горой несчастья. Уму был поставлен диагноз Рак в апреле 2015, а спустя несколько недель его отец попал в больницу с последней стадией рака лёгких и скоропостижно скончался. Все это пишет его мать в письме с мольбами о помощи, которое не оставит никого равнодушным.

«Меня зовут Валентина, моему мальчику Лилиану очень нужна  Ваша помощь, в 30 лет ему поставили диагноз рак. Все началось  с сильных болей в животе еще в декабре 2014 года, в апрели 2015 Лилиан лег на лечение в больницу, после месяца обследования врачи обнаружили опухоль в брюшной полости, решили срочно оперировать. Операция была сложная длилась 3.45 часа. В это же время на нашу семью свалилось еще одно несчастие, отец Лилияна попал в больницу с конвульсиями, врачи поставили диагноз рак легких с 3 метастазами в головном мозге, последняя стадия. Очень больно осознавать что теряешь дорогих тебе людей. Мой муж стремительно скончался от рака, а мой сын даже не имел возможности его увидеть так как его состояние оставалось по прежнему тяжёлым. После биопсии Лилиану поставили окончательный диагноз, Лимфома  НХЛ (Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma). После ряда переливания крови, Лилиана перевели в онко больницу Кишинева для химиотерапии, после 3 курсов химии врачи обнаружили метастазу в головном мозге, которая парализовала левую  часть тела. Лилиан боец, и он очень старался чтобы снова начать ходить, при помощи поддержки близких и врачей он снова стал на ноги и начал делать первые шаги. Врачи посоветовали лечение через трансплант стволовых клеток, к сожалению в Кишинёве таких процедур не делают, поэтому мы обратились в Румынию, и нас приняли на лечение врачи из больницы Бухареста. На данный момент Лилиан находится там на лечение, но на весь курс к сожалению у нас денег нет, поэтому мы вынуждены обратится  к  Вас дорогие люди с большим сердцем, за помочью. Мы получаем пособие по инвалидности которое составляет 100 лей, а это меньше 6$ и не на что не хватает. Поэтому прошу Вас о помощи, у моего мальчика есть шансы выжить, помогите его спасти.»

story:
iAmulet

 

Short Summary

iAmulet is a lifestyle gadget, a wonderful wearable remote. Easy to use, even a 2 year old child or an eight year old can operate it easily

Uses Bluetooth low energy, works within a radius of 50 meters.

Our iAmulet will empower you, to effortlessly communicate with your family and friends.You can call your kids, acknowledge their presence, play music, make shortcuts to phone,  control your lights, add timers, control other smart gadgets through this iAmulet.  This will be a powerful, one click gadget with up to Eight Functions.  It is very handy even for small children or elders of the family, to alert you immediately when in need.



A True Wearable



An iAmulet Empowers you 



 






What We Need & What You Get

We believe that iAmulet can be very useful companion, to anybody. It will be used by all alike, old or young, able or disabled, patient or active, professional or a Home maker. With this in mind, we are keen to take this to the world, as fast as possible. 

For this, we need  support and contribution from you, in going ahead and bring this product to reality.  In return for your contribution, we are offering interesting perks, with discounts, as below


Project Timelines

The Impact

Our iAmulet design is unique and allows for one click effortless communication. We believe, iAmulet will bring our families and friends closer to each other. It will generate enormous warmth in relationships. This iAmulet uses near zero energy and is very environment friendly. iAmulets are disabled friendly and can be used by Visually Challenged, Hearing Impaired, Physically disabled.

Technologies in your iAmulet

This design utilizes several technologies like Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), Touch Sensors, AES Encryption, ARM Cortex cores, wireless charging, RFID, Networking protocol algorithms, small memory, haptics, and many more. It has been made possible because our team has spent more than a decade in developing products on technologies, like  RFID based attendance / Access Machine, Biometrics machine, Scanners, Intelligent Devices for RFID, UHF RFID, NFC, Gprs / GPS, JAVA based contactless / contact machines, Readers with encryption built in.

refer  www.diacspaa.com to know more, about the work we have already done.

Risks & Challenges

Your iAmulet is multifunctional, loaded with many cutting edge technologies. As such, there may be delay in adding some advanced functions/features. 

Advance functions like special gaming needs, making other smart gadgets compatible with iAmulet, special immersion effects, enabling more accelerometer functions, data to cloud, or many other features,  not yet thought off.

Not to worry, for users wanting special advance features will be able to update their iAmulet,  with their smartphones, whenever updates are available. This will be as easy as upgrading an APP on your phone.

In any case, we are not promoting these features as of now, however, these will be exciting for clients peaking into the future.


Other Ways You Can Help

Your support and encouragement is very important to us. You can share and recommend our campaign on social media. 

Write to us with your feedback / how this iAmulet can be used in your environment at ajain@diacspaa.com.

story:
Hello, my name is Vi, I'm from Viet Nam and is the operating organization Living My Life.
In my country, the issue of homosexuality is still taboo and stigma still exists, including violence. We have had many cases of violence lesbians from their family, from their parents and relatives. Do not stop violence in mentally, physically they were sexually abused (forced to have sex with the opposite sex), violence and economic (financial control). The saddest thing is not an organization in Vietnam with the support intervention for lesbians.
Living My Life we decided to do this to help the abused lesbians can come or we can intervene to support and help when they are abused. In addition, we also provide lodging and accommodation for people with emergencies. We have the support services such as counseling, job placement or training for those lesbians in a maximum period of 6 months, to ensure victims stability afford to go back to social life. And of course all these things we are FREE to them.
However, we encountered difficulties in the payment of rent, living expenses in the long run for the victims there. We want to call the people to contribute to maintaining this activity
We assure you that your help will be to the victims of violence and help their lives better.

Xin chào, tôi tên là Vi, tôi đến từ Viet Nam và đang là người điều hành tổ chức Living My Life.

Tại đất nước tôi, vấn đề đồng tính luyến ái vẫn là điều cấm kỵ và vẫn tồn tại sự kỳ thị, bạo hành trong đó. Chúng tôi đã có rất nhiều trường hợp nữ đồng tính bị bạo hành từ chính trong gia đình của họ, từ cha mẹ và người thân. Không dừng ở bạo hành tinh thần, thể xác họ còn bị bạo hành về tình dục (cưỡng ép phải quan hệ với người khác giới), bạo hành về kinh tế (khống chế tài chính). Điều đáng buồn nhất là chưa một tổ chức nào tại Việt Nam có sự hỗ trợ can thiệp nào dành cho nữ đồng tính.

Living My Life chúng tôi quyết định thực hiện việc này để giúp những người nữ đồng tính bị bạo hành có thể tìm đến hoặc chúng tôi có thể can thiệp hỗ trợ và giúp đỡ khi họ bị bạo hành. Ngoài ra chúng tôi còn cung cấp nơi lưu trú, ăn ở dành cho những người có trường hợp khẩn cấp. Chúng tôi có những dịch vụ hỗ trợ như tư vấn tâm lý, giới thiệu việc làm hoặc học nghề cho những người nữ đồng tính đó trong thời gian tối đa là 6 tháng, để đảm bảo người bị nạn đủ khả năng ổn định để quay trở lại cuộc sống xã hội. Và điều tất nhiên tất cả những điều đó chúng tôi đều MIỄN PHÍ đối với họ.

Tuy nhiên chúng tôi gặp ít khó khăn về việc chi trả tiền thuê phòng, chi phí sinh hoạt về lâu dài cho những người bị nạn đó. Chúng tôi muốn kêu gọi mọi người đóng góp để có thể duy trì hoạt động này

Chúng tôi xin đảm bảo rằng sự giúp đỡ của các bạn sẽ được đến tay các nạn nhân bị bạo hành và giúp cuộc sống của họ ngày càng tốt hơn.
story_txt:
Hello, my name is Vi, I'm from Viet Nam and is the operating organization Living My Life. In my country, the issue of homosexuality is still taboo and stigma still exists, including violence. We have had many cases of violence lesbians from their family, from their parents and relatives. Do not stop violence in mentally, physically they were sexually abused (forced to have sex with the opposite sex), violence and economic (financial control). The saddest thing is not an organization in Vietnam with the support intervention for lesbians. Living My Life we decided to do this to help the abused lesbians can come or we can intervene to support and help when they are abused. In addition, we also provide lodging and accommodation for people with emergencies. We have the support services such as counseling, job placement or training for those lesbians in a maximum period of 6 months, to ensure victims stability afford to go back to social life. And of course all these things we are FREE to them. However, we encountered difficulties in the payment of rent, living expenses in the long run for the victims there. We want to call the people to contribute to maintaining this activityWe assure you that your help will be to the victims of violence and help their lives better.
Xin chào,
tôi tên là Vi, tôi đến từ Viet Nam và đang là người điều hành tổ chức Living My
Life. 

Tại đất nước
tôi, vấn đề đồng tính luyến ái vẫn là điều cấm kỵ và vẫn tồn tại sự kỳ thị, bạo
hành trong đó. Chúng tôi đã có rất nhiều trường hợp nữ đồng tính bị bạo hành từ
chính trong gia đình của họ, từ cha mẹ và người thân. Không dừng ở bạo hành
tinh thần, thể xác họ còn bị bạo hành về tình dục (cưỡng ép phải quan hệ với
người khác giới), bạo hành về kinh tế (khống chế tài chính). Điều đáng buồn nhất
là chưa một tổ chức nào tại Việt Nam có sự hỗ trợ can thiệp nào dành cho nữ đồng
tính. 

Living My
Life chúng tôi quyết định thực hiện việc này để giúp những người nữ đồng tính bị
bạo hành có thể tìm đến hoặc chúng tôi có thể can thiệp hỗ trợ và giúp đỡ khi họ
bị bạo hành. Ngoài ra chúng tôi còn cung cấp nơi lưu trú, ăn ở dành cho những
người có trường hợp khẩn cấp. Chúng tôi có những dịch vụ hỗ trợ như tư vấn tâm
lý, giới thiệu việc làm hoặc học nghề cho những người nữ đồng tính đó trong thời
gian tối đa là 6 tháng, để đảm bảo người bị nạn đủ khả năng ổn định để quay trở
lại cuộc sống xã hội. Và điều tất nhiên tất cả những điều đó chúng tôi đều MIỄN
PHÍ đối với họ.

Tuy nhiên
chúng tôi gặp ít khó khăn về việc chi trả tiền thuê phòng, chi phí sinh hoạt về
lâu dài cho những người bị nạn đó. Chúng tôi muốn kêu gọi mọi người đóng góp để
có thể duy trì hoạt động này 

Chúng tôi
xin đảm bảo rằng sự giúp đỡ của các bạn sẽ được đến tay các nạn nhân bị bạo
hành và giúp cuộc sống của họ ngày càng tốt hơn.

story:
Imagine if you looked in the mirror and every time you said out loud, ‘Damn, I look good.’  Imagine if your skin was so healthy, so clear, and literally glowed with life in just 6 minutes a day.  

Imagine if you no longer had to:

-  Harm your skin with your skin care products

-  Disrupt your hormone levels from your skin care products

-  Spend money trying and looking for a better option.

Sounds like you just imagined life with Veridatta Skin. 

Veridatta SKIN is a 6 step system that uses raw, organic, scientifically advanced ingredients that fight stress and premature aging. In other words:

PIMPLES, WRINKLES, AGE SPOTS, FINE LINES, and DULL SKIN.

The skinny on Veridatta:

Licensed Acupuncturist and facial rejuvenation specialist, Rebecca Underdown began the development of Veridatta products to slow down the process of aging.  6 years of research, development, testing, and formulation, the system was completed in February 2015.  The products have been used on a control group based in New York and California for the last 6 years and has a strong grass roots following.  

TEAM:

Hand picked, trained, and dedicated, we are a team of skin care, product development, marketing, and online distribution experts ready to PROVIDE A SOLUTION for your SKIN. 

WHY TRY VERIDATTA?

IN JUST 15 DAYS of using the product, WE WILL SHOW YOU THAT YOUR SKIN IS A LIVING, BREATHING ORGAN and deserves to breathe.


WATCH the 

15 DAY SUPPLY How-To Video


HOW IS VERIDATTA DIFFERENT THAN ANY OTHER SKIN CARE ROUTINE?

1.  The Veridatta Kit (6 products) work synergistically to increase the cellular turnover through the process of detoxification.  

2.  Globally sourced, every single ingredient has a specific action to regenerate or hydrate the skin cells.

3.  It’s handmade and includes ORGANIC PLANT STEM CELLS imported from Italy that increase regeneration.

4.  It works!!!   We are so confident that it does, we’ll prove it to you in 15 days.

WHAT DO OTHER SKIN CARE CREAMS HAVE THAT WE DON’T?

Phthalates: often associated with artificial fragrance is considered a hormone disruptor, and is known to cause serious reproductive and developmental effects.

Parabens: which are chemicals used as preservatives.  They are cheap and effective in fighting bacteria which is why companies use them.  BUT, they mimic the hormone estrogen which has been proven to increase cancerous cells in the body tissue.

Sulfates: caustic detergents used by almost every mainstream personal care skin care company today because they are a cheap way to cut grease or create a foamy lather. They are used in driveway de-greasers!  Sulfates denature the proteins on our skin making them a cancerous mutagen.  Not cool.

Propylene Glycol:  THIS IS THE ACTIVE INGREDIENT IN ANTI-FREEZE!! Direct contact can cause brain, liver, and kidney abnormalities. The EPA requires workers to wear protective gloves, clothing, and goggles when working with it.  We are not into antifreeze. 

Mineral oil:  A petroleum derivative that coats the skin like Saran Wrap, which prevents the skin from breathing, absorbing, and excreting. It also slows the skin’s natural cell development, causing the skin to age prematurely. Note that baby oil is 100% mineral oil—and 100% bad for your baby’s sensitive skin.  The skin CANNOT breathe with Vaseline and nor is it being moisturized. 

Polyethylene Glycol or PEGs: dissolve oil and grease and are most commonly used in spray-on oven cleanser and skin products.  We don’t want to treat your skin like an oven.


VERIDATTA IS FAST, EASY, AND EFFECTIVE:

3-minute morning routine:

1.  Wash your face with the Sea Foam Cleanser: designed to open the layers of the skin up to allow detoxification.

2.  Spritz your face with Skin Tight Toner: designed to tighten and tone the outer layers of the skin.

  3.  Apply Raw Coconut Day Repair:  designed to continue the detoxification process of the skin throughout your day to improve REGENERATION OF SKIN CELLS.  Oh, and of course the raw coconut water hydrates and sets your glow for the day.


3-minute night routine:

1. Scrub with the Living Enzyme Scrub: designed to gently exfoliate skin cells that need to be removed from your body and supply body with healthy bacteria.

2.  Apply The Truth Serum to the entire face:  designed to decrease sun spots, wrinkles, fine lines, and dark circles.

3.  Apply Naked Night Repair:  designed to balance the sebaceous (oil) glands of the skin, hydrate, and regenerate your skin cells while you sleep.


You don't have to take OUR word for it:

“I received this skin care regimen as a gift and I have been blown away.  It has lightened all the dark marks, made my skin even toned, super soft, less fine lines, and most importantly, the acne I have been fighting for the last 5 years is finally under control.  I can go almost entirely make up free!  I have spent countless dollars on creams that are $120 and had countless peels and microdermabrasion, and I swear this line works better that anything else I’ve tried.  I love it.” -Nicole

“I have been modeling for 7 years and I have been fighting acne since I started.  This is a difficult thing to face each day when I have to show my face to the world.  Make-up has always been a part of my daily routine.  I’ve been using Veridatta for 2 months and it took about a week to see a difference in my skin.  The breakouts slowly stopped and I feel like my skin can breathe.  I am now more aware of how I need to keep the layers open so I am wearing less make-up and I am getting more complements.  I’m psyched.’  -Lauren

“I have a long 'skin story' that involves incredibly sensitive and acne prone skin. I am post-accutane treatment five years ago and I have not changed my skin regimen for at least the same amount of time in fear of triggering acne outbreaks.  

The Day Repair adds the perfect amount of moisture under my makeup without looking too 'wet'. The night repair is absolutely decadent and I can't wait until the day is over just to wash my face and lather it on. Veridatta has really have created a wonderful product. I have had no sensitivity issues, and now I can say I have successfully strayed from my skin regimen for the first time in years without ill effect. This is huge for me. Because of my experience, I  have also introduced the Night Repair in my aesthetic practice for my post chemical peel clients with rave reviews. It's the perfect post treatment cream.”  -Dr. Glenna

“Veridatta is a collection where you witness all of the products work together, synergistically throughout the day.  I am a makeup artist and have been using products all of my life and I have never seen one line work so effectively.  I love the eye serum the most as it does not burn my eyes and I notice I do not have puffiness or dark circles when using it.  The scrub is not harsh but extremely moisturizing which is unlike any other scrub I have ever used.  I have been in love with my skin as soon as I started using Veridatta.” -Anonymous 

“I have been using Veridatta since the beginning.  I have seen all of the changes that the products have undergone and I couldn’t be happier with the final product.  If I don’t have my night repair with me, I can always tell in the morning and I swear I’ll never sleep out again.” -Dan

WHERE WE ARE NOW

-We have finalized, tested, and created the line and we are ready to share it with the faces of the world.

-We have the team in place to manufacture, package, and ship the products to your doorstep.

WHAT WE WILL DO WITH YOUR BACKING:

-  Order the raw ingredients in bulk.

-  Manufacture all of the products.

- Ship the products to our national and international backers.  

VERIDATTA SHIPPING TIME

April: - Manufacture the first wave of 15 Day Packs

May:  - Ship the first wave of 15 Day Packs

            - Order Raw Ingredients in bulk for the V Kits

June:  - Manufacture the V Kits

             - Ship the V Kits to National Backers

July:    - Ship Products to International backers

             -  Launch 'THE V LIFE' social media campaign online!  

RISKS

We feel very comfortable about the timeline above.  After 6 years of development and sales in the Hamptons, we feel extremely confident in the effectiveness of the product.  We have all of the key components in place to manufacture the product in our Veridatta facility and the team in place to ship the final products.  With that being said, since we are offering an ungodly discount of the most effective skin care line, there could be delays in manufacturing if the numbers are higher than we foresee.  If that is the case, we will email you directly to give you the exact forecast in receiving your products.

story:
"We have no permanent fillings. The first little filling leads to an average expense of $2000 to $4000 per tooth filled through a lifetime of breakdown and repair. Thats why it is so important that we can now prevent the decay process from advancing to the stage that drilling and filling become necessary."

Dr. Larry Burnett, DDS


Toothscan is a beautifully designed and crafted device roughly the size of your regular toothbrush. It uses cutting edge technology to help you maintain your dental heath and acts as an early detection tool for dental problems helping you avoid expensive treatment bills.

Toothscan is designed to be used by both dentists and public. It aims to increase diagnostic capability for early detection of dental problems and the collaboration between patient and the dentist. No technology can replace your dentist but Toothscan will allow you to have a better control over your and your families dental health. 



Mobile application

There is an electronic diary that helps to track condition of the teeth that will clearly demonstrate personal mouth hygiene on a daily basis. 

The device could be connected to a server with a personal account. It will allow monitoring your teeth condition on a daily (or weekly) basis, give you recommendations and advice to assign a prophylactic visit to your dentist before the disease developed. 

Toothscan would be connected to your personal online account that would store the long term statistics that you could share with your dentist.

     


                                     


Toothscan is a dental health network that would link dentists and patients, with automatic molecular analysis tool for early disease risk detection. 

There is a mobile application with server <-> client communication and a virtual avatar of your doctor (with your real dentist behind) that will automatically advice you on which areas you should take attention to when brushing your teeth and give personal recommendations. 

The virtual dentist mobile app will remind to clean teeth to your kids and provide daily or weekly advice, for instance if you need to eat more fruits & veg in order to restore minerals balance, like calcium etc. 

Toothscan user could personalize settings for the most comfortable use.

Featured on:


CNET                                         Tech Assimilate  

DENTAL HEALTH CARE         David L. Fried, DMD


Why Toothscan?

It will revolutionize the dentist and client relationship by enabling new visualization of the condition of the clients teeth in realtime and on mobile.


Keep your smile at it's best! 

Experts in dental health say that “prevention” is the key for maintaining your beautiful smile. With Toothscan you will be able to identify potential problems even before they become apparent.

For all the family!

Toothscan allows you and your whole family to monitor their dental health on a day to day, weekly, monthly and yearly basis keeping separate logs for all members of the family. It detects changes in your enamel (top layer of your teeth) even before changes are visually apparent. It’s attractive design helps it’s adoption by your children improving their brushing habits via it’s interactive mobile app.

Reduce costs!

It is well known that a perfect smile does not come cheap! Toothscan allows close collaboration between you and your dentist alerting you and your dentist for developing problems. It can even suggest booking appointments so you can treat problems at the earliest stage reducing treatment costs.

Toothscan is an ambassador of your dentist in your home!



By tracking the condition of your teeth on a daily or weekly basis with an electronic diary, tracking graph and real-time information at your fingertips, you will be able to optimise your and your family’s oral hygiene.  The more you use Toothscan the better prediction you will get.

Toothscan will alert you areas that you are treating less efficiently when brushing your teeth allowing you to change your habits for a better dental health. 

 


How Does It Work? - Science behind the magic

The operation principle of Toothscanis based on the spectroscopy technology.

This method is used to measure the frequency of light, electromagnetic or acoustic waves reflected from a surface or a substance. 

Toothscan’s emitter generates a powerful light beam which reflects from the surface of the teeth which is then detected by the receiver area. Irregular reflections are measured and interpreted by the software diagnosing areas requiring attention.

Spectroscopy does not require any special treatment to the object being analysed making it ideal for diagnostic use avoiding potential side effects of any additional chemicals.


Obtained data is synchronised online via your PC, Tablet or Smartphone.

Toothscan uses Bluetooth® technology to pair with your electronic devices.

Toothscan Software keeps track of personal information giving you real-time feedback. 

It will also warn you to change your toothbrush in regular intervals and will be able to recommend a particular toothpaste depending on the composition of your teeth.


Identify problem areas of the teeth at an early stage! 

Dentophobia (Fear of dentist or dental treatment) is a reality and unfortunately not an uncommon one. 

Early detection capabilities of the Toothscan will let you know exactly when you need to visit your dentist. Most dental treatments are less costly and possible to prevent progression if detected at an earlier stage. 

 


FOR DENTISTS

Toothscan Pro version is designed for professionals. 

It can improve the dentists work and help to set recommendations for patients based on the day to day Toothscan monitoring. 

We are building a network of dentist practitioners who would like to participate in our special dentist trial programme.

If you you like to sign up for clinical trial please leave us your comment.


Toothscan backer’s rewards:

UPDATING...


Toothscan technical specifications:

- Powerful ARM processor for fast performance

- Low Energy Bluetooth for wireless operation

- High Resolution Image Sensor for precise scanning

- Safety glass to protect optical system

- Optical fibre for data transmission

- Motion sensors for precise tracking

- Battery for up to 5 days of daily use

- Micro-USB charging dock



Supported Platforms


Production timeline


Why we need your help

We need your help to improve all about Toothscan! 

With your financial support we will be able to:

- Complete the product design and make it small

- Develop advanced app functions and a cloud server

- Set up manufacturing line for mass production

- Carry out further medical and scientific research and bring it to perfection

With your feedback and input we will:

-  Create a better interface for the Toothscan apps to improve user experience.

-  Make Toothscan’s teeth analysis and advice more accurate and personalized.

We all understand how teeth health is complicated and important for whole mankind. This is main reason why we need your participation.

We have dentists practitioners signed for tests and our community is growing! Please join us!


The Team Behind the Toothscan

Tesla Studios Limited is an established hardware and software developer with HQ based in the UK. There is a team of hardware and software developers, engineers, creative designers and industrial technology experts. We are developing our own cutting edge products, as well as working with big brands and private business.

Tesla Studios is supported by the UK Trade & Investment Global Entrepreneur Programme as innovative company which have high growth potential.

Dr. Mark Priest is in advisory role on international R&D, scientific and technology issues. Mark has 25 years experience building technology businesses in the energy, engineering, medical and consumer markets. He started his career with BP and then subsequently worked in a range of corporate research and business development roles in the US and Europe before moving into management consulting.

Dr Cemal Kavasogullari is a Doctor of Medicine with a PGCert in Aesthetic Medicine (Queen Mary University of London). Dr. Kavasogullari has previous experience in Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery (University College London) and General Practice in NHS Lanarkshire, Scotland. He is our medical expert in research and use of advance technologies in healthcare innovation.


UPDATING...


Risk and challenges

We have been working on Toothscan for the last year. We created our first working proof-of-concept and now perfecting it. 

The main challenges we are facing now are making the prototype as small as a toothbrush and software development with complicated algorithms.   

The next challenge we would face is the process of taking device into mass production. We believe that we would able to minimize those risks by working with the top professionals in order to deliver Toothscan to our backers with full satisfaction.

Based on our plan, Toothscan will be able to support more smart devices such as Apple Watch in the future. The exact dates have yet to be officially set. 

We will start shipping out early-bird orders from early November. Usually it takes less than a week for the carrier to deliver the product.  The actual time for you to receive your Toothscan is contingent to air and local traffic. Custom delays and extraordinary circumstances.


FAQ

Is Toothscan eye and skin safe safe?

Yes, Toothscan is eye-safe. The technology meets IEC/EN 62471 standard for eye and skin safety operation.

How does Toothscan communicate wirelessly to my smartphone?

Toothscanhas a fast speed Bluetooth module component that allows wireless communication with your smartphone. 

How long does the battery last?

Toothscan could operate for about 5 days of a standard daily use before it needs to be recharged. It comes with a micro-USB charger dock.

How long does a scan take?

Toothscan could scan each tooth in about a second.

How accurate are the results the device gives?

When the light beam reflects from the healthy tooth, there is a certain spectrum - we call it the Reference. Any spectrum deviation from the Reference would signal that the molecular structure is changing.

As more often you use Toothscan as more accurate will be results based on the long term statistics. This would enable to monitor dynamics of your teeth health and predict the decease development risk at early stage.

Are you sure you can embed all electronics into the stick form? Flexible PCBs are extremely difficult to effectively use.

We design PCBs ourselves and our engineers made it longer and slim to fit in the shape of the stick. There is no need for flexible PCB.

If I contribute for the Early bird, will I get a beta or final device?

Early bird device for beta testing is fully functional at the near-final stage. Once we complete the clinical trials there would be improvements done according to the beta testing results. Early bird backers would be able to get the final product at 50% discounted price.

Why do I need to buy the Nozzles Pack? How many nozzles are included by default.

For hygienic purposes. You could get one Toothscan device with changeable nozzles and multiple accounts for every member of your family - you buy one Toothscan device and give a nozzle to each member of your family. This might cause a queue in your bathroom though, but this is the most affordable option for a big family.

If you buy an individual Toothscan device for each member of your family it will give you more flexibility of using an individual scanner and use it at any time and take away with you whenever your need it.

Dentist professionals would be able to use disposable nozzles with one Toothscan device for multiple patients.


What is the warranty period?

Toothscan is provided with a 12-month limited warranty.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do ship worldwide. The actual time for you to receive your Toothscan is contingent to air and local traffic. Please allow custom delays, import taxes and extraordinary circumstances depending on your country of origin.

Am I supposed to manually add shipping?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. We will send you a further notification with an exact amount of shipping to your country. 

At the moment we have a filling company in charge to estimate the shipping costs for each country individually. This is to make sure that you won't be overcharged for shipping. 


This is a flexible campaign which means that you will receive the funding no matter what. What would you do if the campaign won't reach your minimum target?

If we won't succeed with the minimum investment for Toothscan campaign we GUARANTEE the money back to our supporters.


PLEASE HELP US TO MAKE THIS CAMPAIGN A SUCCESS!

You could massively help us by sharing this campaign in your social networks. Every little helps!
story_txt:
"We have no permanent fillings. The first little filling leads to an average expense of $2000 to $4000 per tooth filled through a lifetime of breakdown and repair. Thats why it is so important that we can now prevent the decay process from advancing to the stage that drilling and filling become necessary."Dr. Larry Burnett, DDSToothscan is a beautifully designed and crafted device roughly the size of your regular toothbrush. It uses cutting edge technology to help you maintain your dental heath and acts as an early detection tool for dental problems helping you avoid expensive treatment bills.Toothscan is designed to be used by both dentists and public. It aims to increase diagnostic capability for early detection of dental problems and the collaboration between patient and the dentist. No technology can replace your dentist but Toothscan will allow you to have a better control over your and your families dental health. Mobile applicationThere is an electronic diary that helps to track condition of the teeth that will clearly demonstrate personal mouth hygiene on a daily basis. The device could be connected to a server with a personal account. It will allow monitoring your teeth condition on a daily (or weekly) basis, give you recommendations and advice to assign a prophylactic visit to your dentist before the disease developed. Toothscan would be connected to your personal online account that would store the long term statistics that you could share with your dentist.     

                                     


Toothscan is a dental health network that would link dentists and patients, with automatic molecular analysis tool for early disease risk detection. 

There is a mobile application with server <-> client communication and a virtual avatar of your doctor (with your real dentist behind) that will automatically advice you on which areas you should take attention to when brushing your teeth and give personal recommendations. 
The virtual dentist mobile app will remind to clean teeth to your kids and provide daily or weekly advice, for instance if you need to eat more fruits & veg in order to restore minerals balance, like calcium etc. 

Toothscan user could personalize settings for the most comfortable use.
Featured on:

CNET                                         Tech Assimilate  
DENTAL HEALTH CARE         David L. Fried, DMD

Why Toothscan?
It will revolutionize the dentist and client relationship by enabling new visualization of the condition of the clients teeth in realtime and on mobile.

Keep your smile at it's best! 
Experts in dental health say that “prevention” is the key for maintaining your beautiful smile. With Toothscan you will be able to identify potential problems even before they become apparent.
For all the family!
Toothscan allows you and your whole family to monitor their dental health on a day to day, weekly, monthly and yearly basis keeping separate logs for all members of the family. It detects changes in your enamel (top layer of your teeth) even before changes are visually apparent. It’s attractive design helps it’s adoption by your children improving their brushing habits via it’s interactive mobile app.
Reduce costs!
It is well known that a perfect smile does not come cheap! Toothscan allows close collaboration between you and your dentist alerting you and your dentist for developing problems. It can even suggest booking appointments so you can treat problems at the earliest stage reducing treatment costs.
Toothscan is an ambassador of your dentist in your home!




By tracking the condition of your teeth on a daily or weekly basis with an electronic diary, tracking graph and real-time information at your fingertips, you will be able to optimise your and your family’s oral hygiene.  The more you use Toothscan the better prediction you will get.
Toothscan will alert you areas that you are treating less efficiently when brushing your teeth allowing you to change your habits for a better dental health. 
 

How Does It Work? - Science behind the magic
The operation principle of Toothscanis based on the spectroscopy technology.
This method is used to measure the frequency of light, electromagnetic or acoustic waves reflected from a surface or a substance. 
Toothscan’s emitter generates a powerful light beam which reflects from the surface of the teeth which is then detected by the receiver area. Irregular reflections are measured and interpreted by the software diagnosing areas requiring attention.
Spectroscopy does not require any special treatment to the object being analysed making it ideal for diagnostic use avoiding potential side effects of any additional chemicals.

Obtained data is synchronised online via your PC, Tablet or Smartphone.
Toothscan uses Bluetooth® technology to pair with your electronic devices.
Toothscan Software keeps track of personal information giving you real-time feedback. 
It will also warn you to change your toothbrush in regular intervals and will be able to recommend a particular toothpaste depending on the composition of your teeth.


Identify problem areas of the teeth at an early stage! 
Dentophobia (Fear of dentist or dental treatment) is a reality and unfortunately not an uncommon one. 
Early detection capabilities of the Toothscan will let you know exactly when you need to visit your dentist. Most dental treatments are less costly and possible to prevent progression if detected at an earlier stage. 


 


FOR DENTISTS
Toothscan Pro version is designed for professionals. 
It can improve the dentists work and help to set recommendations for patients based on the day to day Toothscan monitoring. 
We are building a network of dentist practitioners who would like to participate in our special dentist trial programme.
If you you like to sign up for clinical trial please leave us your comment.

Toothscan backer’s rewards:
UPDATING...
Toothscan technical specifications:



- Powerful ARM processor for fast performance
- Low Energy Bluetooth for wireless operation
- High Resolution Image Sensor for precise scanning
- Safety glass to protect optical system
- Optical fibre for data transmission
- Motion sensors for precise tracking
- Battery for up to 5 days of daily use
- Micro-USB charging dock



Supported Platforms




Production timeline




Why we need your help
We need your help to improve all about Toothscan! 
With your financial support we will be able to:
- Complete the product design and make it small
- Develop advanced app functions and a cloud server
- Set up manufacturing line for mass production
- Carry out further medical and scientific research and bring it to perfection

With your feedback and input we will:
-  Create a better interface for the Toothscan apps to improve user experience.
-  Make Toothscan’s teeth analysis and advice more accurate and personalized.
We all understand how teeth health is complicated and important for whole mankind. This is main reason why we need your participation.
We have dentists practitioners signed for tests and our community is growing! Please join us!

The Team Behind the Toothscan


Tesla Studios Limited is an established hardware and software developer
with HQ based in the UK. There is a team of hardware and software developers,
engineers, creative designers and industrial technology experts. We are
developing our own cutting edge products, as well as working with big brands
and private business.
Tesla Studios is supported by the UK Trade &
Investment Global Entrepreneur Programme as innovative company which have high
growth potential.

Dr. Mark Priest is in advisory role on international R&D, scientific and technology issues. Mark has 25 years experience building technology businesses in the energy, engineering, medical and consumer markets. He started his career with BP and then subsequently worked in a range of corporate research and business development roles in the US and Europe before moving into management consulting.
Dr
 Cemal Kavasogullari is a Doctor of Medicine with a PGCert in Aesthetic 
Medicine (Queen Mary University of London). Dr. Kavasogullari has 
previous experience in Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery (University 
College London) and General Practice in NHS Lanarkshire, Scotland. He is
 our medical expert in research and use of advance technologies in 
healthcare innovation.

story:
Short Summary

Hey, I'm Jen.  I'm a 19 year old nonbinary student at the University of Washington.  Right now, I'm dealing with gender stuff as well as Anxiety disorders and Depression.  My parents are footing basically all of my bills, but they don't have the money to do so much longer.  I can't get any jobs that work with my college schedule, so I can't really contribute.  I plan to get bottom surgery this summer, but the money just isn't there.  This is where you come in - you lovely lovely internaut you.

This campaign is raising money specifically for that surgery.  It's looking like it'll cost about $15,000 US. That's mostly thanks to the fact that my insurance doesn't cover any of it.  I'm going through the U of M health center, and they're all wonderful people, but they can't make it any cheaper.  I have $2,000 saved up, but it certainly won't carry me all the way.

Your donation would mean the world to me, and to a lot of others.  Setting a precedent for this kind of surgery and saying "we want this, there is a market for this, make this standardized" will do nothing but good as far as the trans and nonbinary communities are concerned.  This is something that i desperately need, but can't get access to.  This could alleviate some of my depression and anxiety, lowering my dosage of medicine, which would lower my bills.  I urge you to find it somewhere in your heart to help me in this time.

What I Need & What You Get

As I mentioned above, I'm gonna need about $15,000 US to cover the surgery and post-surgery checkups.  I'll be going through the University of Michigan Transgender Health Clinic, and their experienced surgeons are ones I can trust to do a good job and heal me up the quickest, minimizing after-costs.

I've put in a few perks because I love perks and I know tons of other people do.  As I've said, I can't really afford to spend money on most of these, but please remember that I love each and every one of you that helps me out, whether you donate or share this campaign or both.  Any perks will be executed (meaning letters will take up to a week) either once the campaign ends or after the surgery, depending on how the timing goes.  I'll post updates on this page after that point is reached.

If the goal is exceeded before time runs out, I'll add more perks, and more people will get to share in the happy!

If I don't reach my goal, I'll put the money I do raise aside in its own account tied to my bank account.  I might start another indiegogo campaign, or I might be in a better position to earn more money elsewhere.  regardless of whether or not my goal is reached, I'll be forever indebted to all those who participated.

Risks & Challenges

There are a few possible snags along the way.  I'm going for a rather... unstandardized procedure.  I'm basically going halfway, which means I might face some pushback from doctors or surgeons who want to urge me to go all or nothing.  I have a mountain of resources backing me up on the existence of nonbinary identities and the desire for this kind of surgery, but they might jack the price on me.  I hope that doesn't happen, but if it does and I don't have enough, I'll follow the same procedure as if I haven't reached my goal: setting aside what I have and continuing to push forward.

Other Ways You Can Help

Remember: If you can't donate, the gig isn't up!

  • Share this campaign either using the Indiegogo tools or social media!
  • Raise awareness for nonbinary people!
  • Give your nonbinary or transgender friend a hug (if they're okay with that)
