story:
Hey thanks for checking out Dose4Dose Coconut Greens!

We started just over two years ago while co-founder Geoff was training for his 3rd Ironman triathlon and looking to fuel his body for the gruelling schedule of 15 -20 hours of training a week. Diet alone wasn't cutting it and the early morning green smoothie became a ritual the only thing was we didn't have time to chop bunches of kale at 5am.  

So we started our quest to make the #worldseasiestgreensmoothie.  We started blending superfood powders with our favourite smoothie recipes and now here we are ready to take Coconut Greens from our kitchen to commercial production in the USA, for sale in the USA, Australia and the world. 

Campaign ended please head to www.coconutgreens.com to purchase.

 

 

We have combined coconut water with 9 of the best green superfoods (algaes, grasses, leafy vegetables) on the planet to create the most amazing nutrition rich organic superfood powder with one goal to give you the worlds easiest green smoothie

While researching Coconut Greens we were impacted by the life threatening vitamin A shortage for kids in the developing world and decided that we would donate 5 years Vitamin with every sale which reduces the risk of death by 23%.

 

Dose 4 Dose is a mission based social enterprise set up to bring the highest quality organic superfoods and dietary supplements to the market with the added benefit that we match customers purchases Dose 4 Dose with 5 years vitamin A for at risk children around the world.  

Our mission statement - Your Good Health Helping others

 

Our aim is to eventually provide 10,000 children with lifesaving vitamin A in the next two years.  For this we need your help to launch!

 

Our campaign is the pre-sales launch of  Dose4dose Coconut Greens all the research work is done and we have already put down half of the opening order cost and we would like your help to fund the half of the first production run. 

We are really passionate about your health and the health of those less fortunate and we believe you'll want to be a part of that!  

Coconut Greens will help you feel good and Dose 4 Dose will help you do good :)

 

Our goal $10,000

So we have so far put in around $8,000 in research costs, trademarks, registrations etc and $20,000 toward our opening order and we seek $10,000 take delivery and start shipping debt free.  We will launch regardless of the outcome of this campaign so contribute with confidence even the smallest contributions will help us.

 


Coconut Greens is simply the world's easiest green smoothie.  It's a powder that you add to your smoothie mix or plain water.  

Our vision for Coconut Greens was to create a product that could:

 

 Hydrate - Natures isotonic packed with magnesium, calcium, sodium and        potassium to balance your body's fluids

 Detox - Gently cleanses the body and removes environmental toxins

 Energize - Bursting with antioxidants such as B group vitamins 

 Defend - Supports the body's natural immunity to fight infections

 

 

It's 100% organic and 100% taste!

 

Label readers take note we know the 1st thing you do is turn the product over to check what's in it I know we do, so we are going to put the ingredients on the front panel and change the game!

 

(This is not the final label and is indicative only we still need to finalise this from a final product specifications which may vary slightly as we scale up production and also need legal and compliance sign off)

More details on the ingredients can be found in our "Top questions" list below.
 

What do we donate? Vitamin A via our charity partner Vitamin Angels, we donate 5 years worth for one child from every sale.

Why do we care about Vitamin A deficiency (VAD) ? VAD causes 250,000 to 500,000 children to become blind every year with 50% dying within 12 months of losing their sight.

Who is at risk of  VAD? Children and pregnant women in over 50% of worlds countries, this problem is huge and its solvable.

How does it help? For deficient children Vitamin A supplementation for the first 5 years of life reduces their risk of death by 23%!

Our goal is to donate 5 years vitamin to 10,000 children over the next 2 years!

Information above is sourced from the World Health Organisation website for more information on the need for Vitamin A check out the site here.

 

Super Early bird < $1 a serve - $25 USD

Very limited numbers and won't be repeated.

 

30 serves (1) tub of Coconut Greens the #worldseasiestgreensmoothie

Enjoy with chilled water in a shaker or add to yoghurt, ice, a banana and blend. 

All the benefits of a green smoothie with none of the work!

We'll donate of 5 years Vitamin A to a needy child.

Cleanse your body and soul :)

Future Retail Price: $59 + taxes + shipping

Save $34!!

 

 

Early Bird $1 per serve - $30 USD

Limited numbers

30 serves (1) tub of Coconut Greens the #worldseasiestgreensmoothie

We'll donate of 5 years Vitamin A to a needy child.

Cleanse your body and soul :)

Future Retail Price: $59 + taxes + shipping

Save $29!

 

Indiegogo Launch price - $39 USD

 

30 serves (1) tub of Coconut Greens the #worldseasiestgreensmoothie

We'll donate of 5 years Vitamin A to a needy child.

Cleanse your body and soul :)

Future Retail Price: $59 + taxes + shipping

Save $20!

Coconut Greens blitz - $79 USD

 

90 serves (3) tubs of Coconut Greens the #worldseasiestgreensmoothie

Great for a busy household trying to go green or share with a friend.

We'll donate of 5 years Vitamin A to a 3 needy children!

Cleanse your body and soul :)

Future Retail Price per unit: $59 + shipping

Save $98!!

Cheaper 'buy' the dozen - $300 USD

 

 

 

Great introductory offer for a  Nutritionist, Yoga studio, gym or Personal Trainer you be among the 1st to offer your clients Coconut Greens.

Great addition to a healthy eating plan or detox.

Simply buy 12 x 1 month tubs @ $25 each and make a healthy margin promoting good health to your clients on our $59.99 launch price.

We'll donate 5 years worth of  Vitamin A to 12 at risk children.

 

Cafe pack - $300 USD

 

 

A great addition to any Cafe menu add to your tasty smoothie mix to boost appeal and profitability Deal is for a minimum of 12 x 30 dose tubs @ wholesale cost of $25 per tub giving a healthy margin. Around 80 cents addition in cost to any smoothie and mark it up by $3.

We'll donate Vitamin A to 12 at risk children and give some point of sale material to help you leverage your good work.

 

 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Whether you are in a position to supporting this campaign or not you can still play a role in helping us spread the word.
    See the Facebook and Twitter sharing links at the top of the page.

    Please use your popularity to help launch Dose 4 Dose via Thunderclap a social sharing platform click the link and support via your social media by clicking the link below.

    https://www.thunderclap.it/projects/30842-dose4...

    Top Questions

     

     

     

     Organic Coconut water (4.6g per dose)

    Coconut water is the clear liquid inside a young coconut – it’s a nutritional goldmine.  It's scientifically proven to be as effective as popular sports drinks but with natural sugars rather than the modified sugars found in leading sports drinks.

     

        Organic Spirulina (1,100mg per dose)

    Our Organic spirulina is a blue green algae lovingly processed to guarantee purity. A truly powerful green superfood. With over 60% of the most “complete”, digestible plant  protein on the planet.

     Organic Apple powder (600mg per dose)

    Orchard fresh apples provide the base for this apple pectin, a fine powder used for digestive health to improve natural balance of flora inside your digestive tract as a natural treatment for candida overgrowth and to detoxify your body.

    Organic Chlorella (500mg per dose)

    Chlorella is a green single-celled micro-algae brimming with the highest concentrations of chlorophyll known to man.  Chlorella also supplies high levels of Beta-Carotene, Mixed Carotenoids, Vitamin C, Iron and Protein. 

      Organic Alfalfa (450mg per dose)

    A type of wild grass, alfalfa is an a abundant source of healthy nutrients.  Naturally high in fibre, B complex vitamins, and vitamins A, C, D, E, K. It is also a fantastic source of protein (particularly useful for vegans and vegetarians), biotin, choline, inositol and PABA. High in chlorophyll and packed with calcium, magnesium, phosphorous, potassium and trace minerals.

       Organic Wheat grass (450mg per dose)

    A good source of vitamin E, an anti-oxidant to provide protection for cells against free radical damage a chief culprit in developing  conditions like heart disease and cancer. It is essential for maintenance of a healthy immune system, particularly in times of stress and viral illness.

    Wheat Grass Powder contains no actual wheat; it is harvested before the young plant ‘sections’ before any “gluten” is formed. Therefore, people with wheat allergies are not affected. Gluten free

      Organic Barley grass (450mg per dose)

    Long known for the many vitamins and trace minerals that are found in green barley grass leaves.  Including potassium, calcium, magnesium, iron, copper, phosphorus, manganese, zinc, beta carotene, B1, B2, B6, C, folic acid, and pantothenic acid.

      Organic Kale (200mg per dose)

    A rich source of carotenoids including beta-carotene, a source of Vitamin A, as well as Leutein and zeaxanthin, for good eye health. It is high in Vitamin C and K and is also a good source of calcium and potassium.  No smoothie is complete without kale.

    Organic Broccoli (300mg per dose)

    Broccoli, a member of the cruciferous family of vegetables, contains high levels of healthy compounds called glucosinolates. Glucosinolates are rich in Sulphur which helps to cleanse and strengthen the blood.

     Organic Spinach leaf (200mg per dose)

    Spinach a nutrition-packed power green rich in chlorophyll and antioxidants.  Spinach is a rich source of vitamins and trace minerals  A, C, E, K, B2, and B6, magnesium, manganese, folate, iron, calcium, potassium, folic acid, phosphorus, zinc, niacin, selenium and omega-3 fatty acids.

    How do I use Coconut Greens?

     

     

     

    What vitamins and minerals can you get from Coconut Greens?
    Well we thought a picture can tell a thousand words well word art can too!

    Why combine coconut water with super greens?

    When the goodness of coconut water meets the greatness of Super-greens! 

    We are all no doubt aware of the benefits of these amazing superfood in fact the idea came from the fact that these are the 1st things that we add to our fresh smoothies.  We realized quickly that no one had actually done this in a convenience of a powder.  We have brought you a product that works naturally to assist the body to hydrate, detox, energize and defend.  It also makes the taste great so it just makes sense don't you think?

    Some super greens powders have more ingredients how did you chose the ingredients to put in Coconut Greens? Why not more?

    In deciding on the final recipe for Coconut Greens we had some non negotiables. It needed to be organic and the consumer needs to understand what each ingredient does.  Too many supplements contain massive ingredient lists that the average consider has no idea what they do, so if you don't recognize an ingredient why would take it?  More is definitely not better often the quantities of each ingredients are of such low concentrations why bother and some ingredients should be carefully considered. 

    For a great example of this read the following article on rice bran powder.  http://www.nutraingredients-usa.com/Research/Rice-bran-contains-high-arsenic-levels-study

    Where is Coconut Greens made?

     

    Coconut Greens will be made at a FDA and TGA accredited facility in the USA from the best locally and internationally sourced organic ingredients.  For your peace of mind, our carefully chosen manufacturing partner in Long Island NY holds the following accreditations and affiliations:

     

     

              

     

    Geoff and Jo on site with our food scientist perfecting the blend.
     

    How many calories in a dose of Coconut Greens?

    If taken with water Coconut Greens is very low in calories. This makes it perfect to support an intermittent fasting diet such as the 5:2 diet.

    Do you have a children's dose?

     

    For children aged 8 – 12 years, we recommend a half dose of Coconut Greens.  For children under this age please consult with a health care professional to assess your child's individual requirements.

    Can Coconut Greens be used during pregnancy and breastfeeding?

    Please consult with a health care professional whilst pregnant or lactating.

    What is Dose 4 Dose?

    Dose 4 Dose is a social enterprise, our mission - Your Good Health Helping others. Your purchase is matched Dose 4 Dose with vitamins for at risk children.

    Dose 4 Dose is a social enterprise set up to bring the highest quality sustainable and ethical vitamins and supplements to the market with the added benefit that we match customers purchases Dose 4 Dose with vitamins for at risk children and mothers in countries all around the world including the USA.  By purchasing your vitamins and supplements to enrich you own health you truly are letting “Your good health help others.”

    Dose 4 Dose are innovators in the vitamin and supplement category determined to bring products to unmet needs and make a difference.  We work with our supply chain partners to shrink margins which makes it possible to be price competitive while providing a premium quality product that makes a difference to the end consumer and the beneficiary.  We do all this without charging one the customer one penny extra!

    We believe strongly in supporting the community our Dose 4 Dose commitment but realise that for this to truly be a sustainable business model we have to put the very best products in the hands of our customers and create compelling value.

    Do you really give a months supply of vitamins for every month purchase?

    Actually this was our original goal but with a smart partnerships and supply chain management we have been able to pledge much more.  For example if you buy one month worth of Dose 4 Dose Coconut Greens we will give a child vitamin A for the 1st five years of their life reducing their mortality in this time by a remarkable 23%.

    How do you get the vitamins to the at risk populations?

    Dose 4 Dose supports Vitamin Angels, a non-profit organization providing vitamins and minerals to children in need. Each item you purchase provides lifesaving vitamins to a child for the first five years of their life.

    For more information on Vitamin Angels lifesaving work please visit their website www.vitaminangels.org
story_txt:
Hey thanks for checking out Dose4Dose Coconut Greens!
We started just over two years ago while co-founder Geoff was training for his 3rd Ironman triathlon and looking to fuel his body for the gruelling schedule of 15 -20 hours of training a week. Diet alone wasn't cutting it and the early morning green smoothie became a ritual the only thing was we didn't have time to chop bunches of kale at 5am.  
So we started our quest to make the #worldseasiestgreensmoothie.  We started blending superfood powders with our favourite smoothie recipes and now here we are ready to take Coconut Greens from our kitchen to commercial production in the USA, for sale in the USA, Australia and the world. 
Campaign ended please head to www.coconutgreens.com to purchase.
 
 

We have combined coconut water with 9 of the best green superfoods (algaes, grasses, leafy vegetables) on the planet to create the most amazing nutrition rich organic superfood powder with one goal to give you the worlds easiest green smoothie
While researching Coconut Greens we were impacted by the life threatening vitamin A shortage for kids in the developing world and decided that we would donate 5 years Vitamin with every sale which reduces the risk of death by 23%.
 Dose 4 Dose is a mission based social enterprise set up to bring the highest quality organic superfoods and dietary supplements to the market with the added benefit that we match customers purchases Dose 4 Dose with 5 years vitamin A for at risk children around the world.  
Our mission statement - Your Good Health Helping others
 Our aim is to eventually provide 10,000 children with lifesaving vitamin A in the next two years.  For this we need your help to launch!


 
Our campaign is the pre-sales launch of  Dose4dose Coconut Greens all the research work is done and we have already put down half of the opening order cost and we would like your help to fund the half of the first production run. 
We are really passionate about your health and the health of those less fortunate and we believe you'll want to be a part of that!  
Coconut Greens will help you feel good and Dose 4 Dose will help you do good :)
 
Our goal $10,000
So we have so far put in around $8,000 in research costs, trademarks, registrations etc and $20,000 toward our opening order and we seek $10,000 take delivery and start shipping debt free.  We will launch regardless of the outcome of this campaign so contribute with confidence even the smallest contributions will help us.
 

Coconut Greens is simply the world's easiest green smoothie.  It's a powder that you add to your smoothie mix or plain water.  

Our vision for Coconut Greens was to create a product that could:
 
 Hydrate - Natures isotonic packed with magnesium, calcium, sodium and        potassium to balance your body's fluids
 Detox - Gently cleanses the body and removes environmental toxins
 Energize - Bursting with antioxidants such as B group vitamins 
 Defend - Supports the body's natural immunity to fight infections
 
 
It's 100% organic and 100% taste!


 
Label readers take note we know the 1st thing you do is turn the product over to check what's in it I know we do, so we are going to put the ingredients on the front panel and change the game!
 
(This is not the final label and is indicative only we still need to finalise this from a final product specifications which may vary slightly as we scale up production and also need legal and compliance sign off)

More details on the ingredients can be found in our "Top questions" list below.
 

What do we donate? Vitamin A via our charity partner Vitamin Angels, we donate 5 years worth for one child from every sale.
Why do we care about Vitamin A deficiency (VAD) ? VAD causes 250,000 to 500,000 children to become blind every year with 50% dying within 12 months of losing their sight.
Who is at risk of  VAD? Children and pregnant women in over 50% of worlds countries, this problem is huge and its solvable.
How does it help? For deficient children Vitamin A supplementation for the first 5 years of life reduces their risk of death by 23%!
Our goal is to donate 5 years vitamin to 10,000 children over the next 2 years!
Information above is sourced from the World Health Organisation website for more information on the need for Vitamin A check out the site here.

Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Introduction 

Imagine a world where Cancer was no longer feared as a death-sentence, but accepted as a normal, treatable disease. One where the Patient could expect to recover and continue to live their normal life, without the harsh side effects or debilitating consequences so common with current treatments. 

TBL-12 offers this kind of hope. TBL-12 is a Natural Product, without any Chemicals or Preservatives. TBL-12 has been used for decades, without adverse side effects, and has been used by hundreds of people with many different forms of Cancer and Leukemia.

Now TBL-12 has been granted Orphan Drug Designation for the treatment of Multiple Myeloma (Bone Cancer) and we are ready to apply for our FDA Marketing Approval, in order to make it available to the mass market.


Background Information

Cancer is a leading cause of death in the United States and the number of cancer deaths is growing.

This year approximately 550,000 Americans are expected to die of cancer. That’s more than 1500 people a day, and another 1.3 million will be newly diagnosed. In the USA about one in four deaths is a result of cancer, and about 70% of all Cancers are diagnosed at 55 and older. (American Cancer Society, Cancer Facts and Figures 2003).

We are all aware that conventional modalities including chemotherapy and radiation has not faired too well over the last 4 – 5 decades. According to an analysis published in “Current Cancer Research”, chemo is credited with remission in only 7% of cases, and prolonged survival in another 15%. That means it is basically ineffective 80% of the time.  Most of us are aware of the concept of chemotherapy, which is to attack the cancer cells and hope not too many of the healthy cells are killed along with them. In addition there are the debilitating side effects. Chemotherapy is basically a palliative treatment.

Until now chemotherapy and radiation may have been the only options available to a cancer patient, but this is changing.

Our Company, Unicorn Pacific Corporation, is a small company who has developed and produced a Natural Dietary Supplement, used mainly by Cancer and Leukemia Sufferers that has the ability to change the way Cancer is treated and save the lives and increase the Quality of Life of Millions of sufferers worldwide. 


Vision and Mission

Vision – to commercialize and distribute TBL-12 world-wide as an approved cancer drug.

Mission – to achieve Marketing Approval from the FDA to permit the commercialization of the drug.


What we have already done

TBL-12 has been available for many years, as a Dietary Supplement.

There are many products out there that claim miraculous benefits, but it has always been accepted that in order to develop a product to help Cancer Sufferers, a lot of Medical and Scientific Research was needed in order to convince the authorities and the market of a product’s benefit and safety for the Patient. 

In 2006 we were lucky enough to find a Clinical Researcher who was interested in TBL-12. This was because of results he noticed with several of his Patients. This Researcher was the Head of the Multiple Myeloma Research arm of St. Vincent’s Cancer Hospital in New York City. We had to show its Safety and meet other Standards, but in December, 2008 we were granted permission from the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to be allowed to begin a Phase II Clinical Trial on TBL-12 for the Treatment of Multiple Myeloma (Bone Cancer).

In 2010, our Trial was moved to two new locations, one at Mount Sinai Hospital under the control of the original Researcher, and the other was at New York University, Cancer Center, under the control of the original Principal Investigator. Both of these Studies have been completed, but have not been fully documented and Finalized, but enough data was available, showing positive advantages, for an Application to be submitted to the FDA to have the product designated an Orphan Drug for the treatment of Multiple Myeloma (Bone Cancer). The application was submitted on the 12th of March, 2012 and was approved by the FDA on the 14th May, 2012.

Please follow this link below to see a full list of Research Documents and our Orphan Drug Designation :-

http://www.tbl12.com/research-on-clinical-trials-of-tbl12-against-bone-cancer

Also, please check these Videos in the GALLERY SECTION at the top of the page, These people have been a part of our research, and are still using  TBL-12, even after their Studies were completed, because they have had good results.                   

TBL-12 is the first Natural Product to be granted Orphan Drug Designation by the FDA for any form of Cancer Treatment.

Many people with a wide variety of Cancers, not just Multiple Myeloma, have used TBL-12.

To see some of the results achieved by TBL-12 on other forms of Cancer, please check out the web site, www.thecancerhasgone.com or check the Videos in the Gallery Section.

TBL-12 is an Immune Modulator and works on any Immune Related condition. One of the main benefits of TBL-12 is that unlike all conventional Cancer treatments, TBL-12 has no side-effects and does not interact with other Drugs and Medications, thereby increasing the "Quality of Life" of Patients, something that is very rare for Cancer Sufferers.


What we need to do now

In order for Unicorn Pacific to enter the Multiple Myeloma market as an equal to the established companies already in the market place, we need to obtain our Marketing Approval through the FDA.

Though it is relatively simple in principle, it is expensive in order to meet all the requirements as laid down by the FDA.

Stage 1:   We must complete our current Studies, and have all the documentation finalized and published in Peer Review Journals, for this we need to raise approximately US$750,000.00

Stage 2:   New Toxicity and Safety Data needs to be established. This is also a simple matter and just requires Studies to be conducted on TBL-12 in order to prove the toxicity of the product. We have an existing Study that shows that TBL-12 is completely non-toxic, but the Marketing Approval requires a New Study to be conducted showing the latest research. The cost of this stage is relevant to where the work is done, and who does it. My preference would be to use a USA Laboratory, as the FDA is always happier to accept US Research Facilities’ findings. The approximate cost of these would be US$2,500,000.00 for the Toxicity Report and relevant Filings to the FDA.

Stage 3:  This would entail a Phase III, multi-site Clinical Trial on a minimum of 300 patients – this costs about US$10,000.00 per patient per year. If fully enrolled it would cost around US$3,000,000.00 for the first year.

Summary of Costs:

Stage 1  -  US$  750.000.00

Stage 2  -  US$2,500.000.00

Stage 3  -  US$3,000.000.00

Total    -  US$6,250,000.00

The only way we can get our Marketing Approval is to meet the condition setout by the FDA and prove Scientifically that TBL-12 is Safe and Effective. This is expensive, but, is vital, not just for regulatory purposes, but in order to make sure vulnerable Sufferers are not taken advantage of.

Many products in the market make outlandish claims that cannot be substantiated scientifically, they cost a lot of money and give false hope – and most importantly, do not work. If a product does help, if it has benefits, it is important that it goes through the correct procedures and meets all the regulations. 

While many people will say that these Studies and Trials are obstacles, put in place by Major Companies and the FDA to keep little Companies out of the Market, the truth is, that they give Patients confidence, and assurance that they are using Safe and Effective Treatments. Every "Real" Product has to meet these standards, if they don't or can't it is because they are not good products.

This is why we are we are continuing the research with TBL-12, we know it works, it has been proven, now, we must meet our other obligations, not just to the FDA, but to the millions of sufferers who need TBL-12, and want the confidence that will come with Full FDA Approval.

Already we have done Phase II Clinical Studies at reputable research facilities, we have scientifically proven the benefits and safety of TBL-12, and we now need to get our Marketing Approval from the FDA.

This why we need your help. Your help will not only give us the Funds for the next stage, but will allow us to keep TBL-12 at a reasonable price for the consumers. By helping us with the Funding, we will not need to increase our prices to help recoup our costs, as is done by the major Drug Companies. We will be able to continue with our current price, allowing us to offer a Fully Approved Natural Product for the Treatment of Cancer at prices much lower than conventional Drugs, thereby being able to help many more people, and reducing the cost burden for everyone, the individual, the Government and the Health Care Providers.

TBL-12 is the first Natural Product to be granted Orphan Drug Designation for the Treatment of any Cancer. With your help, we will become the First Natural Product to be FDA Approved for Marketing for the treatment of Multiple Myeloma (Bone Cancer) and eventually many other Cancers.

                     - :  You can help make this a reality  :-


Summary

We have shown through anecdotal results from customers who have used TBL-12 over the years, and now, through scientific research conducted at leading, world-class facilities, that this product has the potential to become a leading Cancer Treatment for not only Multiple Myeloma, but many other Cancers as well.

Cancer is a devastating disease, and one that affects many people, more than we realize. Now there is a real opportunity to be a part of a real solution to this disease, one that not only helps these people survive and live longer, but lets them survive with Quality of Life, something that is not possible with the current therapies available.

product’s benefit and safety for the Patient. 
In 2006 we were lucky enough to
find a Clinical Researcher who was interested in TBL-12. This was because of
results he noticed with several of his Patients. This Researcher was the Head
of the Multiple Myeloma Research arm of St. Vincent’s Cancer Hospital in New
York City. We had to show its Safety and meet other Standards, but in December,
2008 we were granted permission from the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA)
to be allowed to begin a Phase II Clinical Trial on TBL-12 for the Treatment of
Multiple Myeloma (Bone Cancer).
In 2010, our Trial was moved to
two new locations, one at Mount Sinai Hospital under the control of the
original Researcher, and the other was at New York University, Cancer Center,
under the control of the original Principal Investigator. Both of these Studies
have been completed, but have not been fully documented and Finalized, but
enough data was available, showing positive advantages, for an Application to
be submitted to the FDA to have the product designated an Orphan Drug for the
treatment of Multiple Myeloma (Bone Cancer). The application was submitted on
the 12th of March, 2012 and was approved by the FDA on the 14th May, 2012.
Please follow this link below to
see a full list of Research Documents and our Orphan Drug Designation :-
http://www.tbl12.com/research-on-clinical-trials-of-tbl12-against-bone-cancer
Also, please check these Videos in the GALLERY SECTION at the top of the page, These people have been a part of our research, and are still using  TBL-12, even after their Studies were completed, because they have had good results.                   
TBL-12 is the first Natural
Product to be granted Orphan Drug Designation by the FDA for any form of Cancer
Treatment.
Many people with a wide variety of
Cancers, not just Multiple Myeloma, have used TBL-12.
To see some of the results achieved by TBL-12 on other forms of Cancer, please check out the web site, www.thecancerhasgone.com or check the Videos in the Gallery Section.
TBL-12 is an Immune Modulator and
works on any Immune Related condition. One of the main benefits of TBL-12 is that
unlike all conventional Cancer treatments, TBL-12 has no side-effects and does not interact with other Drugs and Medications, thereby increasing the "Quality of Life" of Patients, something that is very rare for Cancer Sufferers.



What we need to do now


In order for Unicorn Pacific to
enter the Multiple Myeloma market as an equal to the established companies
already in the market place, we need to obtain our Marketing Approval through
the FDA.
Though it is relatively simple in
principle, it is expensive in order to meet all the requirements as laid down
by the FDA.
Stage 1:   We must complete our current Studies, and have all the documentation
finalized and published in Peer Review Journals, for this we need to raise
approximately US$750,000.00
Stage 2:   New Toxicity and Safety Data needs to be established. This is also a
simple matter and just requires Studies to be conducted on TBL-12 in order to
prove the toxicity of the product. We have an existing Study that shows that
TBL-12 is completely non-toxic, but the Marketing Approval requires a New Study
to be conducted showing the latest research. The cost of this stage is relevant
to where the work is done, and who does it. My preference would be to use a USA
Laboratory, as the FDA is always happier to accept US Research Facilities’
findings. The approximate cost of these would be US$2,500,000.00 for the
Toxicity Report and relevant Filings to the FDA.
Stage 3:  This would entail a Phase III, multi-site Clinical Trial on a minimum
of 300 patients – this costs about US$10,000.00 per patient per year. If fully
enrolled it would cost around US$3,000,000.00 for the first year.
Summary of Costs:
Stage 1  -  US$ 
750.000.00
Stage 2  - 
US$2,500.000.00
Stage 3  - 
US$3,000.000.00
Total    -  US$6,250,000.00
The only way we can get our
Marketing Approval is to meet the condition setout by the FDA and prove
Scientifically that TBL-12 is Safe and Effective. This is expensive, but, is
vital, not just for regulatory purposes, but in order to make sure vulnerable
Sufferers are not taken advantage of.
Many products in the market make
outlandish claims that cannot be substantiated scientifically, they cost a lot
of money and give false hope – and most importantly, do not work. If a product
does help, if it has benefits, it is important that it goes through the correct
procedures and meets all the regulations. 
While many people will say that these Studies and Trials are obstacles, put in place by Major Companies and the FDA to keep little Companies out of the Market, the truth is, that they give Patients confidence, and assurance that they are using Safe and Effective Treatments. Every "Real" Product has to meet these standards, if they don't or can't it is because they are not good products.
This is why we are we are continuing the research with
TBL-12, we know it works, it has been proven, now, we must meet our other obligations, not just to the FDA, but to the millions of sufferers who need TBL-12, and want the confidence that will come with Full FDA Approval.
Already we have done Phase II
Clinical Studies at reputable research facilities, we have scientifically
proven the benefits and safety of TBL-12, and we now need to get our Marketing
Approval from the FDA.
This why we need your help. Your
help will not only give us the Funds for the next stage, but will allow us to
keep TBL-12 at a reasonable price for the consumers. By helping us with the
Funding, we will not need to increase our prices to help recoup our costs, as
is done by the major Drug Companies. We will be able to continue with our
current price, allowing us to offer a Fully Approved Natural Product for the
Treatment of Cancer at prices much lower than conventional Drugs, thereby being
able to help many more people, and reducing the cost burden for everyone, the individual,
the Government and the Health Care Providers.
TBL-12 is the first Natural
Product to be granted Orphan Drug Designation for the Treatment of any Cancer. With
your help, we will become the First Natural Product to be FDA Approved for
Marketing for the treatment of Multiple Myeloma (Bone Cancer) and eventually
many other Cancers.
                     - :  You can help make this a reality
 :-


Summary


We have shown through anecdotal
results from customers who have used TBL-12 over the years, and now, through
scientific research conducted at leading, world-class facilities, that this
product has the potential to become a leading Cancer Treatment for not only
Multiple Myeloma, but many other Cancers as well.
Cancer is a devastating disease,
and one that affects many people, more than we realize. Now there is a real
opportunity to be a part of a real solution to this disease, one that not only
helps these people survive and live longer, but lets them survive with Quality
of Life, something that is not possible with the current therapies available.

story:
The Sanctuary Project

Storm Mountain Sanctuary Retreat Center, LLC is a project dedicated to making mind-body wellness retreats more accessible. Through your support, Storm Mountain Sanctuary will be able to:
  • Reach out to underserved populations.
  • Provide skills and resources to those with unique physical and mental health needs.
  • Provide a sanctuary to those who have been unable to find relief through traditional medical treatments.
  • Foster love, compassion, healing, and wellness in our communities.
Located on over 5 beautiful acres of mountain property in the heart of Roosevelt National Forest, Storm Mountain Sanctuary is a nurturing and grounding environment, where guests can embark on a profound path toward wellness and balance. More information on the Sanctuary can be found here: http://www.stormmountainsanctuary.com


Why is the Sanctuary Crowdfunding?

In order to provide quality holistic care to those who need it, regardless of their financial means, Storm Mountain Sanctuary needs some initial capital to get the project going. We have set a goal of raising at least $20,000. 

  • The first 50% of net contributions from this crowdfunding campaign will go toward scholarships for those with limited financial means. ("Net contributions" means contributions received minus actual incurred costs of the crowdfunding campaign). 
  • The other 50% of net contributions will go to property costs (including improvement and maintenance), equipment acquisition, retreat supplies, advertising, and outreach.

About the Director

Wesley M. Bowman, MSEd, LPC is the Director of Storm Mountain Sanctuary. Wesley is a caring and compassionate healer, who has dedicated his life to helping others. He is committed to providing quality holistic care to those who need it, regardless of their financial means. Wesley is a life-long learner and has acquired training in a variety of healing modalities:

  • Licensed Professional Counselor
  • Certified Neuro-Linguistic Programming Practitioner
  • Certified Life Coach
  • Brainspotting Practitioner
  • Trained in Herbal Medicine
  • Reiki Practitioner
  • Trained in a Variety of Meditation Practices
  • Student of Eastern and Western Philosophy

Wesley has received academic awards for his research on abuse, presented at academic conferences, contributed to published research, and is a bona-fide expert on factors that contribute to healing efficacy.

Storm Mountain Sanctuary is the culmination of Wesley's life work. 


Perks of Contributing

A full breakdown of contribution perks can be found here


Non-Monetary Contributions

For those with limited financial resources, there are ways to still support the Sanctuary without contributing money. Some helpful ways of showing support include:

  • Encouraging friends, family, and colleagues to support the project.
  • Donating supplies, such as meditation cushions, blankets, cleaning supplies, landscaping supplies, essential oils, herbal supplies, etc. 
  • Volunteering time to help with property improvements and maintenance.
  • Sharing links to the Storm Mountain Sanctuary Website on your own website, Facebook page, etc.
To explore non-monetary opportunties for contributing, please contact Wesley at http://www.stormmountainsanctuary.com/book-your... or call (970) 238-0268.


The Potential Health Benefits of Attending a Sanctuary Retreat 

The potential health benefits of attending a Storm Mountain Sanctuary retreat can be found here. Additionally, more information on some of the healing modalities used can be found below:

  • Herbal Medicine

  • Reiki

  • Aromatherapy

  • Meditation Training

  • Mindfulness Training

  • Biofeedback and Relaxation Training​​

  • Sound Therapy

  • Negative Ion Therapy
  • ​Far Infrared Healing​

story:
After the recent atrocities, Gaza has been left in a land of ruin. Schools, hospitals, UN shelters and homes have been destroyed, displaying nothing but rubble in a once prosperous country. The damages are not only physical, but physchological. Hence we aim to provide care in ways that excel far beyond simple food donations and medication, though this is a necessity that we provide also. With your help, we can build schools and help rebuild lives.

There is still hope.

Please donate generously, we can do this together.

story:
Short Summary:

Your donation to the International Committee for Chinese Orphans (ICCO), which supports the Tianjin orphanage, will help to improve the orphans’ life by providing calorie rich formula for the orphans in order to have healthy growth.

My motivation for this campaign:

I volunteered at the Tianjin orphanage during my one year stay in Tianjin, China. I only spent a few hours with the kids every week but they gave me back so much more: The smile in the children’s faces when I played with them and fed them was the most heartwarming moment that I have experienced in my life. Coming from a country in the world where state welfare is taken for granted I also experienced that this is not the case in every country of the world. Every week I saw new orphans coming in but I also had to deal with the reality that a lot of the children had serious disabilities like heart conditions which needed surgery but were unlikely to be given this opportunity due to a lack of funds. But it is not only the expensive surgical interventions that some of the orphans need, it is also basic things like proper nutrition, formula, orthopedic shoes or medical devices for the clinic in the orphanage, that are expensive and can’t all be covered by the orphanage itself.

Why donate?

100% of the profits of this campaign will help improve the life of Tianjin’s orphans. The profits will be used for the nutrition program. This provides high calorie, nutrient dense formula for preemies and at risk children. To sponsor one child for one month is US$100. ICCO is currently supporting 8 children in this program. Reaching the goal of 4,800US$ would support the 8 children for 6 months.


          Zhang Xin Yu before and after the first nurtition project in 2012 

The organization you are donating to:

The orphanage in Tianjin is incorporated in the International Committee for Chinese Orphans (ICCO):

  • ICCO is a volunteer organization that has been dedicated to improving the lives of Tianjin’s disabled orphans since the early 1990’s.
  • The Tianjin Institute of Children’s Welfare has been housing orphans since 1882.
  • Currently, there are 200+ children with physical or mental disability in the orphanage. As well as 450+ kids in foster care.
  • ICCO increase levels of care by facilitating physical therapists, special educators and other professionals.
  • ICCO also provides financial assistance to the Adult Facility, a separate facility in Tianjin that provides for the care of those who are too old for the orphanage (15+ years old) and unable to live independently. The over 350 residents there are provided with 24-hour care, physical therapy, medical care, educational classes and nutritional support.
  • The Committee provides financial assistance for medical assistants, surgeries, special formula and special equipment.
  • For over 20 years, ICCO has succeeded in improving the lives of the children with help from the volunteers and donors, ICCO will continue to benefit the orphans of China.
  • ICCO provides financial assistance in many areas: support for medical surgeries like cleft lip/palate repair, heart & eye surgery.
  • ICCO provides milk powder to children with special medical needs such as PKU, milk allergies, and lactose intolerance. They also provide funds for wheelchair repairs, leg braces, and other special medical needs.

      Top left: Brenda Tea and Rebekah Lee, Co-Chair and Treasurer of ICCO

Other ways you can help:

You are more than welcome to donate to the orphanage after this campaign has ended. The easiest way to do this is on the Tianjin ICCO website: http://tjicco.org/donate/. Again: Every Dollar, Pound or Euro we donate helps to improve the lives of these orphans and puts a smile on their face. So the next time you buy another coffee or pack of cigarettes, you might want to think about how much more of an impact you could make by donating the money to help a disabled orphan instead.

story:
Short Summary

The border of Mexico is full of poverty and the inability to pay for healthcare or the funds to get to a city with free care.  We take quarterly medical mission teams to provide medical care to those who receive no care. Especially young women who are pregnant, and people with terminal illness or chronic illness who need ongoing monitoring and medications. 

MEDICAL MISSION trips are our greatest PRIORITY. 

We are a 501c3 non-profit organization designed to change lives, one life at a time. 

It's like the Starfish Story:

Once upon a time, there was an old man who used to go to the ocean to do his writing.He had a habit of walking on the beach every morning before he began his work. Early one morning, he was walking along the shore after a big storm had passed and found the vast beach littered with starfish as far as the eye could see, stretching in both directions. 

Off in the distance, the old man noticed a small boy approaching.  As the boy walked, he paused every so often and as he grew closer, the man could see that he was occasionally bending down to pick up an object and throw it into the sea. The boy came closer still and the man called out, “Good morning!  May I ask what it is that you are doing?”

The young boy paused, looked up, and replied “Throwing starfish into the ocean. The tide has washed them up onto the beach and they can’t return to the sea by themselves,” the youth replied. “When the sun gets high, they will die, unless I throw them back into the water.”

The old man replied, “But there must be tens of thousands of starfish on this beach. I’m afraid you won’t really be able to make much of a difference.”

The boy bent down, picked up yet another starfish and threw it as far as he could into the ocean. Then he turned, smiled and said, “It made a difference to that one!”

adapted from The Star Thrower, by Loren Eiseley (1907 – 1977)


What We Need & What You Get

We need funds for the following:

 - funds for women's paps and early detection education, pre-natal care

 - funds for medications and diagnostic equipment

The Impact

When my husband and I first started doing research on the border we went to small towns on the border. When you walk over the bridge you hear the cries of women and children. They are begging for something to be thrown down to them: food, money or both. Their cries are deeply implanted into my heart and mind and we must do something to change the way they have to live. I cannot sit in my warm home in the morning, with a cup of coffee, and not hear the "cries from under the bridge". 

Life on the Border makes a tangible and immediate difference in the lives of these people. The human spirit is given HOPE through medical care! 

MEDICAL MISSION trips are our greatest PRIORITY. 

ONE OF OUR SUCCESS STORIES: 

March of 2014, we met Antonio. Antonio could hardly walk. He was in great pain and used a cane. He needed back surgery. Life on the Border walked him through his countries free medical care system and he was able to get on a 1 year waiting list for surgery. Life on the Border provided medications, in the form of injections, each month so that he could make it one year. Antonio is home now and healing. He went quickly from a wheelchair to a cane and is now out selling again for his business. ONE LIFE MAKES A DIFFERENCE! 

Risks & Challenges

We have built a name, in the community, that can be trusted. We build relationships and join resources. We are capable of surmounting the challenges that the border brings so that we may reach people who are in desperate need.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You may donate medical equipment
  • You can volunteer your time for a medical mission
  • You can donate baby care food and care items, and medicines. 
  • YOU can make a PROFOUND difference in ONE life.......

And that's all there is to it.

.

story:
Most water filters remove only one kind of particulate. MUV not only removes 99.999% of viruses and bacteria, but also allows you to change the filter modules for your specific water needs. If you are getting water from your tap at home in North America, you don’t need to be concerned about viruses being in your water. What you may find in your tap water is chlorine and metals. In this case you don’t need to use the MUV 3 module that removes viruses, or the MUV 2 that removes bacteria, but you would want to use the MUV 1 module that removes chemicals and metals. 

MUV Benefits

MUV Adapts to Your Lifestyle

MUV can be customized to anyone's needs, whether you are an avid hiker, traveling the world, or simply want clean water on the go. MUV can be adapted to meet your clean water needs.

.

Filtration Specifics

MUV is made of three different filtration mediums. This allows you to choose the filter medium best suited for the severity of the water you will be filtering.

Activated Carbon Fiber - MUV 1 Module

Unlike traditional activated carbon in powder or granular form, Activated Carbon Fiber is a fibrous adsorbent that has 10x higher adsorption than traditional activated carbon and gives you faster flow rates.

Activated Carbon Fiber can remove:

  • Chemicals
  • Heavy metals
  • Discoloration of water
  • Negative taste
  • Filters up to 150 gallons

Hollow Fiber - MUV 2 Module    

Hollow Fiber membrane are tiny hollow tubes that look like straws. These fibers have a porous membrane wall that allows clean water into the fiber and prohibits contaminants from passing through the membrane. Hollow Fiber membranes filter water by size exclusion. Size exclusion works by having a pore size smaller than the size of the contaminants. Clean water is allowed to go through the membrane while large contaminants cannot fit through the pores.

Hollow Fiber can remove:

  • Bacteria (E. Coli, Cholera, Typhoid, etc) 
  • Protozoa (Cryptosporidium) 
  • Parasites (Giardia)
  • Filters up to 100,000 gallons

Nanalum - MUV 3 Module    

The technology used in Nanalum was developed by NASA as a way to reuse waste water on the International Space Station. Nanalum works through electro-absorption and is manufactured with non-woven highly engineered water filter paper which is also impregnated with Granular Activated Carbon (GAC). The Nanalum module has a strong positive electrostatic charge when wet. Like a strong magnet, the positive electrostatic charge of the Nanalum attracts and traps organic contaminants..

Nanalum can remove:

  • Viruses (Hepatitis A, Hepatitis E, Poliovirus, Meningitis, etc) 
  • Bacteria (E. Coli, Cholera, Typhoid, etc) 
  • Protozoa (Cryptosporidium)
  • Parasites (Giardia) 
  • Heavy Metals 
  • Chemicals 
  • Negative taste 
  • Filters up to 90 gallons

How to Use MUV

MUV can be adapted to virtually any lifestyle or activity. Here are some of the ways that you can use MUV.    

  • In a water bottle 
  • In-line with a hydration bladder 
  • Use as a straw and drink directly from the water source 
  • As a gravity system 
  • With a pump 
  • Threaded onto a standard 28mm bottle top

There are dozens of different ways that you can customize and adapt MUV to your needs. You no longer need to buy a bunch of different filters for one specific use. MUV will adapt for you.

History and About Us

MUV has been years in the making. Last year we came out with a product that wasn’t quite ready and, frankly, it was a little confusing. This was called the Oasis Filter and we just missed our funding on Kickstarter. We learned so much from that failed attempt. We got a lot of really good feedback and a lot of support from our backers who wanted us to keep the project going. We went back to the drawing board and hired a design team.

We created many different designs and concepts and with the help of our product development team, focus groups and more feedback from our customers, we developed what has now become MUV.

We spent a lot of time building prototypes and 3D models. This helped us refine the size and feel of the filter components.

We are very excited about the final product and how well the different modules work together. We have had a lot of requests for additional colors. Perhaps as a stretch goal...hint, hint.

Rewards

Risks and Challenges

We have completed all the sourcing of materials, and are 90% done with the final design. Our molds and tooling have already been designed and are awaiting production.

The big hurdle is finalizing testing and certification. However, since our sourcing partners complete internal testing procedures we are confident in a fluid certification process. We have certified other filter products but due to the complexity of certification for a modular water filter, we will have to undergo much more complex testing for the MUV Adaptable Water Filter.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Most water filters remove only one kind of particulate. MUV not only removes 99.999% of viruses and bacteria, but also allows you to change the filter modules for your specific water needs. If you are getting water from your tap at home in North America, you don’t need to be concerned about viruses being in your water. What you may find in your tap water is chlorine and metals. In this case you don’t need to use the MUV 3 module that removes viruses, or the MUV 2 that removes bacteria, but you would want to use the MUV 1 module that removes chemicals and metals. 
MUV Benefits

MUV Adapts to Your Lifestyle
MUV can be customized to anyone's needs, whether you are an avid hiker, traveling the world, or simply want clean water on the go. MUV can be adapted to meet your clean water needs.
.
Filtration Specifics

MUV is made of three different filtration mediums. This allows you to choose the filter medium best suited for the severity of the water you will be filtering.


Activated Carbon Fiber - MUV 1 Module
Unlike traditional activated carbon in powder or granular form, Activated Carbon Fiber is a fibrous adsorbent that has 10x higher adsorption than traditional activated carbon and gives you faster flow rates.
Activated Carbon Fiber can remove:

Chemicals
Heavy metals
Discoloration of water
Negative taste
Filters up to 150 gallons


Hollow Fiber - MUV 2 Module    
Hollow Fiber membrane are tiny hollow tubes that look like straws. These fibers have a porous membrane wall that allows clean water into the fiber and prohibits contaminants from passing through the membrane. Hollow Fiber membranes filter water by size exclusion. Size exclusion works by having a pore size smaller than the size of the contaminants. Clean water is allowed to go through the membrane while large contaminants cannot fit through the pores.
Hollow Fiber can remove:

Bacteria (E. Coli, Cholera, Typhoid, etc) 
Protozoa (Cryptosporidium) 
Parasites (Giardia)
Filters up to 100,000 gallons


Nanalum - MUV 3 Module    
The technology used in Nanalum was developed by NASA as a way to reuse waste water on the International Space Station. Nanalum works through electro-absorption and is manufactured with non-woven highly engineered water filter paper which is also impregnated with Granular Activated Carbon (GAC). The Nanalum module has a strong positive electrostatic charge when wet. Like a strong magnet, the positive electrostatic charge of the Nanalum attracts and traps organic contaminants..
Nanalum can remove:

Viruses (Hepatitis A, Hepatitis E, Poliovirus, Meningitis, etc) 
Bacteria (E. Coli, Cholera, Typhoid, etc) 
Protozoa (Cryptosporidium)
Parasites (Giardia) 
Heavy Metals 
Chemicals 
Negative taste 
Filters up to 90 gallons

How to Use MUV

MUV can be adapted to virtually any lifestyle or activity. Here are some of the ways that you can use MUV.    

In a water bottle 
In-line with a hydration bladder 
Use as a straw and drink directly from the water source 
As a gravity system 
With a pump 
Threaded onto a standard 28mm bottle top

There are dozens of different ways that you can customize and adapt MUV to your needs. You no longer need to buy a bunch of different filters for one specific use. MUV will adapt for you.

History and About Us
MUV has been years in the making. Last year we came out with a product that wasn’t quite ready and, frankly, it was a little confusing. This was called the Oasis Filter and we just missed our funding on Kickstarter. We learned so much from that failed attempt. We got a lot of really good feedback and a lot of support from our backers who wanted us to keep the project going. We went back to the drawing board and hired a design team.


We created many different designs and concepts and with the help of our product development team, focus groups and more feedback from our customers, we developed what has now become MUV.

We spent a lot of time building prototypes and 3D models. This helped us refine the size and feel of the filter components.

We are very excited about the final product and how well the different modules work together. We have had a lot of requests for additional colors. Perhaps as a stretch goal...hint, hint.
Rewards







Risks and Challenges
We have completed all the sourcing of materials, and are 90% done with the final design. Our molds and tooling have already been designed and are awaiting production.
The big hurdle is finalizing testing and certification. However, since our sourcing partners complete internal testing procedures we are confident in a fluid certification process. We have certified other filter products but due to the complexity of certification for a modular water filter, we will have to undergo much more complex testing for the MUV Adaptable Water Filter.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
