to lead a life of total awesomeness - and why he wants you to do the same.

What people are saying about Dai Manuel and the Whole Life Fitness Manifesto?

"In addition to being one of the nicest people on planet earth, Dai Manuel has been a thought leader in the health and fitness space for many years.  We are so excited that he is bringing his wealth of knowledge about how to be more awesome at life with his new book."  ~ Juliet & Kelly Starrett, Co-founders of San Francisco Crossfit and Mobility WOD
"Dai’s manifesto is awesome! This book is fun, exciting and most importantly an effective tool that can help make meaningful behaviour changes in our hectic lives. Read it" ~ Peter van Stolk CEO SPUD.ca 
“Whole life fitness is vital, but in our busy world it can be a bit complicated.  Dai simplifies this complex quest in a way that make it achievable and fun for all.” ~ Richard Monette, CEO Active for Life
"Dai Manuel's Whole Life Fitness Manifesto is pure brilliance, and everything that the fitness, health and wellness space NEEDS in a book, in a leader, in a movement. Dai Manuel isn't just lecturing in his book- he is LEADING and LIVING a transformed LIFESTYLE. He walks the walk and makes everyone fully understand that they can do it to: transform their life. There's a big difference between authors that write books about a "program"- they inspire people to WANT to change, but Dai has the ability to enable everyone to FEEL and EMBRACE their potential to make that change a reality. Dai Manuel is to me the definition of FitFluential in every aspect of the word. He is as genuine as they come and has created a treasure of a book here that is inviting to read, and will change lives everywhere. You simply MUST get this book, start following everything this man does, and, you can thank me later for that." ~ Kelly Olexa, CEO, Founder of FitFluential - We are Fitness Found(TM)
"Dai is an ambassador that lives and breathes the Whole Life Fitness Manifesto message. His mantra provides "a less is more" blueprint that jump started my workouts with ideas and a powerful community." ~ Riaz Meghji, Breakfast Television Vancouver Co-Host and Creator of Every Conversation Counts
"Dai is pretty much a long proponent of fitness for the RIGHT reasons. From age 15 onwards he's been determined to not just help himself, but everyone he meets along the way. His passion and love for what he does in infectious and to see his thoughts and ideas on paper for everyone is part of his ultimate goal, to share his knowledge." ~ Drex - Evening Host / News Talk 980 - CKNW
"Every now and then you meet an individual in the health and fitness industry that you absolutely want to support and so it was when I met Dai. Dai is dynamic, knowledgeable and above all- does it for the right reasons. Dai's passion is to help others.live a life full of health.  You have bought this book and clearly made the right decision and now when you heed Dai's wisdom in this book - you have indeed made a smart choice!" ~ Kathy Smart, RNC, RSNA, PTS, HTC (North America's Gluten- Free Expert, Best Selling Author, TV Show Host & CEO of Live The Smart Way) 
“Life and the way we move through it is seemingly moving faster and faster. Time has become the only real commodity worth anything these days. Dai’s take on carving out 30 minutes each day for your body, mind, and spirit is a true guide on how to live each day in this fast paced world.” ~ Richard Pollock, president of Pauling Labs Inc. (makers of Ener-C)




BONUS: A personal message from Coach Moose, "Do you want to live a life of total awesomeness?"


Some years ago, I asked myself that same question. I realized that while I had a lot to be thankful for in my life, I was falling short of my own potential. Don’t get me wrong—I was doing the best I could, and life had been trucking along fine. I had moved to a new city on the West Coast, attended university, started to discover myself, landed a great job, fell in love, traveled a little and started a family. But I never seemed to have time for the things that were most important to me. I was also spending more money than I had.
A balancing act called 'life'
My health and fitness ebbed and flowed throughout my life. When I only had to worry about myself, I could always find time for fitness. But when other people—my family—became a significant part of my life, I felt pulled to prioritize “us” rather than “me,” and my health often suffered as a result. I figured that this was just the way it went; after all, it seemed like everyone else I knew was on the same path. But in the back of my mind, I was always thinking: Is this really how life is supposed to be?
As time went on, I kept trying to balance the priorities in my life, striving to attain “perfection,” but I was constantly disappointed in myself. I was never able to truly balance it all. When I let one part of my life become the shining star, all other aspects of my life would dim in comparison. If I focused on family, my career suffered. When I turned my energies toward my career, in particular when I was building my company, my family felt it, and so did my health. I just never seemed to have enough to make everything work. Do you know the feeling?


Like many people, I found happy distraction in activities that didn’t propel me forward in life—pub nights, boys’ trips, nights out with my colleagues and long days on the golf course. I kept telling myself that tomorrow would be the day to “reset” and get everything in order: Tomorrow is the day to start my new habits. Tomorrow is the start of my path to awesomeness. But you know what? Every day I’d wake up to today and tomorrow would never arrive.
Maybe you can relate. Many of us put all of our obligations— ether it’s work, family, or social life—ahead of our own well-being and personal growth. We’re so busy taking care of what her people need from us that we forget to pay attention to our own needs. The problem with that is that while this might help us to get a lot done, mostly for others, we’re probably not feeling satisfied with our lives. Even worse, if we’re not careful, we can burn out—both mentally and physically. And when that happens, we not only let ourselves down, we also let down who depend on us.
Why create the Whole Life Fitness Manifesto?
My goal in creating the Whole Life Fitness Manifesto is to sweep away the negative energies, accentuate the positive ones and empower you to radiate your own awesomeness, along with the greatness of those around you. In a nutshell, the Whole Life Fitness Manifesto is about putting yourself first, which will ultimately benefit those you care about. We all have people in our lives that matter to us. It’s time we begin to matter to ourselves so that we can enjoy an incredible life with each other. So, welcome to a new kind of fitness book. We’re not just talking about physical fitness here. We’re acknowledging that whole-life awesomeness encompasses fitness of mind, body and spirit. And because this is something that we all deserve, this book is for everyone. Even the most stamina-challenged person can tackle the Whole Life Fitness Power 30 program, which will also test you if you are already pushing your own fitness limits.

Getting a grip on total health and wellness is particularly important now because of disturbing rises in obesity and diabetes. Current health statistics, which you’ll find throughout this book, are not pretty. In fact, they are a sobering wake-up call.
But there is reason for hope. On the other end of the spectrum, there is a booming personal growth movement, in which people are realizing their limitless potential as human beings. Put simply, linking your greater potential to your physical fitness is a powerful combination that can change—and possibly save—your life.
As you’ll see, workouts don’t have to be a chore. Working out is really about enjoying a burst of movement that can function as a reset, break, and check-in with your body throughout the day. It’s about feeling how daily movement can activate all kinds of positive things in your life.
What makes me so certain about all this? 
Let me share a deeply personal story.
When I was a kid, there were two students in my school who were extremely over- weight. I was one of them. As a 91-kg (200-lb) 15-year-old, I had a body mass index (BMI) of over 40; I was, by definition, morbidly obese. But after a big personal break- through shortly after my 15th birthday, I dug deep to make a change and, quite simply, I never looked back. My mental attitude played a pivotal role in making that change. I wanted to be healthy, happy and more satisfied with my life, and I did whatever it took to make that happen.


So what about today?
Today, I am honored to be part of a healthy and beautiful family, with my wife, Christie, and my daughters, Chardonae and Brielyn. I constantly strive to live a life  of which I’m proud. In my professional life, I’ve evolved from a successful fitness equipment entrepreneur to a personal trainer, lifestyle coach, speaker, author and all-around “life enhancer.” I’m honored to have the ability to help people every day— now that’s pretty awesome!
Beyond my family, physical health and career, one of the most important aspects of my well-being is my mental health, or emotional fitness. I continually strive to cultivate a deep sense of purpose in my heart and mind; this is what makes me spring out of bed in the morning. And at the end of each day, I ask myself: Was I the best person I could possibly be today? If I can answer yes more often than not, then I know I’m on the right track.
I know we are all capable of achieving whole life fitness. That is, while I believe that we can work out on our own, we never have to be alone with our fitness and lifestyle goals. Now that you’ve found this book, you have found your community—your tribe. No matter what your current lifestyle, age, gender or personality, you are not alone. We are here to encourage and support each other to be the happiest, healthiest versions of ourselves.
So, hands up if you’re ready for a whole life of awesomeness!


PS - a huge thank you to all those that have supported me and my family on this journey. It's been quite the ride and it's only just beginning. Hoorah!

story:
Hello and thanks for checking out V Well Health. We are a passionate team of nutrition and wellness experts with one goal in mind: to spread hope, health and healing to as many people as possible. 

We’re driven by our co-founder’s powerful story, where Vicky DeRosa, a blind mother, can see again after changing her diet and lifestyle habits. Our vision is to create a worldwide community where people learn to eat better, live healthier and be happier.

Your participation and contribution can help make this a reality as we develop and launch our Healthier, Happier You Challenge - health for the body, calm for the mind, and bliss for the spirit. 

If you're too tired to cook and feel guilty about not making healthy choices for you and your family, this Challenge is for you. Our proven programs help you lose weight and have more energy while still eating healthy, delicious food. We make it easier for you to live a happier and healthier life with our done-for-you shopping guides, health coaches, on-demand fitness videos, app integration and daily inspirational tips. In just 10 weeks, you'll be beach body ready, feeling great, and have a chance to win $1,000!

Past challenge participants have lost on average 12 pounds, reduced body fat, increased muscle mass and, perhaps most importantly, learned about real, authentic health. They don’t go on a diet for a few weeks - they learn a whole new way of approaching food, activity and health. Participants leave the challenge looking and feeling better and having more energy.  

This is V Well Health, a new culture of healthy and happier living.

Want to join the challenge? Select the "Join the Challenge" perk on the right. You'll get 50% off by joining through our Indiegogo page and helping us spread the message of hope, health and healing as far as it will go!

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $50,000 to make our vision a reality – we’ve been working with individuals, celebrities, families, companies, hospitals and other organizations to get them healthy and more productive. We’ve learned what works and what doesn’t, and are putting everything we've learned into this new Challenge.

The scope for this Challenge is on a much larger scale so the funds will go towards the development, fulfillment and delivery of a world-class program that anyone can benefit from. We are creating a lifestyle Challenge that will provide people with the knowledge and the tools and resources for maintaining permanent overall health and weight control.

This requires a crack, passionate team to make everything run smoothly. The team will include chefs and dietitians, fitness experts, an editorial team, videographers, and support staff - everything and everyone required to make this challenge a success

You can participate by yourself, with friends and family, or get your company to participate. The more people you join with, the more likely you’ll succeed in becoming healthier and happier quicker.

You can join the Happier Healthier You Challenge for a special Indiegogo launch price of $50 by selecting the "Join the Challenge" perk. After April 15, the price will jump back up to $97.

In exchange, you'll gain access to all the tools and resources you need to get healthy (with a beach body!) in just 10 weeks:

  • Premium daily, motivational and devotional tips to wake up to
  • Fun inspiring daily health tips to help you stick with the program and stay strong
  • Easy but effective workout videos you can follow in the comfort and privacy of your own home
  • Shopping lists to create delicious meals based on the foods you love to eat
  • Weekly menus that are affordable, healthy and simple to make
  • Health coaching by Vicky herself showing you how to do a pantry makeover, go food shopping, read nutritional labels and answer questions
  • Weekly pledges focused on improving one healthy habit

If you’ve tried and failed with programs in the past, consider this: Vicky has deliberately gained over 30 pounds this year to show you the exact step by step strategy to lose this and more despite still being legally blind. If she can do it, so can you!

Contributors will receive a range of perks including admission into the Challenge, access to the program, healthy menus and recipes.

Sample menu

There is also a chance to win! We are going to pick a Biggest Winner at the end of the contest to receive a $1,000 prize. The winner will be picked based on progress (before and after pictures, measurements, weight and BMI changes), but also their personal story. We want to hear about your body and health challenges and your journey to a healthy lifestyle!

And with health and happiness on the table, everyone who joins comes out a winner in the end.

The Impact

Check out some of the results from previous challenges done at Hackensack University Medical Center in New Jersey.

We believe that being able to operate a large scale challenge like this is the first step in getting millions of people to change their lives. Contributing to our cause is the first step towards making the world a healthier place!

Other Ways You Can Encourage Healthy Living

If you don't plan on joining the challenge you can still contribute for someone you think might benefit from the challenge. And if you can't contribute, we understand, but you can still help us out by:

  • Sharing this campaign on your Facebook page or through e-mail (use the Indiegogo share tools). 
  • Follow us on Facebook!

We appreciate you taking the time to read this and thank you in advance for sharing this with your friends, family and coworkers.

story:
with support from 


We are conducting one of the first studies that is comparing the healing potential of conventional psychotherapy and ayahuasca. The preliminary results are promising and will hopefully be used as a part of scientific evidence needed to legalize the therapeutic use of ayahuasca and associated method of psychedelic psychotherapy.

But we need your help! We are a small independent institute, depending solely on external contributors and we need your help and support, which will help us cover our on-going research and publication costs.

By making a donation and sharing the information about this campaign you have an amazing opportunity:

  • to help bring about one of the first studies, comparing the effects of ayahuasca and conventional psychotherapy,
     
  • to help various organizations use new scientific evidence such as our study, to convince policy makers to legalize the therapeutic use of ayahuasca and psychedelic psychotherapy,
     
  • and to support an independent research institute whose goal is to broaden scientific research into psychedelic medicine and psychedelic psychotherapy.

We will be extremely grateful for any amount that you are able to donate and we promise it will be beneficial and will go a very long way!

About us - Rabbit Hole Institute

 


Presenting preliminary findings of our study at the Interdisciplinary Conference on Psychedelics Research (ICPR) 2016 in Amsterdam.

Rabbit hole is an institute for psychotherapy and research of healing potential of non-ordinary states of consciousness. Professionals working in the Institute offer integrative, psychodynamic and transpersonal psychotherapy and conduct research in the field of different psychotherapeutic modalities and other healing techniques. Visit us at www.rabbitholeinstitute.org.

What is ayahuasca, its effects  and how it is used?

Ayahuasca is the name for a brew that has been used for centuries by the indigenous populations of the Amazon for healing and divination. Its main ingredients are Banisteriopsis Caapi and Psychotria Viridis, but other plants are often added to the brew. After the colonization of the region the use of ayahuasca diminished and almost disappeared. Fortunately in some regions of the Amazon the use of ayahuasca continued, enabling the ancient knowledge about healing with this ancient medicine to be conserved.

Why the research?

The “official” treatment modalities such as western medicine and psychotherapy are not considering ayahuasca to be of healing value, but as of lately there is a growing body of evidence suggesting that ayahuasca may be useful to treat substance use disorders, anxiety and depression, PTSD and other mental health issues (Doinguez-Clave et. al., 2016). Therefore we have decided to conduct a following study, focusing mainly on the influence of ayahuasca use in psychopathology and general well being of the participants. With the study we are trying to outline the similarities between ayahuasca experience and psychotherapeutic process and compare the effectiviness of both.

The research

We have officially started the research in September 2015 and will finish it by the end of 2016. There will be minimum of 40 participants included in the study, in which we are using semi structured interviews and CORE outcome questionnaires to evaluate the effects of ayahuasca on psychopathology and general well being of the participants. Visit our research page to learn more.

Why we need your help?

This is an independent study, and we are dependent solely on external contributors to cover the on-going costs of research, publication and presentations of research findings on scientific conferences. We are convinced that our study will make a significant contribution in making ayahuasca a part of legitimate treatment modalities and we will only be able to do this with your support. Thank you!

Questions?

Have a question or a comment? Hit the comments tab at the top and we'll reply as soon as possible!


Meet the Research Team
 

Mina Pas, M.D.
Mina Pas is an integrative-relational psychotherapist and an M.D. (medical doctor). She trained at IPSA institute where she received a certificate from International Association for Integrative Psychotherapy (IIPA).

Marko Vide
Marko Vide is a resident psychotherapist trained at SIP and IPP institute, with a B.S. degree in Psychotherapy Science from Sigmund Freud University in Vienna. He is also a trainee at Grof Transpersonal Training.
 

 

Anja Mihevc
Anja Mihevc is a researcher with a M.S. degree in Social Pedagogy and years of experience in Harm Reduction programs.

 

Simona Sabic
Simona Sabic is a researcher with a M.S. degree in Social Pedagogy and years of experience in Harm Reduction programs.

 

Spela Dovzan
Spela Dovzan is a researcher with a M.S. degree in Social Pedagogy and years of experience in Harm Reduction programs.

story:
BioTraps quickly and efficiently deliver insecticide within a simulated breeding ground to eliminate the female mosquito and her larvae. 

Our specially designed Biotraps are low-cost, easy to deploy and disintegrate in 4-6 weeks, when replacement is needed.

As Featured In....

You can help us provide medical aid and mosquito prevention to people in need.

 Direct Relief and International Medical Corps helps us reach countries affected by mosquito-borne illnesses.




       

                


Our first product was Greenlid, the world's first compostable compost bin (www.mygreenlid.com), which successfully launched on Kickstarter, then closed a deal on Dragons' Den (Canada's Shark Tank) and is now widely available across Canada and Western U.S.

Based on the waterproofing technology that we patented with Greenlid, our Founder, Dr. Morgan Wyatt created Biotrap so it would hold water long enough to mimic the breeding ground of mosquitoes and are coated with insecticide so they target only the female mosquito.


Our Mosquito Traps are a Success in Australia!


Over the past 18 months, we have worked with health officials in Australia (Queensland Health Authority-Dengue Action Response Team) to develop our technology into biodegradable mosquito traps as a cost-effective and easy way to kill mosquitoes during Dengue Fever outbreaks in Australia, but is directly applicable to other mosquito-borne diseases such as the Zika virus, which is transmitted by the same species of Mosquito. The Australian government is now ordering our biodegradable traps due to their cost effectiveness and ease to deploy. We are also supplying traps to Hawaii and Florida to carry out additional testing, but need your support to help distribute our solution to everyone who is at risk.


What insecticide do Biotraps use? Are they safe?

Biotraps typically use pyrethroid insecticides that are based on naturally occurring chemicals produced by the Chrysanthemum plant. However, Biotrap's targeted approach use far less insecticide than spraying with each trap containing only milligrams of insecticide so they are much better for the environment and your health. 


What trials have been completed to show effectiveness?

Trials using Biotraps were carried out in Australia by the Queensland Health Authority, who actively use lethal ovitraps (nonbiodegradable mosquito traps) to combat the spread of Dengue Fever in the country. Over 1000 Biotraps were deployed and shown to last for 6 weeks in both wet and dry conditions on a variety of surfaces (concrete, mulch, and dirt). During this time, the kill rate was established as greater than 95% mosquito death within 5 minutes of contacting our Biotraps for up to 6 weeks. The Queensland Health Authority now purchases Biotraps to combat Dengue Fever outbreaks in their region.           

When will they begin to work and how will I know?

Biotraps begin killing breeding mosquitoes immediately after deployment. After 1 month, a significant reduction in the mosquito population will occur provided alternative breeding areas are eliminated and the correct number of traps are deployed as directed. Ongoing use of Biotraps are recommended during mosquito seasons. 


How long is each Biotrap effective for?

Biotraps are effective for 4-6 weeks when the insecticide will lose its efficacy. At this point the traps are designed to breakdown allowing the water to leak out preventing a trap from becoming an ongoing breeding container, which is the risk of using non-biodegradable vector methods. We recommend replacing traps every 4-6 with new Biotraps so that the mosquito population will continue to be reduced within the treated area.

How is it made?


Risks & Challenges

Our traps have already been tested in Australia for their fight against Dengue Fever, which is the same Mosquito species that carries Zika virus. Also non-biodegradable versions of our traps are already deployed across the globe. We do not expect any issues with completing successful trials for regulatory approval. Our major unknown for delivery will be the speed at which the EPA and other regulatory bodies will approve our trap for commercial use. If they are fast, we may be able to supply backers really quickly to protect themselves in their home this year, even as fast as this summer. However, we are being conservative for a delivery time of next year. We will be able to deploy all donated bins to affected areas as part of the global effort to stop Zika Virus spread.

Video created by:

www.mediaonecreative.com
story_txt:
BioTraps quickly and efficiently deliver insecticide within a simulated breeding ground to eliminate the female mosquito and her larvae. Our specially designed Biotraps are low-cost, easy to deploy and disintegrate in 4-6 weeks, when replacement is needed.As Featured In....



You can help us provide medical aid and mosquito prevention to people in need. Direct Relief and International Medical Corps helps us reach countries affected by mosquito-borne illnesses.
                       


Our first product was Greenlid, the world's first compostable compost bin (www.mygreenlid.com), which successfully launched on Kickstarter, then closed a deal on Dragons' Den (Canada's Shark Tank) and is now widely available across Canada and Western U.S.
Based on the waterproofing technology that we patented with Greenlid, our Founder, Dr. Morgan Wyatt created Biotrap so it would hold water long enough to mimic the breeding ground of mosquitoes and are coated with insecticide so they target only the female mosquito.
Our Mosquito Traps are a Success in Australia!Over the past 18 months, we have worked with health officials in Australia (Queensland Health Authority-Dengue Action Response Team) to develop our technology into biodegradable mosquito traps as a cost-effective and easy way to kill mosquitoes during Dengue Fever outbreaks in Australia, but is directly applicable to other mosquito-borne diseases such as the Zika virus, which is transmitted by the same species of Mosquito. The Australian government is now ordering our biodegradable traps due to their cost effectiveness and ease to deploy. We are also supplying traps to Hawaii and Florida to carry out additional testing, but need your support to help distribute our solution to everyone who is at risk.What insecticide do Biotraps use? Are they safe?Biotraps typically use pyrethroid insecticides that are based on naturally occurring chemicals produced by the Chrysanthemum plant. However, Biotrap's targeted approach use far less insecticide than spraying with each trap containing only milligrams of insecticide so they are much better for the environment and your health. What trials have been completed to show effectiveness?Trials using Biotraps were carried out in Australia by the Queensland Health Authority, who actively use lethal ovitraps (nonbiodegradable mosquito traps) to combat the spread of Dengue Fever in the country. Over 1000 Biotraps were deployed and shown to last for 6 weeks in both wet and dry conditions on a variety of surfaces (concrete, mulch, and dirt). During this time, the kill rate was established as greater than 95% mosquito death within 5 minutes of contacting our Biotraps for up to 6 weeks. The Queensland Health Authority now purchases Biotraps to combat Dengue Fever outbreaks in their region.           When will they begin to work and how will I know?Biotraps begin killing breeding mosquitoes immediately after deployment. After 1 month, a significant reduction in the mosquito population will occur provided alternative breeding areas are eliminated and the correct number of traps are deployed as directed. Ongoing use of Biotraps are recommended during mosquito seasons. How long is each Biotrap effective for?Biotraps are effective for 4-6 weeks when the insecticide will lose its efficacy. At this point the traps are designed to breakdown allowing the water to leak out preventing a trap from becoming an ongoing breeding container, which is the risk of using non-biodegradable vector methods. We recommend replacing traps every 4-6 with new Biotraps so that the mosquito population will continue to be reduced within the treated area.How is it made?Risks & ChallengesOur traps have already been tested in Australia for their fight against Dengue Fever, which is the same Mosquito species that carries Zika virus. Also non-biodegradable versions of our traps are already deployed across the globe. We do not expect any issues with completing successful trials for regulatory approval. Our major unknown for delivery will be the speed at which the EPA and other regulatory bodies will approve our trap for commercial use. If they are fast, we may be able to supply backers really quickly to protect themselves in their home this year, even as fast as this summer. However, we are being conservative for a delivery time of next year. We will be able to deploy all donated bins to affected areas as part of the global effort to stop Zika Virus spread.Video created by:www.mediaonecreative.com

story:
Flossing is hard to do...

                                   ...until now!

Do you floss? Maybe. Are you doing it properly? Probably not!

My name is Dr. Joseph Dargan. I'm a dentist. When I ask my patients to start flossing, they say... "but I do that already!" 

You can see the problem! 



We all know that flossing properly is hard to do. So I invented FlossiO, a patented innovative dental flosser that helps you floss properly. It's also the only disposable flosser that can floss the whole mouth with clean floss in one go! We believe it's better than the other dental flossers available today, and we think you will too! 


            

                  


FlossiO consists of a loop of dental floss held by two finger rings. A unique feature is that the user can easily move to a fresh piece of floss for each tooth without taking the rings off the fingers due to the patented design that allows the floss to move through the rings. Rings that hold floss have been designed before, but they use a fixed section of floss that has to be loaded by the user, and will only floss a few teeth before getting worn. 

The best way to floss is using normal dental floss. Used properly, it provides a strong "blade" of floss to scrape deposits of tartar from between the teeth. Control,  strength and anchorage is provided by the fingers. Also, the user can move to a fresh section of floss by unwinding the floss off one finger and winding it up on the other. This procedure, however, is difficult, time consuming, requires dexterity, and can hurt the fingers. FlossiO incorporates all the advantages of flossing properly, while eliminating the disadvantages. 


Other disposable flossers...

  • Are weak and therefore bend when used.
  • Have only one short length of floss that will transfer bacteria and plaque around the mouth.
  • Require floss to be attached by the user.
  • Have heads that come off and get stuck between the teeth.
  • Are big and bulky and therefore not very portable.
  • Are shaped in a way that makes access to the back teeth difficult.


FlossiO has the following advantages

1. Bacteria are not transferred between teeth.

2. One device will floss the whole mouth hygienically.

3. Provides more control from the strength and anchorage of the fingers.

4. Individually wrapped for hygiene and portability. 

5. No more sore fingers.

6. No heads that can dislodge and get stuck between teeth. 



1. Place rings on the middle fingers.

2. Stretch floss with index fingers or thumbs.

3. Work floss between teeth and scrape teeth up and down.

4. Pull floss to move to a fresh piece.

5. Repeat for each tooth. 


Watch the video....



Background


Dargan Dental Limited is a company incorporated in Ireland on 2 September 2014. (Company no. 548984. https://search.cro.ie/company/CompanySearch.aspx). It was founded by Dr. Joseph Dargan, who has been a general practice for 25 years. He worked in the U.K. for 5 years before setting up his own dental practice in Ireland's largest shopping centre in Blanchardstown, Dublin, in 1998. (www.gums.ie, www.blanchardstowncentre.ie). 


                          


We've been developing FlossiO for over two years and will soon be ready to start production. This money will help us with essential startup costs such as machinery, patenting, marketing, insurance and ordering of the first batch. The total needed for year 1 is €18,845.00. We have invested over two years in Research and Development. We have an Irish patent (No. S86501) and U.S. patent pending (No. 15/051,768). Our County Enterprise Office (Fingal, Swords, Co. Dublin) was also impressed and has granted €5000.00 for machinery and patenting, but we need to raise the balance of €13,845.00 ($15,469.00) before the grant can be drawn down. To make this much profit we need to sell approximately $72,000.00 worth of FlossiOs!



It will take up to three months before the product is ready for shipping. 

Initially the business model is to sell directly to Dentists, but anyone can buy FlossiO. Our first marketing drive will target the U.K. This will give us an idea for demand in other countries, but FlossiO will be available to buy worldwide. FlossiO pre-order special offers are also available worldwide on Indiegogo. FlossiO is a registered Trade Mark and we own the domain www.flossio.com


The Future

Initially FlossiO will be manufactured manually. This is because of the high costs involved with automation. A disadvantage of manual manufacturing is a limited production capacity. During the first year we will be able to gauge demand and begin funding for automation. Automation will cost approximately €100,000.00. Funding for automation will be sourced from income from sales and, if necessary, offers of equity in the company. We will also apply for further government agency grants. Purchasers of the "33% off and Share offer" Perk will be informed about any equity (share) offers BEFORE anyone else. Future perks will not offer this.

We will introduce new versions of FlossiO such as ones with medicated floss or  thicker sections of floss for cleaning wider spaces.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Amitai Segev and I'm a 31 year old medical doctor. Together with my future wife Maria, who's also a doctor, we plan to go on a 4 months volunteer program to Uganda on October. We chose Brit Olam because it is one of the few projects in Africa where you can work as a full time doctor in a city hospital and really make a difference (see "Why Uganda?" at http://www.miron-uganda.com/).

Brit Olam’s Sustainable Medical Development Program (http://www.britolam.org/medical-program/) sends doctors and healthcare professionals to Uganda. Together with local health professionals, they explore and implement methods to improve access to medical treatment. The program provides individuals with knowledge of health issues, preventative healthcare and hygiene; provides medical treatment; trains local medical teams; and develops and establishes medical clinics in remote areas that have no medical infrastructures.


Throughout 2014, the teams of doctors have served as the sole physicians in the inpatient wards, have established a training program for clinical officers and nurses and saw over 800 patients within the mobile clinic in the rural areas.


Unfortunately at the moment there are no more funds to support this project.

We're approaching all prospective donors to support this unique project and allow its continuation.

Read more about the project in this blog: http://www.miron-uganda.com/ 

What We Need 

Your donations will help us finance in part our departure and stay (working visa, medical licence, insurance, malaria treatment, vaccinations..) and the costs of the mobile clinic (car, salaries to local staff, medications etc.).

The Impact

Quick facts:
- Kiboga district is one of the poorest in Uganda, with 64% of the population living below the poverty line.
- The mortality rate in Kiboga is ranked sixth lowest at 46.7 years – 12.3 years below the national average. 
- The Kiboga City Hospital serves a population of 400,000 citizens.
- There is only one local doctor at any given time in the entire hospital.


We can enhance greatly the quality of health care in this district with only 0.5$ per capita a year !


Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out !!
Share this project with your friends, family, co-workers, neighbours and everyone you know.
Like us on Facebook

story: Chanaute health post is located in western part of Sindhupalchok district where is the biggest casualties and losses of big earth quake in 25th April 2015. This hospital was built before 35 years ago. This is the center of nearby 6 village development committees and serving for more than 60,000 people. This hospital is providing preventive and curative health services since then. We are also providing acupuncture service with the help of Mindful Medicine Worldwide, an american organization. We are planning to make it for ten years continuously. We are also serving surrounding people with small type of irrigation, drinking water and income generating activities. This hospital building has been destroyed due to EQ and want to rebuild it. The total budget is USD 20m and requesting for fund collection here is USD 20,000. This fund will be used to construct two storied new hospital where clinical and treatment facilities will be available with 8 bedrooms for patients and 6 rooms for staff residence. Pls help how much you can

story:
Short Summary

Hi. My name is Nicole and I will be 42 in October. I wear many hats, and one of them is as a fitness trainer and manager at a Curves branch over here in Malaysia. 

About 2 years ago, I got divorced. My mom, being the caring, worrying mom that she always has been, decided it was a good idea to buy the gym I was working at, over from the owners who were selling at that time, so that I can have something secure for myself. I was already working here for almost 2 years by then. And so the sale went through.

Recently, as being part of a franchise entails, all branches who have yet to upgrade their system to the latest one will have to do so, especially if it is a resale. We fell into the resale category, so now my mom and myself have to look for another big amount of money to get this through. My mom has spent all her money on the initial purchase, and now with this additional cost, we have exhausted almost all our resources. 

The deadline is fast approaching. Which is why I thought to just give this a shot.

This new system will literally be a member's personal coach. Called CurvesSmart, this system is the most advanced fitness technology in the world, and Curves is the only gym franchise that carries it. This system is able to track how well you worked out, how many calories you burnt, how much more you need to work out, how much fat you lost, how much muscle you gained, how low or high your metabolic rate is, and so much more. It is your very own personal coach that will keep track of each member individually. Plus, at Curves, we have our own coaches to push and motivate you at each workout.

The money is entirely to upgrade the system, and to do the minor renovations needed to keep up with the current look of the Curves gym franchise.

When I stopped working under someone about 7 years ago, I told myself I will only work or get involved with things that actually make a positive difference in the world, for the planet, for any marginalised community or species, and causes. Being able to run a ladies only gym, and giving these ladies hope that they can feel great and in turn look great, no matter their fitness levels or age, is truly a privilege. I hope I will be able to carry on spreading this positivity with your help!

story:
Short Summary

JAT Industries is very excited to introduce to you and the world a revolutionary protein product that will be a permanent staple in your food as well as uniquely positioned to become a key player in the health and wellness industry, infant formula and baby food industry, animal food industry, and cosmetic industry.  Our protein product is by far the cleanest and highest protein concentrate in the world with a 66% base protein level and with ZERO contamination (a factual claim supported by third party lab documentation through two of the industry’s top independent scientific labs).  We have the incredible ability through proprietary technology to produce our organic, non-GMO, clean, contaminant-free algae protein up to 100% protein concentrate.  Additionally, we will offer our unique protein products to the marketplace in powder form, paste form, and liquid slurry for sports nutrition and protein drinks.  Moreover, through patented technology, JAT industries will introduce the world’s ONLY off-white algae protein (for those of you who don’t like the idea of eating anything green) and still retain all the powerful nutritional benefits that our algae protein has to offer.  JAT Industries will remain a raw materials manufacturer of Algae protein for the food industries with future plans to offer our revolutionary products direct to the consumer.  


We are very passionate BUT also VERY concerned about what is currently being added in our foods today, how unhealthy ingredients loaded with toxins, heavy metals, hormones, GMO, and pesticides are riddled in the ingredients added to our food.  It’s people like you who have said we’ve had enough.  You’ve made a conscious decision to change the way you eat and what you feed your families.  We hear you and we have spent countless hours, months, and years to arrive at this day and cannot wait to get our algae protein out into the world to help people feel better, heal their illnesses, and ultimately improve their overall health.  With you and your generous contributions, we can get this out there to the masses faster and on a much larger scale.

We believe that our protein products will change many of the different industries’ attitudes about “acceptable ingredients” and the lack of healthy ingredients, specifically protein as a vital supplement needed daily for our survival and create a movement motivating many food manufacturers to adopt a more health conscious attitude towards the ingredients they introduce into our food that we buy and consume.

In our video, we introduce our CEO, Mr. Donald Gerhardt, who shares with you an extensive knowledge based on years of research about what is currently being found in our foods.  Examples found include heavy metals in fish and fish oil, synthetic hormones found in key protein sources such as cows and chickens, and pesticides within the food chain.  All of these harmful substances currently exist in the meat we consume.  Mr. Gerhardt will also provide you with very helpful information about the different protein sources out there, what the good, bad, and ugly is about them, and why our algae protein is light years ahead of anything available right now.  


What We Need & What You Get

JAT Industries, headquartered in Denver Colorado, has been in business for three years conducting in-depth research to find the most cutting edge and efficient technology out there that can adequately introduce the powerful superfood that is Spirulina Algae.  JAT Industries has already established relationships with distributors who are excited to introduce our algae protein products, so much so that they have already test marketed our green and off-white algae.  The response has been overwhelming.  We currently have two years of our product already committed with staggering orders pledged once we begin manufacturing and harvesting at our soon to be established state of the art facility in South Florida.  We will need to generate extra working capital for immediate expansion of our facilities to meet their purchase requests.  We need your help; there is no question about that.  Your contributions will help us acquire the land needed to create this commercial endeavor.  It will also allow us to build the 5,000 square foot facility used to harvest and dry the algae protein.  This will include an FDA -approved clean room assuring no contamination during the packaging of our products.  In addition, in the field out behind the facility, we will construct the many hermetically-sealed bio-reactors to ensure zero contamination penetration.  And finally, we can begin harvesting our superior clean, high protein Spirulina algae on a commercial scale.

Your contribution and your help in spreading the news about our product campaign not only will help us accomplish our $1.5 million dollar goal to begin manufacturing and harvesting our superior, high concentrate algae protein, but also will help us continue to generate additional capital to allow for immediate expansion to address the growing demand for our algae protein in the future.  If only 200,000 people contributed $50, we would raise our highest level of capitalization needed of $10 million dollars to bring our product to the global market.  We would be able to generate a massive presence in the market where there is already demand for our product from many top manufacturers to include some of the largest baby food manufacturers in the industry. (Please view our video about infant formula and baby food.  It will shock you).  The beneficiaries of our product not only will be you but also everyone who is demanding to have a superior, cleaner, and healthier protein product in the foods we consume. 


A $50 contribution gets you a big thank you e-mail from our management team!!

A $150 contribution gets you a quality black t-shirt with our logo on the front and back

A $250 contribution gets 2 quality black T-Shirts w JAT logo on the front and back.

A $500 contribution gets 2 quality black t-shirts with JAT logo on the front and back, and 1 pound of our green algae protein

A $1000 contribution sponsors 1 bio-reactor placing your name on it, and 3 pounds of our green or off-white high protein algae, 2 quality black t-shirts with JAT logo on the front and back.

A $5000 contribution gets to have an entire bio-reactor named after them, a quality black golf shirt with JAT logo, 3 pounds of JAT Algae Protein sent three times in a year (total 9 pounds),

A $10,000 contribution gets a bio-reactor pod (bio-reactor cluster) named after them, 2 quality black golf shirts with JAT logo, 1 pound of JAT Algae green and off-white Protein sent every month for 12 months.

A $50,000 contribution gets a bio-reactor pod (bio-reactor cluster) named after them, 2 quality black golf shirts, 2 quality black wind breaker Jackets with JAT Logo, 1 pound of JAT Algae Protein (green and off-white) sent every month for 24 months, a copy of the JAT documentary (soon to be titled) DVD.

A $100,000 + contribution gets the entire bio-reactor property / field (70+ acres) named in their honor with a quality placard permanently placed on the property, 1 pound of JAT’s algae protein (green and off-white) every month for 36 months, 2 quality black t-shirts with JAT logo on the front and back, 2 quality black Golf Shirts with JAT logo , 2 Quality Black wind breaker Jackets with JAT logo , a cameo in the JAT Algae documentary, and a signed copy (from the executive management team) of the DVD as a permanent memento of your generosity, a special VIP invite to the facilities in Florida for two people, flight, accommodations for the weekend, transportation to and from, a very special dinner with the executive management team at an exclusive restaurant, and a huge thank you from the bottom of our hearts. 


The Impact

In the global community, people face mounting problems because of climate change, a growing population competing for food and water resources, and strains on the global economic system as governments, countries, NGOs (non-government organizations), and the business community struggle to find viable cost-effective solutions.  The onset of these issues has prompted the emergence of green industries built on the concept of sustainability that focus on ways not only that benefit people but also benefit the environment.

In a report by Miller (2014), severe drought conditions in California brought on by climate change could threaten agriculture production of more than 25% of the nation’s food crops since more than 80% of the available water is used by California’s agricultural industry.  According to Schiavenza (2015), “California is the world’s fifth-largest supplier of food, a big reason why the state would, if an independent country, be the 7th largest economy in the world” (para. 3).  It is the leading producer of many important food crops such as almonds, artichokes, broccoli, lemons, pistachios, spinach, and tomatoes.  Nonetheless, California agriculture lost more than $2.2 billion in 2014 and approximately 17,000 farmers lost their jobs in 2014 as a result of drought.  Therefore, farmers have had to rethink which crops to produce because of water and production constraints.  This is also true in other parts of the world where water and fertile land resources have become scarce due to changing conditions.  However, as shown in the charts below, production of the algae known as spirulina can significantly cut land and water requirements to help conserve land and water resources as well as increase protein production for a growing population. 

Source:  AlgaeIndustryMagazine.com. (2011). Special report: Spirulina part 7. The future of spirulina in an evolving world.

In addition to the foregoing, increased concerns over GMO crop safety and the use of pesticides in global agricultural production has prompted public outcry for healthier food options.  In addition, the global community is demonstrating greater awareness of the need to implement green alternatives throughout the business sector to mitigate climate change and decrease the world’s carbon footprint.  Because of these concerns, the emergence of green industries has grown in recent years because of public interest and demand.  One of these key industries concerns the growth, harvesting, and distribution of algae products such as spirulina and chlorella in the food and nutrition market because of the high-protein content, vitamin and mineral makeup, lack of contamination, and sustainable production.  AlgaeIndustryMagazine.com (2015) noted the use of algae in food, beverages, and nutritional supplements continues to expand.


In a report by Piccolo (2011) funded by the European Union, he noted the high nutritional value of spirulina as well as its high protein content.  Further, it “yields 20 times more protein per acre than soybeans, 40 times more than corn, and over 200 times more than beef” (Piccolo, 2011, p. 9).  Because of this, it is classified as a superfood.  As a superfood, spirulina possesses a strong nutrient profile that consists of protein, vitamins, and other phytonutrients, thus demonstrating a higher potency than other foods.  For example, it contains a higher protein content (approximately 65% or higher) than other natural foods; whereas, soybeans possess 35% protein content and animal protein typically consists of 25%.  Further, it possesses a higher concentration of vitamins and minerals boasting the highest levels of beta carotene and vitamin B-12.  It also contains rich levels of B-complex vitamins, iron, calcium, magnesium, zinc, and other trace minerals such as manganese, chromium, and selenium.  Statistics show that spirulina has 2300% more iron than spinach, 3900% more beta carotene than carrots, 300% more calcium than whole milk, 375% more protein than tofu, and possesses 31 times more potency in phytonutrient levels than blueberries.

Piccolo (2011) also noted 10 important benefits of the consumption of 5-10 grams of spirulina each day:

  • It strengthens immune systems by increasing the CD4 count.  Therefore, it is beneficial for HIV/AIDS patients.
  • It increases RNA (Ribonucleic acid) in the brain for more energy.
  • It contains 10 times more beta carotene than carrots which supplies the body with higher levels of antioxidants to fight disease as well as proving beneficial for healthy eyes and vision.
  • It builds muscle because it contains vegetable protein and amino acids.
  • Possesses high concentrations of B vitamins to help break down carbohydrates and fats as well as support cardiovascular health.
  • It is an excellent anti-inflammatory which demonstrates an essential benefit to arthritis patients as well as the prevention of heart disease. 
  • Contains anti-aging properties.
  • Improves digestive health.
  • Contains iron that is easy to absorb.
  • Reduces cancer with antioxidant protection.

These health benefits underscore the importance of spirulina.  This superfood can benefit people in the Western world who need its nutritional value to supplement a diet already clouded with unhealthy foods.  Further, it can benefit people in developing countries who suffer from malnutrition.  Spirulina already has legal approval as a food or supplement in various countries to include Europe, Japan, the United States, and many others.  Further, spirulina has GRAS (Generally Accepted as Safe) status, thereby demonstrating that it is a safe food for ingestion. 


Not only can the use of algae reap nutritional benefits, but the algae production industry is good for the environment because it feeds on carbon (Shaffer, 2011).  Thus, the algae industry has a positive environmental impact because it helps to mitigate the high levels of carbon emissions in the atmosphere from human activity and the burning of fossil fuels.

According to the 2015 Algae Industry Survey, three critical challenges exist for the algae industry to include:

  • The establishment of cost-efficient production systems
  • Harvesting and extraction systems
  • Scale of production facilities

While most manufacturers deal with these issues, the use of a proprietary process by JAT Industries LLC mitigates these issues significantly to allow for greater cost-effectiveness, increased harvesting of algae, and larger-scale production capabilities.

----------

References

AlgaeIndustryMagazine. (2011, June 1). Special report: Spirulina part 7: The future of spirulina in an evolving world. Retrieved from http://www.algaeindustrymagazine.com/special-report-spirulina-part-7/

AlgaeIndustryMagazine.com. (2015, February 17). A look at the algae-based food landscape 2015. AlgaeIndustryMagazine.com. Retrieved from website located at http://www.algaeindustrymagazine.com/look-algae-based-food-landscape-2015/

Miller, K. (2014, October 23). Why the golden state’s long dry spell – and its changing climate – will have implications far beyond the west coast. Takepart.com. Retrieved from the official website located at: http://www.takepart.com/feature/2014/10/23/california-drought-statistics-infographic

Schiavenza, M. (2015, March 21). The economics of California’s drought. The Atlantic. Retrieved from the official website located at:  http://www.theatlantic.com/business/archive/2015/03/the-economics-of-californias-drought/388375/

Shaffer, E. (2011, October 25). Algae industry is bubbling up. StarTribune – Business. Retrieved from official website at http://www.startribune.com/business/132590243.html


Risks & Challenges

While most new companies face significant hurdles in the beginning because of just trying to get their product out there to the public, we don't have that issue.  In fact, we've had some of the largest manufacturers out there expressing strong interest in our product.  In fact, we've already received a large purchase order for our product with the commitment that several others will be forthcoming once we begin operations.  So, we feel very confident that we will exceed our business and manufacturing goals once we begin actual farming operations to produce our algae for our buyers.  What this means to you is far less risk than you would encounter with another new business operation.  In fact, we think our biggest challenge will be growing our algae protein fast enough to keep up with the demand.  That's a much better position to be in than not having real interest from real buyers in our algae protein.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Short Summary
 
JAT Industries is very excited to introduce to you and
the world a revolutionary protein product that will be a permanent staple in your
food as well as uniquely positioned to become a key player in the health and
wellness industry, infant formula and baby food industry, animal food industry,
and cosmetic industry.  Our protein
product is by far the cleanest and highest protein concentrate in the world with
a 66% base protein level and with ZERO contamination (a factual claim supported
by third party lab documentation through two of the industry’s top independent scientific
labs).  We have the incredible ability through
proprietary technology to produce our organic, non-GMO, clean, contaminant-free
algae protein up to 100% protein concentrate. 
Additionally, we will offer our unique protein products to the
marketplace in powder form, paste form, and liquid slurry for sports nutrition and
protein drinks.  Moreover, through
patented technology, JAT industries will introduce the world’s ONLY off-white
algae protein (for those of you who don’t like the idea of eating anything
green) and still retain all the powerful nutritional benefits that our algae
protein has to offer.  JAT Industries
will remain a raw materials manufacturer of Algae protein for the food
industries with future plans to offer our revolutionary products direct to the
consumer.  


We are very passionate BUT also VERY concerned about
what is currently being added in our foods today, how unhealthy ingredients
loaded with toxins, heavy metals, hormones, GMO, and pesticides are riddled in
the ingredients added to our food.  It’s
people like you who have said we’ve had enough. 
You’ve made a conscious decision to change the way you eat and what you
feed your families.  We hear you and we
have spent countless hours, months, and years to arrive at this day and cannot
wait to get our algae protein out into the world to help people feel better,
heal their illnesses, and ultimately improve their overall health.  With you and your generous contributions, we
can get this out there to the masses faster and on a much larger scale.

We believe that our protein products will change many
of the different industries’ attitudes about “acceptable ingredients” and the lack
of healthy ingredients, specifically protein as a vital supplement needed daily
for our survival and create a movement motivating many food manufacturers to
adopt a more health conscious attitude towards the ingredients they introduce
into our food that we buy and consume.
In our video, we introduce our CEO, Mr. Donald Gerhardt, who shares with you an extensive knowledge based on years of research about what is currently being found in our foods.  Examples found include heavy metals in fish and fish oil, synthetic hormones found in key protein sources such as cows and chickens, and pesticides within the food chain.  All of these harmful substances currently exist in the meat we consume.  Mr. Gerhardt will also provide you with very helpful information about the different protein sources out there, what the good, bad, and ugly is about them, and why our algae protein is light years ahead of anything available right now.  

What We Need & What You Get
 
JAT Industries, headquartered in Denver Colorado, has been
in business for three years conducting in-depth research to find the most cutting
edge and efficient technology out there that can adequately introduce the
powerful superfood that is Spirulina Algae. 
JAT Industries has already established relationships with distributors
who are excited to introduce our algae protein products, so much so that they have
already test marketed our green and off-white algae.  The response has been overwhelming.  We currently have two years of our product
already committed with staggering orders pledged once we begin manufacturing
and harvesting at our soon to be established state of the art facility in South
Florida.  We will need to generate extra
working capital for immediate expansion of our facilities to meet their purchase
requests.  We need your help; there is no
question about that.  Your contributions
will help us acquire the land needed to create this commercial endeavor.  It will also allow us to build the 5,000
square foot facility used to harvest and dry the algae protein.  This will include an FDA -approved clean room
assuring no contamination during the packaging of our products.  In addition, in the field out behind the
facility, we will construct the many hermetically-sealed bio-reactors to ensure
zero contamination penetration.  And
finally, we can begin harvesting our superior clean, high protein Spirulina algae
on a commercial scale.
Your contribution and your help in spreading the news
about our product campaign not only will help us accomplish our $1.5 million
dollar goal to begin manufacturing and harvesting our superior, high
concentrate algae protein, but also will help us continue to generate
additional capital to allow for immediate expansion to address the growing
demand for our algae protein in the future. 
If only 200,000 people contributed $50, we would raise our highest level
of capitalization needed of $10 million dollars to bring our product to the
global market.  We would be able to
generate a massive presence in the market where there is already demand for our
product from many top manufacturers to include some of the largest baby food
manufacturers in the industry. (Please view our video about infant formula and
baby food.  It will shock you).  The beneficiaries of our product not only
will be you but also everyone who is demanding to have a superior, cleaner, and
healthier protein product in the foods we consume. 

A $50 contribution
gets you a big thank you e-mail from our management team!!
A $150 contribution
gets you a quality black t-shirt with our logo on the front and back
A $250
contribution gets 2 quality black T-Shirts w JAT logo on the front and back.
A $500 contribution
gets 2 quality black t-shirts with JAT logo on the front and back, and 1 pound
of our green algae protein
A $1000
contribution sponsors 1 bio-reactor placing your name on it, and 3 pounds of
our green or off-white high protein algae, 2 quality black t-shirts with JAT
logo on the front and back.
A $5000 contribution
gets to have an entire bio-reactor named after them, a quality black golf shirt
with JAT logo, 3 pounds of JAT Algae Protein sent three times in a year (total
9 pounds), 
A $10,000 contribution

story:
The Capitilzer

Hi there fellow inventors, prospective investors, exercise fanatics and the general market. My name is Rodney Mills, 50 years of age and my wife and I live in the beautiful city of Cape Town, South Africa. I have spent the last 27 years of my life in the Vacation Ownership Industry, covering all aspects, but specifically focused on marketing, sales, development and innovation.

It is habit of mine to wake up every morning and follow a light exercise routine before I start my day, mainly focused on "push ups", and after having done these day after day, for many years, a light went off in my head giving me an idea with which I need your support, an idea that intensifies the workout significantly, as well as adds so many additional muscle groups, all by doing just push ups, as well as stabilizing or "planking" as it often referred to.

I was so excited about the idea, I immediately started with rough sketches and approached a local and international patent firm (USA) to see whether anything similar exists. Both responses were very positive and both recommended that I pursue the project. Next came the Design Engineers who relentlessly worked with me until we had agreed on the final prototype design for the CAPITILIZER. The name has been derived from Core, Abs, Pushups and Stabilizer.

How Does it Work?

The concept is a set of handle bars that have an outer grip and an inner grip for different muscle groups, the bars pivot on a central axis point with a low center of gravity that compounds any movement from the body and subsequent contraction of targeted muscle group. The idea is to balance yourself whilst either planking or doing pushups, if the feet are wide apart the body is more stable, but far more control is required as you narrow your stance. This creates an intense and compounded workout for the entire upper body, exercising intensively all muscles from the core upwards. The handle bars can also rotate to 4 different positions, each with inner and outer grip options, making the options almost infinite and easy through to extreme.

Next came the manufacturing process which was undertaken by an engineering firm that specialize in racing engines. Specialized equipment had to be used to ensure precision and a prototype which offers a true reflection of the final product.

The proposed plan is to initiate manufacturing here in South Africa capitilizing on labor costs and cost of raw materials. The block and handle bars are made of solid stainless steel, and the tubing is reinforced metal. the prototype has been tested up to 100 kilograms of direct weight being placed on it, however, for it's intended use, in a push up position, it is estimated that only a maximum of 40% of a persons body weight will be placed on the machine.

Once we had the prototype, we needed to obtain the expert opinion of a professional and qualified Personal Trainer, and below is the excellent feedback and some suggested exercises from Lana Jamneck, who is extremely excited about it's potential, and is looking forward to the final manufactured product as much as we are.

Then came the fun part, 2 days of filming to put together our 2 minute clip you've probably already viewed. Here are some "fun shots" of the team during the 2 days, have a glance through them, have another look at the video, and then we can discuss the risks, rewards and ultimate goal that we are striving for.

Preparation.............

Juan giving instruction.

Melissa looking good for the camera........

Focused and determined.

This is working, keep rolling................

Nicholas showing the CAPitilizer is for all ages......

Roanne adding some song.

Michael having his make up done, seems to be enjoying the pamper session....

Sound, lights, action.....

The prototype.

Lana and Juan discussing the workout session.

Nicholas still determined to show us how it's really done.

Roanne deciding her song needs a bit of dance with it.

Michael calling for another pamper session.

Almost there.

Juan dictating how things will roll....

Lana practicing her lines.

Real deal.

The pro at work...

All in a days fun.


Great fun and impressive results. Fun over, now time for serious attention to the way forward.

Here are some "fun shots" of the team during the 2 days, have a glance through them, have another look at the video, and then we can discuss the risks, rewards and ultimate goal that we are striving for.Preparation.............Juan giving instruction.Melissa looking good for the camera........Focused and determined.This is working, keep rolling................Nicholas showing the CAPitilizer is for all ages......Roanne adding some song.Michael having his make up done, seems to be enjoying the pamper session....Sound, lights, action.....The prototype.Lana and Juan discussing the workout session.Nicholas still determined to show us how it's really done.Roanne deciding her song needs a bit of dance with it.Michael calling for another pamper session.Almost there.Juan dictating how things will roll....Lana practicing her lines.Real deal.The pro at work...All in a days fun.Great fun and impressive results. Fun over, now time for serious attention to the way forward.

story:
Short Summary

Coming Together is a nonprofit independent publishing label 100% powered by volunteers. Most of its catalog is comprised of erotic fiction, hence the Doing good while being bad!  tagline. All proceeds from the sales of its publications are donated to charity. No author, editor, or artist receives any tangible compensation.

What We Need


Coming Together needs to have a presence at all major (and many minor) events where readers, writers, editors, and publishers of erotic fiction congregate. Currently, in order to attend a convention or book fair or conference, Coming Together representatives have to pay their own way.

We feel that's asking a lot from someone who's already donated their time and talent to the cause.

With your support, Coming Together can send its editors to publishing events! We can offer more books and promotional items to attendees, and we can reach more writers and readers, thus increasing the revenue Coming Together donates to many different charities.

Your contributions are tax-deductible, by the way!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand that you may not have the means to donate right now. You can still help by sharing our campaign on social media! Thank you!

story:
Our Story

Aloha! My name is Kristi Toguchi and I am the owner of Aerial Fitness, located in The Entertainment Capital of the world, Las Vegas, Nevada. I have been fortunate to have a career that has allowed me to travel the globe while sharing my art. My most rewarding shows were the opportunities to share my knowledge and craft with my community. As a third generation performer, I have followed in the footsteps of my father and grandfather. My predecessors were inspiring men who took great joy in performing at senior homes, public libraries, Shriners Hospitals, and various community events. Since both my father and grandfather have passed, I have continued our legacy and family tradition of helping my community through art and service.  

Blood donations are very close to my heart. My father is featured on the Wall of Fame at the Hawaii Blood Bank for donating blood 142 times. My plan is to multiply that number tenfold and beyond! To achieve this goal, I will require quite a bit of help. My mission is to spread awareness on the importance of blood banks across the nation along with providing opportunities to those who dream of performing. I strive to combine my love of service with my passion for performance, allowing my students the experience of enhancing their lives through self expression while performing for others.

Our Project

After my father passed away, I decided to open my school, Aerial Fitness. Within the first year we organized our inaugural blood drive and student showcase while partnering with the Red Cross. We have also held a community event with Lorna Jane at Tivoli Village and began a stretch program with the KingdomFit Ministry of Las Vegas. This year we plan to double our community and charity events while continuing to cultivate our relationships with a myriad of local philanthropic organizations.  

As a performing artist, I have not always have the financial resources to donate to charity. The one thing I do have is my time and unique talents, which I am grateful to put to use for those in need. Our students have worked incredibly hard to perform at previous events, and due to budget issues, their costuming consisted of generic leggings and a t-shirt. I would love to provide a professional performing atmosphere for both the charity organizations we work with as well as our students and future artists.  

  • Please visit http://www.Aerial-Fitness.net/Blog to view our past charity and community events
I feel honored to be associated with the next generation of community donors, entertainers, athletes, and professionals. I hope to be able to instill the importance of sharing what we have to assist others in any way we can. I became a teacher to inspire others and generate change. My goal is to create future leaders and artists who recognize the importance of giving back.  

  • Please share this campaign as widely as possible on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media!

What We Need

We need your donations in order to produce our United Blood Services Blood Drive Charity Show on August 29, 2015. I may not have the funds on my own to make this happen, but I have the heart and dedication. Most of all, I will not give up on my mission. Your donations will help us on our journey to make this charity show, and future charity shows, become a reality. 

  • Right now we require new aerial equipment and costumes for our students to produce the best show we can. Here is the basic breakdown of our costs:
                 8 Aerial Silks ($185 each) = $1,480
                 8 Aerial Silk Rigging ($190 each set) = $1,520
                 20 Aerial Unitard Costumes = ($200 each) = $4,000
                 Rigging Installation by Professional Rigger = $1,500
                 3 crash pad mats ($350 each) =$1,050
                 Portable Changing Room = $50
                 Circus Make up and Brushes = $250
                 Show posters,flyers, and programs= $150
                                    TOTAL AMOUNT DETERMINED TO RAISE = $10,000
*If we exceed our goal, we will apply the remaining funds towards our future charity events and shows. Remember, this is only the beginning of our journey* 
PERK-A-PALOOZA!
We've got your perks! We've got your Perks! Please check out our list of perks and select your favorite! If we don't have the perk you are looking for, don't hesitate to make a suggestion...your wish may just come true!
Help us make this happen!

EVEN IF YOU CAN'T MAKE A DONATION, YOU STILL CAN HELP!:

  • Please Contact us to sign up for the blood drive!
  • Please Contact your local blood bank to donate blood. Be even more ambitious and organize your own blood drive!
  • Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our mission!
  • PLEASE SEND US YOUR POSITIVE ENERGY!

MAHALO & ALOHA!

Love,

Aerial Fitness


*UPDATE June 6,2015*

After launching our campaign a week ago we still have quite a ways to go to reach our goal.  We did however receive our first sponsor for our Blood Drive on August 29, 2015.  

 

They will provide Free Gourmet Frozen Yogurt to everyone who donates blood at our Blood Drive!  

We are also working on our second charity show for children with Cancer some time in September. 

MEET SOME OF OUR STUDENTS YOUR DONATIONS WILL SUPPORT
