story:
We, LazarusW, are a startup based in chile, accelerated by Start-Up Chile and incubated by 3IE, dedicated to the development of orthopedic solutions designed 100% from user experience. We have multi-disciplinary team composed of engineers, designers and physiatrists, and lead by Luis Cardozo, founder of Lazarus and master in electronic engineering and product design at the University of Nottingham, UK.

 

We are still working with public funds. Last May we started the clinical trials to test and improve our products, and obtain the certifications to start the commercialization. We only needed 25 patients for the tests, and in 3 days from our public call, 580 had registered to participate. This allowed us to understand the problem. 

 

 

Thousands of Chileans don't have a prosthesis / orthosis. Many people are unable to afford one. Others do not meet the requirements for accessing those provided by the state, and those that do meet them, have to wait for years for it to actually be delivered. Another problem is that those who do have one struggle with the negative consequences and damages that current prosthesis cause. All of these people are condemned to a life of limitations and restrictions, and unfortunately this situation is replicated throughout Latin America.

 

Did you know protheses can not get wet? thus, they can´t get into a beach or bath with it for the rest of their lives! they will always have to take it away and deal with it...

 

We do not 3D print out pieces, as we could not achieve the result we wanted, so we studied for nearly a year different techniques, using 3D printers to print out high temperature resistant molds, to place the carbon fiber inside. We reduced manufacturing time of conventional protheses to 5 days and costs several time. This is the inner and outter structure of one of our protheses, and how it looks when assembled

 

 

We decided to do something and create a unit that solved all the problems people were facing. We manufactured a 100% carbon fiber prosthesis, with an adjustable socket so that the stump is well attached. This unit has anti-bacterial properties to prevent the infection of rare but possible wounds and entries to facilitate skin transpiration. It's also waterproof so users are not limited to perform activities that involve water, it has the ability to change the foot for different occasions, and in the future a bionic heel will be incorporated. The development and validation of our product has advanced enormously, but the clinical trials consumed all the resources that we had left and we are only 3 months to finish. However, for each product to be validated and approved by medical supervisors, units have to be manufactured multiple times, and without funds this last stretch is impossible.

 

 

Each round of trials, which last 15 days, consumes approximately 5000USD. Thus, for 3 months, we require about 30,000USD. We still have access to public funds to assist the most vulnerable population, but first we are required to complete the trials for these funds to be delivered. Our work is not only limited to the prosthetic tests, we are also testing OTP for Charcot and developing a upper limb bionic carbon fiber prosthesis as well as an exo-skeleton and a smart wheel chair... so any excess money will be used for testing and developing these products.

 

We have prepared a set of unique benefits (perks), some personalized, others with strong social impact! worked and designed for you, in return for your contribution, in your interest in helping us to resolve this dramatic situation. We want to make you part of our community, and reward you for it.

 

If we do not achieve the goal, we will reduce the number of patients per trial to adjust the resources raised and to obtain a limited certification that allows us to access other funds. We did not know the importance of what we were working on until we made it public and the magnitude of this regional problem exploded in our faces. Millions of people are condemned and resigned, including the middle class, to living extremely restricted and isolated, without any chance of inclusion. Help us change that!

 

 

We have faced resistance to our work from the private sector; some have told us directly to stop working on this. However, others have opened their doors to us, among them the NGOs Charcot CR Foundation (Costa Rica), Manos a la Obra Foundation (Venezuela) and Pather Nostrum Foundation (Chile), to directly address the problem, as well as several private rehabilitation centers. Weekly we receive emails from people eager for a solution and this is what motivates us to continue with our work. Our team is made up of materials engineers, mechanics, electronics, designers and health advisors, all committed to this cause, to make it profitable and sustainable with a business model that allows everyone to acquire them. We have convinced Chilean public programs to finance us, and we continue to do so because of our progress.

 

Help us spread the word using the "sharing tool" in social networks. We would greatly appreciate it! You can see more information about our work in the following videos

 

CHARCOT MARIE TOOTH 

 

 

 

UPPER LIMB CARBON FIBER BIONIC PROTHESIS

 

 

 

LOWER LIMB CARBON FIBER PROTHESIS

 

 

 

FIND US AT: 

 

WWW.LAZARUSW.COM

Facebook f/veczoglobal

Instagram @veczoglobal

Twitter  @VECZOglobal

Youtube 

LinkedLn

story:
We know you are too busy to sleep

 

Diabetes?

Risk of cancer?

Declining memory?

Obesity?

Rough skin?

Impaired immunity?

 

The adverse effect of the sleep deprivation on health is quite large.

It is being called a “sleep debt” recently, and the risk of sleep deprivation and the importance of adequate sleep are appealing.

 

But the fact that sleep is important is obvious even to children.

If you had enough time to sleep, you would go to sleep early.

 

However...

 

You are busy with your work and you want to go out for few drinks with your friends at night.

So you have no time to sleep.

 

You want to play video games once in a while, and you have more and more recorded TV shows waiting to be watched.

You do not waste your time sleeping.

 

No matter how much you play with your smartphone before going to bed, you can fall asleep right away.

You don’t need any help of alcohol, and once you decide to go to bed, it won’t take long to fall asleep.

But there are too many things to do preventing you from saving your sleep time.

 

You want to stay up as long as you can.

It's a shame to go to bed early.

We only have 24 hours each day, so how can you use your free time fully ?

Yes, the shorter sleep time the better.

 

 

Even so ...

 

You are always sleepy during daytime, it’s hard to concentrate on something, and you tend to be careless while driving.

Even if you cut out your sleep, you want to be full of energy the next day at work.

 

Diabetes, risk of cancer

Declining memory

Obesity

Rough skin

Decreased immunity

 

You want to avoid all above if possible.

So even if you take less sleep than recommended, you still hope to have a deep and quality sleep ....!

The solution is.......           

Sleepion 2

 

Repay your sleep debt with quality sleep

Even a slight amount of sleep loss adds up to create a condition known as “sleep debt”. Just like in terms of monetary debt, a small amount of deficit accumulates unbeknownst to yourself and causes various health related issues such as loss of concentration, obesity, aging, and difficulty in performing everyday tasks. If the condition is neglected for an extended amount of time, it can lead to serious problems like increased cancer risks due to low hormone level or dementia.

However it is said that the sleep debt can be repaid with quality sleep

 

How do we create a natural sleeping environment without relying on sleep inducing drugs?

Changing your daily habits such as going to bed early and refraining from using smartphones before sleeping can indeed help. However, the importance of optimizing your sleeping environment by focusing on the sensual stimulus surrounding you cannot be overstated.

Refrain from taking caffeine or alcohol related beverages later in the evening
Finish eating big meals three hours before bed.
Take a bath instead of a shower.
No screen time 1 hour before bed. Turn off your smartphone, TV and PC.
Use bedclothes and pillows that match your body.

“Sleepion” is developed to act upon your three basic senses, the audible, visual and scent, to restore your circadian rhythm and bring back your natural healing power induced by sleeping deeply.

 

 

Your ordinary sleep may not be enough. Resting your brain and body by reaching the deepest “State 4” sleep, which only exists in humans, is the key in waking up refreshed and keeping yourself energized throughout the day.

A first of its kind, palm-sized tool to create your ideal sleeping environment that lets you sleep deeply and gently. Sleepion 2 will support you in tuning your body and mind to live comfortably, all throughout the day.

Sleepion 2 influences your three basic senses to heighten the quality of your sleep.

Natural healing sound that puts your brain to sleep.

Audio impulse has a strong sleep inducing power and aids healing during your sleep. Sleepion 2 is equipped with 18 originally developed audio tracks each with 60 minutes of sound with fluctuation inherent to nature which induces the healing effect during your sleep.

Fluctuating light of 1/f frequency relaxes and heals your mind.

In the dawn of history, man relieved themselves from the fear and horror of the dark by assurance of the flickering fire. The natural 1/f frequency flickering light source of Sleepion 2 acts like a dimly lit candle, giving you the relaxing sensation you have genetically inherited and knew in heart all along.

The original aroma-ring, made with 100% natural ingredients prepared specifically for your sleeping needs.

The effect of scent on your sleep quality is often overlooked. We prepared an aroma ring of Lavender, Japanese Cypress, Geranium all 100% natural essential oil, directly taking effect on your sleeping brain easing your tension and relieving your stress.

 

Three modes and more for sleeping, meditation and concentration

Along with the standard “sleeping mode”, Sleepion 2 is also equipped with a “mindfulness mode” perfect for meditation and power-naps, and a “concentration mode” for work and study. Also, Sleepion 2 can act as a wireless speaker when used under the “Bluetooth mode”.

Sleep mode : Creating the ideal sleeping environment.

The basic mode for Sleepion 2 is the "sleep mode", fitted with original audio tracks reminiscent of the most relaxing mother's womb, which will guide you to a deep sleep state.

Mindfulness mode : For yoga sessions and power naps.

This mode is perfect for meditation, a power-nap, or a short siesta. It will make a short sleep work best for you and sets you ready for an active afternoon. After 20 minutes, the audio changes its rhythm to an active tune, waking you up comfortably without fatigue (8 audio tracks to choose from, 25 minutes each).

Concentration mode : Enter the zone while working or studying.

Bluetooth mode : Use Sleepion as a portable speaker.

You can connect Sleepion to your smartphones via Bluetooth and use it as a wireless portable speaker. Enjoy the clear and high quality sound supervised by TimeDomain Inc.

Custom-made aroma ring

100% natural essential oil is soaked and enclosed in a custom-made “Aroma ring (1)” for portability and extended preservation by preventing leakages. Vibration of the speaker spreads the aroma naturally and tenderly (2).1) Patent registered. 2) We refrain from using heat as it will break the chemical ingredient.

28 Hour Continuous Battery Usage

Battery used in Sleepion 2 is able to continuously power the unit up to 28 hours (under sleep mode). It is detachable and can be used as a mobile battery in case of need.

Compact and Portable

Sleepion 2 is a portable, palm-sized device. Perfect for oversea traveling to ease the painful jet lags.

Biodegradable packaging

Package is 3d molded using natural wood pulp which is biodegradable and good for the environment.

 

Using the Sleepion 2 only takes 3 steps. Set your preferred aroma ring and turn on the power by long pressing the battery button. Select mode using the “M” button and enjoy the relaxation flowing through your senses.

1. Set your preferred aroma ring.

2. Long press the battery button.

3. Use the "M" button to choose mode.

4. Select your favorite audio track.

5. Place lid when not in use.

6. Use it standing or laying it on its side.

SHIPPING IS READY

Production is underway, and we already have some stock waiting to be shipped out. We can ship what you back as soon as the campaign is finished.

CUSTOMER'S FEEDBACKS

 

 

EARLY SKETCH DESIGNS

CAD DIGITAL ILLUSTRATIONS

EARLY PROTOTYPES

How the Sleepion Idea was Born - A Letter from Ryo Higashi 

Sleepion was born by a chance encounter.

One day, I was at my friend's wedding party and Dr. Shimizu, an emeritus professor of Osaka Prefectural University, was sitting right next to me. He has been doing academic research about Sleep for over three decades. We talked about many different things and he told me that it was possible to cure my sleep deprivation problem without medicine, a problem I almost gave up solving because of my age. 

“Let’s make the most use of your decades of research and knowledge, and create the tool which makes people (and myself) sleep well.” I told him. Starting from this, 7 professionals got together and the Sleepion project had begun.

2 years after my first encounter with Dr. Shimizu, at the end of December in 2015, the project dedicated “To the comfortable sleep world” released it's first product. This was, quite simply, the world first tool that provides both sounds, light and aroma. It was highly evaluated not just in Japan, but in the US, Europe and other countries.

However, the more we researched the more we found out that sleep deprivation, or sleep deterioration, give a multitude of negative impacts on many people’s mind, body essentially their lives. We decided to develop a more compact version of Sleeion which was easier to use by anybody anywhere. With this in mind, in 2016, we launched this new project for Sleepion 2. 

Sleepion 2 has been developed to bring back the human’s innate “sleeping ability”. To rediscover the natural rhythms of body and mind, Sleepion 2 has the following features:

Small, compact, portable design. Sleepion 2 is about the size of your palm and can be used wherever and whenever. 

Easy-to-use aroma rings. No oily mess. 

Not just for the sleep at night, but also for daytime meditation/nap and for enhancing concentration. 

Can use with earphones to avoid bothering others while in confined spaces.

Bluetooth makes it possible to play music wirelessly. 

Provides more people a deep high-quality sleep and wake-up feeling amazing.

 

Model: CHE-612

Operating temperature: 5-35C (41-95F)

Maximum power: 3W

Battery Standby: 28 hours under sleep mode (depends on environment).

Size: 73W×45D×104H mm (2.8W x 1.8D x 4.1H in) battery included.

Weight: 190g (6.7oz) battery included.

Battery capacity: 3350mAh/3.6V（12.06Wh）

Input: DC5V/1A

Output: DC5V / 1.5A (Auto-IC included)

Battery charging time: 3 hours using an 1A adapter (not included)

Battery size: 22mm (0.87in) in diameter, 104mm(4.1in) in height.

Bluetooth Standard: Ver 4.1

Wireless range: 10m (32ft) Varies depending on environment.

Bluetooth Profile: A2DP

Box Includes: 

Sleepion 2 / battery / dust cap (x2) / aroma pack (aroma ring and spacer included) of Lavender (x5), Japanese Cypress(x5), Lemongrass(x3), Geranium(x2), Forest(x2), Blank(x3) / Carrying bag / USB-microUSB charging cable / Manual.Warranty

Patent, utility model registration, and design registration pending.
story_txt: We know you are too busy to sleep Diabetes?Risk of cancer?Declining memory?Obesity?Rough skin?Impaired immunity? The adverse effect of the sleep deprivation on health is quite large.It is being called a “sleep debt” recently, and the risk of sleep deprivation and the importance of adequate sleep are appealing. But the fact that sleep is important is obvious even to children.If you had enough time to sleep, you would go to sleep early. However... You are busy with your work and you want to go out for few drinks with your friends at night.So you have no time to sleep. You want to play video games once in a while, and you have more and more recorded TV shows waiting to be watched.You do not waste your time sleeping. No matter how much you play with your smartphone before going to bed, you can fall asleep right away.You don’t need any help of alcohol, and once you decide to go to bed, it won’t take long to fall asleep.But there are too many things to do preventing you from saving your sleep time. You want to stay up as long as you can.It's a shame to go to bed early.We only have 24 hours each day, so how can you use your free time fully ?Yes, the shorter sleep time the better.  Even so ... You are always sleepy during daytime, it’s hard to concentrate on something, and you tend to be careless while driving.Even if you cut out your sleep, you want to be full of energy the next day at work. Diabetes, risk of cancerDeclining memoryObesityRough skinDecreased immunity You want to avoid all above if possible.So even if you take less sleep than recommended, you still hope to have a deep and quality sleep ....!The solution is.......           Sleepion 2 Repay your sleep debt with quality sleepEven a slight amount of sleep loss adds up to create a condition known as “sleep debt”. Just like in terms of monetary debt, a small amount of deficit accumulates unbeknownst to yourself and causes various health related issues such as loss of concentration, obesity, aging, and difficulty in performing everyday tasks. If the condition is neglected for an extended amount of time, it can lead to serious problems like increased cancer risks due to low hormone level or dementia.However it is said that the sleep debt can be repaid with quality sleep How do we create a natural sleeping environment without relying on sleep inducing drugs?Changing your daily habits such as going to bed early and refraining from using smartphones before sleeping can indeed help. However, the importance of optimizing your sleeping environment by focusing on the sensual stimulus surrounding you cannot be overstated.Refrain from taking caffeine or alcohol related beverages later in the eveningFinish eating big meals three hours before bed.Take a bath instead of a shower.No screen time 1 hour before bed. Turn off your smartphone, TV and PC.Use bedclothes and pillows that match your body.“Sleepion” is developed to act upon your three basic senses, the audible, visual and scent, to restore your circadian rhythm and bring back your natural healing power induced by sleeping deeply.  Your ordinary sleep may not be enough. Resting your brain and body by reaching the deepest “State 4” sleep, which only exists in humans, is the key in waking up refreshed and keeping yourself energized throughout the day.A first of its kind, palm-sized tool to create your ideal sleeping environment that lets you sleep deeply and gently. Sleepion 2 will support you in tuning your body and mind to live comfortably, all throughout the day.Sleepion 2 influences your three basic senses to heighten the quality of your sleep.Natural healing sound that puts your brain to sleep.Audio impulse has a strong sleep inducing power and aids healing during your sleep. Sleepion 2 is equipped with 18 originally developed audio tracks each with 60 minutes of sound with fluctuation inherent to nature which induces the healing effect during your sleep.Fluctuating light of 1/f frequency relaxes and heals your mind.In the dawn of history, man relieved themselves from the fear and horror of the dark by assurance of the flickering fire. The natural 1/f frequency flickering light source of Sleepion 2 acts like a dimly lit candle, giving you the relaxing sensation you have genetically inherited and knew in heart all along.The original aroma-ring, made with 100% natural ingredients prepared specifically for your sleeping needs.The effect of scent on your sleep quality is often overlooked. We prepared an aroma ring of Lavender, Japanese Cypress, Geranium all 100% natural essential oil, directly taking effect on your sleeping brain easing your tension and relieving your stress. Three modes and more for sleeping, meditation and concentrationAlong with the standard “sleeping mode”, Sleepion 2 is also equipped with a “mindfulness mode” perfect for meditation and power-naps, and a “concentration mode” for work and study. Also, Sleepion 2 can act as a wireless speaker when used under the “Bluetooth mode”.Sleep mode : Creating the ideal sleeping environment.The basic mode for Sleepion 2 is the "sleep mode", fitted with original audio tracks reminiscent of the most relaxing mother's womb, which will guide you to a deep sleep state.Mindfulness mode : For yoga sessions and power naps.This mode is perfect for meditation, a power-nap, or a short siesta. It will make a short sleep work best for you and sets you ready for an active afternoon. After 20 minutes, the audio changes its rhythm to an active tune, waking you up comfortably without fatigue (8 audio tracks to choose from, 25 minutes each).Concentration mode : Enter the zone while working or studying.Bluetooth mode : Use Sleepion as a portable speaker.You can connect Sleepion to your smartphones via Bluetooth and use it as a wireless portable speaker. Enjoy the clear and high quality sound supervised by TimeDomain Inc.Custom-made aroma ring100% natural essential oil is soaked and enclosed in a custom-made “Aroma ring (1)” for portability and extended preservation by preventing leakages. Vibration of the speaker spreads the aroma naturally and tenderly (2).1) Patent registered. 2) We refrain from using heat as it will break the chemical ingredient.28 Hour Continuous Battery UsageBattery used in Sleepion 2 is able to continuously power the unit up to 28 hours (under sleep mode). It is detachable and can be used as a mobile battery in case of need.Compact and PortableSleepion 2 is a portable, palm-sized device. Perfect for oversea traveling to ease the painful jet lags.Biodegradable packagingPackage is 3d molded using natural wood pulp which is biodegradable and good for the environment. Using the Sleepion 2 only takes 3 steps. Set your preferred aroma ring and turn on the power by long pressing the battery button. Select mode using the “M” button and enjoy the relaxation flowing through your senses.1. Set your preferred aroma ring.2. Long press the battery button.3. Use the "M" button to choose mode.4. Select your favorite audio track.5. Place lid when not in use.6. Use it standing or laying it on its side.SHIPPING IS READYProduction is underway, and we already have some stock waiting to be shipped out. We can ship what you back as soon as the campaign is finished.CUSTOMER'S FEEDBACKS  EARLY SKETCH DESIGNSCAD DIGITAL ILLUSTRATIONSEARLY PROTOTYPESHow the Sleepion Idea was Born - A Letter from Ryo Higashi Sleepion was born by a chance encounter.One day, I was at my friend's wedding party and Dr. Shimizu, an emeritus professor of Osaka Prefectural University, was sitting right next to me. He has been doing academic research about Sleep for over three decades. We talked about many different things and he told me that it was possible to cure my sleep deprivation problem without medicine, a problem I almost gave up solving because of my age. “Let’s make the most use of your decades of research and knowledge, and create the tool which makes people (and myself) sleep well.” I told him. Starting from this, 7 professionals got together and the Sleepion project had begun.2 years after my first encounter with Dr. Shimizu, at the end of December in 2015, the project dedicated “To the comfortable sleep world” released it's first product. This was, quite simply, the world first tool that provides both sounds, light and aroma. It was highly evaluated not just in Japan, but in the US, Europe and other countries.However, the more we researched the more we found out that sleep deprivation, or sleep deterioration, give a multitude of negative impacts on many people’s mind, body essentially their lives. We decided to develop a more compact version of Sleeion which was easier to use by anybody anywhere. With this in mind, in 2016, we launched this new project for Sleepion 2. Sleepion 2 has been developed to bring back the human’s innate “sleeping ability”. To rediscover the natural rhythms of body and mind, Sleepion 2 has the following features:Small, compact, portable design. Sleepion 2 is about the size of your palm and can be used wherever and whenever. Easy-to-use aroma rings. No oily mess. Not just for the sleep at night, but also for daytime meditation/nap and for enhancing concentration. Can use with earphones to avoid bothering others while in confined spaces.Bluetooth makes it possible to play music wirelessly. Provides more people a deep high-quality sleep and wake-up feeling amazing. Model: CHE-612Operating temperature: 5-35C (41-95F)Maximum power: 3WBattery Standby: 28 hours under sleep mode (depends on environment).Size: 73W×45D×104H mm (2.8W x 1.8D x 4.1H in) battery included.Weight: 190g (6.7oz) battery included.Battery capacity: 3350mAh/3.6V（12.06Wh）Input: DC5V/1AOutput: DC5V / 1.5A (Auto-IC included)Battery charging time: 3 hours using an 1A adapter (not included)Battery size: 22mm (0.87in) in diameter, 104mm(4.1in) in height.Bluetooth Standard: Ver 4.1Wireless range: 10m (32ft) Varies depending on environment.Bluetooth Profile: A2DPBox Includes: Sleepion 2 / battery / dust cap (x2) / aroma pack (aroma ring and spacer included) of Lavender (x5), Japanese Cypress(x5), Lemongrass(x3), Geranium(x2), Forest(x2), Blank(x3) / Carrying bag / USB-microUSB charging cable / Manual.WarrantyPatent, utility model registration, and design registration pending.

story:
What is the Signal Light?

The Signal Light is a practical multi-combinational rescue aiding flashlight that is designed to assist in rescue efforts for lost and stranded people. It is also vital for emergency preparedness and natural disasters.

  • The dual function flashlight has both a standard flashlight and a red flashing beacon light to alert distress.
  • The flashlight also has a mounted signal mirror for signaling people to your location.
  • A hand pumped air horn gives you the ability to effortlessly get the attention of people around you.
  • The best feature of this device is a deploy-able 16 inch helium filled balloon that is both reflective and lit  to give visibility above the tree lines with over 100 feet of tough nylon string, increasing visibility at night and during the day.

The modular flashlight has the ability to change to fit your needs. If you only need a flashlight, it can be removed and will function independent of the other sections. You can combine the flashlight and the balloon, the balloon and the air horn, or the air horn and the flashlight.

You can customize the light to fill your needs. Once we are ready for manufacturing, each piece can be bought separately, making the helium canister easy to replace when used.

The Signal Light is what everyone should have when they venture out into the wilderness, what every car should have stored in case of getting stranded, the compact device to be added to every emergency kit, 72 hour kit and survival kit. The Signal Light makes you seen when you can’t see your way out.

Help the Signal Light get to the next step!

Where did the idea for the Signal Light come from?

* Patent Pending

What would you do if you were lost? Stranded?  Hurt or stuck in a natural disaster?   What would you take with you so that people around you would be alerted to your distress?  The Signal Light is the multi-combinational devise that can alert others to your needs.

I developed the Signal Light with my own child’s safety in mind.  He was at the age that he was going off on scout camp-outs without my husband or I and when we would quiz him on what he should do if he got lost or stranded somewhere to get someone to help him he really didn’t have answers that we thought were sufficient.

As a mom, that intense protective drive set in and I was determined to come up with something that would make a difference if the unspeakable were to happen.  I started doing some research on what were the best things to bring to help people find a missing person. Whistles, signal mirrors, lighting fires and using smoke signals… all these things were frequently mentioned.  So, I started sending my son with these items.

The Problem

Then one camp out he went on a five mile hike and I asked him if he took all those things with him on the hike, because if there were an activity that made the stakes for getting lost or stranded higher, this was it.  He replied that it was too much stuff to remember and he didn’t have time to grab all of it.

Being the problem solving mom that I was, the next trip he took I put them all in a bag so he could easily grab them together and go; still he didn’t take them with- it took up too much space in his back pack. I had to come up with something else. I had to make it easier for him to grab and go.

I  wanted to have the best options for my son to be found. I focused on three essential things to be found: Being seen, being heard and staying put.  I wanted  something better than a whistle and a signal mirror- I wanted to give my son the best chance at getting found.  And, it all needed to be packaged together and convenient to grab and go.

Where to Start?

Sight: A signal mirror is what I heard mentioned for being seen.  What if the lost person was in a deeply wooded area and the mirror can’t be seen by anyone, what about at night or a cloudy day?  Would the signal mirror be effective then?

My husband and I were discussing the problems with the mirror while driving one day and drove past a car lot with huge balloons in the air. We noticed how far away we could see that balloon and thought  it was a great way to be seen. What if we could include that?

It could get above the tree lines unlike the mirror, it was effortless after its deployed unlike the mirror,  and no matter the time of day or weather, it was still effective. If we included reflective tails and lit the balloon we would have even more visibility.  So we had a goal: include a helium fill-able balloon in the devise.

Sound: A whistle is the standard thing to take with you…but we saw so many problems with this.

To be effective, it requires a lot of deep breaths, if you’ve been stuck for a while, you’re exhausted.  A whistle is a high pitch noise, lower sounds travel farther.  Whistles are small and can be deformed easily if sat on or not packed well in a back pack making it useless.

I had to come up with something better than a whistle.  Similar to how the balloon came to us, we went to a bike race at a nearby park and heard a lot of air horns.  That would be much better than a whistle, but how do we work around the air canister problem?  A hand pumped air horn!

Our noise making goal was accomplished.

Staying put: So many rescue missions are complicated with people wandering around trying to find their own way out.  When people stay where they originally became lost, search and rescue becomes a much easier  task.

I felt confident that if the lost person had a balloon launched and an air horn they would feel like that was essentially their base camp, they would feel more confident in staying where they were.  The first two conclusions have concluded our last goal.

Putting It All Together

My son gave me three problems to work through if he would actually use the things I wanted him to take:  It needed to be  packaged together, easy to grab, and not take up too much room.  So I started thinking of ways that I could pair the air horn and balloon system together.

We came up with a few capsule designs, but they seemed bulky and we thought that even packaged together, they would get left behind if a back pack was too full from other gear.

So I thought of things that you typically grab with every outing: water, food, a pocket knife, flashlight.  Maybe I needed to pair this with one of those items.  Not everyone was comfortable sending their child with a pocket knife and there are so many multi-use pocket knives on the market already.

So I started toying around with combining it with a flashlight.

Designed Around a Flashlight

* Patent Pending

I bought a handful or different flashlights in different sizes, ordered some hand pumped air horns and helium canisters, and started playing Frankenstein.  Lucky for me, my husband is an engineer and has a 3-D printer, so my development of this product was much easier than so many other inventors.

He and I would take a flashlight completely apart, use the circuit board and bulbs and add it into a new sleeve that would fit the helium capsule and air horn. Things were coming together…literally.  We went through about 100 ideas of piecing it together, and tried five or six configurations before we came up with the working prototype that we have now.

Then I wanted some feedback about the combo-flashlight.

Improving the Design

I talked to every person that I came across about it- coworkers, friends, neighbors- anyone who was willing to give me 5 minutes.  Everyone thought it was amazing.

We got a few suggestions on improving it, like adding a signal mirror as a cap to the air horn,  and making the flashlight a dual function flashlight so it not only could be used as a regular flashlight, but could also be used as a flashing red distress signal, and individually powered single bulb LED lights that could be used for triangulating your location or as a comfort light for the lost person during the night.

So we changed the design and added these few extra necessities. I also learned from a few people  that we talked to how great it would be in a 72 hour kit or emergency kit; the usefulness of the devise in natural disasters and car troubles.

Sharing With The World

Coming up with a working flashlight combination for our son to use was my goal, but keeping what could be a life-saving device for just my son to use seemed like a waste of such a great invention.  Nearly everyone that we talked to told me that they wanted to have one or even a few.  It was becoming clear that what I had come up with was a hit.

I was just an ordinary stay at home mom, thinking through every way that I could keep my kids safe and I have seemingly come up with a devise that so many people wanted to buy for their own use.  It was obvious that I needed to patent this idea.

Refining the Design

Now my new problem to work through was how in the world could I get this Frankenstein life-saving flashlight that my son carries, to a slimmer, polished, more reliable design that functions seamlessly ? If I was going to market this, I needed to make sure that everything worked every time.

This is a life-saving devise, so  I needed to engineer every aspect of it, test every aspect of safety, effectiveness and reliability.  Development costs, manufacturing costs, marketing costs…how could I come up with the means to do all this?  It seemed like an impossible thing to accomplish.

The more I talked to our inventor friends, the more they convinced me that I could make this happen with local help through crowd funding.  My family is not the type to ask for anything that we haven’t earned; we were always on the other end of equation jumping at any opportunity to help someone else in need.  But, if so many people saw the usefulness of this product, maybe giving a little bit to make it available to everyone was the way to do it.

The Signal Light Can Make a Difference

I can see how this product can change the outcome of lost kids and even adults. How it can aid in shortening rescue missions and relief in natural disasters and emergencies.  How it can make the difference when you are stranded with car trouble and no way to communicate.

Our target price for resale is aimed at under $50, making it is available for purchase to all hard working people just like us.  We are also working hard to make The Signal Light multi-combinational so it can be customized for your use.

Each section of the Signal Light will be independent of the other and able to combine with any other section by just snapping it together. This gives you the ability to have 3 separate devices or any number of combinations to suit your needs for any scenario.

Although not in production yet, we are confident that, with your help we can get these to the marketplace in a very short time.

As I mentioned before, we love to get suggestions for improvement and changes and we will always keep our followers updated on progress and news that is happening for Signal Light. Shoot us an email, leave us a comment, we love hearing from you!

The Path Forward

Recently, I have been working with 2 local universities to have The Signal Light be included in the fall engineering Capstone projects.  A team of engineering students will be perfecting the design and functions of The Signal Light for a cost much lower than we originally anticipated.  This is really exciting for me and gives me the confidence that I can offer The Signal Light to supporters that help us get there.  In April 2016 we will have a fully engineered and tested devise that will go right into production and you will be the first to receive one!  

With a donation of $1 or more, you will be first in line to receive The Signal Light when it is produced.

 Donation of  $25 will receive a  mini Signal Light key chain.

Donations of $120  will receive a flashlight/air horn combo Signal Light.

Donations of $220 will receive a full version Signal Light

Donations of $400 will receive 2 full version Signal Lights.

 We will keep you updated the entire process and we will offer all of our supporters to be  the first in line to purchase a Signal Light when they are manufactured.

The Signal Light helps you be seen when you can’t see your own way out...Help The Signal Light get to the next step!


Go to: www.thesignallight.com to see more about us.

Visit and “like” our Facebook page for more frequent updates and images: https://www.facebook.com/thesignallight?ref=aym...

This gives you the ability to have 3 separate devices or any number of combinations to suit your needs for any scenario.Although not in production yet, we are confident that, with your help we can get these to the marketplace in a very short time.As I mentioned before, we love to get suggestions for improvement and changes and we will always keep our followers updated on progress and news that is happening for Signal Light. Shoot us an email, leave us a comment, we love hearing from you!The Path ForwardRecently, I have been working with 2 local universities to have The Signal Light be included in the fall engineering Capstone projects.  A team of engineering students will be perfecting the design and functions of The Signal Light for a cost much lower than we originally anticipated.  This is really exciting for me and gives me the confidence that I can offer The Signal Light to supporters that help us get there.  In April 2016 we will have a fully engineered and tested devise that will go right into production and you will be the first to receive one!  With a donation of $1 or more, you will be first in line to receive The Signal Light when it is produced. Donation of  $25 will receive a  mini Signal Light key chain.Donations of $120  will receive a flashlight/air horn combo Signal Light.Donations of $220 will receive a full version Signal LightDonations of $400 will receive 2 full version Signal Lights. We will keep you updated the entire process and we will offer all of our supporters to be  the first in line to purchase a Signal Light when they are manufactured.The Signal Light helps you be seen when you can’t see your own way out...Help The Signal Light get to the next step!Go to: www.thesignallight.com to see more about us.
Visit and “like” our Facebook page for more frequent updates
and images: https://www.facebook.com/thesignallight?ref=aym...

story:
We have just successfully raised the money to create the plastics mold for the cover of the LucidBRAKE - and while we wait for the cover to be made 6-8 weeks - we want to allow pre-orders for cyclists so that they can get their LucidBRAKE for the 2015 cycling season.

LucidBrake 2.0 is a second-generation, one-of-a-kind, acceleration-sensing, wireless, brake light intended for bicyclists everywhere to be seen from farther away and to let others around them know if they are slowing down or stopping.

  • Lucid Brake is a bike brake light that doesn't need to be wired to your bike! 
  • You can even attach LucidBrake to your helmet or to a back pack. 
  • The higher the light is on your person, the farther away it can be seen in traffic.

Mount it Anywhere –

 LucidBRAKE has a flat back which gives you options...

You can mount it on your seat post, fender, jacket, backpack, flag, basket or helmet. 

Big Improvements for LucidBrake 2.0: 

  •  Better power management. We swapped out the power circuit used in the last LucidBrake because it didn't last the year in the garage that we promised. We've tested this prototype and it has great battery life.   Calculations show over a year with normal use.
  • Instant turn-on, turn-off by changing the position of the unit. If you take the LucidBrake off your bike and put it in your backpack or purse or up on the shelf it will turn off. Just knowing that it is being stored in a 'flat' or 'primarily horizontal' position will automatically turn it off. 
  • We still have the 4-different beacon modes, but they align to the laws in the EU better than they did before.


      LucidBRAKE in the news... 


We consulted with the experts at 3-M company and discovered their dual-lock fasteners as the ideal way to mount LuciudBrakes to all these surfaces.

Not just for bikes, this can be mounted ANYWHERE you need a brake light.

We include several pieces of the dual-lock fasteners so that if you need to borrow a brake light from your bike to keep something else safer in traffic, you can do that too.

LucidBrake is Self-Adjusting

LucidBrake's patent-pending algorithms allow self-adjusting to any mounting angle, so even if it is mounted at a slight angle, it will figure it out automatically. LucidBrake also readjusts instantly for most hills, bumps and rotations - which means you can mount it on something that turns from side to side - like your helmet - and it will still work great!

LucidBrake is Waterproof


Running perfectly while totally submerged in water.

There is no "on/off" switch - 

LucidBrake senses if it is parked / in motion / braking / in your backpack or on a shelf. If at rest, or facing up or down, the circuitry stays in ultra-low-power "sleep" mode.

But wait... there is so much more! 

No other brake light has this next feature... but we think they all should!


Two-speed braking

(demonstrated in the video)

Everyone knows there is a difference between putting on your brakes and slamming on your brakes. 

LucidBrake has been designed to indicate these two quite different deceleration events. It will flash and then stay on for several seconds if you drastically reduce speed or stop suddenly. 



Four Beacon Modes

(demonstrated in the video)

LucidBrake doubles as an awareness beacon. During night time road tests, LucidBrake’s eight super bright LEDs could be seen flashing over half a mile away. 

There are 4 different beacon modes to choose from. You choose which one you want by mounting the LucidBrake at a 0, 90, 180, or 270 degree angle. 


Low Total Mass

We thought "way outside the box" during the design of LucidBrake. Avid bikers insisted on low total mass, so instead of encasing the board in a plastic case, subject to water retention, internal fogging, and other problems, we encased the board in a special optically clear conformal coating at the suggestion of engineers at Dow Corning. This super-tough coating is used for solar energy projects, where long term exposure to ultraviolet light, intense heat, and intense cold can take their toll. 


Brake light/deceleration light – what’s the difference? 

Well, quite a bit. Most people are used to brake lights only coming on when they press a pedal or squeeze a handle, but LucidBrake is different. It is smart enough to know you are slowing down or stopping without it having to be wired up to anything. It senses inertial (motion) changes, then flashes brightly if it senses deceleration.

story:
The Vision

We are looking to start a business that focuses on strengthening the mind-body-spirit connection through various arts and healing modalities. These will include forms of yoga, martial arts, dance, and pilates; additionally, we will be offering sessions for reiki, massage therapy, life-coaching, and esoteric readings. Our center will be attached to a coffee shop or smoothie bar as well as a store and a community garden. You can purchase essential oils, healing crystals, seeds and other merchandise (which will also be available online) in the shop.

We also have an online presence with blogs posted regularly on topics such as yoga, spiritual insights, positive body image, relationships, astrology, entrepreneurship and more.

We are currently offering FREE wellness consults. Contact us if you would like to schedule one.

What We Need & What You Get

Our initial goal is to raise $5,000, although that would be a very small portion of the amount we hope to raise before opening up our first location. Our initial funding will be going towards online projects(blogs, video projects, making our website more user-friendly, etc) and more fundraisers and events(open mics, poetry slams, jams, etc). Many of our video projects will be used to tell stories through art or to help promote local artists and local businesses.

Once we raise enough funds to open up a location, the funding would be going towards our inventory, rent and utilities for the center, paying employees, teachers and masters, and various other functions we would need to perform in order to get started. 

As a contributor, there will be several perks available to you. Check out the different rewards we offer to see what you could qualify for!

The Impact

We appreciate any and all donations. If you are unable to donate, you can help us by spreading the word about our cause and sharing our website or social media accounts. You can use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign. Feel free to contact us with any questions.

We will be hosting several fundraisers throughout the life of this campaign and afterwards.

There will be a launch party on the first day of the campaign to get it jump started! Learn more here: https://www.facebook.com/events/1669879139911457/

We will be hosting an open mic on September18:

 https://www.facebook.com/events/1788198094739775/

And another open mic on October30: 

https://www.facebook.com/events/626267647476166/

We will be periodically hosting classes that focus on holistic healing and alternative medicine as well. Contact us for more information about these classes. We can be reached at admin@wabisabifornow.com

Best Crowd funding Campaigns article about our project: 

http://best-crowdfunding-websites.com/wabi-sabi...

Risks & Challenges

As this idea needs much nurturing and support, we are prepared to see some challenges in our future. We may have some trouble obtaining the proper funding, and once we do, we may not receive the amount of customers that we hoped for.

Because of these potential challenges, we have decided to first start up our online campaign, blogs, and an online shop to help get the ball rolling. We are prepared to make this  dream a reality, no matter how long it takes.

story:
Anandi Ma is the head of a meditation community based in Nikora, India and Antioch, California. On May 31st, 2015 Anandi Ma and her husband Dileepji, opened a medical center at their ashram in Nikora. They are now looking to raise funds to equip this free clinic to serve the poor people in the community.  

Click HERE to read more about Anandi Ma's community.

Click HERE for a link to the cost estimate sheets for the Nikora clinic. 


General Medical Clinic Donation (Goes towards medical equipment in the cost estimate sheet) - $1.00 or more

Sponsoring One Cataract Surgery Donation - $50.00


Dileepji's Letter About the Nikora Clinic

Over the past few years, since the opening of the ashram, we have provided some social and medical services. We have had an ongoing free medical clinic and organized yearly medical camps through which hundreds of cataract surgeries have been performed. We have also distributed free food grains to the poor, supplied notebooks to school children at free or subsidized costs, and given free footwear to schoolchildren.

We have been researching the needs of the community and once again, mother-child health, nutrition, deworming, and most of all eye care through cataract and glaucoma surgeries seem to be the needs of the day. We are hoping to equip the new medical center with the necessary tools gradually over time. The costs are high and we need to develop a trained staff. We are blessed already with expert physicians who have offered to come regularly and offer their services. We have Dr. Pranay Kapadia, a well-known ophthalmic surgeon, dermatologist Dr. Rajiv Pathak, and Dr. Deepak Sheth, a general surgeon. They are all from Mumbai, one of the cities with the best and most reliable medical care in India. 

At this juncture, we deeply seek your love and support, especially through donations to equip the clinic with the best and latest tools and to provide all necessary infrastructure for the staff.

Please pledge your donations to the best of your capacities. We are targeting cataract surgeries. Presently, once we have some basic instruments purchased we will be able to offer eye and other similar surgeries at a cost (to us) of $50 per patient. We will do the basic examinations at our clinic but transport the patients to nearby facilities who have agreed to help us. Gradually, over time, we will perform the surgeries at our own facility at lower costs, barring inflation of course.

Please sponsor the purchase of the basic equipment and/or sponsor one or as many surgeries as you can. This will bring peace to many a soul, and shower blessings, an amazing aspect of spiritual evolution and peace. Performing charity that provides care and support to those in need is our prime dharma. Grab the opportunity. Donating towards the roots of the new medical clinic will allow your gift to work for years to come. So please reap the subtle benefits of offering care and support now, and the invisible hand of God will lift you to heights undreamed of.

Let’s work hand in hand and bring peace, joy and not only mere smiles but laughter on earth that can resonate in the universe with the name of God. Anonymous rather than published donation is the best in terms of karma. Let not the left hand know what the right is giving. Also, don’t do it with any sense that you are obligated. Duty and dharma, love and compassion, that’s all that matters. Never let the ego rise. Remember, we are just mediums of the divine. Just be that hollow flute and don’t hold the memory that “I gave this donation or I did this seva”.

May God inspire and lead you through the love of life to the fun at His feet.

Love and Prayers,

Anandi Ma & Dileepji

story:
Only 65 hours remain at the time of this posting! Check out the last minute special!

There are only 65 hours left to be one of the first to try RIS3UP and we have decided to run an unprecedented last minute offer! We are going to give you the opportunity to get one of the first 10-packs of RIS3UP that comes off the production line at a super discounted $17 and we’ll even ship it to you for free anywhere in the US or Canada. Check out the special offer "LAST CHANCE" on the right!


MENTAL FOCUS
RIS3UP TO THE MOMENT

The vast majority of Americans consume some form of caffeine or energy supplement on a regular basis to give them the jolt of energy and endurance they need to get through the day. But do you ever feel like that second or third cup of coffee still isn’t doing the trick?

That’s because many of these energy sources are packed with artificial ingredients and preservatives, which lead to a crash later in the day. Our product, RIS3UP, makes use of naturally energizing vitamins and minerals. Now, you can avoid the inevitable afternoon crash and stay productive all day in a natural, healthy way!

Give RIS3UP a try and take charge of your body and focus once again.


IMMUNITY BOOST
RIS3UP OVER THE UNEXPECTED

Are you sick of feeling constantly fatigued? RIS3UP is packed with the natural nutrients you need to keep your body energized and healthy. By taking this daily supplement, you ensure you’re getting the important vitamins and minerals you need for a strong immune system, especially when coupled with a balanced diet.

RIS3UP gives you the chance to get more out of life and avoid unexpected illnesses by improving your immune system and boosting your overall vitality. Stop feeling drained, and RIS3UP to treat your body right!


NATURAL ENERGY
RIS3UP OVER ANY CHALLENGE

Worried about what’s in these supplements? That’s understandable — many other energy supplements leaving you feeling tired and irritable because of the synthetic ingredients they use. But with RIS3UP, you will benefit from the numerous vitamins, minerals and superfoods used as the natural ingredients in these water-based capsules.

No side-effects, no long-term drawbacks — this supplement is the result of years of scientific research by the Dead Sea Moringa team, and now you can RIS3UP to overcome any obstacle in a natural, healthy way.


BENEFITS

Why should you give RIS3UP a try? Consider that:

·  There are NO antibiotics or other added ingredients. RIS3UP doesn’t make you worry about long ingredient lists. You know what you’re getting every single time — the outstanding, natural health benefits of moringa and guayusa.

·  There is NO added sodium. Too many supplements pack in extra sodium, which detracts from the health benefits of the ingredients. RIS3UP contains no added sodium.

·  Each serving is just 20 calories. For only 20 extra calories, you get an incredible amount of nutrition. These are supplements that are extremely nutritionally efficient.


ABOUT US

RIS3UP is a scientifically-backed, natural supplement giving you a healthier means of keeping your energy all day long.

So many of us rely far too heavily on highly caffeinated products to make it through a day, but long-term use of these products can lead to some severe health complications. Instead, take advantage of RIS3UP, a supplement primarily composed of moringa, one of the most nutrient-rich plants on the planet.

If you’ve dreamed of a healthier lifestyle and days without caffeine crashes, now you can make that a reality thanks to the scientific experts behind RIS3UP. 


Natural Energy - RIS3UP over any Challenge!


Immunity Boost - RIS3UP over the Unexpected!


Mental Focus - RIS3UP to the Moment!

RIS3UP above the rest, conquer your moment—seize the day!


RIS3UP to the challenge and contribute TODAY!


RIS3UP is Moving Forward...

Packaging Mockups for 10 capsule blister pack inside of display box:


Packaging for 2 capsule blister packs and point of purchase display:

you can make that a reality thanks to the scientific experts behind RIS3UP. 
Natural Energy - RIS3UP over any Challenge!Immunity Boost - RIS3UP over the Unexpected!Mental Focus - RIS3UP to the Moment!RIS3UP above the rest, conquer your moment—seize the day!RIS3UP to the challenge and contribute TODAY!

story:
We are raising money for final developments of our lab space &  ISO Certified testing site in central California. We will use the money to secure support from our scientific equipment providers & complete last stages of laboratory build-out! Once open, we plan to receive a large level of local support! We have already signed up early user adopters as "Premier Members" who desire a high level of service monthly! So, getting a boost in funding will help us jumpstart our facilities into action! We truly appreciate everybody's support, & so do the patients!!

In this industry much goes unchecked, leaving massive room for error. This unregulated market can foster greed and negligence which is great for capitalism but non-beneficial for patients in need. We will help bridge the gap between a grass roots movement that has primarily been in the shadows of the black market, and a legitimate medical and recreational revolution taking the country by storm! 

The people have spoken.. and they want Cannabis! But not just any Cannabis. This day in age, the average Cannabis patient is well rounded in the science behind their meds and demand them to be potent, clean, tested and verified! Help us provide the level of support the community is asking for to ensure quality controlled medication reaches the patients who need it most! Thank You!!

story:
SPIRIT OF THE LAKE YOGA & WELLNESS CENTER!

Spirit of the Lake Yoga and Wellness Center has been an integral part of the Excelsior, MN community since 2010, offering yoga classes, workshops, and teacher training.  The time has come for the original owners to sell and we are now looking to the community to help us transform the space into offering even more.  

Please help us to support this locally and veteran owned sangha/community so that we can all continue to enjoy the amazing benefits of our yoga practice.

“Yoga teaches us to cure what need not be endured and endure what cannot be cured.” BKS Iyengar

With your generosity and support, we will continue to offer yoga classes but also expand to provide more holistic health offerings.  We want to bring more joy, happiness, health, and well-being to the community through: 

  • Massage Therapy
  • Thai Body Massage
  • Energy Work/Reiki
  • Life and Wellness Coaching  
  • Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction
  • Behavioral Health
  • Nutrition Consultations

“Undisturbed calmness of mind is attained by cultivating friendliness toward the happy, compassion for the unhappy, delight in the virtuous, and indifference toward the wicked.” ~ Yoga Sutras

Our current offerings:

All-Level, Beginning, Yin Yoga, Restorative, Iyengar, Yoga Nidra, Yoga Therapy, Workshops, Trainings, Massage and more! 

Check us out at: www.spiritofthelakeyoga.com

Please join us in celebrating the next phase of Spirit of the Lake Yoga and Wellness!  Namaste.

Services offered at Spirit of the Lake Yoga and Wellness are all integral and supportive practices in caring for our bodies, minds, and souls. The sanskrit word yoga means a "union" or coming together of those three parts of our being so that we can be in touch with our true Self.

What happens when you learn how to take time and care for yourself through yoga, massage, meditation, mindfulness, nutrition, and more?

You might feel happier! more relaxed! more energetic and vibrant! at ease! peaceful! joyful! focused! confident! healthy! calm! more limber/flexible! and much, much more. 

"We are the ones we have been waiting for." ~ Hopi Elders

Our Story?

My husband, Jon, and I have dreamt of owning a business since we got married and were traveling the country with his military career, over 15 years ago. During that time we talked about what life would be like when he retired from the military and how we hoped for more time to truly relax and find even more enjoyment in our lives. We have both valued professions where we were able to give back and serve people, but felt a desire to find more balance in our lives.

So, the time is now here for us to dive in and claim the next phase of our journey! Jon retired from the military in April and I am quitting my full-time job in higher education to focus on owning and operating the yoga studio. In addition, I will be teaching more yoga and also doing more Life and Wellness coaching. I am so excited to be merging my passions of coaching, yoga, wellness, and being a part of a business community that is focused on giving back and helping people live happier and healthier lives. 

As we forge our new path, we appreciate all your love and support! Without the amazing people we are so lucky to know, we would never have had the courage and fortitude to make our dreams a reality. 

Namaste,

Nicole

“Make an attitude to be in gratitude, you will find the whole Universe will come to you.” ~ Yogi Bahrain

Risks and challenges

If this campaign is successfully funded, it will allow us to complete a remodeling project at the studio. We would like to add an additional therapy/wellness room in the back of the studio so that we have one room for massage, thai body massage, and energy work and one room for coaching, counseling, nutrition consultations and private yoga therapy sessions. If we are not fully funded, we will not be able to offer all of these services until we can build enough revenue to fund the construction. 

Our hope is that our community will come together to help us make this dream become a reality! Peace and love to all of you!

story:
Svaast,a Hindi synonym for healthy, is introducing a software platform to record child growth statistics in different countries, to monitor, compare and evaluate individual development and nutritional status against WHO parameters.

Our Goal

Collect health statistics of children, evaluate data and measure against WHOs parameters. Send reports to the parents for preventive and remedial steps for a nominal subscription fee. 

Concept

Collect data through schools, diagnose early symptoms and educate parents about nutrition, physical and mental development of children.

Involvement

We will further share this data with government agencies, hospitals and organisations like Red-Cross, Sick-Kids, etc. to provide health care for FREE to the needy and the under-privileged.

“We want to generate awareness, educate parents and help the next generation.”

Our teams will visit schools to record child growth data periodically and provide results to the schools and the parents. We will give them comparison charts for kids their age and provide suggestions for specialists in the neighborhood in the related medical field. 

Methodology 

The World Health Organisation has 13 parameters to record Child Growth. Our teams will visit schools every six months to collect these parameters and upload it to the individual child's profile. Parents can track their child's growth by logging into the app or the website. For parents who don't have access to the internet, the report shall be mailed to them by post. 

Our solution will also have features to test the Child's IQ, track educational performance, information about nutrition and balanced diet.

Why is this Solution Needed?

People in developing countries don't have free health care system and they only visit doctors when the problem has triggered. Svaast solution will give an opportunity for taking preventive and remedial measures. Moreover, by suggesting region and culture specific nutritional alternatives, it plans to educate parents about nutrition and inform them about different specialists and services available in their area.

According to the National Family Healthy Survey (India, 2005-06) 46% of the children under the age three are underweight that is too think for their age and 38.4% are stunted, too short for their age. Further, majority of them don’t have adequate access to free health care and monitoring system.

The geographical analysis of data will help the interested public health institutions to design region specific prevention programs for affected territories. 

Implementation

The technical inputs on the monitoring and nutritional front will come from experts from the Department of Food and Nutrition, Punjab Agricultural University (PAU), Ludhiana, India. It is also in talks to take on Board expert associated with reviewing the Mid Day Meal Scheme of the Ministry of Human Resource Development of India,  Dr. Neelam Grewal, presently working as Dean Post Graduate Studies. 

With the help of its consultants, Svaast is excited about rolling out its pilot in India in the last quarter of 2015. India has 315 million students enrolled in schools across the country, the largest in the world. Total population between the age group 0-4yrs is 110 million.

After the anticipated successful pilot in the Indian market, Svaast plans to extend its services in the South East Asia,  Africa and other developing countries that have a large population of malnourished children, lack of nutritional awareness and expensive/ inadequate  healthcare.

story:
Introduction

People of all races are welcome to come to Obsidian Gathering!

My name is David Ivey, I’m a young Black man from the DC metropolitan area and I’ve been training Parkour for close to 10 years. I grew up in an extremely politically involved family- both of my parents have held office and my brother is a political activist. As you can imagine, dinnertime conversations were always light ;). I’m working with Marquis Johnson to take Obsidian Gathering from an idea to a reality. As you all know, Marquis has been training in Columbus, SC with his crew TFAC and has been running the social media accounts for Team Farang.

Obsidian Gathering is the first Black Pride Parkour jam and will celebrate the Black Parkour practitioners from across the nation as well as help increase political involvement in the Parkour community. We knew we needed to create Obsidian Gathering due to the numerous conversations we had with politically disengaged Parkour practitioners during the 2016 campaign cycle and the resulting election of Donald Trump. These events made it clear that we can best serve our country by helping our Parkour family become politically engaged so that we can make a difference in the 2018 elections.

Your contribution will go towards supporting Black traceurs and traceuses as well as energizing and mobilizing Parkour practitioners in the fight against the injustices that the Trump administration is already imposing upon Americans of all colors. It will also help us increase voting participation in the Parkour community in the 2018 midterm elections.

People of all races are welcome to come to Obsidian Gathering!

 

What We Need & What You Get

The funding target for Obsidian Gathering 2017 is $1,570.

Food- $140.00

  1. 4 meals for 40 people
    1. The meals served for each day of the event are as follows-
      1. Friday- dinner
      2. Saturday- breakfast and dinner
      3. Sunday- breakfast

Insurance- $600.00

  1. To insure against property damage from City Securities Insurance for a three daylong event.

Shirts- $750.00

  1. $7.50 per shirt for 100 Bella + Canvas shirts with 2 screens (one screen each for the front and back of each shirt).
    • Note: The total number of shirts printed will be decided by demand. 100 shirts is the maximum number of shirts that can possibly be printed.
  1. Shipping costs to T-shirt reward buyers is included in reward price.

Wristbands - $80.00

  1. $70 100 ½” printed wrist bands with interior message from RapidWristBands.com
  2. $10.00 Shipping from RapidWristBands.com
    • Shipping costs to Wristband reward buyers is included in reward price

 

    Contingency Plans

    If the goal is not reached and there are not enough funds to complete the orders for wristbands and T-shirts then all of the money will be refunded to funders.

    If the goal is not reached but there are enough funds to insure the event, feed all of the participants and complete the orders for wristbands and T-shirts then the event will continue on a reduced budget.

    The Impact

    Obsidian Gathering provides value to us and the entire Parkour community by celebrating our integral involvement in the creation of American culture, society and history. Obsidian Gathering will also be a catalyst for increasing civic participation in the Parkour community. Our goal is for attendees to take the spirit of Obsidian Gathering with them to their communities and show their friends, practitioners and non-practitioners alike, how important and easy it is to make their voices heard in the enormously important field of local, state and national politics. Millenials are the largest generation in America and if we participate and encourage our peers to do the same then we can massively influence the political course of the USA for years to come.

    We are confident that we can successfully organize and run Obsidian Gathering because of our years of experience as community leaders. In 2014 I created, planned and ran the first Floor Jam in the Raleigh/Durham, NC area. Practitioners from New York, Pennsylvania, Maryland, North Carolina and South Carolina attended. The event has since been run by Enso Movement and has expanded in attendance as well as the participation of practitioners from across the country. You should definitely go to this year’s event ;). My years of experience working on my parents’ campaigns and my research of America’s political system and history have prepared me for the political aspects of Obsidian Gathering.

     

    Risks & Challenges

    The largest challenges for organizing Obsidian Gathering are raising enough money and generating enough interest. We’ll need you to help us by donating any amount that you can spare and by spreading the word about Obsidian Gathering. Please share the IndieGoGo event page and invite anyone you think would be interested in attending the event or supporting us. Every contribution, share and invite will help us get closer to our goal! We can’t thank you enough for lending us your attention and contributing in anyway that you can!

story:
Short Summary

We are pleased to introduce BHO, Beyond Honey Oil.  For the past several months we have been working on a business plan and model that is very unique in the cannabis industry.  BHO was launched as a result of three friends coming together wanting better health outcomes for their families than traditional medicine could offer. 

What We Need & What You Receive

What your contribution helps us with.

  • Your contribution will help pay for Oregon licenses, Fund expansion to new facility and new testing equipment.
  • Based upon your contribution level we are pleased to offer Beyond Honey Oil commemorative launch items including:  Beyond Honey Oil branded t-shirt, coffee mug and exclusive behind the scenes updates.
  • Any unused funds will be contributed to Cannabis for Autism study.

The Impact

Today medicinal cannabis is being utilized to treat:

  • Post Traumatic Stress Disorder  PTSD 
  • Cancer
  • Autism
  • Seizures

Risks & Challenges

Cannabis is still being debated in numerous states.  It is a very regulated industry however national surveys have concluded that more than seventy percent support legalization of cannabis.

  • We have built a vast network of doctors and patients who provide valuable testimony for medical needs for cannabis.
  • To help with advocacy we have launched a political action committee and partner with: Legistlatures, Veterans, Parents advocating for medicinal cannabis.

Other Ways You Can Help

We sincerely appreciate your support and understand not everyone can financially contribute however there are several other ways you can help: 

  • Share our campaign in your network, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram etc.
  • Advocacy.  Vote and support candidates who support medical cannabis.

Thank you so much we appreciate every donation.  Please also share Beyond Honey Oil with your network, family and friends.

Thank you.

Beyond Honey Oil

story:
Hi let me introduce myself! Im Fritts Mosshart,  being a competitive athlete, supplements played a huge role in my training, performance and recovery which led me to doing my own research on ingredients that are actually effective and what their dosages are. This helped me formulate Apex Predator Nutrition's first product that is;

  1. intra/post workout. (take during or after workout/training).
  2. will NOT cause stomach discomfort or cramps.
  3. WILL make  you see changes in your performance and recovery.

My product(s) will contain NO

  • additives,
  • artificial dyes
  • anything that does not benefit an athletes body.

Apex Predator Nutrition main objectives are

  • To be the first Deaf Owned Sports Nutrition and Lifestyle brand
  • To be transparent
  • To be community driven

story:
Short Summary

My name is Alphonsine Ndayikengurukiye, the founder of Maranathan Ministry, an organization constructed to help the forgotten people of Burundi. This non-profit is an international organization established to help fight oppression, and give hope to those living with little to no resources. With a network of volunteers around the world, Maranathan has managed to provide medical assistance and nourishment to hundreds of people struggling in the region.

We face many difficulties as a country. Though Maranathan has brought hope across continents and fed more than we first predicted. It is time that we humbily ask for help. We need contributions to help provide health care services to mothers and orphaned children who need surviving.

OUR GOAL, is to join hands with those who are in need and offer assistance ; partner with those who are able to help others as they share their resources and their valuable time; and collaborate with each other thereby bringing the people together as we strengthen our community.

The Organization was Founded to help vulnerable people to overcome some difficulties, which they face on daily basis through prayer and donations.

What We Need 

We are raising funds to provide compensation to ophthalmologists (eye doctors) working on a rare case of vision loss on an 8 year old girl who has a slight chance of full recovery if given proper care. We also have a mother who gives birth to children suffering from a rare bone disease causing the offspring to have a fatality rate of 3-5 years maximum.

She is nearly 8 years old. She can’t speak and she is blind, hopeless she certainly need your help. Her family was counseled to accept their daughter and understand that there is nothing to be ashamed of given her current condition. This is because her family never allowed her to be seen or interacted with. They hid her whenever visitors. Thanks to Maranathan she is now in touch with an Ophthalmologist who will follow her up with medical assistance and the proper care she requires.


The photo above shows a 12 year old boy awaiting surgery for his leg, and with the help of Maranathan the pressure was relieved with the following photo below.


This is a case of 12 years old boy in Burundi who had an accident when he was 2 years old. This boy is at risk of losing his leg due to lack of resources for good treatment. His mother confirmed that he needs a wheel chair to help his journey back to school as treatment is done. 

The Impact

Your help will support pregnant women and children from birth to 5 years old. This project will support Maranathan's mission to diagnose and treat newborns and young children, intervening before their conditions become critical or life-threatening. 

Maranathan will also focus on maternal post-birth infections and hemorrhaging (heavy bleeding) which can be life threatening if not diagnosed and treated promptly.

Risks & Challenges

If we don't reach our goal, the women carry infections during or after birth will be at a health risk and the children who are infected by their mothers will also have to fight for their lives because the fatality rate will be against. 

The mothers and the children who also need surgery will be at risk of no recovery or even the hope to live a normal life again. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to further assist, there are funds set up on the website below to help the forgotten people of Burundi through donations or any kind. (food, clothes, school supplies etc).

http://maranathan.com/
story_txt:
Short
Summary
My name is Alphonsine Ndayikengurukiye, the founder of Maranathan
Ministry, an organization constructed to help the forgotten people of
Burundi. This non-profit is an international organization established to help
fight oppression, and give hope to those living with little to no resources.
With a network of volunteers around the world, Maranathan has managed to
provide medical assistance and nourishment to hundreds of people struggling in
the region.
We face many difficulties as a country. Though Maranathan has
brought hope across continents and fed more than we first predicted. It is time
that we humbily ask for help. We need contributions to help provide health care
services to mothers and orphaned children who need surviving.
OUR GOAL, is to join hands with those who
are in need and offer assistance ; partner with those who are able to help
others as they share their resources and their valuable time; and collaborate with
each other thereby bringing the people together as we strengthen our community.
The Organization was Founded to help vulnerable people to
overcome some difficulties, which they face on daily basis through prayer and
donations.
What
We Need 
We are raising funds
to provide compensation to ophthalmologists (eye doctors) working on a
rare case of vision loss on an 8 year old girl who has a slight chance of full
recovery if given proper care. We also have a mother who gives birth to
children suffering from a rare bone disease causing the offspring to have a
fatality rate of 3-5 years maximum.She
is nearly 8 years old. She can’t speak and she is blind, hopeless she certainly
need your help. Her family was counseled to accept their daughter and
understand that there is nothing to be ashamed of given her current condition.
This is because her family never allowed her to be seen or interacted with.
They hid her whenever visitors. Thanks to Maranathan she is now in touch with
an Ophthalmologist who will follow her up with medical assistance and the
proper care she requires.

photo above shows a 12 year old boy awaiting surgery for his leg, and with the
help of Maranathan the pressure was relieved with the following photo below.

is at risk of losing his leg due to lack of resources for good treatment. His
mother confirmed that he needs a wheel chair to help his journey back to school
as treatment is done.

Impact

pregnant women and children from birth to 5 years old. This project will
support Maranathan's mission to diagnose and treat newborns and young children,
intervening before their conditions become critical or life-threatening. 
Maranathan will also focus on maternal post-birth infections and
hemorrhaging (heavy bleeding) which can be life threatening if not diagnosed
and treated promptly.

Risks
& Challenges

during or after birth will be at a health risk and the children who are
infected by their mothers will also have to fight for their lives because the
fatality rate will be against. 
The mothers and the children who also need surgery will be
at risk of no recovery or even the hope to live a normal life again.
