story:
KC CAMP CONFIDENCE 

We'd like to turn KC Camp Confidence from a Day Camp into an outdoor, high-energy 2 - 14 day overnight summer camp that we hope to be located on 150 Acres in the heart of Kansas City, Mo. Ages (8 – 18) will have the opportunity to run their own city for 2 weeks and be led by professionally trained peer counselors and Mentors.  The camp’s goal is to equip children with skills needed to be effective and successful in life such as: leadership, confidence, team building, money management and communication skills.

Campers have the opportunity to engage in fun, wholesome recreational and team building activities including sports, music/dance, and visual art while learning critical life skills such as building self-and team confidence, building solid friendships as well as learning how to save and manage money.  


BENEFITS TO KC CAMPERS: 2015 DAY CAMP TESTIMONIALS

Jasmin Atagi Northcutt           Yesterday at 1:58pm

There are so many awesome things to say about our weekend at camp confidence but the couple things that stood out most to me were the happiness and positivity I saw in each person. Every person who attended was so happy to be there and be apart of this experience. We were faced with challenges and each person has different insecurities that they had to overcome. The teamwork, trust, communication, leadership, humility, fun, and love that was portrayed by each person and group was beyond amazing! There is truly nothing more wonderful than to see your children find their voice and confidence. Thank you Terra and Lance for giving everyone this amazing opportunity to continue to grow in such a positive way! So excited to be apart of KC Camp Confidence!


MEET CO-FOUNDER AND CEO TERRA WHIPPLE

Click here to learn about my professional career and how I came to be prepared to launch KC Camp Confidence!


KC Camp Confidence Quick Outline:
- Summary
- Benefits to Campers, Volunteers and  Long-Term Business Partners
- Business Plan Overview
- Future Projects 

KC WOODSONG WEEKEND OFFERINGS

A camp full of fun! Offered in weeklong sessions throughout the summer, the Adventure Camp features activities such as biking, tree climbing, canoeing, zip lining. Located on a 150-acre property. Campers will also enjoy swimming daily, endless games, team competitions and fun fun fun!

Fee: $250 per camper per weekend. Kansas City, Missouri or Kansas residents receive a $45 discount.

Coed • Ages 8-18 • Weekly • Overnight/Full-day • June 15-Oct. 1


KC CAMP CONFIDENCE GOAL 

Our goal is to raise $1.2M  to offer 150 acres of campground,  land and waters sports on a 7.5 acre lake (featured below), 2 employees, and necessary licensing.  Our goal is to build indoor studios for music and dance classes provided by teachers from all over the world to expand culture.  We will offer visual art classes, and the best camp food around provided at Mason Mess Hall,  named after the late Mason Folau Atagi, 16 years old.


250+ VOLUNTEER KC CC COUNSELORS AND MENTORS 

Counselors and mentors have been interviewed, selected and will be professionally trained to play a key role. Each adult volunteer (ages 18+) will be interviewed and if qualified, volunteer in a specific role during KC Camp Confidence, as assigned. 

Getting Results: KC Camp Confidence partners with Camp Volunteers to successfully execute Camp Confidence Events.  

Training the Trainers:  Counselors, Mentors and select volunteers will be certified in appropriate classes and courses as needed. Classes are held periodically throughout the year as well as a mandatory two-day bi-annual KC Camp Confidence Business retreat.

Camp Volunteers will be responsible for executing all assigned responsibilities in order to receive high-school or college credit. Each individual volunteer must be committed to driving confidence, building self worth and integrity, enhancing financial literacy skills, based on thorough development and training provided for CC Counselor skills to meet camper and overall CC business expectations. 

During  Bi-annual 2-3 day retreat we split into teams to provide volunteers hands-on training, indoor and outdoor team activities, and details about the updated activities list.  

Mentor/ Counselor Trust Exercise between all Confidence Color Teams

Royal Blue Counselor Alex is listening to his teammates lead the way during a blind-folded trust challenge

Through KC Camp Confidence Mentors and Counselors grow together as family and as friends.  Building skills such as trust, unity, strength, compassion and love. 

With your donations we would like help make, Windsong Ranch in Oskaloosa, Kansas where KC Camp Confidence will forever live as well as build cabins.   Windsong Ranch  comes on a rolling 160 acres with 60% treed and 40% open.  Coming home to Windsong Ranch would make KC Camp Confidence come to life and change the lives of so many. 

Location: Oskaloosa                          Lot Size: 160 acres                    Acres: 160

WHAT WILL WE DO ON 160 ACRES OF KC CAMP CONFIDENCE?

KC Camp Confidence Cabins  

Key Buildings

Purpose

Brief Description

# of buildings

Camper Cabins

to house campers

12-15 campers per cabin.  Two cabins will sit in an L shape forming a square.  In the middle of both cabins will be a connecting fire pit. (Lance - COO has high-level design)

12

Mason Folau Atagi, "Mason" Mess Hall

Meals

Mess Hall will seat 600 people at one time

1

Admissions building/ Upper building in Mason Mess Hall 

Camp Registration, main offices/conference room/board rooms/main hall for large meetings

3 conference rooms, 2 executive offices, 1 Kitchen, Large Community Male and Female bathrooms, 5 mini meeting rooms

n/a

Maintenance Center

House all of the maintenance matierials and tools needed to upkeep the camp.  

Will also store the carts and larger items needed in offseasons

1

Nurse's Station

To nurse campers when ill

Must have 10 beds

1

Bait and Tackle Building

House water accessories 

Fishing poles, worms, swimming trunks, etc… 

1

Pavillions

During rainy days, ability to gather under pavillions

Will be able to provide shelter on rainy days

5

Meeting Building

Place for classrooms and meeting rooms

Place for indoor classrooms 

1

Pavillion Fire Pit

Indoor Fire Pit for inclement weather 

1 big fire pit under a pavillion for when weather is bad

1

Laundry Facility

Room For Industrial Washer and Dryer

Wash all of the kids clothers at the camp

1

Stadium campfire

For Community outdoor meetings/ Gatherings

Wood/concrete stadium seating with campfire with stage around it as focal point

1

Restroom Facilities for Boys

Community Bathroom for boys

May cut the cost of running water and electricity to cabins.  If there are 24 (12 boys/12 girls) cabins. we need 12 boys restrooms

12

Restroom Facilities for Girls

Community Bathroom for girls

May cut the cost of running water and electricity to cabins. If there are 24 (12 boys/12 girls) cabins. we need 12 girls restrooms

12
BIG TICKET KC CAMP CONFIDENCE CABIN ACCESSORIES ITEMS

Storage trunks on Beds

Each camper will have a place to store their belongings while at camp at the end of their beds.  Trunks will lock and will be set in place to ensure security and safety of items.

Trunks will allow campers to organize belongings and lock-up while at the camp to ensure security and safety of belongings 

199

Towel Hooks

Hang towels on the side of their bed along with lanyards and other important items 

This will allow campers to always have their badges and necessary crudentials to get into the camp

199

story:
The Problem?

 Most physical restraint methods are made lethal by the judgment of the official using the method. Government and Behavioral Health Officials should sponsor and  support laws  requiring that  non-lethal restraint methods  be considered  first response priority use when it becomes  necessary to  restrain  an individual exhibiting rage  and uncontrolled  behavior  in the US. 


 Introducing An alternative!  The Cycle Breaker Rage Reduction Bracelet. 

 The Cycle Breaker  Bracelet  is a 21 st century  restraint device integrated  with technology. Using the Cycle Breaker Bracelet encourages the  wearer to develop responsibility for their own behavior, while increasing opportunities to become  more sensitive  to their  personal default pattern and practice using self-soothing techniques, such as, mindfulness and diaphragmatic breathing and  learn to recognize environmental, social and physiological triggers.

The convenient and  habitual use  of lethal, physical restraints by law enforcement, or even chemical restraints used by psychiatric facilities, prison complexes, etc, is frankly, over used and detracts from possible  research projects seeking  alternative methods for restraining  affected individuals.

In addition, the over use of lethal restraints is creating  an  environment of mistrust, anger and paranoia on the part of our citizens, and experience tells us that it is rarely necessary to use lethal restraints on individuals being detained..

                                

                                     The Cycle Breaker Invention Project!

       A 21st Century Solution Integrated With Technological Innovation! 

Over the years, the response to violent behavior and unprovoked aggression in our society has been to pay more attention to the economic, ideological, social and political factors associated with these behaviors and  any resulting consequences. This approach, in our opinion, erroneously overlooks opportunities to investigate, identify and label psychological bio markers that point directly to  predictable default patterns  linking them to  the central nervous system. For example, by linking  psychological bio markers with  their  specific default pattern, we can actually determine the impact that intrinsic neurophysiologic and external environmental factors have on behavior. And, in fact, research suggests that unchecked, aggressive behavior in adults can

eventually change the brain in ways that causes serotonin activity to decrease and perhaps violent behavior to increase.

  In our estimation, there are  few  small behavior health medical devices  dedicated exclusively to real time intervention and treatment of rage and anger misbehavior, or that facilitate the  modification of  rage  default patterns through its collection and interpretation  of triggers,  while teaching mindfulness and self-calming  skills that also facilitate behavior modification. 


             Innovation Technology That Manages 

                                         Uncontrolled Behavior...

         The Cycle Breaker Rage Reduction (CBB)Bracelet  
Displays of intense anger and rage are growing at a phenomenal pace in the US. The consistent use of physical and psycho pharmacological restraints frequently end in the death or injury of the person being restrained.  The NEIMAS-1 organization, a small behavioral health company based in Raleigh, North Carolina, is on a mission to address this very issue.

Phyllis West is the founder and Chief Executive Officer of the NEIMAS- 1 Group. From the beginning, Dr. West's mission focused on strengthening mental health treatment outcomes through technology. In January 2015, Dr. West established the NEIMAS-1 Corporation with the aim of designing, prototyping, manufacturing, and marketing the Cycle Breaker Rage Reduction  Bracelet (CBB) and the Cycle Breaker Rage Reduction Phone App (CBBA).

The Neimas-1 Group is dedicated to the following principals:

· Eliminating the frequency of deaths and injuries from crisis restraint encounters.

·  Providing expanded supervision and monitoring of  individuals who identified with having chronic anger and rage problems and an inability to consistently manage and control their aggression.

·  Design a  small, attractive, unidentifiable behavior modification device that:

o  Activates  immediately, when the wearer is overwhelmed by physiological,social and environmental triggers and effectively reduces and/or eliminates negative default reactions to these triggers.

o  Reinforces  use of  mindfulness and self-empowering skills learned during weekly therapy sessions,including; mindfulness, grounding, somatic sensitivity, body scanning and other  self-calming management skills.

o  Can be used in institutions or in homes throughout the country by engaging customers,consumers and early adopters within community service agencies, law enforcement sites,  psychiatric hospitals, military personnel, and forensic facilities providing mental and behavioral health services.

o  Can be used as a stand-alone alternative to psychotropic medication.

o Can be supported with diverse payment methods, including health insurance.

o Provides weekly  clinical  services, supervision and monitoring of CBB clients.

How  Does the Cycle Breaker Bracelet Work?

Electrodes which are made of flexible, non-conductive graphene fabric are attached to a flattened, 4 in. pronged, stainless steel bracelet that wraps snugly and comfortably around the wearer's wrist and locks into place. Each Cycle Breaker Bracelet (CBB) is assigned its own breaker code which is logged into the microprocessor.

The Cycle Breaker's accompanying microprocessor is comprised of 9 different sensory bio-components housed in a separate single database platform which monitors behavior, records stress-related triggers, provides feedback, and upon activation manages rage misbehavior through electrical stimulation.

 The microprocessor components include:

·  Patient position sensor accelerometer

·  Pulse and oxygen in blood sensor(SP02)

·  Blood pressure sensor or sphygmomanometer

·  Galvanic skin response sensor (GSR)

·  sweating /body temperature sensor

·  Air flow sensor (respirations)

·  Electro-cardiogram sensor (ECG)

·  Glucometer sensor

·  Customized message center display unit, consisting of 16 colored LED lights.

    CBB participants must commit to the following treatment Protocols:

·   Comply with pre-scheduled weekly counseling sessions.

·  Consistent use of newly learned self-calming techniques.

·  Reporting to assigned clinician for deactivation of bracelet.

·  Weekly participation in anger and stress management groups.

·  Weekly telephone and Skype follow-up debriefings.

 Some Benefits of Using the Cycle Breaker Bracelet

Wearers develop the capacity to successfully resolve conflict and learn to:

·  Manage stress quickly while remaining alert and calm.

·  Control emotions and behavior.

·  More focus on social cues,boundaries, and needs being expressed by others. 

·  More awareness  and respect for the impact of personal triggers.

.  Treatment plans include insurance options and contracted periods of use.

  .Coming soon ! the cycle breaker phone App!

. Daily collection of meta data taken from the Bracelet's microprocessor. The role  of the microprocessor includes; analyzing  and interpreting the impact of  physiological, environmental and emotional triggers, evaluating and sorting  acute versus chronic readings,assessing and evaluating; the level of intensity,frequency,duration of triggers on the wearer and  forwarding results to the wearer's clinical manager and or  their Primary Care physician.

Some Risks and Challenges

The Cycle Breaker Bracelet will be manufactured as a behavioral health device to monitor physiological activity and metabolic changes due to isolated triggers that lead to aggressive behavior. Once a wearer becomes engaged in aggressive behavior, the Cycle Breaker Bracelet will generate electrical stimulation at the point of attachment on the wrist. The current stimulation acts as the primary intervention to modify/stop violent, rage behavior and quickly eliminate exhibitions of violence. Our hypothesis suggests that behavior modification will become a learned response from the electrical stimulation and the subsequent memory of the stimulation will be stored in the nervous system of the wearer, to attenuate compliance. Until we have completed prototypes and are able to run beta trials, our hypothesis cannot be fully tested and results may be inconsistent. 

 Possible Road Blocks

 Current studies do not provide compelling evidence regarding the efficacy of psycho social treatments over and above nonspecific factors for anger, intensity, and frequency upon which anger is displayed, or for enhancing anger awareness. Furthermore, positive effects are typically demonstrated by self-report measures, with little or no evidence regarding the efficacy of the anger treatment on other behavioral indices.

Additionally, the findings of various US Behaviorists suggest that under some conditions, psycho social treatment for anger can produce iatrogenic effects. Although most treatments are at least minimally effective, there is growing evidence making compelling cases about some of these interventions being harmful. If mental health practitioners are to operate under the principle of primum non nocere (first, do no harm), we should be more aware of the contexts in which anger treatments can be harmful.


 Future Implications

The use  of technology to immediately interrupt harmful behavior 

 Concentrated use of  counseling and psychotherapy to modify anger, rage and aggression versus mandating the use of on-line anger classes that do little to correct the core problem.

More emphasis in behavioral health science to; identify, isolate and label psychological bio signatures and  default patterns before randomly  using inhumane, dangerous, or lethal restraint methods to control behavior.

Greater focus being placed on the selection of  behavior intervention methods that can be used to; capture environmental, social and physiological triggers, as well as, monitor, track, measure, and interpret the frequency, duration and intensity of anxiety states,  hyper alertness, rage, anger  and aggression and utilize resulting meta data to develop new drug or behavior therapy protocols. 

Integrating devices such as the CB Bracelet and CB App into medical  practices to facilitate treatment planning with a focus on reducing patient stress levels, hypertension, anxiety, migraines, and other physical health issues resulting from uncontrolled anger.


Coming Soon!:

An added benefit to using the Cycle Breaker Bracelet is immediate accessibility to the  Cycle Breaker Phone App, an excellent Mindfulness training and reinforcement tool.

What We Need & What You Get

The Cycle Breaker Project Design Outline:

Funding need: $300,000

Goal:   Complete Project Prototypes     

Financial Breakdown:

$1250-1800: Beta testing Anger and Rage Assessment Inventories 12-24 months-

$1,000 Liability insurance(range)

Manufacturing: Possible cost per unit for CBB Design with Microprocessor Prototype:

$3,500-10,000@8- 10 units

Market research: Feasibility Studies, Beta- testing,  packaging, branding,  Niche Marketing and outreach,data collection /  analysis/management, <2>PT-T personnel

12-24 months- 

$25,000-85,000

Consultations: Manufacturing: Design Engineering/ Certification of(small medical device)

$8,000-12,000(range)

Curriculum Design and Training Pks CBB Units: (CBB Service Contracts) 24-36 months :  phase 1

$50,500-80,000(range)

Product warranty

$1500-2500.00

Field Support: (2) PT-T Clinical  Research Assistants ( Experienced  college graduate students); (1) PT-T) statistician; Recruitment/training/orientation/per Diem travel of support team

$45,000-70,000(range)

Unused Funds

If we do not meet the original goal set for this fund campaign period,the accumulated funds will be used to advance research in the area of rage and aggressive behavior in the following manner; hiring one assistant to help with research work and white paper development, the completion of Beta field tests and validation of supplemental of the CBB  Anger and Rage Assessment Inventories and soliciting partners interested in future collaborations,.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate any support from individuals like you who are visiting our site today an are  interested in bringing about change in the field of behavioral health services.  We thank you in advance for your support. If you would like to support this project and cannot donate at this time, please help us by telling your friends and family about the Cycle Breaker Research Project Campaign and remember to use the Indie Go Go share tools on this page.  Also, don't forget to visit our web site to learn more about our other services or respond to future survey questions.

We will be so very grateful,   Thank you!


For additional information about this exciting project, or to make a donation, please email inquiries to Admin Services Office: Attn: Mr,  Reginald Hartman, Administration:

  neimas1group@gmail.com

Website Address: http://neimas1group.com 

By donating to this project, We believe you recognize  the benefits to thousands  of individuals affected by  uncontrolled rage and anger, who will now have  the option of choosing the Cycle  Breaker Bracelet as a more acceptable and humane method of  managing uncontrolled rage issues. Simultaneously, you get the opportunity to support this on-going behavioral health research. 

 Please  consider sending funds via PayPal Account or Credit Card payment to: 

 The Cycle Breaker Fund Campaign! 

  Thank you.
story_txt:
The Problem? Most physical restraint methods are made lethal by the judgment of the official using the method. Government and Behavioral Health Officials should sponsor and  support laws  requiring that  non-lethal restraint methods  be considered  first response priority use when it becomes  necessary to  restrain  an individual exhibiting rage  and uncontrolled  behavior  in the US.  Introducing An alternative!  The Cycle Breaker Rage Reduction Bracelet.  The Cycle Breaker  Bracelet  is a 21 st century  restraint device integrated  with technology. Using the Cycle Breaker Bracelet encourages the  wearer to develop responsibility for their own behavior, while increasing opportunities to become  more sensitive  to their  personal default pattern and practice using self-soothing techniques, such as, mindfulness and diaphragmatic breathing and  learn to recognize environmental, social and physiological triggers.The convenient and  habitual use  of lethal, physical restraints by law enforcement, or even chemical restraints used by psychiatric facilities, prison complexes, etc, is frankly, over used and detracts from possible  research projects seeking  alternative methods for restraining  affected individuals.In addition, the over use of lethal restraints is creating  an  environment of mistrust, anger and paranoia on the part of our citizens, and experience tells us that it is rarely necessary to use lethal restraints on individuals being detained..                                
                                     The Cycle Breaker Invention Project!       A 21st Century Solution Integrated With Technological Innovation! Over the years, the response to violent behavior and unprovoked aggression in our society has been to pay more attention to the economic, ideological, social and political factors associated with these behaviors and  any resulting consequences. This approach, in our opinion, erroneously overlooks opportunities to investigate, identify and label psychological bio markers that point directly to  predictable default patterns  linking them to  the central nervous system. For example, by linking  psychological bio markers with  their  specific default pattern, we can actually determine the impact that intrinsic neurophysiologic and external environmental factors have on behavior. And, in fact, research suggests that unchecked, aggressive behavior in adults caneventually change the brain in ways that causes serotonin activity to decrease and perhaps violent behavior to increase.  In our estimation, there are  few  small behavior health medical devices  dedicated exclusively to real time intervention and treatment of rage and anger misbehavior, or that facilitate the  modification of  rage  default patterns through its collection and interpretation  of triggers,  while teaching mindfulness and self-calming  skills that also facilitate behavior modification. 
             Innovation Technology That Manages                                          Uncontrolled Behavior...
         The Cycle
Breaker Rage Reduction (CBB)Bracelet  

Displays of intense
anger and rage are growing at a phenomenal pace in the US. The consistent use of physical and
psycho pharmacological restraints frequently end in the death or injury of the
person being restrained.  The NEIMAS-1 organization, a small behavioral health company based in
Raleigh, North Carolina, is on a mission to address this very issue.

Phyllis West is the founder and Chief Executive Officer of the NEIMAS- 1 Group. From the
beginning, Dr. West's mission focused on strengthening mental health treatment
outcomes through technology. In January 2015, Dr. West established the NEIMAS-1
Corporation with the aim of designing, prototyping, manufacturing,
and marketing the Cycle Breaker Rage Reduction  Bracelet (CBB) and the
Cycle Breaker Rage Reduction Phone App (CBBA).
The Neimas-1 Group is
dedicated to the following principals:
· Eliminating the frequency of deaths and injuries from crisis
restraint encounters.
· 
Providing expanded supervision and monitoring of  individuals who identified with having chronic anger and rage problems and an inability to consistently manage and control their aggression.
· 
Design a  small, attractive, unidentifiable behavior modification device that:
o  Activates  immediately, when the
wearer is overwhelmed by physiological,social and environmental triggers and effectively reduces and/or eliminates negative default reactions to these triggers.
o  Reinforces  use of  mindfulness and self-empowering skills learned during weekly therapy sessions,including; mindfulness, grounding, somatic sensitivity, body scanning and other  self-calming management
skills.
o  Can be used in
institutions or in homes throughout the country by engaging customers,consumers and early adopters within community service agencies, law enforcement sites,  psychiatric hospitals, military personnel, and forensic facilities providing mental and behavioral health services.
o  Can be used as a stand-alone alternative to psychotropic
medication.
o Can be supported with diverse payment methods, including health insurance.
o Provides weekly  clinical  services, supervision and monitoring of CBB clients.

How  Does the Cycle Breaker Bracelet Work?
Electrodes which are
made of flexible, non-conductive graphene fabric are attached to a flattened, 4
in. pronged, stainless steel bracelet that wraps snugly and comfortably around
the wearer's wrist and locks into place. Each Cycle Breaker Bracelet (CBB) is
assigned its own breaker code which is logged into the microprocessor. 
The Cycle Breaker's
accompanying microprocessor is comprised of 9 different sensory bio-components
housed in a separate single database platform which monitors behavior, records
stress-related triggers, provides feedback, and upon activation manages rage misbehavior
through electrical stimulation.
 The
microprocessor components include:
· 
Patient position sensor accelerometer
· 
Pulse and oxygen in blood sensor(SP02) 
· 
Blood pressure sensor or sphygmomanometer
· 
Galvanic skin response sensor (GSR)
· 
sweating /body temperature sensor
· 
Air flow sensor (respirations)
· 
Electro-cardiogram sensor (ECG)
· 
Glucometer sensor 
·  Customized message center display unit, consisting of 16
colored LED lights.
    CBB participants must
commit to the following treatment Protocols: 
· 
 Comply with pre-scheduled weekly counseling sessions.
· 
Consistent use of newly learned self-calming techniques.
· 
Reporting to assigned clinician for deactivation of bracelet.
· 
Weekly participation in anger and stress management groups.
· 
Weekly telephone and Skype follow-up debriefings.
 Some Benefits of Using the Cycle Breaker Bracelet
Wearers develop the
capacity to successfully resolve conflict and learn to:
· 
Manage stress quickly while remaining alert and calm.
· 
Control emotions and behavior. 
·  More focus on social cues,boundaries, and needs being
expressed by others. 
·  More awareness  and respect for the impact of personal triggers.
.  Treatment plans include insurance options and contracted periods of use.
  .Coming soon ! the cycle breaker phone App!
. Daily collection of meta data taken from the Bracelet's microprocessor. The role  of the microprocessor includes; analyzing  and interpreting the impact of  physiological, environmental and emotional triggers, evaluating and sorting  acute versus chronic readings,assessing and evaluating; the level of intensity,frequency,duration of triggers on the wearer and  forwarding results to the wearer's clinical manager and or  their Primary Care physician.

Some Risks and Challenges
The Cycle Breaker
Bracelet will be manufactured as a behavioral health device to monitor
physiological activity and metabolic changes due to isolated triggers that lead
to aggressive behavior. Once a wearer becomes engaged in aggressive behavior,
the Cycle Breaker Bracelet will generate electrical stimulation at the point of
attachment on the wrist. The current stimulation acts as the primary
intervention to modify/stop violent, rage behavior and quickly eliminate
exhibitions of violence. Our hypothesis suggests that behavior modification
will become a learned response from the electrical stimulation and the
subsequent memory of the stimulation will be stored in the nervous system of
the wearer, to attenuate compliance. Until we have completed prototypes and are
able to run beta trials, our hypothesis cannot be fully tested and results may
be inconsistent. 
 Possible Road Blocks
 Current studies do not
provide compelling evidence regarding the efficacy of psycho social treatments
over and above nonspecific factors for anger, intensity, and frequency
upon which anger is displayed, or for enhancing anger awareness. Furthermore,
positive effects are typically demonstrated by self-report measures, with
little or no evidence regarding the efficacy of the anger treatment on other
behavioral indices.
Additionally, the
findings of various US Behaviorists suggest that under some conditions,
psycho social treatment for anger can produce iatrogenic effects. Although
most treatments are at least minimally effective, there is growing
evidence making compelling cases about some of these interventions being
harmful. If mental health practitioners are to operate under the principle
of primum non nocere (first,
do no harm), we should be more aware of the contexts in which anger treatments
can be harmful.
 Future Implications

The use  of technology to immediately interrupt harmful
behavior 
 Concentrated use of  counseling and psychotherapy to modify anger, rage and aggression versus mandating the use of on-line anger classes that do little to correct the core problem.
More emphasis in behavioral health science to; identify, isolate and label psychological bio signatures and  default patterns before randomly  using inhumane, dangerous, or lethal restraint methods to control behavior.
Greater focus being placed on the selection of  behavior intervention methods that can be used to; capture environmental, social and physiological triggers, as well as, monitor, track, measure, and interpret the frequency, duration and intensity of anxiety states,  hyper alertness, rage, anger  and aggression and utilize resulting meta data to develop new drug or behavior therapy protocols. 
Integrating devices such as the CB Bracelet and CB App into medical  practices to facilitate treatment planning with a focus on reducing patient stress levels, hypertension, anxiety, migraines, and other physical health issues resulting from uncontrolled anger.

Coming Soon!:
An added benefit to using the Cycle Breaker Bracelet is immediate accessibility to the  Cycle Breaker Phone App, an excellent Mindfulness training and reinforcement tool.
What We Need &
What You Get
The Cycle Breaker Project Design Outline:

Goal:   Complete Project
Prototypes

insurance(range)

Unused Funds
If we do not meet the
original goal set for this fund campaign period,the accumulated funds will be used to advance
research in the area of rage and aggressive behavior in the following manner;
hiring one assistant to help with research work and white paper development, the completion of Beta field tests and
validation of supplemental of the CBB  Anger and Rage Assessment Inventories and soliciting
partners interested in future collaborations,.
Other Ways You Can Help
We appreciate any support from individuals like you who are visiting our site today an are  interested in bringing about change in the field of behavioral health services.  We thank you in advance for your support. If you would like to support this
project and cannot donate at this time, please help us by telling your friends
and family about the Cycle Breaker Research Project Campaign and remember to
use the Indie Go Go share tools on this
page.  Also, don't forget to visit our web site to learn more about our other services or respond to future survey questions.
We will be so very grateful,   Thank you!


For additional information about this exciting project, or to make a donation, please email inquiries to Admin Services Office: Attn: Mr,  Reginald Hartman, Administration:
  neimas1group@gmail.comWebsite Address: http://neimas1group.com By donating to this project, We believe you recognize  the benefits to thousands  of individuals affected by  uncontrolled rage and anger, who will now have  the option of choosing the Cycle  Breaker Bracelet as a more acceptable and humane method of  managing uncontrolled rage issues. Simultaneously, you get the opportunity to support this on-going behavioral health research.  Please  consider sending funds via PayPal Account or Credit Card payment to:  The Cycle Breaker Fund Campaign!   Thank you.

story:
My name is Juan Morales, I’m the owner and creator of Naughty Fruit.

Naughty Fruit is The Dehydrated (SUPER) Spiced RAW fruit snack made for the active life style. Full of vitamins, nutrients and natural enzymes; Naughty Fruit is a snack we are proud of and want to share “Eating Naughty” across the US. We use only the highest quality, ripest fruit and unique spice blends to bring you an unforgettable snacking experience. 

INTRODUCING SUPER SPICES/HERBS TO NAUGHTY FRUIT: Turmeric, Rosemary, Sage and more. What makes Naughty Fruit so special? The fruit is dried with a custom seasoning blend. This sassy and spicy blend complements the fruit's natural sweetness and gives you a little surprise kick. The spice blend contains herbs and spices that may improve circulation, curb inflammation and provide antioxidants. * 

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. 

Dehydration & Nutrition:

Health Benefits of Dried Fruit Dried fruits offers some advantages over fresh fruits: a longer shelf life and portability. Dried Fruit is also highly nutritious. One piece of dried fruit contains about the same amount of nutrients as the fresh fruit, but condensed in a much smaller package. By weight, dried fruit contains up to 3.5 times the fiber, vitamins and minerals of fresh fruit. Therefore, one serving can provide a large percentage of the daily recommended intake of many vitamins and minerals, such as folate.

  • 1. Dried fruits also contains more fiber than the same-sized serving of their fresh counterparts. Fiber helps keep your digestive system running smoothly. Dried apricots, for example, contain 6.5 grams per cup, while fresh apricots contain just 3.1 grams. According to the Harvard School of Public Health, it helps prevent obesity, heart disease and some forms of cancer.
  • 2. Some dried fruits are a good source of certain antioxidants, according to a 2005 study in the "Journal of the American College of Nutrition." Phenols, a type of antioxidant, are more abundant in dried fruits than in some fresh fruits, leading researchers to advise that more dried fruits be included in the American diet. Plant polyphenols have been found to fight heart disease, cancer, osteoporosis, diabetes, cancer and degenerative diseases of the brain, according to the November-December 2009 issue of "Oxidative Medicine and Cellular Longevity." They also are associated with health benefits such as improved blood flow, better digestive health, decreased oxidative damage and reduced risk of many diseases.
  • 3. Because most of the water is extracted from dried fruits, their nutrients are condensed into a small package. Dried fruits like apricots, raisins, prunes and figs contain high amounts of beta carotene, vitamin E, niacin, iron, magnesium, potassium and calcium, reports the European Food Information Council. 
  • 4. Several studies have shown that people who eat dried fruit tend to weigh less and ingest more nutrients compared to individuals not eating dried fruit. Not all dried fruit is created equally though. Added sugars, and problematic preservatives & processing practices can quickly offset any nutritional benefits dried fruits provide. It is important to avoid dried fruits with added sugars and preservatives. In conclusion, dried fruit have many health benefits. They are delicious and sweet and can be a substitute for processed and artificially sweetened snacks for both kids and adults.

What We Need & What You Get

After a summer of product testing, Naughty Fruit has piqued the interest of many individuals as well as local businesses. Now it's time to take the next step to expand our distribution locally and online, but before we can do this we need to cover our legal and operational costs. 

$10K Covers: 

Trademarking, LLC Docs., Barcodes, Nutritional label(s), Labeling Design Fees, Proprietary docs., Website Development Fees, costs to build a large Dehydrator to produce large amounts of Naughty Fruit and expenses to cover Backers Incentives. 

With your support we will reach our Goal of 10K and Naughty Fruit will begin its journey into your Grocery Baskets.    

No common allergenic elements are used in the making of Naughty Fruit.

Giving $5 you will enjoy 1 sample bag of Naughty Fruit and your own "I Eat Naughty" stickers, (domestic shipping is included).

Giving $25 you will enjoy a bag of the first batch of our 6oz Naughty Mix blend and your own "I Eat Naughty" sticker. (domestic shipping is included). 

Giving $30
ORGANIC: Your own 6oz of Organic Pineapple Naughty Fruit Bag. and our "I Eat Naughty" Fruit sticker. (domestic shipping is included)

Pledge $50, Now we’re getting Naughty. You will enjoy a 6oz bag of our Naughty Mix blend and 6oz bag of Pineapple. And your own "I Eat Naughty" stickers. Great for Holiday Gifts. (domestic shipping is included). 

Pledge $60
ORGANIC: Pledging $60 you will enjoy an Organic 6oz bag of our Naughty Mix and Organic 6oz bag of Pineapple. And our "I Eat Naughty" sticker. . (domestic shipping is included).

Pledge $100 to be a Naughty Fruit Fanatic and enjoy 1 bag of each of our following blends: 6oz Naughty Mix blend, 6oz bag of Pineapple, 6oz bag of Bad Apple, a 6oz bag of Tropic Tease (Mango/ Pineapple) and your own"I Eat Naughty" stickers. Your Naughty Fruit Selfie on the Naughty Fruit Fanatics Wall on our Facebook page and website. (domestic shipping is included). 

Pledge $150
ORGANIC: Naughty Fruit Fanatics who give $150 you can enjoy 1 bag of each of our following ORGANIC blends: 6oz Naughty Mix blend, 6oz of Pineapple, 6oz of Bad Apple, a 6oz of Tropic Tease (Mango/ Pineapple). And our "I Eat Naughty" sticker. Your Naughty Fruit selfie on the Naughty Fruit Fanatics Wall on our Facebook page and website. (domestic shipping is included)

Pledge $500, and join us for a "Naughty Jackson Lake Boat Ride Party Picnic" for you and a Naughty Guest of your liking along with a bag of each of our following blends: 6oz Naughty Mix blend, 6oz bag of Pineapple, 6oz bag of Bad Apple, a 6oz bag of Tropic Tease (Mango/ Pineapple) for both of you. Transportation within 50miles of Teton Valley provided, And your very own "I Eat Naughty" stickers. Your Naughty Fruit Selfie on the Naughty Fruit Fanatics Wall on our Facebook page and website. 

Pledge $1000, and we throw a "Naughty Private Party" from Sponsor Morales Home Made 'Mexican Cuisine' Catering for #25 People at your private residence in the Teton Valley area. 1hr Salsa Lesson included. And your choice of Naughty Fruit Platters served. 

OUR FAMILY:
In 2013 my father had undergone his 3rd back operation, replacing protruding and worn down lower back disks. 3 months prior, my mother left her job because of unfair wages. With the reality of medical bills and only having my mother’s limited income to rely on, the road ahead was looking pretty tough. I decided to come home and try to find a way to lessen their load and seek out my own peace of mind in the process. Giving back to my parents who had sacrificed and given me so much is one of the things that continues to motivate me.

We had begun to create a local following, selling Tamales in the farmers market in Jackson Wyoming and shaved ice at the Jackson Hole High School soccer fields. We had created our own opportunities and found hope once again. I began to play with the notion of dehydrating my own snacks since we had agreed on keeping a tight budget. 

After doing a lot of online research and playing around with fruit and a bunch of different SPICES & HERBS, Naughty Fruit was born. With all of its health benefits, Naughty Fruit will assist in the battle over the high obesity rate which plagues the US by providing a healthy snack alternative. 

Now you can give your loved ones a snack that taste amazing and contains incredible ingredients made to increase intake of natural Herbs/Spices, and it taste absolutely DELICIOUS....! 

Risks & Challenges

We believe our biggest issues will arise in scaling up to an ever growing demand for Naughty Fruit orders and blends, none the less we will tackle these matters as they arise and will plan accordingly. Once production is running smoothly, we will begin to produce Organic Naughty Fruit blends to cater to our growing clientele. 
If you have any further questions or concerns please feel free to contact us. 
No common allergenic elements are used in the making of Naughty Fruit.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please share as much as you can, every little bit helps. Help yourself to the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
Your help at any level brings a vending machine with these tasty and healthy  food kits one step closer to your home and your kids' school.


Fresh salad in a few seconds - Packaging design and kit

We are a small group of inventors trying to develop ideas of consumer products for healthy lifestyle promotion. This is our first experience of crowdfunding.

The presented salad concept, giving customers an option to slice fresh whole vegetables just prior to consumption, meets actually two trends: healthy and tasteful eating (fresh salad prepared just before consumption); and convenience (potability). No salad on the market meets both of these requirements. 

Initially we thought finalize the development in a couple of months, but the task was much more difficult. We have tried dozens variants of the packaging design for several years up to come to the current design. The challenge was to develop the design which is on one hand efficient, convenient, environmentally friendly and safe and on the other hand simple and inexpensive as the conventional packaging.  

We need your help to move the concept further, from prof-of-principle prototype to real packaging made by industrial technologies. For this purpose two molds (for  pulp thermoformed tray and for plastic knife) and a die-cut tool (for carton insert) are required. 


Proposed product. People lately have been increasingly shifting their tastes to fresh food that they see as healthier.  Grocery stores have sought to capitalize on the desire for fresh foods by sprucing up the perimeter of the store with farmers' market-style produce bins and packaged salads, offering fresh vegetables on the go.  Currently sales of the pre-packaged salads are limited because of their short shelf life. 

The proposed product, based on the developed packaging design, gives customers an option to slice fresh whole vegetables just prior to consumption, addressing unmet market need. This is a kit, in which washed whole vegetables are stored in a disposable packaging. Cutting/slicing is done for just a few seconds using the plastic knife integrated into the package. 

Our first product is a salad based on cherry tomatoes and cucumbers, with addition of baby leaves, mozzarella cheese small balls, et al, combined with a variety of salad dressings and other additives. Further we are planning to develop products based on other vegetables and fruits.  

Our missionis making fresh and tasty salads available anywhere at any time. We believe that this way we promote healthy eating and fight obesity, especially among children.

The kits can be distributed through catering, convenience stores and other outdoor food distribution channels. The product could also be supplied to schools, hospitals and other institutions, or sold by vending machines.


Packaging Design

The packaging includes:

·  Tray, could be made by pulp thermoforming

·  Insert, die cut of thin carton

·  Plastic knife, injection molded

During transportation and marketing the kit is covered by a transparent film.

Current status 

  • Passed the “proof of concept” stage.
  • Developed a working prototype of the packaging made manually of thin carton. 

Development plan:

Stage 1.

Fundraising campaign.

At this stage we need the community support, not only to raise the required budget, but also to gauge the response of the broader audience to the product idea. The more backers, the higher is the potential of the proposed salad kit, the stronger a business case for the potential partners.

Estimated duration: 2 months.

Stage 2.

·  Making temporary tooling; manufacturing small series of the packaging samples;

·  Applying for membership in the United Fresh Produce Association;

·  IP protection;

·  Search for Strategic Partner, contacting fresh produce growers, distributors, processors and others.

Estimated duration: 3-6 months after the fundraising campaign is over.

Stage 3.

Pre-sale preparation (production facility, marketing etc.) and start of sales.

During Stage 3 we plan to not just start the kit production, but also to launch a public campaign for healthy eating. For instance, we are going to hold competitions among school children, who is the fastest in a salad preparation.

Estimated duration: 1-1.5 years after the fundraising campaign is over.

story:
Hi. My name is Hilton Holder, and I started promoting the new genre of lightweight folding electric wheelchairs four years ago. 


Even though the lightweight folding electric wheelchairs we provide are comparatively portable at between 20 and 30 kg or around 40 to 60 lb,  these weights are still far too heavy to lift for anybody but those with normal upper body strength.

What I've learned is that due to the lack of a portable lightweight electric lift in the mobility aid market, there must be hundreds of thousands of individuals with impaired mobility that are stuck between four walls and in lonely nursing homes and tiny dank apartments.

Now I don't get it. We've had astronauts landing on the moon in the 60s already, but somehow the market failed to identify and come up with a lightweight portable electric wheelchair lift. It's quite pathetic really.

Here we have our ageing parents and disabled friends not being able to access the community to satisfy even their most basic needs like shopping, attending doctor appointments, spending time with friends, going to the movies or simply getting out of the apartment for a breath of fresh air.

I am not an engineer, but during the time I have been marketing these wheelchairs I've been overcome with the personal strength and courage that so many mobility impaired people have to come up with every day in order to cope with the frustration of severely limited mobility, something the rest of us just take for granted.

Seeing this need for making wheelchairs more portable motivated me to teach myself how to design parts and have them manufactured. 

One of the first parts I actually designed and had manufactured were these sliding brackets that allowed my clients to quickly detach the back wheels of their lightweight folding electric wheelchairs in order to reduce the lifting weight.

This has helped scores of my clients by making it easier to lift their wheelchairs into the back of a car trunk or boot, but most do not have the dexterity nor the strength to disassemble and assemble their wheelchairs by themselves.

With your support, we will be able to provide mobility impaired individuals with an almost effortless solution to load their wheelchairs and mobility scooters into a car trunk or boot, and I can't wait to see all the extra smiles on their faces



What We Need & What You Get

How much funding will we need to make the Portalift a reality?

Our goal is to produce the Portalift at the lowest cost possible, and luckily for us we are able to source the main component (the linear actuator) from an existing factory without the need for any redesign.

As for the rest of the Portalift, the manufacture thereof will be outsourced to a factory that manufactures heavy duty aluminium speaker stands, and once again we will be able to take advantage of low-cost manufacturing due to the economies of scale. This factory literally produces thousands of quality aluminium speaker stands every day.

In order to achieve the most friendly and ergonomic design, we will be outsourcing to a very accomplished mechanical engineer with years of experience in structural design. Our aim is to minimise the weight of the unit to the extent that it provides the most portable design without compromising on user safety or ease of use.

The creation of the prototype will be completed as a collaboration between myself, the mechanical engineer as well as the factory.

Our minimum quantity that will allow us to bring the Portalift to life comes to about 100 units and  we are silently optimistic about getting funding for this many units.

However, we will still go ahead even if we don't fully reach our goal. 

The factory will charge us slightly more per unit to produce less than 100 units, and even if we just have to break even we are committed to ship the product to everyone who has funded us.

Should we not reach the funding goal, we will still produce units for everyone who has contributed, and we believe that having a professionally manufactured product to showcase will assist us to raise the rest of the required funds necessary for getting the Portalift into mobility equipment stores on a wide enough scale for it to be available to those who may need it.

We are confident that we can bring the Portalift to life within 90 days from the end of the crowdfunding campaign, and if there are any delays we will be updating all our contributors. We do not foresee this though as most of the crucial landmarks in the development of the product have already been completed.


The Impact

As mentioned in my appeal video above, the need that mobility impaired individuals have for a solution that will allow them to almost effortlessly lift their wheelchairs and mobility scooters into a car is dire.

Again and again my sympathies have been stirred as I have come across dozens of individuals who need help, disabled mothers who need all the help they can get to raise their families, mobility impaired fathers for whom portable mobility will provide a new sense of self-esteem and empowerment to get the job done of being a dad.

We have many parents who struggle to provide their disabled kids with the ability to interact with the world, simply because most electric wheelchairs are too heavy.
For the same reason, we have the disgrace of thousands of aged parents stuck between four walls in dank apartments and lonely nursing homes because of the inability to get around easily.

Coming up with this wheelchair lift is not a big ask. Your contribution will make it a reality, and the result will be that we add an untold amount of happiness and joy to the lives of those who are holding out for an easy solution that will give them portable mobility.

As mentioned before, I am not an engineer but have brought a whole number of innovations to life, specifically for the sake of making life easier for the mobility impaired.

Among the innovations, we have developed a carer arm to steer and power our wheelchairs by simply walking behind it.

We have also developed the sliding brackets required to easily disassemble our wheelchairs into three easy to lift parts. This innovation alone has been responsible for giving many of our clients the ability to lift the wheelchair into the car by themselves, or, at least empowering their caregivers with this ability.

We are also busy bringing a number of other mobility innovations to life, all of them related to providing our clients with portable mobility solutions.
Until now, we have manufactured these innovations in our own workshop, and the high cost of producing these one by one has been a major obstacle towards commercialization of our innovations. 

We know that with your support  we can bring these innovations to life and provide the solutions that will help many people with mobility impairments live a much happier life. Thanks.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is to come up with a design friendly enough to make it sufficiently easy for even those with heavily impaired dexterity to use the Portalift . Ease of use and friendliness will be our main design brief, and to this end, we have identified the most creative and accomplished engineers for the design task.

We will be focusing on simplicity above all, with failsafe easy to use features for deploying the Portalift .

With the engineers we have identified, and having carefully studied their portfolios and currently successful mechanical designs for similar gadgets, we are convinced that we will bring to market a game-changing device for the mobility impaired.

Our other challenge for this project was to come up with a solution that would bypass the strict requirements for shipping lithium iron batteries. 

We have overcome this by using standard 9 V batteries that are not only highly affordable and available everywhere, but which also come in rechargeable format so as to contain the costs of operating the Portalift .

The unit operates on voltages ranging from 20 V right up to 29 V, and therefore it is possible for you to  use a standard 20v portable electric screwdriver battery pack available from ebay or your local hardware store.

Other Ways You Can Help

We believe there are many individuals who would love to help and donate, but who would appreciate getting something tangible in return.

For this reason, we have identified some of the most desirable gadgets available and are offering them at steep discounts for those who would like to contribute whilst getting something tangible and useful in return.

You will see that we have listed some very useful gadgets for those who suffer from physical disability. 

We have also listed some amazing rewards for those who want something useful for the kitchen, the workshop, and for those looking for useful gadgets for their mobile phones or tablets.

Shipping cost will be calculated according to the address, and will simply be a disbursement without any further costs added.

We will ship internationally using the least expensive option, and contributors will also be given the opportunity to select receiving their rewards via express Courier.

Once again, we are extremely grateful for any contributions you can make, and it will go a long way towards helping to make the Portalift a reality for thousands and thousands of individuals worldwide.

story:
In honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, empower women to "Get Their Sexy Back" with Organic, Oncology Safe Skincare.  Diminish the appearance of fine lines, relieve eczema and minimize scarring.  Save up to $45 when you order by November 1st.


Post Surgery | Post Radiation | Anti-Aging Skincare

Secret Sexy by Simone™ is an ORGANIC, oncology safe skincare line developed with breast cancer patients in mind.  Formulated by me, Simone Knight, a one-year breast cancer survivor, Secret Sexy by Simone™ helps women “get their sexy back”.  Now, my goal is to empower all women to feel good about their reflection, because when you look good, you feel good, and that heals the spirit.  It's not just for cancer patients!  

Pre-Order Your New Skincare Obsession Trio: 
  1. Magic Mender™ - Prevents and reduces scarring  
  2. Pink Lemonade™ - Protects skin from radiation burns and relieves eczema
  3. The New You™ - The ultimate anti-aging fountain of youth

My Background As Chief Apothecary

So who am I to develop a skincare line? I am a 42 year old Engineer, wife and mother with a background in marketing.  I've always enjoyed being a fashionista and am recognized for my keen sense of style and healthy skin. I was diagnosed with breast cancer in 2014 and I felt powerless to protect my skin while undergoing cancer treatments.  Growing up in a Caribbean household, I learned at a young age how to use homeopathic medicine and skincare from my mother and grandmother. Thus began my quest to Get My Sexy Back!

Many people are aware of the physical impact of chemotherapy, radiation and surgery on cancer patients. But, they don’t always understand the huge emotional impact of looking in the mirror, and no longer feeling like you. After surgery, I felt like the Bride of Frankenstein every time I saw my new body. Everything was different, including my skin. I was doing everything to get healthy; however, an exhaustive search for a natural and effective skincare product left me frustrated and depressed. 

The lack of chemical-free options pushed me to take control and create my first beauty oil. And, what a difference it made! Here I was, fighting every day, going through radiation, and yet I was getting compliments on my skin! People told me that my skin looked radiant, and that it glowed… it put a smile on my face at a time when I needed it most. I got MY sexy back and I started to feel like ME again!


Why You Should Back This Project

Buy one, give one.  We'll donate a free bottle of Pink Lemonade to Breast Cancer Centers for each bottle sold.  Plus, save up to $45 off retail prices when you order through this campaign!  

Amazed by my product's ability to repair and protect skin, my plastic surgeon's office and a major hospital chain have asked me to deliver a large shipment of product. I need your help in funding the manufacturing and packaging of 15,000 bottles, so I can get them out and help other women to Get Their Sexy Back!

The Secret Sexy by Simone TM initial product line has three beauty oils.  And, it's not just for cancer patients.  Each oil is formulated with organic ingredients designed to supercharge the skin’s natural healing process and soothe the spirit without interfering with oncology treatments.  The added bonus is...everyone else can use it too.  Key ingredients include superstar oils, like Coconut and Chia Seed, known for their antioxidant and moisturizing properties. Each product contains no sulfates, parabens or chemicals and is safe for all skin types.  Each ingredient was carefully researched, formulated and tested for efficacy. 

Pink Lemonade™ - Protects and heals skin.  Anti-inflamatory properties reduces itching and irritation caused by oncology radiation, eczema or other conditions. Blends of Coconut and Lemon essential oils protects skin and uplifts the spirit. Buy one, give one.  We'll donate a free bottle to breast cancer centers for each bottle sold.

Magic Mender™ - Smooths and lightens surgical scars and stretch marks. Antioxidants and anti-inflamatories repairs skin and reduces dark spots. Scents of Lavender and Rosemary soothes while it heals.  

The New You™- Diminishes the appearance of wrinkles and brightens dry, blemished skin.  Aromas of Bergamot blended with antioxidant rich Chia Seed oil slows skin aging.


Risks & Challenges

I've formulated each product, sourced suppliers, and identified manufacturers.  To ensure the quality and organic healing components of the oils, I carefully chose a qualified, U.S.-based manufacturing laboratory that specializes in organic skincare. My biggest potential obstacles are meeting minimum manufacturing quantities and my lab's ability to make and package the product according to the agreed-upon timeline. If a setback arises, I will quickly and openly communicate with all of my backers and ensure the rewards are delivered December 2015 as promised.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are three ways to help me and my team bring organic, oncology safe skincare to everyone: 

  • Choose a reward level and  back this project 
  • Share our campaign page on social media 
  • Tell friends about the campaign

If a setback arises, I will quickly and openly communicate with all of my backers and ensure the rewards are delivered December 2015 as promised.   Other Ways You Can Help There are three ways to help me and my team bring organic, oncology safe skincare to everyone: 

Choose a reward level and  back this project 
Share our campaign page on social media 
Tell friends about the campaign

story:
need to relax, decrease stress, soothe aching muscles

Short Summary

THERMO HOT TUBS ARE COMING TO YOUR AREA.  WE NEED YOUR HELP!!!

Hi, I'm Jerry. Owner of Jema Pool Supply in Selma, Al. and Jema Pool&Spa Service formerly located in Cassopolis, Mi.  For 19 years I have predominantly maintained many public facilities' swimming pools and spas. My home is Cassopolis, Mi.

I was Chief Engineer at Lee's Inn&Suites and Hawthorne Inn&Suites in Kalamazoo, Mi. at which time I maintained and serviced both there pools and spas. In doing so I had the pleasure of working directly with the local Health Dept., by submitting water samples weekly to ensure that water quality and chemical balancing continuously met their standards and the standards of the N.S.P.F. (National Swimming Pool Foundation.) I further service several other hotels pools and spas (e.g.) Comfort Inn&Suites -Three Rivers, Mi. and South Bend, In.

I am Certified in Water Chemistry for Pools and Spas, and E.P.A. Certified. 

I was assist. Chief Engineer at the Ramada Inn,  and the now Waterford Estates Lodge located near Notre Dame University and St. Marys College.

I am going to bring to the Michiana area, Hot-Tubs and will open the first location in Mishawaka, In.

THERMO HOT-TUBS will be a community orientated facility to be enjoyed by friends, family, couple and yes...Kids. This facility will only add a unique clean and healthy experience available to the residents at a very affordable cost. This offers a delightful option for entertainment, socialization, re-kindling communications, and tranquility to say the least. Here are some more benefits to Hot-tubbing:
Stress Relief; Muscle Ache Relief; Weight Control Enhancer; Skin Exfoliation; Hands-Free Hydomassage; Mental Tranquility; Serenity; and much more.
     This location will have minimum 7 tubs available including 1 ADA accessible tub room complete with spa lift for those who need assistance.
Each tub will have its own private room and accommodate 1-6 people with 51 stainless jets in each tub and multi-colored underwater mood lights, a shower and rest bench and music of your choice.
This will be the first of its kind in the area and we Need your support in making this happen.


What We Need & What You Get

After careful real estate search we have found the most economical yet best location for the money. This building will allow me to reduce reconstruction by about 35% thereby leaving us with still a cost of about $175,000.00 which includes all necessary alterations, signage, installation, fixtures, lighting and wall &flooring.

If you cannot contribute funds we need you to share your interest and spread the word to all your friends, co-workers and etc., this is very helpful and I Thank you so much.

To reach our goal will allow us to acquire the current targeted building while its available and to be able to open the doors on May 2016

If we don't reach our target goal, our opening date will be extended, however we will make the opening of Thermo Hot Tubs happen and the funds acquired will "ALL" be applied.

 Your support will be essential to the first location in this area which will afford you and others to enjoy this delightful treat without the expense of owning and maintaining a hot tub at your house.

The Impact

I am very passionate about this project for Mishawaka. This is a very healthy, clean, affordable and positive accentuating asset for the community.

I have visited on many occasions the Hot Tubs located in San Francisco and  Berkeley, California as well as the one in Kentwood, Mi. and Kalamazoo. I see no reason why we cannot offer this delightful choice in Mishawaka.

Any and all who may visit the tubs will be without question elated that such a facility is available to the community.

Whether winter, spring, summer or fall, to indulge into the tubs is the perfect private ambiance to re-ignite quality conversation, a tranquil prelim to dinner, a mood changer for a walk under the stars, a serenity to explore uninterrupted thoughts and ideas and much, much more.

People not only in the community, but those who visit the Michiana area from other parts of the world will also find this option quite attractive. It can only be a positive asset to the community so help me make it happen.

IT WILL BE THE TALK OF THE TOWN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk I take is getting the bldg. with the only funds I have left, and without further financial help, reconstruction, materials for the same, and to open the doors will be severely hampered.

I am certified by the National Swimming Pool Foundation, and E.P.A. certified and water chemistry have been my passion for 19 years now which which allows me to perform much of the installation necessary by local codes. My experience affords me to to practically all tub installations, ADA lift installation, plumbing, and etc., with help of course.

So other than severely under financed, all other risks and challenges are void

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. You getting the word out is helping very much so. So spread the word about this project.

Also you can go to our website and e-mail any questions or concerns or ideas.

Also please use the indiegogo share tools and facebook and twitter for sharing.

WE THANK YOU SO MUCH AND LOOK FORWARD TO A SUCCESSFUL CAMPAIGN

story:
Genealogy in Seconds:

Thousands of people want to know their ancestors better. But many of them just don't have the time.

That's where Ged-I comes in.

Ged-I's automation process saves family history seekers the effort of entering ancestral data by hand, and quickly provides them with the information they need to further their genealogy work.


What is Ged-I?

Ged-I (short for GEDCOM Interpreter) is an innovative genealogy software that will help you find your ancestors faster by automating information retrieval. Simply upload text to Ged-I and it will extract key information that you need to find your ancestors. This software will save genealogists everywhere thousands of man-hours. We need your help to bring it to the field.

Backing us today will help make Ged-I a reality. Even a contribution as small as $5 can help us in bringing you the future of genealogy.


What is GEDCOM?

GEDCOM is the universal genealogical file standard that is accepted and in use today.  it has been around since 1984.  You may have heard of other file standards:  HTML for browsers, JPEG for images, MP3 for audio, ZIP for compression -- GEDCOM is the file standard used for genealogical information. 

Where is GEDCOM used?

GEDCOM is used and recognized by all popular genealogical websites such as:  Ancestry.com, familysearch.org, Cyndislist.com, myheritage.com; and genealogy programs such as: Roots Magic, Ancestral Quest, Family Tree Maker, Legacy Family Tree,  Family Tree Builder -- Genealogy applications recognize GEDCOM as a means of transporting your family data for import and export.


How Ged-I came to be:

Lorne, founder of Logíque, has been doing genealogy since he was a teen. Genealogy establishes a human connection between ourselves and those who came before us. When we connect with the dead, it helps us become closer to the living as well.

On top of helping us connect one another to our pasts, genealogy teaches us where we come from. It’s an attempt to answer the age old question of “who am I?”

Lorne’s family heritage came from nobility who had everything stripped from them. But instead of letting that keep them down, they decided to start fresh in America. While doing genealogy work, Lorne found out that he comes from a family of survivors and knowing that inspires him to push on despite the challenges that come his way.

Family stories like this are “Eureka!” moments of genealogy, and Logíque wants to help other genealogists find these moments of inspiration.


“If you could have a prescription drug to make your life better, there could not be a prescription drug better, in any sense of the word, than doing genealogy”. ~ Lorne


In doing his own genealogy work, Lorne came across two large tomes packed with information on thousands of ancestors. He tried enter the data by hand, but it quickly became overwhelming. After a bit of math, he realized that manually keying in all of the entries would take him over a year to complete.


“I've got a lifetime of work here ahead of me. How in the world am I going to survive researching this stuff without some kind of tool?” ~Lorne


Ged-I is the way to drastically reduce the amount of time that cataloging all of this information by hand currently takes. This tool will help thousands of genealogists, like Lorne, who need a more efficient way to archive invaluable information about their ancestors.

None of this can happen without your help.


Where Ged-I is now:


Ged-I is just beyond the idea phase, a proof of concept. There is a lot of work ahead of us to get Ged-I ready for public use.

Ged-I version 1.0 will:

- Be compatible with Windows 7, 8 and 10

- Determine if the input parameter text is a genealogy text

- Find genealogy elements such as birth, death, marriage, divorce, and relationships of parents with children

- Function as a Windows desktop application

- Utilize the English language and basic vocabulary as well as genealogy specific words

- Determine if the input text is or is not in English

- Have the ability of adding proper names and locations, via an Administrator interface

- Have a comprehensive translation engine to determine intent of the text, and parsing English sentence structures

- Be capable of understanding the syntax and structure of a GEDCOM file

- Be capable of writing a GEDCOM file

- Be capable of reading *.txt and .pdf files

- Be used by one person at a time

- Have a feature-limited free version

-Will conform to GEDCOM 5.5 standards


Where Ged-I wants to go:

For us, Ged-I 1.0 is just the beginning.


Later versions will have Ged-I as a web based application that will be available in multiple languages for parsing more complicated texts.

Timeline

We estimate that Ged-I will need 9 months to go from the proof of concept stage that it's in now to a fully realized software. Here's where all of that time is going.

  • Version one development: 6 months
  • Version one senior development: 1 month
  • Version one Final Testing: 1 month
  • Version one documentation: 1 weeks
  • Version one marketing: 3 weeks

Budget

 In order to know exactly where your money is going, we’ve broken our budget below

43,600:

36,800: Development

-Version one Coordination and project management  4800

-Version one development  19200

-Version one Final Testing  4800

-Version one documentation 800

-Version one marketing 3000

-Server hosting  600

-OCR plugin 3600


1,840: Indiegogo Fees

1,840: PayPal Fees

1,120: Credit Card Fees

2,000: Shipping and distribution costs 



Our Team

As with many genealogy projects, Ged-I is a family pursuit. The mind behind the curtain is Lorne Redmond and with the help of his daughter, Melody Van De Graaff, the two of them have brought Ged-I to life.

Lorne:


Lorne has been working genealogy since he was a teenager, starting with the discovery of his great-grandfather’s death certificate. In the spring of 2015 he fulfilled his dream of going on a road trip (in the Pacific Northwest United States) and met 20 living cousins – new family members discovered from years of family research.  He now has a genealogy backlog of thousands of new names and stories to process.

Prompted by this, and thanks to his background in coding, Lorne decided to create  Ged-I to hasten his backlog of genealogy work and further genealogy work worldwide.

Lorne is a Certified Microsoft Professional and has 20 years Software development experience. He has created automation applications for startups and Fortune 500 companies.

Melody:



Melody was originally resistant to doing genealogy work, despite the efforts of friends and family. But one day, someone asked her to give indexing a try and she decided to give genealogy another go. After only a small amount of work, Melody quickly saw how helpful genealogy work was in helping humankind make bonds with ancestors of old.

Melody truly believes that Ged-I will drastically improve genealogy and make the work go faster than ever before. For her, this is a personal endeavor, one that she hopes with all her heart will succeed.

Melody has four years of marketing experience with smaller companies. She has also been on social media since before Facebook was cool, and knows a thing or two about how to get noticed. Melody has also been writing since grade school, and has two novels under her belt.



Rewards

Below is a more detailed breakdown of our rewards

$5 Special Thanks

Your name or business name to appear with other names in a slow moving marque located at the bottom 1/4 of the credits section of the program at Help > About menu.

$15 Ged-I pen.

$25 The Beta release. 

 You will receive the beta version of the software the very moment it becomes available.  You can be among the first beta testers to comment on the software. More functionality than the alpha release. We will also provide you a free license of version 1.0 release.

$30 Ged-I  t-shirt – Limited Edition v 1.0

These will only be available through our campaign. Once the campaign is over, you can’t get these anymore!

$35 The Alpha Release

 You will receive the Alpha version of the software the very moment it becomes available.  You can be among the first to comment on the software.  Alpha versions are a little rough sometimes, but because this is so close to the development software, your voice will be one of the first heard and have some of the most influence as we address issues with the software at this early stage.  You also get the option to be a Beta Tester.

We will also provide you a free license of version 1.0 release.

$50: Version 1.0.

Ged-I will retail at $99, but by supporting us now, you get a copy of the software at half the retail price.

$50 Sponsors  | Bronze tab : Located Next to the Help > about menu.

1.  Benefits: the following information displayed visually on a single line in one of four columns.

  i.  Your name or your business name

   ii.  First come first listed.

  iii.  Smallest sponsor name font.

$50: Virtual 30 min Genealogy Consult (10 available)

Now’s your time to ask Lorne any burning genealogy and/or technology questions you have.

$60 Embossed Ged-I Journal/ Book

Keep your genealogy notes in a Ged-I branded book. Bound in faux leather and embossed with the Ged-I logo.

$100: Virtual 60 min Genealogy Consult (10 available)

Now’s your time to ask Lorne any burning genealogy and/or technology questions you have.

$100 Sponsors | Silver tab:

1.  The following information is displayed visually on a single line in one of two columns.

  i.  Your name or your business name listed on two columns instead of 4 columns (like bronze).

  ii.  Your name or your business name contains embedded hyperlink to your website

  iii.  Non exclusive category

  iv.  more visual space than Bronze.

   v.  Larger font size.

  vi.  Category sorted alphabetically. 

$250 Sponsors | Gold tab: 

1.  The following information is displayed visually on a single line in one column.

  i.  The tab is displayed by default first when clicking on the sponsors page.

  ii.  Exclusive Business Category – once you donate, we lock you into your business category, no one else can use that category.

  iii.  Business Name contains embedded hyperlink to your website.

   iv.  More info link – contains a link to our website where we highlight your business:

1.  a professional write up about why we like your company.

2.  your logo

3.  Your tagline

4.  Other small marketing material.

5.  Person to contact

6.  Phone number

7.  Email

8.  Link to your website

9.  Your more info link is also navigable from our website.

  v.  Largest sponsor name font.

  vi.  Category sorted alphabetically.

$1000, only five available. Have Your Family Story Written

Up to 25,000 words of your own family history written for you. Whether you want it in blog or book format, our resident writer and marketing aficionado Melody will put your family story together. This includes research, interviews, writing the story, and two major revisions.

following information is displayed visually on a single line in one column.
 
i.  The tab is displayed by
default first when clicking on the sponsors page.
 
ii.  Exclusive Business
Category – once you donate, we lock you into your business category, no one
else can use that category. 
 
iii.  Business Name
contains embedded hyperlink to your website.
   iv.  More info link – contains a link
to our website where we highlight your business:
1.  a professional write up about why we
like your company. 
2.  your logo
3.  Your tagline
4.  Other small marketing material.
5.  Person to contact
6.  Phone number
7.  Email
8.  Link to your website
9.  Your more info link is also
navigable from our website.
 
v.  Largest sponsor name font.
 
vi.  Category sorted
alphabetically.
