only five available. Have Your Family Story Written
Up to 25,000 words of your own family history
written for you. Whether you want it in blog or book format, our resident
writer and marketing aficionado Melody will put your family story together.
This includes research, interviews, writing the story, and two major revisions.

story:
StepOne Health puts you in control of your healthcare. Go beyond the exam room and join the StepOne community. Choose the lab tests and products you need, find expert answers to your questions, discuss options, understand your genes, reach your health and fitness goals, and more. StepOne stores all your data-for life for free. Share it only when you want to, with family, doctors, and/or social communities that support you, whether its about a passion or a critical health challenge.

No roadblocks, just real science, the Science of You.  


"Why StepOne Health?

StepOne was launched by Craig Brandman MD, an interventional cardiologist, entrepreneur, coach and father who listened to his patients. As Craig says, “Medicine has become a team sport. It’s more than an interaction in an exam room. Health is something that you build every day, and every patient takes a different path. Diet, lab science, genomics, meds, family history, sensors. It all comes together with the right team. Health is more than a diagnosis, it is the Science of You.” 

What is StepOne Health?

StepOne Health is your platform for everything health. 

StepOne:

  • Offers medical testing and certified products directly to you.

  • Provides tools, graphs and interpretations to help you understand your risks and your progress over time.

  • Securely stores your data for you.

  • Supports online access and personal conversations with a team of medical experts that you put together.

  • Builds communities and offerings for people with a passion or a critical need.

StepOne Health consumers  have more questions than answers about their health.  They are struggling with thousands of online search results, internet hype, and product pitches that are too good to be true. They are voicing their wants and needs related to health care for themselves and their families.  "I want to ferret facts from fiction in all those ads and emails pitching the newest programs and products.” "What specific foods are triggering how I look and feel?” "Is there an exercise that can help get rid of my knee pain so I can run and play with my children longer?" "What if I bring all my health records—medical history, meds, health and fitness data, laboratory tests, my genomics—together, and really understand all of me?” 

How it works: 

You told us about a health care environment where everyone seemed too busy to meet your needs, and it took weeks to get an appointment. Why not, instead, have a central place to find trusted, reliable direct-to-you health products and services 24x7. Why not have an expert to answer your questions, help you set goals and develop a plan to meet them? StepOne Health is designed to be a trusted partner to get you to where you want to go when it comes to your health. 

Where to start? Anywhere. It's your health and your path. 


That big deductible that you face in 2016? That’s your money. StepOne allows You to decide what healthcare expenditures fit your personal needs.  We are ready to go and at last, you can run the show. StepOne will even bill your health plan so your choices count against that big deductible.

Who is StepOne Health: 

The StepOne Health team, led by Craig Brandman, MD and David Clymer, cofounder and CEO of MyMedLab, includes experts like Ronda Gates, a specialist in pharmacy, nutrition and exercise science who is also a successful author and life coach; Gregg Hill, MS, PA-C, a Physician Assistant who, after a life changing 50 pound weight loss is a passionate educator on understanding complex data from your lab, your genomics, and your biome that helps you make those insights actionable, and a host of other experts.

What You're Funding

StepOne already has a great platform of resources in place—a battery of lab tests from the simple to in-depth, tools and assessments, communities of people who share your concerns, your risks, or your passions, and experts of all types.

Today our online destination coordinates and integrates your data, your analyses of prescription and supplement interactions, your nutrition and fitness choices, and remembers the educational and coaching services you receive from the professionals you use.

We are growing, but to truly realize our potential we need help from the community and YOU! We want you as a participant, your input about the products and services you want to add to our platform, and your passion to help us build new communities that support each other.

We will use the money to:

  • 37% Enhance the technology for the platform to serve more people.
  • 14% Increase the products and services you ask for.
  • 24% Spread the word to more people. Our voices are stronger together.
  • 17% Launch new communities for our members.
  • 8% General and administrative coverage.


Your donation today will allow us to continue to build and expand our platform and support our mission: to deliver holistic consumer-centric 21st Century healthcare experiences. 

See our Perks:

We have ten ways you can support us via our perks. In exchange you will receive products and services that exceed the value of your contribution. 

The Detail: More about StepOne 

Our Experiences: Our experiences are designed to support our communities. Our experts bundle the information to that members with important health issues need to manage their health. 

Managing logistics

After securely selecting the tests, products and experiences you want, you will be able to access the results in 24 hours with most tests. In the case of some laboratory tests you will need to make a visit to a local collection center to conveniently, safely and privately collect your specimen (we only use reputable national labs). Sometimes the tests, like genetic tests or measurements of your intestinal biome,  come in the mail. StepOne can submit all claims directly to your insurance carrier as a convenience to you.  

Your health experience products and results are delivered safely and securely to your private health record for you to keep, graph, or share.


We provide easy to read charts to help guide you in making health choices.




And personalized reports from expert resources to help you make sense of all this information from expert services, on demand and from the comfort of your own home.

  • Who's making this a reality? TheStepOne team is a group of health and wellness business leaders focused on digital health and putting the power of healthcare in the hands of the people.

Join us and contribute to the development of this unique and innovative approach to wellness. YOU are the base of our community and, as such, YOUR contributions are an invaluable part of our mutual success. Thank you for your contribution and participation in this one-of-a-kind opportunity to change the health of our community.

Find our campaign here too:


Facebook


Twitter

 YouTube

 Website

story:
The Revolution in Feminine Sanitary Care has Begun! 

Do you hate tampons, but dread the idea of reusing a menstrual cup?


What is Anu™ Clean Cup?

                                        

Anu™ Clean Cup is a revolutionary single-use flexible cup that is worn internally, underneath the cervix that both collects and absorbs menstrual flow.  It's hypo-allergenic, non-latex and completely safe when used as directed

            

Why should you try it?

Anu™ Clean Cup is ideal for all women and girls whether their flow be light or heavy. 

Anu™ Clean Cup is perfect for all women with all types of lifestyles, whether it be a no end to my day stay-at-home mom, a busy on-the-go executive,  an athlete , a world traveling diva, or a no excuses, I just don't want to deal with the messiness of reusable cups or the hassle of frequently changing a tampon woman.

            

Carry on, like you're not on...

Anu™ Clean Cup can safely be worn for up to twelve hours.

Anu™ Clean Cup has such a comfortable fit, you can't even feel it... it goes unnoticed during use. 

Anu™ Clean Cup eliminates menstrual odor, since menstrual flow isn't exposed to air.

Anu™ Clean Cup's absorbent layer is housed completely within its film reservoir, does not cause dryness or irritation, is non-messy during removal and is not linked to Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS). 

Because of it's unique design Anu™ Clean Cup can safely be worn during intercourse for mess-free sex on your period.



How to Use 

While Anu™ Clean Cup is the ONLY menstrual cup that absorbs, it's also the only menstrual cup that has the option of choosing an applicator.  Relax. It's much easier to insert Anu™ Clean Cup when you're relaxed. 

Inserting is much like inserting a tampon and usually takes a few tries before being able to comfortably insert so don't worry. Refer to the instructions and diagrams so you know what to do.

Anu™ Clean Cup w/ applicator is actually made up of 2 parts – the cup itself that you insert into your body, and the applicator you use to insert it. The applicator has a smooth tapered barrel that contains the Anu™ Clean Cup within it, attached is a smaller tube below the cup called a plunger.

1. Wash your hands and then unwrap the Anu™ Clean Cup.

2. Get comfortable. Try sitting on the toilet with knees apart or standing with one foot on the toilet seat.

3. Insert the applicator: hold the applicator plunger using your thumb and middle finger. Place the applicator tip into your vagina parallel to the floor at a 45˚ angle. Now, gently slide the smooth, tapered applicator all the way into your vagina until your fingers touch your body.


4. Push the Anu™ Clean Cup inside: push the plunger all the way into the barrel with your pointer finger. This will release the Anu™ Clean Cup. The plunger should now be inside the barrel. Still holding the plunger, gently pull out the two-piece applicator. The Anu™ Clean Cup should now be comfortably inside you in its precise place.

                                      


After you have inserted the Anu™ Clean Cup, place the used applicator back into the discreet wrapper and throw away. DO NOT FLUSH THE APPLICATOR.

5. Any discomfort? The Anu™ Clean Cup may not be far enough inside. If this happens, just remove the Anu™ Clean Cup and try again with a new one. You won't feel anything when the Anu™ Clean Cup is correctly in place.

6. Removal: relax your muscles. Try getting into the position you used during insertion. Gently push down with your pelvic muscles.  Hook your middle finger under the rim and pull forward.  The Anu™ Clean Cup should slide out easily. Place in an appropriate waste container.


Risks and challenges

*OUR CURRENT STATUS*

             

    

Anu™ Clean Cup is made of a soft polymeric rim attached to a multi-layered reservoir.  The reservoir is composed of three parts.  An impervious polyurethane barrier coupled by a one way porous polyurethane film. Housed within the polyurethane layers is an absorbent polymer core.  Anu™ Clean Cup’s unique design allows the cup to collect significantly increased amounts of fluids versus traditional  menstrual products.  Fluid stays locked away even under compression. 

The Anu™ Clean Cup is still in the development stage.  With your help it will be on its way to be manufactured and ready for delivery by May 2016. We have selected our raw materials and are in the process of finalizing the mold with our manufacturer.

*OUR COMMITMENT TO HONESTY & SAFETY*

We commit to creating a high quality and safe product for all of our backers. Anu™ Clean Cup is made of polyurethane, absorbent polymer and an inert, hypoallergenic, non-irritating polymeric material that has been used safely for more than 30 years in health care products such as non-latex condoms, wound dressings, catheters and baby bottle nipples. We do not cut costs and want to provide the best quality product possible.

We commit to keeping you informed as we hit each new milestone. Once we close this Indiegogo, we will send periodic updates as the Anu™ Clean Cup gets closer and closer to delivery.

*FDA CLEARANCE, REGULATION AND REGISTRATION*

Anu™ Clean Cup is classified as a Class II device under Regulation Number 884.5400 Product Code HHE.

 Note: Class II devices the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has also published a list of Class II (special controls) devices subject to certain limitations, that are now exempt from the premarket notification requirements under the Food and Drug Administration Modernization Act of 1997 (the Modernization Act). FDA believes that these exemptions will relieve manufacturers from the need to submit premarket notification submissions for these devices and will enable FDA to redirect the resources that would be spent on reviewing such submissions to more significant public health issues. FDA is taking this action in order to meet a requirement of the Modernization Act.
 Note: FDA intends to propose exempting these devices from premarket notification pursuant to the criteria at sections 510(l) and 510(m) of the FD&C Act, subject to limitations on exemption criteria found in .9 of the associated classification regulation. Until the publication of a final rule or order exempting these devices from 510(k), FDA does not intend to enforce compliance with 510(k) requirements for these devices.
Although most menstrual cups are  now exempt from PMA and 510(k) submissions we are working with an Accredited third party review board to ensure that we obtain market clearance as quickly as possible.  

*DELAYS AND RISKS*

We are on schedule to deliver the Anu™ Clean Cup in May 2016. However, delays may naturally occur during the manufacturing, testing, packaging, and shipping process. If we find a critical issue that needs to be corrected related to functionality, safety, or user experience – we will need to delay the delivery of the Anu™ Clean Cup to ensure we are shipping a completely safe, reliable, and very useful product. We hope you understand any potential delays are in your best long-term interest.

*COMPANY STATUS*

Case Innovations Inc. is a US C-Corp with its sales and marketing office based in Atlanta, GA. The Anu™ Clean Cup is manufactured in Apex, NC. We are a small startup with small investment from friends, family and personal savings.

Learn about accountability on Indiegogo

FAQ

  • Are there different sizes?

Yes, we will offer Anu™ Clean Cup in multiple sizes.

  • I have an allergy issues with latex. Is the Anu™ Clean Cup safe to use?

Yes! The Anu™ Clean Cup is made of medical-grade materials, latex-free, BPA free that won't cause dryness, irritation or allergic reactions.

  • Can I use Anu™ Clean Cup with an IUD?

Anu™ Clean Cup should not interfere with an internal birth control device. However, all women are different so be informed about your circumstances and consult with your physician if needed.

  • Can I re-use Anu™ Clean Cup?

No, Anu™ Clean Cup is a single-use device made to be disposed of after each use.

  • Will I need to pay customs or taxes?

We are offering Anu™ Clean Cup at a special Indiegogo price, however please be aware that we cannot be responsible for any additional taxes and charges due to the rate of customs and taxes on imported goods.

story: I've been skating the periphery of body work and nutrition for over a decade. Finally, I've found a modality of healing and body work that best integrates and challenges my understanding of the human physiological structure at large. Please contribute to my campaign and prepay for my services. It's a win-win situation, you guys get to help me to realize a dream and in turn I'll get to help you guys develop a new paradigm for your body. A paradigm that fosters therapeutic movement with every single physical action, small or large. Every contribution counts, thank you guys in advance, I look forward to working with every one of you :)

story:
THANK YOU!   

ALTHOUGH the total on our page says $45,712.00 - one day after the campaign closed, we calculated all donations during our Indiegogo raise, including #GivingTuesday, and Black Friday and even Cyber Monday!  The grand total was $52,000!  

 WELL DONE! WE MADE IT!

THANK YOU SO VERY, VERY MUCH!!!

              

“You have changed our lives….. no, you have saved our lives.”

Written by May, the mother of 2 young boys whose story we share below. 

Here are just some of the reasons Angel Flight West has to exist:

Meet Macy H., she is only a year old and has already flown on 9 Angel Flights with us.  Macy suffers with glaucoma and has to fly from Great Falls, MT to Spokane WA for treatment. These flights are not just for her, but for her family too. Often, bringing friends and relatives with passengers is the key component to a patient's recovery.  Macy is able to receive specialized care because of Angel Flight West, without us, would not be able to access it.  We're so happy we can be there for her and her family and for other children with similar medical needs.  We're able to do that for Macy, because of your kind donations to us.

It seems like it might be an intense trip to Macy (above), but for Solomon and Justice (below) who are on their way back from treatment, it can be a pure delight!  There can be genuine excitement and happiness involved in a private flight to and from treatment - so much so it sometimes makes our children forget their ailments! Solomon and Justice are listening in to on their pilot's conversation in this shot!  It's your donations and generosity that keep all this possible, and we thank you.


While Angel Flight West has been helping all manner of people in need since 1983, our current campaign is focused on some of our strongest patients- children battling severe medical conditions.  These are our littlest warriors, whose families would otherwise be unable to get their children the care they need. 

Angel Flight West is a grassroots, volunteer driven, non-profit.  We are based at the Santa Monica Airport, and since 1983 we've worked with a growing list of awesome pilots (currently 1600+) and dedicated ground staff (we call them earth angels!) who volunteer their time and airplanes to fly sick patients to treatment.  Currently a third of our patients are children, and in 2016 we want to help more.....       

Passengers, Deeb and Zaid H., below, need to fly to treatment frequently (their story is below).   With your support, either by donating or equally as important, by sharing our campaign with your friends, we can add 250 flights next year for families like Deeb and Zaid's and with this campaign, we can already say that for sure we've added 118 ... and counting! 

To share our campaign with your friends, just cut and paste this link into your email correspondence with a small note of encouragement: http://igg.me/at/AFW2015 

                    Not your average passenger, not your average pilots! 


AFW Pilot Michael McDonald with Deeb and Zaid before leaving for treatment.

Brothers Deeb H., 16, and Zaid, H., 12, were diagnosed at birth with epidermolysis bullosa. Known as EB, this rare disease causes the skin to blister in response to almost any contact, such as friction and heat. Severe cases mean the blisters also form and grow inside the body. Currently, there is no cure. Treatment aims to offer some measure of relief from symptoms by combatting infection and itching, but EB cannot be reversed and is fatal when severe. 

May, the mother of Deeb and Zaid, was commuting from Visalia to Stanford 3 days in a row each week for medical relief for her sons. Long arduous car rides meant hours of pain from seatbelts and taxing exhaustion from travelling. 

While there is no way to halt the suffering inflicted on these young boys, Angel Flight West stepped in to provide relief and hope for a more painless route to treatment.


Taking care of her boys is a full-time job for May, and we feel as grateful as her for the honor of stepping in to improve the lives of these children:

“You have changed our lives….. no, you have saved our lives.”

You can see how quickly our flights are used up with even one or two children in need.  Please give generously this Thanksgiving Holiday and help us, help families struggling with children in need.

A message from Olivia and Isabel, Angel Flight West's newest additions!


Remember Mason from last year?   He was in a very painful place when we first met him to fly him to his Kidney dialysis treatment three times a week - and now that he has found a kidney replacement, look at how well he's doing.  He made this Thank You video specially for our Indiegogo campaign to show how your generous donations make a lifelong impact to our children:

   

It's patients like Mason that make our work so meaningful to us, and we are making it our mission to increase the number of success stories we get to share with you!
Angel Flight West pilot, Tim Braly, flying back from treatment with 2 of our AFW patients and mom in the front seat. 

Our Executive Director, Josh Olson, Introduces our 2nd Annual Indiegogo launch video - and offers up a very UNIQUE perk - to embarrass him!  Check it out and whatever you can come up with, if he accepts it - we'll film it, and post it here! Talk about a dedicated Executive Director!

This year, we were given $10,000 of matching funds by our Board Chair, Steve Danz.  So for every $1 you donated, Steve donated $1 - up to $10,000! AND WE MANAGED TO SPEND IT ALL!  But we still need the donations to keep coming in.

Did you know that not all of our flights are serious medical emergencies, sometimes they are morale boosters.  Pictured below with Trevin A. and Ariella, Elian, & Alona Z. is Angel Flight West's Board Chair and Command Pilot, Steve Danz who flew them to and from a special camp for deaf and hearing impaired children in Mariposa, CA where they could play with other deaf and hearing impaired kids just like them creating memories to last a lifetime!   

 

Remember Mason? 

If you were one of our donors last year, you'll remember our young passenger, Mason, who was suffering with a debilitating kidney disease.  Mason was having to be shuttled back and forth to kidney dialysis, two hours away, three times a week. With the money we raised in our Indiegogo last year, we were able to help Mason fly to complete all his treatments until a kidney donor was found for his transplant.  

             

Update Since Our 2014 Indiegogo Campaign: We are thrilled that Mason has had a successful kidney transplant and is now in excellent health and back at school! Check out Mason in the hospital before his transplant above left, and on the right, back to doing all the things a child should be able to do-like go to school!

This is Catherine B.  You can't tell from her irresistible smile, but four-year-old Catherine was born with severely underdeveloped kidneys. It's a disorder that requires constant treatment - treatment that's not available in Redding, California, where Catherine lives.  So with AFW as their airline, she and her mother travel to and from Lucile Packard Children’s Hospital in Palo Alto.  Since 2013, Catherine has flown over 15 round-trip flights with AFW - all due to your generous support of our efforts to help as many passengers like Catherine as we possibly can.


What We Need & What You Get

Every flight arranged for a child by AFW costs approximately $250, and there is often more than one leg. We need to raise $50,000 to provide a further 250 flights to help families with sick children fly back to health this year. Then, for every dollar you donate our pilots are donating an additional $4-8 in-kind with donated flight costs. Given the overwhelming support we got last year, we know we can do it again this year if you join us!

Throughout our campaign we'll be looking for the best possible perks to offer you, our trusted donor, so please come back often to check out our new perks! Plus, we'll be posting stories about our brave kids and their families - stories that will inspire you.

Donate an Angel Flight West Aviation Bear to comfort one of our children. Only $50 - or purchase one for the child in your life.

                                          

Private Scenic Flights!

  • Stay in a luxury condo at the 80/50 Private Residences in beautiful Mammoth Lakes  SORRY, SOLD!
  • Stay in a luxury condo on the gorgeous island of Maui, Hawaii. SORRY, SOLD!
  • Take a private flight over Lake Tahoe, the San Juan Islands or Bryce Canyon.
  • Take a private flight over gorgeous San Francisco, with 2 friends - departing from (Hayward, San Carlos, Palo Alto, Reed Hillview, Oakland, Santa Rosa or San Jose) 
  • Private flight over gorgeous Bryce Canyon:
  • Over and above the gorgeous Santa Monica mountains or coastline. 

  Take-off in Hollywood!

  • The President of Disney's Hollywood Records, Ken Bunt, has given us a box set of all of Disney's greatest soundtracks and some beautiful lithographs to offer!  
  •                  
  • Legendary producer, Mark Wolper, is offering to listen to your pitches from his Warner Bros. office in Hollywood - who doesn't have a story in them?    
  •                                                          
  • Oscar nominated screenwriter, Christopher Wilkinson is offering to critique and work with you on your pitch - maybe a 1,2 perk purchase with Mark's above!
  • Disney has donated 4 gorgeous lithograph prints of Pinocchio, Pocahontas, The Lion King and Mary Poppins.  Great Holiday gifts!

  •  

  • Director, Brian Herzlinger (My Date with Drew, Finding Normal, Christmas Angel etc) is offering for you to shadow him for a day of directing - this would make a great gift for any filmmaker to be!  Meet the cast, view from the top!
  • VIP Tickets to a taping of "Wheel of Fortune" in Los Angeles. We'll fly you down, pick you up, and drive you to the show and fly you back (within an hour of LA)
  • Gorgeous Scheyden True Aviator Watch - in three color choices, kindly donated by Jeff Herold  SORRY, SOLD!

  •                           

  • Gorgeous getaways!

  • We have a beautiful condo in Mauii offered as a perk for 5 days and 5 nights with 1st class, roundtrip tickets from anywhere Alaska Airlines flies!
  • 2 tickets to the splendid Endeavor Awards in Denver in 2016.
  • Below are some of the hard costs for Angel Flight West to help fly children back to health - if you'd like to make a donation other than the perk levels we've posted, you can easily donate your own amount, let us know what it's for - and we'll apply it to the campaign and send out a thank you in our social media!

$20 recruits a pilot

$50 flies a patient 50 miles towards treatment

$100 recruits 5 pilots

$250 sponsors one child to fly one leg of a trip to treatment

$500 purchases an emergency r/t flight through our partner airline (if an AFW flight can't be arranged)

$1000 reaches 250 more social workers who alert us to new patients

$5,000 supports one child with chronic illness to a series of AFW flights

$10,000 allows us to arrange for, and coordinate "Earth Angels" our on the ground teams who ferry patients to appointments, hospitals & doctors

$50,000 finances an AFW coordinator to arrange 1,500 flights per year for our patients - and extends our reach to help even more people in need.

If we don't reach our goal, we will still apply all funds raised to help as many children as possible, so please donate, however small.

Please click on the link below to learn more about who we are: http://www.angelflightwest.org/about-us/

                                 

A short (ish!) video on Angel Flight West as a company....


Another Way You Can Help

Even if you are unable contribute, that doesn't mean you can't make a big difference!

  • Please help us get the word out about our campaign raise!
  • Share this page with your friends and family members who might want to help!  It's so easy to do, just use the icons on the left of our launch video to share this page.
  • Email this link to your friends and colleagues, families and co-workers.

We and all our littlest patients and their families thank you!

The Angel Flight West team

Trivia Answer: C) Supersonic means faster than the speed of sound!! (Hopefully we'll hit our goal with the same pace!)

story:
What is Psykhe? 

Psykhe is a social enterprise that strives to increase access to mental health treatment by ending the time-consuming burden on college students of seeking long-term therapy. Through data driven matching, the intuitive online platform equips students with therapists who fit their needs, giving them the resources to begin mental health therapy, and paving a healthier and happier college lifestyle for themselves.

Our Founding Story

Dealing with a mental illness while performing the full-time responsibilities of a college student can be extremely difficult. Mental illness affects one's ability to function on a daily basis and many students don't seek any help. Founder, Mansi Parikh, noticed how mental illness affected those close to her. Her own experiences with finding a therapist and the stories of many peers inspired her to found a venture that works to make mental health treatment more accessible amongst students.

The Impact

Psykhe strives to increase access to mental health care for college students, specifically those seeking long-term therapy, by tackling the root problems for lack of access to mental health care. Psykhe reduces the time-consuming, burdensome nature of finding a good therapist, allowing students to take the first step to seeking help and bringing stability and happiness into the lives of college students. 

Ways You Can Help

If you resonate with our mission, please consider donating to our page in order to help us equip more students with mental health treatment. With funding, we can improve our matching process, which will allow us to reach and match many more college students. 

Contact Us:

Website: https://psykheweb.wixsite.com/website

Email: psykheaustin@gmail.com

Instagram: @psykhehealth

story:
Summary

Stop spending HUNDREDS on expensive DUMBBELLS and HIGH shipping fees! Rock Weights is here to help you finish your weight room on a budget!  (Save over 70% compared to industry standards!)

So how does it work?  

We ship you an empty, crack resistant container perfectly sized to weigh an exact amount once filled with concrete! (Examples: 30, 40, 50, and 60 lbs.)  You can purchase 80 lbs of concrete from your local hardware store for as low as $4!  All you have to do is pour the concrete mix in a bucket, add water, and mix!  After transferring the concrete to the Rock Weights mold, you will have a fully functional dumbbell within 24 hours!  It's that simple!  

Rock Weights is not a short term solution.  The thick, durable plastic material is there to protect YOU and the CONCRETE.  We have no doubt it will endure any work out you throw at it!

Join us on this journey as we pursue "SELF-MADE GAINS"!

*PATENT PENDING

 

Prototype Gallery and Design Details

 

  • Pour hole on the top- The image above shows you the pour hole on the top of the dumbbell. This hole is sized large enough for you to easily pour or scoop concrete directly into it. 
  • Handle Strength- Each end of the handle is angled to allow the concrete to freely flow down the handle similar to what happens when using a funnel.  This angle also helps take pressure off the sides of the handle once the container is filled with concrete.
  • Plastic Details- Once filled with concrete, the stiff crack resistant plastic will minimize cracks in the concrete.  Even if the concrete cracks, the container will keep it securely in place.

 

 

  • Kettlebells COMING SOON-  Rock Weights will be more than just Dumbbell molds!  Kettlebells are already being designed!  Supporting us now with our Dumbbell design will help make these a reality!

Rock Weight Founders

David Glover (Corporate Product Manager) and Jordan Flom (Fitness Entrepreneur) grew up going to school together. They know each other's strengths, and they are excited to use this business to change lives!  This is more than just a "product business" to them; this is an opportunity to help make health and fitness more accessible to EVERYONE.

Our Promise to You:

"We started this business because we saw a huge desire in our nation to be HEALTHY and FIT.  This is a desire felt by everyone... not just the AFFLUENT.  Add this to the current "sold out frustration" due to the recent pandemic, the world is in need of an at home fitness solution that is both affordable and effective.  If you support us now, we promise we will continue making products that benefit YOU and your health... at a price you can be excited about!  Thank you for learning about Rock Weights!"

Sincerely from the Founders,

David Glover and Jordan Flom

Manufacturing Process

    Rock Weights are manufactured through a process called Blow Molding, similar to how large water bottles and containers are made.  This process is time consuming and expensive.  Creating a single mold can take 12 weeks and costs upwards of $30,000.  The good news is we have already begun this process so we should be able to obtain products much sooner than that!  Currently, we are projecting end products early 2021 (January or February).  

    The more support each of you show, the quicker we can get Rock Weights in your hands!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    For those of you who believe in what we are doing, but don't have a need for Rock Weights, below you will see some other options to support us! 

    • Donate as little as $5 using the "Back It" or "Contribute" button on the top of the page.  ANYTHING is appreciated!  
    • Send this webpage to friends and family who enjoy exercising, 
    • Share this campaign on ANY social media platform. Be sure to TAG us so we can thank you! @RockWeights

    Environmental Priorities

    We will reduce shipping costs of dumbbells and kettlebells by over 90%.  We pass this savings on to the consumer while also reducing gas used by the delivery trucks.  In addition to this, all excess plastic during the blow molding manufacturing process will be recycled back into the assembly line for future use. 

    Contact Information

    Interested in getting in contact with Rock Weights, email us at RockWeights@gmail.com.

      *To learn more about Rock Weights, visit the Rock Weights Website: http://rockweights.com

      *PATENT PENDING

SummaryStop spending HUNDREDS on expensive DUMBBELLS and HIGH shipping fees! Rock Weights is here to help you finish your weight room on a budget!  (Save over 70% compared to industry standards!)
So how does it work?  We ship you an empty, crack resistant container perfectly sized to weigh an exact amount once filled with concrete! (Examples: 30, 40, 50, and 60 lbs.)  You can purchase 80 lbs of concrete from your local hardware store for as low as $4!  All you have to do is pour the concrete mix in a bucket, add water, and mix!  After transferring the concrete to the Rock Weights mold, you will have a fully functional dumbbell within 24 hours!  It's that simple!  Rock Weights is not a short term solution.  The thick, durable plastic material is there to protect YOU and the CONCRETE.  We have no doubt it will endure any work out you throw at it!Join us on this journey as we pursue "SELF-MADE GAINS"!*PATENT PENDING Prototype Gallery and Design Details 

Pour hole on the top- The image above shows you the pour hole on the top of the dumbbell. This hole is sized large enough for you to easily pour or scoop concrete directly into it. 

Handle Strength- Each end of the handle is angled to allow the concrete to freely flow down the handle similar to what happens when using a funnel.  This angle also helps take pressure off the sides of the handle once the container is filled with concrete.

Plastic Details- Once filled with concrete, the stiff crack resistant plastic will minimize cracks in the concrete.  Even if the concrete cracks, the container will keep it securely in place.
  
Kettlebells COMING SOON-  Rock Weights will be more than just Dumbbell molds!  Kettlebells are already being designed!  Supporting us now with our Dumbbell design will help make these a reality!Rock Weight FoundersDavid Glover (Corporate Product Manager) and Jordan Flom (Fitness Entrepreneur) grew up going to school together. They know each other's strengths, and they are excited to use this business to change lives!  This is more than just a "product business" to them; this is an opportunity to help make health and fitness more accessible to EVERYONE.Our Promise to You:"We started this business because we saw a huge desire in our nation to be HEALTHY and FIT.  This is a desire felt by everyone... not just the AFFLUENT.  Add this to the current "sold out frustration" due to the recent pandemic, the world is in need of an at home fitness solution that is both affordable and effective.  If you support us now, we promise we will continue making products that benefit YOU and your health... at a price you can be excited about!  Thank you for learning about Rock Weights!"Sincerely from the Founders,David Glover and Jordan FlomManufacturing ProcessRock Weights are manufactured through a process called Blow Molding, similar to how large water bottles and containers are made.  This process is time consuming and expensive.  Creating a single mold can take 12 weeks and costs upwards of $30,000.  The good news is we have already begun this process so we should be able to obtain products much sooner than that!  Currently, we are projecting end products early 2021 (January or February).  The more support each of you show, the quicker we can get Rock Weights in your hands!Other Ways You Can HelpFor those of you who believe in what we are doing, but don't have a need for Rock Weights, below you will see some other options to support us! 
Donate as little as $5 using the "Back It" or "Contribute" button on the top of the page.  ANYTHING is appreciated!  
Send this webpage to friends and family who enjoy exercising, 
Share this campaign on ANY social media platform. Be sure to TAG us so we can thank you! @RockWeights
Environmental PrioritiesWe will reduce shipping costs of dumbbells and kettlebells by over 90%.  We pass this savings on to the consumer while also reducing gas used by the delivery trucks.  In addition to this, all excess plastic during the blow molding manufacturing process will be recycled back into the assembly line for future use. Contact InformationInterested in getting in contact with Rock Weights, email us at RockWeights@gmail.com.*To learn more about Rock Weights, visit the Rock Weights Website: http://rockweights.com*PATENT PENDING

story:
Short Term goals

"In order to achieve his goals and provide you with a work out system, tools and routine that you deserve, he needs help to fund the next stage of his project."

"He's already funded and constructed 3 distinct pieces of work out equipment. "

" He's done this out of his own pocket and it's taken years to get the right folks together to get the job done.

That time is over"

 

"Mr. Cassie has been involved in kickboxing for over 30 years and has been coaching for 20. "

"He's been involved in outreach and fellowship programs."

"He want's to help others develop and succeed at their fitness goals."

"He believes that he has a routine and the equipment to help you do just that. "

"That's why he created 'Lions Den Equipment or LDE for short. "

" With this in mind, in order to proceed with the next stage of his plan, he needs to patent and protect the equipment that he has designed. "

"Once this has been accomplished, he will be able to craft market and distribute his revolutionary new fitness system to people everywhere. "

"He cant wait to bring this amazing system to you -  so wont you please help him reach his goals?"

___________________________________________________________________________

Middle term Goals

"Once these incredible pieces of equipment are securely patented, Lions Den Equipment will be free to market and distribute them to gyms, organizations and individuals everywhere."

"LDE (Lions Den Equipment) intends to use the profit from such sales in order to fund the next stage of Mr. Cassies' plan."

"Those profits will enable LDE (Lions Den Equipment) to get into the real business."

"The business of bringing you a facility that will offer both the product, the experience and the system to help you reach your maximum fitness goals."

"Imagine a place where people of all ages can meet and immerse themselves in a positive environment."

"Imagine that this place has outreach programs for disadvantaged youth and brings them a routine and a sense of discipline that they may not be finding somewhere else."

"Imagine a facility that provides expert physical training, matched equipment and a plan that keeps you at the top of your form?"

"LDE (Lions Den Equipment) intends to do just that. "

"Won't you please lend your support?"

___________________________________________________________________________

Long Term Goals

"Over the long term, LDE (Lions Den Equipment) plans to expand and extent the reach of their patented fitness system into as many locations and communities as possible."

"It is the belief of those committed to the work of LDE (Lions Den Equipment) that everyone, everywhere benefits from a more active and healthy lifestyle."

"LDE wants have a part to play in providing that opportunity for you, for your family and for your community."

story:
We're committed to better health care. 

CaRessa Hutchinson, a registered nurse, is a founder and serves as CEO of ModRN Health. Scott Roethle, a physician, is co-founder and President of ModRN Health.

ModRN Health's founders share a deep personal commitment to helping people navigate the healthcare system. "Every patient counts," CaRessa frequently says. "No one should fall through the cracks."

Your support of ModRN Health's Launch Campaign will help CaRessa and Scott reach more people, faster, by scaling the platform's technology and hiring more nurses. 

"I saw families making major, life-altering decisions without the proper education and support to understand the weight of their decisions," said CaRessa. "Overworked nurses could no longer focus on patient advocacy, and over-loaded physicians were being forced to make decisions based on assumptions, inaccurate information, insurance, and bureaucracy; not based on people, as they had once dreamed of doing when they committed their lives to becoming healers. It started to feel like I was watching one very large and very dangerous game of telephone, but with real lives depending on the results."

Scott had observed very similar trends and shares CaRessa's concern. "I see the perils of our industry's sick-care model on a daily basis," Scott said. "And I know there is a better way to care for people and optimize their health by focusing on the right things, not just prescribing more medications or performing procedures. We engage patients along their healthcare journey so they live a healthy life, preventing diseases and improving underlying chronic conditions." 

Through the ModRN Health solution, Scott says, "we take better care of people."

Here's what we need.

Through this campaign, ModRN Health is seeking at least $50,000. We need the funds to add new features to our technology, including enhancements to a personal health record and more messaging capabilities for members on the platform to contact their nurse coordinator. We also are developing tools that help the employers--our customers--demonstrate that ModRN Health is a valuable employee benefit. Every dollar counts as we scale our company. Your support will be put to good use, even if we don't hit our goal.

And here's what you get.

This campaign lets you take advantage of early bird pricing discounts for individual, family, and employer memberships to the ModRN Health solution.

The perks you get when you fund our campaign are as good for you as they are for us! We want as many people as possible to experience the power of ModRN Health, in the palm of their hands.

  • Unsure whether you need to contact your primary care physician with a follow-up question?
  • Wondering where's the best pharmacy to fill a new prescription?
  • Need a few pointers about how to get a better night's sleep?

These are all questions that can be answered by the care coordination team and patient advocates available to you through the ModRN Health app. Through our technology, you'll be paired with a member of ModRN Health's nurse coordination team who stays with you for the long term. By getting to know you and your personal health journey, ModRN Health's dedicated resources offer even better care coordination as time goes by. 

For employers, the ModRN Health solution is exciting because it works alongside existing health plans and programs by combining technology with personalized, nurse-led healthcare management, This lowers costs and makes it easier for people to get healthy. It's a great perk for employees. 

We're up to the challenge! 

We founded ModRN Health in 2015 and bootstrapped it until now. This campaign coincides with the launch of our first beta customers. The campaign is our first outside fundraising effort. We've designed the campaign to both raise funds and get users on our platform at the same time. That's the best way for us to grow and learn.  

We know it's hard to build a successful SaaS company. For the past three years, we’ve used our personal funds to develop our technology platform and our implementation systems. We’ve also built a loyal following of people who are excited about our progress. We're thrilled to invite our friends to support us as we scale.

We welcome your enthusiasm.

If financial support isn't right for you, there are still plenty of ways you can help ModRN Health grow. 

  • Follow us on social media and share our posts. Find us on Twitter @ModRNHealth, on LinkedIn, and Facebook. 
  • Tell your friends about ModRN Health and encourage them to check out our campaign perks.
  • Tell your employer that ModRN Health is a solution that works alongside existing health plans and wellness programs to ensure that the company and its employees are getting the most out of healthcare investments. In other words, ModRN Health helps lower costs and makes it easier for people to meet their health goals.

story:
The perfect, hygienic solution to clean between your 'cheeks' - Wash cloth & pouf bacteria be gone! 

Have you ever cringed at the thought of using the same wash cloth or pouf to clean both your body and your butt? Your answer is probably yes, because using them for dual purposes is just, well...gross. We've been working on a clever solution for quite some time, and we couldn't be prouder to present CHEEKY.

Exclusive to your derrière, CHEEKY changes the way you wash your butt for a more hygienic and pleasant bath or shower experience. Sleek, classy and totally convenient, CHEEKY's disposable sponge can be replaced as often as you wish giving you a more safe and sanitary clean "in between." We've taken a new, innovative and practical approach to an everyday problem and created a very simple & easy solution that can be effortlessly incorporated into your bath/shower routine. Spreading booty bacteria (from a wash cloth or pouf) all over your body is a thing of the past, CHEEKY puts it all behind you where it belongs. 

I'm sure some of you reading this keep those pouf things around forever, and the stale wash cloths for more than a day--you know who you are. No worries, we've got your back--literally. Maybe you've never even given that much thought to it and that's OK too. There's no time like now to enhance your hygiene routine. When we know better, we do better. Making this small tweak to the way you shower and bathe can positively impact your health. With CHEEKY, you have that extra comfort knowing that the fecal matter and e. coli remnants hanging out between your cheeks have less of a chance to make it's way to your urinary tract and other areas of your body. 

There's a lot going on in our nether region that we should take more seriously. Bacteria lives there in the folds, creases and crevices until we scrub it clean. When we do wash it, that fecal matter remains on our wash cloth or pouf which can be spread to other parts of our body. It's not rocket science--just pure, raw facts. That's why we need CHEEKY, our butt's very own designated scrubber, to ensure we wash up clean and sanitary and to avoid spreading bacteria all over our body. (By the way, you probably don't even remember when you bought that pouf or how long it's been hanging in your shower...right?)

OUR STORY

So there I was, all bubbled up and soaking in my luxurious bath...lavishing in my in favorite sugar scrub and body wash...basking in my calgon, take me away-like moment. Then it happened--time to start washing my intimate parts. I looked up at the pink pouf thing dangling by its string, then I froze, giving it a blank stare....thinking to myself OMG I just washed my butt with that yesterday! After going back/forth in my head about the gross thought of THAT, and contemplating whether or not I should use it on my body, I hesitantly proceeded to do the "wash of shame." With each and every wipe, I grew more and more disgusted. And there went my blissful bath time experience...right down the drain.

The first day with a fresh cloth or brand new pouf is no problem--just simply wash my front first and my bottom last. Possibly even a second day (with the pouf)--but not without fully dissecting it like a science project and wrecking my brain trying to decipher which side of it I used to wash my butt with last. Gotta make sure I don't use the wrong side on my vajayjay. But when that 3rd day rolls around, I get really uncomfortable--and no way I'm using the same wash cloth, period! The thought of all that bacteria lingering around makes me VERY uncomfortable. Surely you can relate...

Thinking that I might be a bit anal about this situation, I asked my hubby what he thought about my little "problem." He did agree that he gets a bit uncomfortable using the same wash cloth/sponge for his body and backside. If he felt uncomfortable (being the manly man that he is), I thought about all the other men (and women of course) that probably felt the same way.

Fed up with going through my bath time crisis every day, and more importantly tired of worrying about the effect it could potentially have on my health and hygiene, I had to find a practical solution. Because who wants to bring two and three wash cloths to the bath or shower, right? And who has time for all that extra laundry anyway? Even worse, who wants all those butt rags piling up in their hamper until wash day...whenever that is? I began to think of ideas, visualizing what I could (conveniently) do to clean between my cheeks and my body separately. Aha! A disposable sponge used exclusively for my butt...that can be discarded and replaced as often as I wish--perfect! And that's how CHEEKY was born. We've vetted and solidified a top notch manufacturer who shares the same high standards that we do, to ensure CHEEKY is made with the utmost quality so we can jump start production for you.

 

AVOID THIS.....

 

BY USING THIS....

  

 

Beyond the bath and shower, this magical little wand can conveniently serve as your handy dandy portable bidet. You know, for those moments when you need a nice little rinse down there. Like no other, CHEEKY's 360 degrees rinsing capability doesn't miss a spot, leaving you feeling nice and fresh...just like you like it. A calming relief aid, CHEEKY when used as a bidet can be VERY soothing to postpartum ladies and others who suffer from hemorrhoids, buttocks chaffing and other soreness that might be going on back there. We thought about every little detail when creating CHEEKY because we want nothing butt the best for you. 

 

  

*Most common cause of UTI is your own E.coli bacteria*
"E. Coli refers to a wide range of bacteria that can cause various diseases, including pneumonia, urinary tract infections, diarrhea, respiratory illness and meningitis."
Suzanne Falck, MD
University Hospital - Illinois
 
"About 80 to 90 percent of UTIs are caused by bacteria from the rectum making its way to the urinary tract. Over 80% of UTIs are recurrent."

National Kidney Foundation

 
"Urinary-tract infections are the most common of all bacterial infections in the United States, accounting for more than 8 million health-care visits a year."

Centers for Disease Control and Prevention


"The most common bacteria found to cause UTIs is E. coli. Other bacteria can cause UTI, but    E. coli is the culprit about 90% of the time."

UCSF Women's Health Clinical Research Center

 

 

If you had the opportunity to view our entire campaign, you can see we've put a lot of time, effort and devotion into developing CHEEKY; and with your help and support, we'll be able to get CHEEKY into your hands and others around the world, so everyone can benefit from a more healthier way of living. 

 

  

 

 
 
 

FAQ'S

Q. Can CHEEKY be used on other areas of the body?

A. Yes, however it's design and recommended usage is for your butt, to prevent the spread of bacteria from your backside to other parts of your body.

Q. Does CHEEKY need batteries?

A. No, it's not electric.

Q. Is CHEEKY heavy or really big?

A. CHEEKY is lightweight, super sleek, and designed to fit very comfortably in your hand.

Q. How often should I change the sponge?

A. Since CHEEKY's intended use is for your backside only, we recommend replacing the sponge at least every 3-4 weeks, butt...you can replace it as often as you wish.

Q. Does CHEEKY fit between your cheeks?

A. Absolutely, CHEEKY is very slim. But just like washing your butt with a wash cloth or pouf thing, you still may need to spread your cheeks a bit for a thorough and detailed cleanse.

Q. How do I pick my color?

A. We will send you an email after the campaign, and at that time, you'll be asked to choose your favorite color(s).

Q. How does CHEEKY work?

A. Simple. Insert running water into CHEEKY, pour your favorite bath/shower gel onto the sponge, clean between your cheeks, then press the button to rinse off the soap & impurities from between your cheeks. Repeat as necessary.

Q. Do I have to put water into CHEEKY?

A. Not at all. Only if you want to use the super cool & convenient rinse feature. If you prefer, you can use CHEEKY just to scrub and clean between your cheeks, and if you already have one of those handheld shower heads, you can use that to rinse your butt (if it's long enough to reach back there)...or you can take up yoga and have the water pour straight from the tub faucet into your behind (just kidding). OR, you can simply use CHEEKY for all your cleansing and rinsing needs.

Q. Can I use CHEEKY just as a bidet?

A. Of course! CHEEKY works awesome as a portable bidet if you just want a good rinsing back there, or if you want to soothe the area for whatever reason.

Q. I want to order a large quantity of CHEEKY's. Can you provide us with any discounts?

A. We sure can! Just send us a message with the color(s) and the quantity and we will get back to you with our discounted pricing and details on how to pledge.

Suzanne Falck, MD

University Hospital - Illinois
 

"About 80 to 90 percent of UTIs are caused by bacteria from the rectum making its way to the urinary tract. Over 80% of UTIs are recurrent."
National Kidney Foundation

 
"Urinary-tract infections are the most common of all bacterial infections in the United States, accounting for more than 8 million health-care visits a year."
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention


"The most common bacteria found to cause UTIs is E. coli. Other bacteria can cause UTI, but    E. coli is the culprit about 90% of the time."

UCSF Women's Health Clinical Research Center





 

 


If you had the opportunity to view our entire campaign, you can see we've put a lot of time, effort and devotion into developing CHEEKY; and with your help and support, we'll be able to get CHEEKY into your hands and others around the world, so everyone can benefit from a more healthier way of living. 
 

  
 

   FAQ'SQ. Can CHEEKY be used on other areas of the body?A. Yes, however it's design and recommended usage is for your butt, to prevent the spread of bacteria from your backside to other parts of your body.Q. Does CHEEKY need batteries?A. No, it's not electric.Q. Is CHEEKY heavy or really big?A. CHEEKY is lightweight, super sleek, and designed to fit very comfortably in your hand.Q. How often should I change the sponge?A. Since CHEEKY's intended use is for your backside only, we recommend replacing the sponge at least every 3-4 weeks, butt...you can replace it as often as you wish.Q. Does CHEEKY fit between your cheeks?A. Absolutely, CHEEKY is very slim. But just like washing your butt with a wash cloth or pouf thing, you still may need to spread your cheeks a bit for a thorough and detailed cleanse.Q. How do I pick my color?A. We will send you an email after the campaign, and at that time, you'll be asked to choose your favorite color(s).Q. How does CHEEKY work?A. Simple. Insert running water into CHEEKY, pour your favorite bath/shower gel onto the sponge, clean between your cheeks, then press the button to rinse off the soap & impurities from between your cheeks. Repeat as necessary.Q. Do I have to put water into CHEEKY?A. Not at all. Only if you want to use the super cool & convenient rinse feature. If you prefer, you can use CHEEKY just to scrub and clean between your cheeks, and if you already have one of those handheld shower heads, you can use that to rinse your butt (if it's long enough to reach back there)...or you can take up yoga and have the water pour straight from the tub faucet into your behind (just kidding). OR, you can simply use CHEEKY for all your cleansing and rinsing needs.Q. Can I use CHEEKY just as a bidet?A. Of course! CHEEKY works awesome as a portable bidet if you just want a good rinsing back there, or if you want to soothe the area for whatever reason.Q. I want to order a large quantity of CHEEKY's. Can you provide us with any discounts?A. We sure can! Just send us a message with the color(s) and the quantity and we will get back to you with our discounted pricing and details on how to pledge.

story:
Thank you to everyone who supported our campaign! Visit our website where you can buy our finished product.

www.blacktopplus.com

Kinesiology tape is no longer just for recovering from injury, but can be used to help our overall health and fitness as it can help us warm up, perform and recover better -- it is now to help in your overall health and fitness needs.

The kinesiology tape industry in health and fitness has remained relatively unchanged since its beginnings, in the 1970's. We looked around at different products in the industry and saw there were many improvements that could be made that would further benefit our health and fitness and the way we warm up, perform, and recover.

With our Original tape, changes include increasing the adhesive strength, cloth more similar to workout clothes and jerseys for reduced friction on the tape, and rounding the corners for you, while our Plus tape has all of those as well as all natural ingredients (capsaicin, menthol and ginger) for warming up, decreased muscle fatigue, and increased recovery.

We have created a product that everyone can use, love and "Feel it Work®".

We have created this product to be beneficial for all people of all ages, from top tier athletes to the weekend warriors and is safe for all ages.

By infusing menthol, capsaicin and ginger (all natural ingredients found in various foods and topical creams) into the adhesive, we have created a tape that increases circulation not only through the technology of current kinesiology taping, but also through stimulating the designated area with heating and cooling. The ginger adds a natural anti-inflammatory that aids in recovery throughout the process of your workout, allowing you to have less muscle fatigue.

All of these aspects together help increase your bodies natural recovery process and allow you to "Feel it Work®".

Sports have played such a big part in the lives of so many here at Blacktop Plus® that we knew from the very start we wanted to give back to the sports community. Many of us have been blessed with amazing facilities, great equipment and the opportunities to progress through organized sports. Much of the world, however, does not have those same opportunities.

Continue down to see more about this effort!

What is Kinesiology Tape and What are the Benefits?

Athletes, both professional and recreational, have used many methods to treat sore or injured muscles, from pain pills to acupuncture. As science has improved, so have the ways to treat sore or injured muscles. 

Traditional treatments resorted to restricting the movement to injured muscles. Today, studies have shown that keeping muscles moving and improving circulation will reduce the pain and speed healing. 

"That's the science that inspired the father of kinesiology taping, Japanese chiropractor Dr. Kenzo Kase, to develop a muscle treatment in 1979 that he named the Kinesio Taping Method. This taping method gently lifts the layer of skin and attached tissue covering a muscle so that blood and other body fluids can move more freely in and around that muscle." - Stephanie Crawford

We are using this technology and improving it with added ingredients to help you perform better, recover better and Feel it Work ®.

Uses For Blacktop Plus® Tape:

Pitfalls of Products on the Market Today

We researched and found that there were several pitfalls with the kinesiology taping industry. We wanted to focus our efforts on solving some of the big issues we noticed.

Product Features

Every athlete is looking for "the edge" ... Blacktop Plus®  technology works fast on your skin while you workout to help you perform better with unique benefits including:

*While we have created simple designs for you to be able to apply to yourself or have a friend apply for you, there are times where the injury is more serious and might require a more complex taping. This is why we have included rolls of our tape. You can take our rolls to a professional or go to a professional who uses kinesiology tape and have them help apply the kinesiology tape for your injury if needed.*

Aaron is training for a big race in a couple of months. He has strapped on some Blacktop Plus ® tape on areas where he has felt aggravation throughout his training runs.

Blacktop Plus ® uses heat/cool technology to warm up Aaron's muscles faster so he can get a jump start to his warmup routine. Within minutes he will feel the tingling sensation of the heat working on his legs.

The shapes allow for increased blood flow while he is performing to help his muscles perform longer with less fatigue.

The ginger allows for a natural anti-inflammatory ingredient to help fight inflammation while he is performing, so he can recover quickly for his next run.

Whether you're training for a marathon or your first 5k, Blacktop Plus ® tape will help you all the same with increased lymphatic circulation, ligaments/tendons/muscles warming up quicker, less muscle fatigue and increased recovery speed.

How to Apply Blacktop Plus®

Scott works 9-5 everyday, but enjoys hitting the gym on his way home from work. He has been tending to a discomfort in his shoulder that he started feeling during a pickup basketball game with his buddies.

Scott strapped on some Blacktop Plus ® tape to his shoulder just before leaving work. On his drive, Scott will begin to feel the tingling sensation of the capsaicin and menthol in the tape starting to warm up his ligaments and muscles in his shoulder.

While the simple design of the tape is doing its job to improve the lymphatic circulation, the ingredients in the tape are helping him get ready to train hard and fight the inflammation in his shoulder with the ginger, as well as fight inflammation as it is building up through his workout.

Due to the increased stickiness and improved cloth material of the tape, Scott will be able to have the tape help his shoulder for multiple days before needing to reapply new tape.

Giving Back

We have worked to design a product that not only revolutionizes the industry, but one that allows for change throughout the world.

One of the biggest flaws in the kinesio tape industry is the lack of knowledge behind what is happening because you can't feel anything happening. We set out to change that.

We love sports and want everyone to have the opportunities we had. 10% of all profit will go to funding the renovation and building of fields and athletic facilities around the world.

10% of Profit Will be Donated to Youth Sports Around the World

We want our philanthropic adventures to involve YOU.

As the consumer, you will be the one who decides what location and which sport will receive the 10% of profit from your purchase.We will have a variety of options available at any given time. 

Upon checkout, you will be shown a list of locations matched with a sport.

After a pre-determined period of time, or when we reach the goal amount for one of the options, we will prepare our adventure to the destination and help better a field or facility by renovating or building what is needed as well as providing the necessary equipment.

Follow Along on Our Adventures to Give Back.

Each time we travel to a new place we will be documenting our adventure and the work that is done to help some area have a better opportunity for safe play. We will have pictures with the locals and videos of the work being done. We may even have some surprise local guests show up to hang out with everyone involved in the efforts.

Follow along on social media in order to stay up-to-date on each new adventure. See how the 10% profit of your purchase is being used and how YOU helped the global sports community.

story:
Dr. Elizabeth  Lee is a US-licensed pharmacist with over 30 years’ experience in leading research, developing new therapies and educating people about the benefits of natural vitamins, herbs and minerals. Early in her career she tested new drugs in preparation for FDA registration. She spent most of her time researching, and developing new therapies in drug development for HIV infection, epilepsy, and diabetes. In addition, she began educating people about the benefits of natural vitamins, herbs, and minerals. Through her research of drugs and new therapies in the pharmaceutical industry, she was able to discover new natural remedies to relieve symptoms, without the harmful side effects.  

In a fast-paced world, men feel stressed and under immense pressure from work and life commitments.  Men tend to feel that conditions which are not life threatening do not need medical attention, not understanding that these conditions, if ignored, may actually worsen over a period of time.  Some common conditions are weak sex drive, decrease libido, muscle cramps especially in the lower back and kidney areas, night urinations and insomnia.

M100 is a male enhancement drug for those seeking to reach the peak of their energy. While many products claim similar benefits, M100 is produced with a proprietary formula using 100% organic herbal ingredients. It is a supplement in the market with male enhancing properties, and also helps with frequent nighttime urination problem. Men have reported feeling energetic after trying M 100, feeling minimal, to no side-effects. 

 

Why we need your support?

By being an early supporter of M100 you’re helping us to raise funds to cover manufacturing costs to create the first commercial quantity of a natural, healthier alternative to men supplement. You’re also helping us reduce our production costs, less expensive and affordable for more men! Help us spread this knowledge and provide a better, healthier life.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

1. What is M100?

M100 is an all-herbal daily supplement for enhancement of male energy.  This formula is used by the royal families from the Qing Dynasty to enhances the ‘Yang’(male energy). 

2. What are the ingredients in M100?

Using modern day fermentation and cool extraction technologies, 1 kilogram of the essence are extracted from 1000 kg of raw ingredients, thus giving it 5 times the efficacy of normal traditional method.

3. What if M100 doesn’t work?

We believe in the quality and effectiveness of this product.This is why there is aa 30- day no question asked guarantee.Just mail the box and the pouches back to the address and we will send you the full refund no question asked.

4. What are the side effects?

There are minimal side effects to taking M100.Less than 1% experienced visual changes, dizziness, nausea and nasal congestion.These symptoms usually disappear 30 minutes after taking a dose.If these symptoms last a long time or other severe reaction occurs, contact your physician or healthcare profession.

5. How often can I take M100?

For first time users, take 1 capsule daily for 3 days consecutively to rejuvenate your body organs.Afterward, you may take 1 capsule at a time, maximum 3 capsules per day.

6. How does M100 work?

M100 formula contains powerful enzymes that can effectively stimulate the kidney healing process.The end result is to restore the well-being of the body and promote vigor in performance at work or at play.

7. Can I take M100 after drinking alcohol? 

Drinking alcohol in moderation seems to be safe when you take M100. There seems to be no clear sign that the risks of alcohol use are made worse by M100. A study published in Clinical Pharmacology and Therapeutics found no adverse reactions between ED medication and red wine.  According to the American Heart Association, most people with heart trouble can enjoy sex safely -- and that includes those with high blood pressure.  Consult your doctor or health profession if you have any question about these medications.

8. Can I take M100 with prescription medication?

Firstly, let me point out that most drugs for high blood pressure can sometimes cause erectile dysfunction (ED). The problem with ED and blood pressure medication is that both can reduce your blood pressure a bit too much and make you feel faint. Consult your doctor or health profession if you have any question about these medications.

Consult your doctor or health profession if you have any question about these medications.

story:
The Earth’s Kitchen 
alternative to harsh chemical sunscreens

Formulated by medical herbalist, registered nurse and naturopath, Jules Bright.

A sunscreen, certified to global standards, that is both a powerful and nourishing way to protect your body. Our sunscreen also applies easily and invisibly, is all natural and 100% free of toxic chemicals.

 

 

Did you know?

The toxic ingredients in everyday sunscreens:

Oxybenzone - found in most sunscreens. It can cause hormone disruptions and cell damage that may trigger serious skin growths.

Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A palmitate) - may actually increase the speed at which malignant cells develop, as they contain vitamin A and its derivatives, retinol, and retinyl palmitate.

Parabens - a synthetic preservative known to interfere with hormone production and release and has been found accumulated inside the body in tumours under scientific studies.

Phthalates -  another synthetic preservative that is carcinogenic and linked to reproductive effects (decreased sperm count, early breast development, and birth defects) as well as liver and kidney damage.

Synthetic musks -  linked to hormone disruption and are thought to persist and accumulate in breast milk, body fat, umbilical cord blood, and the environment.

 

 

Why we need your support

We believe it’s wrong to dump chemicals on our planet or on our skin. We want to bring our pure, natural, free-from-harsh-chemicals sunscreens to the world. But first we need your help.

By being an early supporter of Earth’s Kitchen you’re helping us raise enough funds to cover manufacturing costs to create the first commercial quantity of a natural, healthier alternative to traditional sunscreen. You’re also helping us reduce our production costs, making our sunscreen less expensive and affordable for more people! Not only helping your fellow humans, but also helping the earth.

Help us spread this knowledge and provide a better, healthier sunscreen.

 

 

The Jules Bright and Earth's Kitchen story

Deciding to leave a successful surgical nursing career, that had taken her around the world, was the first step on a long journey for our founder, Jules.  It was a voyage of discovery, as Jules travelled for 10 years rediscovering ancient healing wisdom passed down through centuries. Inevitably, her studies led back to her native New Zealand, a land of rich biodiversity and strong indigenous culture. She instantly reconnected with her spiritual home, and became focused on sharing its centuries-old plant harvesting and healing powers with a world in need. Jules worked closely with a Tohunga of New Zealand, skilled in the medicinal properties of native flora to ensure the ageless wisdom comes of age once again.

Once Jules has developed the formula, we create it from the purest most natural ingredients on the planet. We mix these biodynamic ingredients together to unlock their natural healing power, perfecting the ancient wisdom of indigenous cultures handed down through the centuries. There’s no pseudo-botanical potency here. Just natural whole-plant extracts, wild crafted and distilled into, what we like to call, pure botanical intelligence.

Update: We are delighted to announce that our sample tubes have arrived and our large tube order is well under production, ready to ship to New Zelaand in January. Our certified sunscreen is all set for manufcturing to fill our tubes at our Auckland based laboratory.
