story:
Since the team's founding in 2013, Valhalla has worked tirelessly to foster the growth of quidditch in Canada. We're proud to have athletes involved in every level of Quidditch Canada: from referees to snitches to volunteers to Executive Board directors, Valhalla is committed to putting in the work necessary to help our sport develop; and we know that work includes travelling to major tournaments. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let's be real: there's not a lot of money in quidditch. As a community team, we don't get any support from schools, and we're a bunch of young professionals who decided to live in a big city, pay big city rent, and fly across a really big country. We need all the help we can get!

Our campaign goal of $3500 will cover all our athletes' non-travel expenses: keeping them fed, housed, and ready to play at nationals. Anything beyond that will go toward subsidizing airfare for athletes who may not otherwise be able to afford the trip. In exchange, you'll get some sweet limited edition Valhalla merch! Also our unending gratitude, but let's be real, the merch is the best part. 

 

The Impact

Some of our players have been around since the dawn of quidditch in Canada. Having played before and through the IQA split, we've seen the remarkable growth that comes to the sport when its top teams come together to compete. We're excited about the opportunity to bring our team out west for the first time, and we can't wait to face some new teams!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate or just don't need ANOTHER quidditch t-shirt, there are still plenty of ways to help us out!

  • Share this campaign with your friends and family
  • Talk to us at quidditchvalhalla[at]gmail.com for more information on team sponsorship, quidditch events in the GTA, or upcoming merchandise sales
  • Shop our FlipGive page
  • Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram
story_txt:
Since the team's founding in 2013, Valhalla has worked tirelessly to foster the growth of quidditch in Canada. We're proud to have athletes involved in every level of Quidditch Canada: from referees to snitches to volunteers to Executive Board directors, Valhalla is committed to putting in the work necessary to help our sport develop; and we know that work includes travelling to major tournaments. 
 

What We Need & What You Get
Let's be real: there's not a lot of money in quidditch. As a community team, we don't get any support from schools, and we're a bunch of young professionals who decided to live in a big city, pay big city rent, and fly across a really big country. We need all the help we can get!
Our campaign goal of $3500 will cover all our athletes' non-travel expenses: keeping them fed, housed, and ready to play at nationals. Anything beyond that will go toward subsidizing airfare for athletes who may not otherwise be able to afford the trip. In exchange, you'll get some sweet limited edition Valhalla merch! Also our unending gratitude, but let's be real, the merch is the best part. 
 

The Impact
Some of our players have been around since the dawn of quidditch in Canada. Having played before and through the IQA split, we've seen the remarkable growth that comes to the sport when its top teams come together to compete. We're excited about the opportunity to bring our team out west for the first time, and we can't wait to face some new teams!
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't donate or just don't need ANOTHER quidditch t-shirt, there are still plenty of ways to help us out!

Share this campaign with your friends and family
Talk to us at quidditchvalhalla[at]gmail.com for more information on team sponsorship, quidditch events in the GTA, or upcoming merchandise sales
Shop our FlipGive page
Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram

story:
The Obesity/Weight Epidemic Is At An All Time High... And Growing

My name is Andréa Albright and I'm on a mission to help 1 million women lose weight in a 100% natural and heathy way so that we can stop the obesity epidemic together.

Women are the hearts of the home, and when a woman gets healthy, her entire family is affected in a positive way. That's why I've dedicated my life to supporting women to make healthy choices that they can stick with for life. 


I Used To Be Overweight 


I am a former yo-yo dieter turned international fitness celebrity. Using my background in Biology, I've discovered the science of losing fat without using dangerous pills, crash dieting or gimmicks. 

I used to be a yo-yo dieter throughout my teens and 20s. I was addicted to fad dieting that would only destroy my metabolism and my self esteem. At one point, I was even addicted to diet pills. I was in a war with my body. 

Finally, I discovered the secrets to 100% natural weight loss, and today I've kept the weight off for over 15 years! 

I've helped thousands of women lose weight with my approach, and I was even featured on the cover of the #1 fitness magazine, "Women's Health and Fitness" at 37 years young. 
 



100% Natural Weight Loss 
 


I do not believe in deprivation or extreme dieting. I teach my followers to discover the truth about 100% natural weight loss that lasts.

When a woman loses weight in this way, she feels healthier and more energized than ever. This increases her self esteem and her passion to help others. 
 

TrimTribe Is The Technology That Keeps You Motivated


I created the technology called "TrimTribe" to keep women motivated to make healthy choices that leads to 100% natural weight loss that lasts.

TrimTribe is an online game that you play and get points for making healthy choices.

Plus, it is a community of women all around the world that are supporting you and encouraging you along your natural weight loss journey. 
 


Women Empowering Women
 

TrimTribe is a sisterhood of women empowering women. 

We start with a "28 Day Body Makeover Challenge"™ where women lose up to 16 inches of fat in just 28 short days!

Best of all, they feel more energy and happiness than ever before.

Unlike crash dieting that leaves you week, irritable and drained, the TrimTribe approach gives you energy, focus and happiness because it works with the natural healing mechanisms in your body. 


What We Need And What You Get...


The women in TrimTribe are asking for an app that they can download on their phone to take TrimTribe with them everywhere. The cost to develop the app is $60,000. 

Your contribution (in whatever you can afford) will help to bring this technology out to the millions of women who are struggling to lose weight right now. 



Risks And Challenges



I've been in the weight loss industry since 2006, and it is highly competitive. We need to develop this app as soon as possible. 

Traditional advertising has been hard for me to get this out there because unfortunately, there are a lot of scams in the weight loss industry. 

I have dedicated my life to helping as many women as I can to learn the truth about how to look out for these scams, and only trust people who are giving 100% honest advice. I want them to make healthy choices so that weight comes off naturally. 


The Future Needs Us...

 

I dream of a world where young girls growing up in the future will not hate their bodies or struggle with body image. I dream of a world where they don’t even know what the word “diet” means. 

I need your help. 

The women need your help. The young girls who will become our future need your help. 

TrimTribe is the support they need to stop the destructive yo-yo dieting and reveal the true health they deserve. 

Please share this message with your social networks, and help to get the word out.

Thank you for your contribution.

story:
Finding a BIPOC and queer affirming therapist is now easier with Ayana Therapy! 

  • Ayana therapy is addressing the mental health crisis by matching BIPOC, queer, and intersectional communities with a therapist that reflects their own values and identities through our matchmaking questionnaire. This is why we were named one of the World’s Top Ten Most Innovative Wellness Companies of 2020 by Fast Company.
  • Be the FIRST to try out our therapy services and get one month of FREE therapy on us! 

 

HOW IT WORKS

  • Purchase one of the therapy packages by claiming the perk 
  • When our app is ready to test, you will be receiving a code to bypass the payment in our app. Approximate delivery date: Mid-Late June

 

OUR COVID-19 RESPONSE

Now more than ever, it is important to uplift and protect our frontline workers who have risked their lives for our communities. 

We are committed to offering free access to therapy (1 month)  for up to 50 of our COVID-19 dedicated frontline workers 

  • For more information and to sign up to win, click here. The form will close on Saturday, June 13th at 11:59 PM.
  • Winners will be identified through a lottery and will be notified when we have launched

 

OUR STORY 

After realizing that a member of my tribe had real challenges finding a therapist she liked, I was inspired to develop a concept that addresses cost, stigma, and the health care system’s lack of cultural competency, which all hinder access to mental health services.

WHO IS AYANA?

Finding a counselor one feels comfortable opening up to while of color, queer, or an intersection of both, is very difficult – and considerably more challenging for double or triple minorities. We strongly believe that if finding a reflection of yourself in your counselor is what you demand in order to find a safe space, you should be ENTITLED to it, hence our name, “Ayana,” which means “mirror” in Bengali.

 We are the first therapy app to provide catered care for marginalized, queer, and intersectional populations through flexible, convenient, and anonymous online communication (text, call, and video call) with therapists who align with your own values, identities, and preferences. 

Finding an affordable therapist pre-COVID-19 that could understand you and your background was extremely difficult. The current climate has made it even more challenging, and taking care of your mental health is important even more now than ever. We have streamlined the entire process so that you can focus on YOUR healing, by matching you with one of our many queer-affirming, diverse, and culturally competent therapists who understand the intersectionality of your identity. 

WHAT SETS US APART FROM THE COMPETITION?

Unlike other mental health companies, we are proud to provide:

1. EMPHASIS ON MARGINALIZED MENTAL HEALTH

We address the severe barriers to access that these populations face such as: 

However, we believe that everyone deserves wellbeing; therefore, anyone can use and support our services!

2. FASTER, SMARTER, IDENTITY-BASED MATCHMAKING ALGORITHM BASED ON THE USER'S UNIQUE PREFERENCES, VALUES, IDENTITIES, AND BELIEFS

3. EFFICIENT TREATMENT THROUGH MATCHMAKING 

 Clinical studies have shown that sociocultural mismatches between therapists and clients can lead to incorrect diagnoses, less productive care, and ineffective symptom management. We are constantly growing our therapist base to ensure that there is a perfect match for everyone. 

4. GREATER ACCESS TO CARE

5. DIVERSE THERAPIST BASE

Our therapists are licensed in a variety of states including California, New York, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, North Carolina, and Washington (among many others).  We currently have more than 200 clinicians from a variety of unique and intersectional backgrounds. Check out our therapists’ profiles on our website. If you or someone you know is interested in becoming an Ayana therapist, click here to apply. 

 

6. DESTIGMATIZATION THROUGH ANONYMITY 

Stigma prevents thousands of people, especially within marginalized communities, from receiving the mental health and wellness care that they deserve. Therefore, we allow our users to remain anonymous by only requiring a nickname to use our services!

7. CLEANER DESIGN AND USER EXPERIENCE

Our carefully engineered app is engaging and user-friendly, incorporating substantial feedback from clinicians, professors, students, and researchers. We continuously welcome feedback! You may email us at crowdfunding@ayanatherapy.com. 

8. TEAM OF EXPERT ADVISORS

Our esteemed group of advisors has been intimately involved in the development of Ayana’s app to ensure we provide the highest quality care, especially our intake questionnaire which is foundational to the quality and optimization of our matchmaking process. If you have any questions/comments/concerns, you may reach our board at info@ayanatherapy.com

AYANA IN THE PRESS

Ayana Therapy was recently named one of the World’s Top Ten Most Innovative Wellness Companies of 2020 by Fast Company 

SO YOU ARE INTERESTED AND WANT TO KNOW HOW TO USE THE APP?

Ayana is simple to use and understand — just download our app, create an account, anonymously log into the app, take the questionnaire, and match with a therapist! You can start chatting with your therapist after choosing one of our many affordable packages.  

HERE ARE THE PERKS!

Teletherapy Services: Become a founding user today!

GIVE THERAPY TO A PERSON IN NEED (Any amount helps!) 

Donate by clicking on the 'Back It' button. 

  • $10
  • $25
  • $50
  • $100
  • $500 — feature on our social media via social media story (10k+ followers) 
  • $1,000 — feature on our social media via social media post (10k+ followers) 

BUY ONE MONTH AND GET ONE MONTH FREE  (Most popular perk!)

  • $140 package: daily texting and two calls of 30 min each a month
  • $160 package: daily texting and four calls of 30 min each a month
  • $180 package: daily texting and four video calls of 30 min each a month 

GIVE THERAPY TO A LOVED ONE: BUY ONE MONTH AND GET ONE MONTH FREE

  • $140 package: daily texting and two calls of 30 min each a month
  • $160 package: daily texting and four calls of 30 min each a month
  • $180 package: daily texting and four video calls of 30 min each a month

BUY SIX MONTHS AND GET TWO MONTHS FREE 

  • $560: ($140 package) - daily texting and two calls of 30 min each a month
  • $640: ($160 package) - daily texting and four calls of 30 min each a month
  • $720: ($180 package) - daily texting and four video calls of 30 min each a month

BUY A WHOLE YEAR AND GET THREE MONTHS FREE 

  • $1,260: ($140 package) - daily texting and two calls of 30 min each a month
  • $1,440: ($160 package) - daily texting and four calls of 30 min each a month
  • $1,620: ($180 package) - daily texting and four video calls of 30 min each a month

SUPPORT

  • You may reach out to our support team at crowfunding@ayanatherapy.com
  • You can chat with our team on our website at www.ayanatherapy.com 

FOUNDING MEMBER STATUS

  • As a founding member, you will be able to directly provide feedback and play an active role in our app development by emailing us at crowdfunding@ayanatherapy.com 
  • As a founding member, you will join an online community of BIPOC and queer folks through our Facebook group! 

 

JOIN THE MISSION AND BE PART OF OUR COMMUNITY

Help us spread the word about the importance of mental health in marginalized communities by following us on social media! If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, be sure to contact us!

“I have suffered from very severe and debilitating issues of depression. Seldom in life are we presented with the fortune of working on something as important as normalizing mental health conversations. That rare type of alignment must be honored and this is what my team and I strive to do: de-stigmatizing, listening, and providing safe space to every dismissed, neglected and ignored voice out there in the form of therapy.”

- Eric Coly, CEO and Founder

story:
Short Summary

I have finally graduated after 7 months of study to be qualified as a fitness instructor and personal trainer.

The past 2 years I have been involved in cross fit and obstacle course running which involves high intensity training and trail running over many obstacles (climbing over walls, swimming through muddy pits with barbed wires etc).

I am working on several projects :

  • Becoming a qualified Nordic walking instructor. 
    • Why? 

      Nordic Walking is a fun, social and effective way to be active. Is the gym not your scene? Is jogging too tough on your body? Is walking not tough enough? Do you find swimming too solitary? Well then you have come to the right place! Nordic Walking is as effective as jogging, as gentle as walking and it is perfect to do with a group of old and new friends. Because Nordic Walking uses poles it engages your whole body and works all your major muscles from head to toe. The result is an effective, easy and fun exercise that can be enjoyed by almost everyone - any age, any athletic ability.

      Up to a 40% increase in calorie burn at a lower rate of perceived exertion is just one of the health benefits of Nordic Walking.

    • Burn more calories in less time
      Consumes approximately 400 calories per hour (compared with 280 calories per hour for normal walking)
      Energy consumption increases when using poles by an average of 20% compared with ordinary walking without poles
      Heart rate is 5-17 beats per minute higher.
      Up to a 40% increase in energy consumption (Cooper Institute research, Research Quarterly for Exercise and Sports 2002 publication)
      Low rate of perceived exertion & easy to master
      A total body activity
      The lateral mobility of the neck and spine increases significantly
      The muscles most actively involved are the forearm extensor and flexor muscles, biceps, triceps, the rear part of the shoulder muscles, the large pectoral muscles, chest, abdominals, back muscles, and your butt!
      Reduced load and relaxed muscles
      Does not aggravate joints and knees.
      Reduces the load on knees and other joints. Improves balance and co-ordination
      Releases pain and muscle tension in the neck/shoulder region
      Poles are a safety factor on slippery surfaces
      Varied levels of intensity
      Energetic, Relaxing and Fun

    • Course fee : $495. (Plus living expenses having no work over 2 days)

  • Running bootcamp OCR style workshops for children. 
    • Why? 

      Strengthens the heart: Without a question, your heart will benefit from this rigorous exercise. The more blood your heart pumps, the stronger your heart will get in time and the better blood fluidity will gain. And if you have a strong heart, you will have less risks for diseases, especially heart diseases.

      Puts you in shape: Do you want to lose weight? Or just get fitter? Try an obstacle race! The constant running and intense force you apply to every obstacle will have you burning lots of calories, and eventually burn fat and lose weight. If you are bored with doing the some exercises and workouts, try an obstacle race! Never quit moving and exercising. Keep your body physically active at all times. Stay fit in a fun way!

       

      Fortify bones: With about 10 minutes of being outdoor, the sun activate the vitamin D in your body, which is the one the makes your bones dense and strong. Besides,  the high impact exercise stimulates an increase in bone mass so that the body in prepared to future impacts. Bone mass will increase faster in younger persons involved in high impact workouts, like adolescents, according to recently researchers at the University of Bristol.

      Build strength and endurance: Climbing a walls, crawling under barb wires, holding onto ropes – these types of races will absolutely test your strength abilities and will make you push your physical limits. This way, on your next race, you would be able to keep going faster and farther than the previous time. You’ll even want to go for longer races to keep challenging your body.

      Improve balance and coordination: Along the race, all the racers are trying to not fall down or trip maintaining their balance with every single obstacle. Always coordinating all your body parts, muscles and senses at the same time: looking up to see what obstacle is next or looking back to see how far you are from your friend; feeling the terrain with your feet and stabilize them if it’s rocky or muddy; moving your hands around to help you move faster and have them ready if you fall; jumping and trying to land strong with both feet – all of these movements correspond with your brain’s orders and making you improve you balance and coordination.

      Toughens the brain: Before you attend to one of this events, not only you have to be physically prepared, but mentally too. Your brain is set to one goal: Finish the race! Focusing in accomplish that goal, your level of concentration on that race would be at the top of everything that is on your mind.

      Make new friends – Obstacle courses tend to focus heavily on teamwork and cooperation, and while it’s not required to create a team, you will eventually find many mud runners who are willing to help each other out. These kind of races bring people together, from reaching out an arm on a half-pipe climb to climbing onto of each other to scale ridiculous height, you will make tons of friends doing this. While these courses are called “races,” the cooperation is high – even among strangers – add you build irreplaceable bonds.

      Have fun – There is nothing more exiting than participating in an adventure that is not on your everyday routine. Going out there, running through various obstacles and getting muddy can be outrageously fun. You may fail some obstacles and your muscles may be intensely sore the next day but you will be taking on these challenges with an intense smile and having a great time.

      Even American pediatricians and the Australia teaching curriculum are encouraging more physical activities in children. http://nspt4kids.com/parenting/obstacle-courses... and  Outcome 3—Children have a strong sense of wellbeing

  • Running HIIT training and strength training programs in the outdoors for adults.

    • Benefits listed by the ACSM is the largest sports medicine and exercise science organization in the world. With more than 50,000 members and certified professionals worldwide, ACSM is dedicated to advancing and integrating scientific research to provide educational and practical applications of exercise science and sports medicine.

      • HIIT training has been shown to improve: • aerobic and anaerobic fitness • blood pressure • cardiovascular health • insulin sensitivity (which helps the exercising muscles more readily use glucose for fuel to make energy) • cholesterol profiles • abdominal fat and body weight while maintaining muscle mass.

  • Since I uploaded photos of my participation in Spartan sprint this year, I have had OCR organizers from around the world become curious and encourage me to attend their races. So I am now training to become an elite athlete to participate in events around the world.  

Now why am I stating all of this and asking for SPONSORSHIP ? My current day job pays very little and incurring living expenses does not allow me to fulfill ANY of these projects. 

I am turning to YOU for help to raise funds to get these projects up and running. 

"What do I get out of this" I hear you ask? Well you'll be a superhero for helping me creating an healthier older generation, healthier future generation and a healthier future YOU!!

OK so another question I'm hearing you ask?  "What if I don't have any funds to help?

Well there is a simple solution: the more people who hear about these projects the more funds will be raised. Even if you pledge a very small amount, anything helps.

SUGGESTIONS are more than welcome if there is a perk you'd love to receive when you pledge your assistance to these projects. 

SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE 

 

In advance: THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
story_txt:
Short SummaryI have finally graduated after 7 months of study to be qualified as a fitness instructor and personal trainer.The past 2 years I have been involved in cross fit and obstacle course running which involves high intensity training and trail running over many obstacles (climbing over walls, swimming through muddy pits with barbed wires etc).I am working on several projects :
Becoming a qualified Nordic walking instructor. 
Why? Nordic Walking is a fun, social and effective way to be active. Is the gym not your scene? Is jogging too tough on your body? Is walking not tough enough? Do you find swimming too solitary? Well then you have come to the right place! Nordic Walking is as effective as jogging, as gentle as walking and it is perfect to do with a group of old and new friends. Because Nordic Walking uses poles it engages your whole body and works all your major muscles from head to toe. The result is an effective, easy and fun exercise that can be enjoyed by almost everyone - any age, any athletic ability.
Up to a 40% increase in calorie burn at a lower rate of perceived exertion is just one of the health benefits of Nordic Walking.

Burn more calories in less timeConsumes approximately 400 calories per hour (compared with 280 calories per hour for normal walking)Energy consumption increases when using poles by an average of 20% compared with ordinary walking without polesHeart rate is 5-17 beats per minute higher.Up to a 40% increase in energy consumption (Cooper Institute research, Research Quarterly for Exercise and Sports 2002 publication)Low rate of perceived exertion & easy to masterA total body activityThe lateral mobility of the neck and spine increases significantlyThe muscles most actively involved are the forearm extensor and flexor muscles, biceps, triceps, the rear part of the shoulder muscles, the large pectoral muscles, chest, abdominals, back muscles, and your butt!Reduced load and relaxed musclesDoes not aggravate joints and knees.Reduces the load on knees and other joints. Improves balance and co-ordinationReleases pain and muscle tension in the neck/shoulder regionPoles are a safety factor on slippery surfacesVaried levels of intensityEnergetic, Relaxing and Fun
Course fee : $495. (Plus living expenses having no work over 2 days)


Running bootcamp OCR style workshops for children. 
Why? Strengthens the heart: Without a question, your heart will benefit from this rigorous exercise. The more blood your heart pumps, the stronger your heart will get in time and the better blood fluidity will gain. And if you have a strong heart, you will have less risks for diseases, especially heart diseases.
Puts you in shape: Do you want to lose weight? Or just get fitter? Try an obstacle race! The constant running and intense force you apply to every obstacle will have you burning lots of calories, and eventually burn fat and lose weight. If you are bored with doing the some exercises and workouts, try an obstacle race! Never quit moving and exercising. Keep your body physically active at all times. Stay fit in a fun way! 
Fortify bones: With about 10 minutes of being outdoor, the sun activate the vitamin D in your body, which is the one the makes your bones dense and strong. Besides,  the high impact exercise stimulates an increase in bone mass so that the body in prepared to future impacts. Bone mass will increase faster in younger persons involved in high impact workouts, like adolescents, according to recently researchers at the University of Bristol.
Build strength and endurance: Climbing a walls, crawling under barb wires, holding onto ropes – these types of races will absolutely test your strength abilities and will make you push your physical limits. This way, on your next race, you would be able to keep going faster and farther than the previous time. You’ll even want to go for longer races to keep challenging your body.
Improve balance and coordination: Along the race, all the racers are trying to not fall down or trip maintaining their balance with every single obstacle. Always coordinating all your body parts, muscles and senses at the same time: looking up to see what obstacle is next or looking back to see how far you are from your friend; feeling the terrain with your feet and stabilize them if it’s rocky or muddy; moving your hands around to help you move faster and have them ready if you fall; jumping and trying to land strong with both feet – all of these movements correspond with your brain’s orders and making you improve you balance and coordination.Toughens the brain: Before you attend to one of this events, not only you have to be physically prepared, but mentally too. Your brain is set to one goal: Finish the race! Focusing in accomplish that goal, your level of concentration on that race would be at the top of everything that is on your mind.
Make new friends – Obstacle courses tend to focus heavily on teamwork and cooperation, and while it’s not required to create a team, you will eventually find many mud runners who are willing to help each other out. These kind of races bring people together, from reaching out an arm on a half-pipe climb to climbing onto of each other to scale ridiculous height, you will make tons of friends doing this. While these courses are called “races,” the cooperation is high – even among strangers – add you build irreplaceable bonds.Have fun – There is nothing more exiting than participating in an adventure that is not on your everyday routine. Going out there, running through various obstacles and getting muddy can be outrageously fun. You may fail some obstacles and your muscles may be intensely sore the next day but you will be taking on these challenges with an intense smile and having a great time.Even American pediatricians and the Australia teaching curriculum are encouraging more physical activities in children. http://nspt4kids.com/parenting/obstacle-courses... and  Outcome 3—Children have a strong sense of wellbeing



Running HIIT training and strength training programs in the outdoors for adults.

Benefits listed by the ACSM is the largest sports medicine and exercise science organization in the world. With more than 50,000 members and certified professionals worldwide, ACSM is dedicated to advancing and integrating scientific research to provide educational and practical applications of exercise science and sports medicine.
HIIT training has been shown to improve: • aerobic and anaerobic fitness • blood pressure • cardiovascular health • insulin sensitivity (which helps the exercising muscles more readily use glucose for fuel to make energy) • cholesterol profiles • abdominal fat and body weight while maintaining muscle mass.


Since I uploaded photos of my participation in Spartan sprint this year, I have had OCR organizers from around the world become curious and encourage me to attend their races. So I am now training to become an elite athlete to participate in events around the world.  
Now why am I stating all of this and asking for SPONSORSHIP ? My current day job pays very little and incurring living expenses does not allow me to fulfill ANY of these projects. I am turning to YOU for help to raise funds to get these projects up and running. "What do I get out of this" I hear you ask? Well you'll be a superhero for helping me creating an healthier older generation, healthier future generation and a healthier future YOU!!OK so another question I'm hearing you ask?  "What if I don't have any funds to help?Well there is a simple solution: the more people who hear about these projects the more funds will be raised. Even if you pledge a very small amount, anything helps.SUGGESTIONS are more than welcome if there is a perk you'd love to receive when you pledge your assistance to these projects. SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE  In advance: THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

story:
Who and why?

A big car, a TV and a house - does that mean happiness? I used to think that, but I've tried it, and it didn't work.
The more you give, the happier you are. Imagine if everyone would do just a small thing every day, for someone else.
I've always had this passion to help others, whether by talking to people, trying to organize things for them, or just be there whenever they needed it. The feeling when you can bring back a smile on someone's face is priceless, and if you don't need anything in return, even more pure.
After my studying and working in the field of tourism, traveling was and is my passion. Learning about new cultures and meeting new people has helped me a lot to find out who I am and what means the most to me.
During some difficult times when both of my parents got seriously ill with cancer, I had to find a way to deal with it and did put a lot of work into getting myself out of depression and restoring my mind. But as we say, in everything bad there's something good, so all that work lead me to discover my passion, that is healing with music. After seeing how these therapies can change you and your way of experiencing the world, I would like to share my passion and help others in difficult moments too.
Nowadays everyone is so busy with all those material things that we forget to take care of ourself first, and everything else is more important. But when the results of such a lifestyle come back as an illness, then we remember....what we could've done.

Money is not all, but sometimes you need it to start your dream...
To make my dream come true and get as much experience as possible in the field of sound healing, I need to gain professional knowledge and background, therefore I need to attend two programs:
- International School of Sound healing (taking place in Slovenia, October 2016, with Gong Master Mojca Malek, www.muza.si)
Thes cost of this program  is 2.500 EUR.
- Purchasing instruments
Bowls, gong, with accessories
The cost of a complete set is 3.100 EUR
- Pratical hours
Hours of practicing with masters of sound healing (Mojca Malek, Birman Shrestha - all working in Slovenia)
The cost per hour is 20 EUR; in total 20 hours which equals 400 EUR
- Rental for the studio (1st and 2nd month)
By being able to cover the cost of the rent for the first two months it would make the start a bit easier.
The cost for rent/ month = 500 EUR, TOTAL  2 months= 1.000 EUR


Maybe you also have the desire to help others, but you don't know how exactly yet... By supporting my idea you could be part of a big dream and help others long term, from children to adults, and have an impact of the world and the health of so many!


Analyzing the opportunity and what could be the obstacles...
Sound healing is right now on the raise, more and more doctors are discovering its benefits and new studies are confirming it. After analyzing the current situation in Slovenia, there are only a few people practicing therapies with sound, but widely spread across the country.
The biggest challenge will be to spread the message to people in my city and introduce this method to a wider publicity, but I do have a plan to succesfully overcome this difficulties at the beginning:
- having a wide network of people working in the field of medicine, massage therapy and pilates/yoga field, which all have own clients, can help promoting the new sound therapy treatment
- using social media to promote my work will help tremendously
- local events with thematic programs allow individuals to present their work as volunteers, so that people can get in touch with it
- Being the first sound therapist who will oficially achieve an international recognized diploma in this specific field will give me the most scientific background to combine with alternative medicine

Big dreams always start with a small idea, but I know that this is my way that I want to go, and I'm grateful for the time you took to read this, and if you can help me build something that can improve our lifes, connect us more with ourselves and prevent diseases, you will always be sure that you are a part of something beautiful, happening every day,

story:
Since its run in early May, our campaign has raised over $3200 through the generosity of 62 backers! Thanks for your community-minded consideration in helping us fund the build-out and staffing of a first-of-its’ kind, bilingual Yoga studio with world dance and an in-house healing arts clinic for Watsonville and its’ surrounds! 

With your donation of over $50, you become a valued supporter of positive change in Watsonville, and one of our first and honored guests at the studio when we open in September, with an unlimited monthly pass! If you don't live in Watsonville, you can donate it to a designated friend or family member. 

We also have a nonprofit, tax-deductible campaign on Generosity.com that allows you to deduct your contribution of $60 or more:

https://www.generosity.com/community-fundraisin...

There are at least 16 Yoga studios in Santa Cruz, Capitola, and Aptos collectively and not a single dedicated one yet in our town, amazingly. I began seeking to manifest this project in earnest last year, and have met with so much enthusiasm, synchronicity and support of all across the community, in unfolding this vision to this point. Everywhere, there is tremendous energy supporting the transformation of our downtown Watsonville area into a more visible, healthy and vibrant community for people of all ages and backgrounds.

We have gained a lease on a wonderful historic building at 375 N. Main Street, across from the beautiful community Plaza in the heart of downtown. It comes with some revitalization work to be sure, which forms part of the need-basis for this campaign: the building needs a new ADA bathroom downstairs, and new Title 24 electrical throughout the building, a $50000 price tag in addition to our other build-out, start-up and staffing costs.

Our Yoga studio, named Watsonville Yoga, Dance and Healing Arts, comes to downtown at a time ripe with anticipation and a warmly extended invitation by the City for change and progress specific to the downtown area. This change, so long in coming, could only be of the kind that reflects the unique cultural identity of Watsonville and its’ people.

I have been touched over and over by the kindness in our community, and the defining spirit that of value on the family/familia: from parents I speak to in the parks while our children play, to the gentle abuelas and abuelos who stop to interact with my children, give them treats, and touch their heads with a smile. It is because of the richness I feel here that I want to be able to give back to our community in this project, our own much needed dedicated Yoga studio and world dance studio-- with bilingual classes to connect the community inclusively to the creative, peace-of-mind-enhancing and socially uniting practices of Yoga along with the joy and cultural traditions of world dance taught by leading teachers in their art.

I have, in the past, taught bilingual Yoga classes in Watsonville and Aptos at various Mid Pen Housing sites for a largely migrant population, who I grew to know intimately. I primarily served the communities at these sites with academic tutoring, but I also orchestrated meetings with indigenous teachers for the children and adult residents of the community. I gained footing in bilingual skills thanks largely to the patience of this community of people who lovingly encouraged me. Part of the vision for this studio comes from the positive memory of the reception to those Yoga classes; how useful they were for the people doing backbreaking work in the fields, and the joy that children and young teens found in creative movement through Yoga.

Through my husband Tom May’s employment as a Science teacher at PV High and his work with youth leadership and ecology with WATCH / Monterey Bay Aquarium, I have also learned much about the needs of families in our town for healthy, culturally-grounded leadership opportunities for our youth, and the positive impact it returns to their families and to the relationship to the land which we all depend upon, live and work with as well.

I believe with all of my heart, likewise, in the capacity of Yoga to reveal the above qualities in a person. Cesar Chavez did too--he studied and took example from Yoga philosophy at the observation of “Mahatma” Mohandas K. Gandhi’s successful independence movement for India out of British colonial rule, and the improvements for the people which followed on personal and economic levels.

Watsonville Yoga, Dance and Healing Arts will both reflect the existing cultural heritages in Watsonville and continue to reach across cultures beyond our area in many ways. Yoga is steeped in it’s own culture from hereditary India, but is now practiced all over the world. The dance classes we will offer will be varied world dance taught by teachers who have lived in or studied at their artistic place of origin and are fluent in the language and indigenous musical traditions which stand beside the dance. Dance can be entertaining but has great personal value also as a cultural expression and personal means for joy, energy, discipline, and health. We have plans for "Worldanz" hip hop and global fusion for kids and adults, Middle Eastern / North African Bellydance, Brasilian Capoeira and Samba, and Ballet Folklorico, and are in the process of securing Mejica / Aztec dance and Salsa.

Yoga classes will be offered to everyone inclusively, with mostly bilingual teachers and a bilingual receptionist at the desk at all times. We will offer classes for every age, physical ability, and stylistic preference. Our staff and teachers are sought locally first.

Our tentative Yoga schedule includes classes in meditation, Iyengar-inspired Hatha Yoga, Hatha Yoga, Sivananda Yoga, Vinyasa Flow, Yin/ Restorative, Yoga for kids, and a Community by-donation class for the general public and one for Seniors.

We will also be partnering with local acupuncturists and massage therapists to have a wellness center during the low-use times in the studio.

Watsonville Yoga, Dance and Healing Arts will improve the quality of life for our community in so many ways. Be a part of the positive change and show your support by pre-purchasing a monthly pass at this discounted rate of $50 or simply making a donation! Thank you from our hearts for donating, and for helping us to by spreading the word! Please feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools on this site!

story:
You are the one who can make the difference by helping us to bring NOUS into the world. Your contribution would support organic lands, wildlife and keep alive healthy lifestyle as well as create many workplaces. 

We are individuals who would like to establish production line in largest trade hub of the Baltics - Latvia. Why do we choose Latvia.

 Key Advantages:

  • Robust supply chain 
  • Access to quality ingredients
  • Ecological agriculture for natural ingredients
  • Industry standards and sustainability
  • Developed transit infrastructure
  • Clean environment
  • Abundance of skilled and competitive labour

Geographical advantages:

  • Scandinavia on one side Russia on the other side Poland, Germany on third side.
  • Three International ice free ports.
  • Direct rail link to Russia and a connection between the Baltic and the Black seas gives opportunity for further delivery to/from Scandinavian countries from/to the Caucasus and Turkey.
  • Two hour flight away from all the western capitals more then 65 direct flights from  Riga International airport.

With such a versatile logistics as well as demand of healthy products, our trade would be focused on Scandinavia and Germany in the beginning. We are coming into this market of healthy food and beverage with the product that is unique and essential for modern world. We have great knowledge about healthy beverage and we would like to share it with all of you. 

Why have we chosen the flexible goal?

Business will start developing according to amount of money we get and we will shape it respectively. ​Because no matter what the final contribution is, it will take us closer to our goal - NOUS production. 

I would like to take this opportunity and thank you all for support.

story:
A SMOOTH MISSION

PROBLEM IS, IF YOU HAVE SKIN--YOU’RE AFFECTED!

Hi. I represent the growing population of conscious consumers such as yourself, who are sick (sometimes literally) and tired of crappy, overpriced, ineffective skincare brands. Brands who claim to improve our appearance while taking our hard earned money. Unfortunately, these same products leave us with temporary results at best, no results at all or worsened skin conditions from the harsh chemicals found in their “solution-oriented” skincare lines.

 

WHY THIS IS SO IMPORTANT TO ME

My name is Lariadi and I’m a vegan chef, artist and cosmetologist who is passionate about Mother Nature—namely botany (plant study) and natural remedies (how those plants help us).

Growing up with an unfortunate amount of insecurities and wavering confidence stemming from hormonal acne (even as an adult), scarring, scaly dry skin, stretch marks (I had intense growth spurts as a teen) and hyperpigmentation, I too fell victim to ineffective products with huge promises and price tags without results. All I wanted was crystal clear skin and was desperate to optain it. Meanwhile, I grew weary of my co-dependant relationship with heavy foundations and wanted to break up… for good.

 

BUT, THERE IS HOPE!

Frustrated by my disappearing piggy bank and unending skin ailments, I began to experiment with natural remedies as I’d see my father--a multi-talented gourmet chef—often do. He concocted natural skin pastes that actually healed his allergic breakouts; restoring his once blemish-peppered skin back into buttery smooth perfection!

Thus, I instinctively resorted to creating my own “healing pastes,” and after decades of research and experimenting on myself and friends, I've found what works! 

My formulations have not only healed my skin ailments but are superior in quality to ALL of the expensive big names I've tried in the past since ours rely 100% on the multi-tasking benefits of natural plant power to heal and restore skin. I can't wait to help others while providing immediate access to high quality alternatives to synthetic, gimmicky and often harmfully toxic skin products!

 

HOW SERIOUS THIS IS

We’ve been hearing about those—often someone close to us—being diagnosed with new ailments all too often these days, from developing new allergies to another cancer diagnosis. And according to the American Cancer Society, sample carcinogens (cancer causers) include aluminum, talc, formaldehyde, and mineral oils. ALL of these ingredients are listed in MANY of our common skincare or beauty products and are causing unneccesary ailments!

For these reasons and more, we want to provide consumers with effective, 100% natural, Earth-derived ingredients and not lab-created ones. We conduct ongoing tests on humans only and aim to rely on natural, safe and effective ingredients; many from the ancient beauty rituals of queens known for their beauty such as Cleopatra, Vashti and Esther. What worked for royalty centuries ago still works! And we're out to prove it without causing any known side effects!

 

WHY WE NEED YOU

I hope to use the proceeds of this campaign to legally prepare my business to appear on Shark Tank so my products can be accessed beyond an online platform! Can you imagine 100% natural skincare that is Free of ALL known harmful ingredients? This. Is. MAJOR! And you can play a big part in this movement!

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP MAKE AN IMPACT

My goal is to raise $2,500 USD in order to be safely and fully prepared to appear on Shark Tank to make my brand nationally visible and hopefully physically available. This amount will cover the following:

  • $ Professional labeling, print marketing & ready-to-ship packaging
  • $$ Professional website upgrade with integrated e-Commerce + branded emails
  • $$$ Legal + USPTO registered protections with attorney fees (this is where the bulk of the funding will go)

My time is limited as I just found out that the Shark Tank casting crew is coming to my town in less than 10 days! This audition will be the FINAL one for the upcoming season of Shark Tank, so I’m on a crunch and need your help swiftly!

 

OH YES! THERE IS SOMETHING IN IT FOR YOU!

Aside from helping:

  • conscious moms & dads,
  • allergy-laden children who can't use synthetic skincare products,
  • confidence-lacking teens,
  • and pro-natural consumers with limited access to products that are truly 100% natural,

your donation of $15 or more will not only enable us to help the aforementioned individuals, but you’ll be able to get buttery smooth skin for yourself! EVERYONE who donates will get to try our 7-in-1 Miracle Skin Perfector! The More you can give, the Smoother you can get!!

 

HOW MY INVENTION WILL HELP YOU

This solitary, unisex, spa-grade skincare product can save your precious TIME, counter SPACE and MONEY by replacing ALL* of your skincare products--as it is capable of not just one, but SEVEN jobs:

  1. Gently CLEANSING with vegetable based cleansers
  2. EXFOLIATING with naturally-derived Alpha Hydroxy Acid
  3. BALANCING with alkaline components
  4. MOISTURIZING with non-occlusive natural oils
  5. TREATING** specific skin ailments with herbs and elixirs
  6. HEALING with vitamin A & C
  7. PROTECTING your skin with vitamin E

Mind-blowing right? I understand. I get “high on my own supply!” Seriously, I don’t need or even own foundation or other skin-camouflaging make-up anymore!

 

IF WE SOMEHOW DON'T REACH OUR GOAL

If I sadly don’t raise enough to prepare to appear on the Shark Tank TV Show, I will allot the received funds towards whatever they will cover and look to enter trade shows and vendor markets! On the contrary, if I raise MORE than expected, then I can rent a better equipped work space facility and be able to expand our product line more rapidly!

 

HOW SERIOUS I AM

Just so you know how “all in” I am, I live in a “micro-mobile studio” and have created these products in a mini 10 ft. by 5 ft. workspace that I currently rent. I sold literally EVERYTHING but my car and computer to make this dream happen. I do this FULL-time with NO side jobs. I eat peanut butter sandwiches most days and spend 90% of sales on more supplies, then survive on whatever is left.

This may sound extreme, but I’ve had skin problems since I entered puberty and when I finally cured my acne over TWENTY years later, I also found a new life-changing confidence in myself I hadn't previously experienced! Now, I’m simply following the path that life has organically prepped me for about 22 years ago. I couldn’t be more passionate about the opportunity to help and increase the confidence of others!

 

GLOBAL IMPACT

We all have skin—like it or not--and we all have to maintain it somehow. Why use chemicals like parabens, mineral oils or other cancer-causing, hormone-disrupting, artificial ingredients* when the real thing is available to heal and improve? Those same chemicals are then rinsed into our public water sources which are connected to and affect EVERYTHING! Our WORLD needs Effective, Natural skincare resources that don’t hurt or harm us. Period. Are you down to help me make them available to as many people as possible?

*Learn more about what synthetic ingredients are doing to us HERE.

 

TRANSPARENCY: OUR ONLY FORSEEN CHALLENGE…

Aside from not raising enough funds, the other possible challenge could come from a shortage of hands. For now, I mostly do it all, making each product in small batches by hand and then inspect, contain, pack and label each one with care. So please be patient if for any unforeseen reason there is a delay in receiving your perk. Should any delays or issues arise that require immediate attention, I will always make an effort to notify you via email or web as soon as possible.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Can't contribute financially? No worries! Please SHARE this campaign with your Facebook, Twitter & Instagram friends, family, co-workers and organization members, or tell them to visit SmootherThanButter.com to try the natural power of alternative beauty for themselves (especially if they struggle with common skin ailments!).

 

KEEP THE “GOOD STUFF” FLOWING!

After using the Indiegogo share tools, try to avoid the toxic chemicals listed on our benefits page at SmootherThanButter.com. Eat healthier, get fresh air and exercise daily—even if it’s just doing calf raises in the line at a grocery store. Love others. But first, take time to heal and love Yourself! Stay consciously beautiful!

 

 

*Additional sunscreen protection may be needed based on your personal needs and exposure to sunlight

** Treatable ailments include: acne, dryness, wrinkles, hyperpigmentation, eczema (coming soon!), oily skin, razor-bump prevention (pre-shave), sore muscles and dullness. Our products are suitable for dry, oily, combination, mature, acne-prone and normal skin types (see product at SmootherThanButter.com, store page, for specific details.)
story_txt:
A SMOOTH MISSIONPROBLEM IS, IF YOU HAVE SKIN--YOU’RE AFFECTED!Hi. I represent the growing population of conscious consumers such as yourself, who are sick (sometimes literally) and tired of crappy, overpriced, ineffective skincare brands. Brands who claim to improve our appearance while taking our hard earned money. All I wanted was crystal clear skin and was desperate to optain it. Meanwhile, I grew weary of my co-dependant relationship with heavy foundations and wanted to break up… for good. BUT, THERE IS HOPE!Frustrated by my disappearing piggy bank and unending skin ailments, I began to experiment with natural remedies as I’d see my father--a multi-talented gourmet chef—often do. story:
Sports Bottle Revolutionized

Dual Drinking Modes / Hydration Monitoring / DPAT Algorithm

We always forget to drink water, whether in life or sports, and we drink when we feel thirsty. We hope Moikit Gene can be a product that helps you to build better hydration habits. It works as perfect as a conventional sports bottle, and it is a lot  better. Moikit Gene can record your water intake automatically, and the Moikit APP offers more hydration management features. Many health issues are caused by poor hydration habits, and that’s why we believe Moikit Gene can change this.

Dual Hydration Modes

Traditional sports bottles only allow people to drink via one of two method: sipping or through a straw. Moikit’s revolutionary SmartStraw™ technology breaks this limitation. No matter you are riding outdoors, jogging or working at home, Gene allows you to hydrate in comfort, regardless of your current activity.

Zephair™​ Hydration Monitoring

Gene features patented Zephair™ hydration tracking technology, which not only eliminates all conventional electronic internals within the bottle, but also improves the measurement accuracy up to ±5ml. This new technology allows Gene to be carried around like any other traditional sports bottles. Gene can be easily cleaned without worrying about deposition.

DPAT Hydration Tracking Algorithm

Proper hydration is essential to your daily workouts and trainings. Our DPAT hydration tracking algorithm calculates your body’s hydration needs based on your actual water intake, body weight, health condition and your daily exercises. It will determine when you need to hydrate during your workouts.

Real Time Display and Notification

Gene allows you to check your hydration data in real time and reminds you to drink water before your body dehydrates. Gene’s high quality LCD display is clearly visible even under bright sunlight.

Farewell to Leaks in Your Bag

The world’s most innovative safe lid lock. Simply spin it, and it will lock the lid completely. When your Gene is in your bag, there is no need to worry about the leakage.

BPA Free, Robust Bottle Design

Gene uses Tritan™ as the main material of the bottle, and will not release BPA or other harmful substances. It has been approved by the US Food and Drug Administration, and has become the designated material for infant products. Tritan™ gives Gene a firm surface. Gene’s body is strong and will not break even when hit by strong forces. Gene is stable regardless of your activity.

IPX6 Waterproof, Easy to Wash

Gene is designed to be waterproofed (IPX6). You may wash it regularly or use it rainy days.

Single Charge Lasts 25 Days

Gene has a 150mAh polymer lithium battery. Gene can be charged  via the micro USB port on the lid. A single charge lasts up to 25 days.

The Moikit APP

We developed the Moikit APP, and it is compatible with all Moikit smart hydration products. The Moikit APP allows you to view your hydration progress, analyzes your hydration habits and reminds you to hydrate .

Moikit SmartStraw™

Not all straw bottles are created equally. Introducing Moikit SmartStraw™, an innovated technology that allows you to drink in two ways: sipping and pouring. Therefore no matter you are riding outdoors, jogging or working at home, Gene allows you to hydrate in comfort, regardless of your current activity.

Moikit Zephair™

Knowing your daily hydration is important for your health, and the more accurate, the better. Moikit’s patented Zephair™ hydration tracking technology makes this happen. Zephair™’s highly accurate sensor has an error range of ±5ml (based on a daily water consumption of 100ml). It not only eliminates all traditional electronic internals within the bottle, but also improve the measurement accuracy.

Moikit Safe Lock™

Having a unlocked bottle in your bag can be nightmare. The conventional lock mechanism on the market will often malfunction and cause leakage;therefore, we revolutionize our lock design and let users say bye to leakage once for all.

Your Personal Hydration Coach

You can connect Gene with your smart devices, and all data will be automatically synchronized via Bluetooth. You can monitor your personal hydration data in the Moikit APP anytime and anywhere.

Hydrate in a Scientific Way

Gene calculates your hydration data with accurate DPAT algorithm and reminds you to drink water regularly. You can optimize your hydration habits by checking data every now and then. The data and graphs in the Moikit APP provide you detailed hydration analysis and you can set your hydration reminder accordingly (notification to drink water). It helps you to build better hydration habits.

Apple Health Compatibility

Hydration data can be synchronized and viewed in Apple Health.

Third Party APP Compatibility

Gene is not only compatible with the Moikit APP, the hydration data recorded by Gene can also be synchronized and viewed in Apple Health, Fitbit, and Jawbone UP.

Gene currently offers 3 colors and more colors will be available in the future.

First Production Round Completed

Gene has already passed the research and development sages. We have the first production run of 10,000 Genes and they are now ready to ship.

At Mokit, we put people at the center of everything. We focus on developing the best smart drinking products that can be used in everyday life. Our goal is to revolutionize the way people hydrate. By connecting with their smart devices, our users will be able to closely monitor their daily water intake whenever and wherever. Our mission is to provide the best smart drinking solutions that help people live healthier lives.

FAQ

1. Can I use Gene to carry beverages other than water?

Yes, however, Gene is designed for non-carbonated drinks. Thick or pulpy drinks may block the gravity plug or cause malfunction.

2. Is Gene dishwasher safe?

Gene’s bottle is dishwasher safe. Gene’s lid can be washed by hands and should avoid submergence.

3. How can I download the Moikit APP?

You can download the Moikit APP for free on the Apple APP store or Google Play. It is compatible with Android (Android 4.3 (or later) smart phones that support Bluetooth 4.0.) and IOS (iPhone4S / 5 / 5c / 5s / 6 / 6Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / SE / 7 for Apple iOS8.0 and later).

4. Do you ship internationally and how long does it take?

Yes, shipping time may vary due to countries and regions. We will start shipping your orders within 1 month when the campaign finishes.

5. How can I change the address?

If you need to update your address, please follow Indiegogo's steps here.

6. What payment options do I have?

You can pay via PayPal and credit card, select a perk and you will see the available payment methods at checkout.

7. Can I get a refund if I pay for the wrong perk?

No worries. Please follow Indiegogo's steps here.

8. How can I change my perk level?

Please follow Indiegogo's instructions here .

story:
Hi,

I’m Pooja, the Founder of Begin to Heal and let me share with you my story on how holistic healing came into my life. For 14 years I’ve been a Strategy and Business Development Executive, working with Fortune 500 companies such as American Express, Microsoft, IBM, Wipro, and Pepsi. Although I enjoyed a nice living and felt invincible, due to my extreme worklife I developed adrenal fatigue in 2013, which made me completely reconsider my past way of life. After trying countless doctors from New York to India - without any meaningful improvement - I was finally introduced to the wondrous world of holistic healing, and this changed everything.

When I finally managed to get all of my strength back, I decided to dedicate my life to creating a premier online marketplace for holistic healing, and changing as many lives in the process as possible. Begin to Heal was born with the mission to help people find the best holistic health practitioners, and to be a trusted source in all holistic practices.

Begin to Heal is an online platform, your trusted source on Holistic Healing, where those in search of optimal health and wellness can book video, audio, or in-person sessions with a curated list of practitioners from across the country. Our list includes over 200 highly qualified professionals, M.D.s, keynote speakers in conferences and celebrated authors.

Begin to Heal is your trusted companion in your quest for a conscious lifestyle to help you discover the marvelous benefits of Holistic healing and to make it easy for you connect with the best practitioners and read reviews on them. You can even do these sessions from the comfort of your home, with practitioners from around the world, through our state-of-the-art video calling feature for many of our practices. Begin to Heal is also an online oasis of soulfully written articles, online courses, guided meditations and daily webinars from leading practitioners to calm your mind, energize your body and nourish your soul. BTH is committed to providing only the very best resources for your mental, physical, and spiritual growth It is only when we view ourselves from a holistic perspective that we realize that health is really an overall state of being. Holistic healing believes that the whole person is made up of interdependent parts and if one part is not working properly, all the other parts will be affected. In this way, if you have imbalances (physical, emotional, or spiritual) in your lives, it can negatively affect your overall health.

Holistic medicine focuses on the inner workings of the most advanced system in the universe: your body. I truly want to make a positive impact on peoples lives and help them heal naturlly, so help me with your contribution to make this vision come to life.

Warmly, Pooja
story_txt:
Hi,
I’m Pooja, the Founder of Begin to Heal and let me share with you my story on how holistic healing came into my life. For 14 years I’ve been a Strategy and Business Development Executive, working with Fortune 500 companies such as American Express, Microsoft, IBM, Wipro, and Pepsi. Although I enjoyed a nice living and felt invincible, due to my extreme worklife I developed adrenal fatigue in 2013, which made me completely reconsider my past way of life. After trying countless doctors from New York to India - without any meaningful improvement - I was finally introduced to the wondrous world of holistic healing, and this changed everything.
When I finally managed to get all of my strength back, I decided to dedicate my life to creating a premier online marketplace for holistic healing, and changing as many lives in the process as possible. Begin to Heal was born with the mission to help people find the best holistic health practitioners, and to be a trusted source in all holistic practices.
Begin to Heal is an online platform, your trusted source on Holistic Healing, where those in search of optimal health and wellness can book video, audio, or in-person sessions with a curated list of practitioners from across the country. Our list includes over 200 highly qualified professionals, M.D.s, keynote speakers in conferences and celebrated authors.
Begin to Heal is your trusted companion in your quest for a conscious lifestyle to help you discover the marvelous benefits of Holistic healing and to make it easy for you connect with the best practitioners and read reviews on them. You can even do these sessions from the comfort of your home, with practitioners from around the world, through our state-of-the-art video calling feature for many of our practices. Begin to Heal is also an online oasis of soulfully written articles, online courses, guided meditations and daily webinars from leading practitioners to calm your mind, energize your body and nourish your soul. BTH is committed to providing only the very best resources for your mental, physical, and spiritual growth It is only when we view ourselves from a holistic perspective that we realize that health is really an overall state of being. Holistic healing believes that the whole person is made up of interdependent parts and if one part is not working properly, all the other parts will be affected. In this way, if you have imbalances (physical, emotional, or spiritual) in your lives, it can negatively affect your overall health.
Holistic medicine focuses on the inner workings of the most advanced system in the universe: your body. I truly want to make a positive impact on peoples lives and help them heal naturlly, so help me with your contribution to make this vision come to life.
Warmly, Pooja

story:
Purpose

We started Elite Performance Studios in November of 2017. As a collective, we have a background in Corrective Exercise, Combat Sports, Yoga, Zumba, Massage Therapy as well as Strength and Conditioning. Since opening our studio, we have helped many of the residents in the area to achieve their long term goals, whether it be to run a marathon, prepare for a competition or simply achieve a higher level of general fitness. We have also groomed athletes in a variety of different sports, such as: World championship boxers, world class fencers and division 1 collegiate athletes.  


We are currently experiencing growing pains. This campaign marks a pivotal time in our transition because we have essentially outgrown our space and we are looking to expand in order to extend the best quality of service to our community. 

A greater influx of members require more space and more equipment in order for us to continue to provide the level of service that allowed us to get to this point in the first place. For this coming year, we have also planned to run multiple classes at one time, that in which will require us to expand out of the 800 square feet that we are currently working in. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $10,000 in order to cover the cost of a new space and equipment:

  • $3,000 will cover the cost of some key items that we would like to add to our gym floor such as a row machine, stair climber, treadmill for advanced runners as well as newer dumbbell and kettlebell sets. (We have added the link to our amazon wish list for specific detail in terms of our intentions)
  • The remaining $7,000 will cover renovations for the new space such as: HVAC upgrades, soundproofing, bathroom renovations and mirror installation. 

We of course would not look to accept donations without extending anything in return :)                       Some of our perks include: 

  • An invitation to the grand opening of our new space.
  • Premium product associated with our fitness community and our in-house brand. 
  • Fitness and nutritional consults. 
  • Be the first to try out our brand new facility, on us.  

We are looking to kick off the spring with a grand opening in May, we are hoping to ensure that we reach that goal with your support and contribution. More importantly, we are excited to grow our extended fitness family in Windsor Terrace and beyond. 

The Impact

As we aforementioned, we a have been active in this community for about 2 years, and as we are proud of our impact, we see the growth potential for more. With limited time and limited resources, we have managed to create hundreds of success stories. With the expansion of our studio, we project that we will be able to double our rate of service, which will ultimately result to exponential growth. 

Furthermore, we are looking to use this time to implement a part of our 10 year plan that we have yet to explore; a youth program. The parents of the Windsor Terrace school district have been a huge part of our success in this endeavor. Our growing relationships with the parents of the district have resulted in growing relationships with the youth of the community as well and we are anxious to extend our services in that regard. The expansion of our space will allow for us to start our youth program and hopefully launch as early as Fall of 2020.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are fully aware that a financial commitment is not the best and only way in which one can contribute. We are grateful for support of any means: 

  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools to pass this on to anyone who you feel it would resonate with or who you feel would be able to help. Spreading the word is just as important to us as any monetary value. 
  • Please provide the contacts of anyone that you feel we would be able to partner with, we are open to collaboration ! 
  • Subscribe to our Youtube channel ! We more than welcome you into our community and beyond happy to have you. 
  • Lastly, drop us an E - mail ! We would love for you to keep up with us and all of our future endeavors.

story:
You have probably heard of kinesiology taping or seen athletes using sports taping. Kinesiology taping is known to enhance performance, reduce pain and muscle fatigue, and promote recovery. Benefits of taping are widely researched.

 

 But Kinesiology taping is complicated. Taping requires tapes, scissors, and instructions. It is just too difficult to master taping. You need help to tape certain parts of the body. 

 

 

After years of research and development, we have created a new innovative performance wear that combines  kinesiology taping with compression sportswear.

 

WaveWear is built in with thin, elastic material called BWAS™(Bio Waved Adhesive Silicone). BWAS™ has enough adhesive strength for the taping effect and is exceptionally elastic and durable.

WaveWear is safe. BWAS™ was clinically tested to be harmless to the skin and leaves no residue. WaveWear is certified as class 1 grade from Europe CE medical test.

WaveWear is durable. WaveWear was tested under harsh conditions. BWAS™ will stay on the fabric and will not lose adhesion even after washing.  It's resistant to sweat so it will maintain adhesive strength even when you are sweating. 

 

WaveWear is perfectly reusable after the wash. If you feel that the adhesion has weakened, it's due to microscopic dust or lint gradually covering the surface in most cases. We recommend dry cleaning your WaveWear. We have done the testing. Dry cleaning will make it feel like a new product.  

 

Joins & Muscle relief : When kinesiology taping is applied to the area of pain, the tape prevents hyper extension thus effectively reduces pain.

Stabilize Muscles & Joints : Ease the tension of the muscles to effectively stabilize the joints and prevent injury as well as improve posture.

Accelerate recovery. Reduces Muscle Fatigue as much as 35% : Reduces lactic acid as much as 35 %. WaveWear wass tested to be very effective in nationally approved institute clinical trial.  

WaveWear can reduce up to 35% of lactic acid that causes muscle fatigue. It reduces undesired vibrations of the muscle, preventing delayed myalgia. 

WaveWear reduces swelling, promotes blood circulation and can also help with the warm-ups and the cool-downs.

Use of WaveWear showed less accumulation of lactic acid compared to taping, compression wear, and non-adhesive silicone compression wear. Reduced lactic acid accumulation means less muscle fatigue and pain. 

For more details of clinical testing, find it on our WaveWear website technology section and R&D section.

Wondering whether the taping works to all body sizes? Don't worry, we developed Body Mapping Technology, that works for everybody!

Body mapped system provides taping to support back muscles, spine and the shoulders. Shoulder taping helps preventing frozen shoulders. Back taping can reduce pain and improve posture. 

For the lower body, knee and thigh taping supports the patella and secures to prevent injuries. The calf taping was inspired by the varicose vein kinesiology taping method for swollen leg relief. Effective for those that run and walk for a long time. Also recommended for air flights!

WaveWear saves you money and helps you save the environment by reducing the use of disposable tapes.

You use about 1 Meter of tape to tape a knee. This means you will use 2 meters of tape to tape both knees. Taping a calf generally require 4 meters of tape. You are using almost an entire roll of tape to tape your knees and calves.

If you are taping everyday for a month, you use 30 rolls of tape. This will cost you $300. $900 for 3 months, $1800 for 6 months. If you tape everyday for a year, you will spend about $3500. Use WaveWear instead, and start saving!

Imagine how many tapes you will be throwing away...

 

WaveWear has excellent breathability even the silicone parts

 

Excellent Breathability

WaveWear has excellent breathability, even the BWAS™. WaveWear's fabric was certified by KATRI (Korean Apparel Testing & Research Institute) for 82mm/s breathability, which is similiar to that of cotton textiles. 

 

Anti-Bacterial & Anti Odor

The anti-bacterial and anti-odor processing will help sports enthusiasts stay fresh even after a long workout. WaveWear's fabric was treated with high performance silver antimicrobial that harnesses the power of silver to effectively achieve the highest odor reduction efficiency with minimal dosing. 

 

Optimal Compression 

We put comfort & safety first when designing our products. WaveWear has just enough compression to maximize performance and still be comfortable. WaveWear does not exceed the pressure of 4kPa, so you can feel comfortable in it. Multi-directional stretch fabric promotes free movement and comfort. 

 

 For more details of scientific research, you may find it on our WaveWear website technology section and R&D section.

 

 

 

  • Moisturize your skin for better adhesion.
  • Limit usage to less than an hour for the first usage. Extend usage time gradually.
  • This product contains microfiber and bio-silicone.
  • The product can be damaged if it is excessively stretched or worn over rough metallic accessories.
  • Hand wash in cold water with mild detergent and air dry.
  • Gently wipe the silicone with your palm under running water.  Alcohol wipes are recommended when removing dust or dead skin from the silicone.
  • Moisturize your skin before usage if you have very dry skin.

Following conditions may cause skin irritation due to friction.

  • Very dry skin.
  • Wearing incorrect size or wearing additional compression wear or tight garment over the product.

Back in 2010, our co-founders Nancy and Lee were using sports tape and supporters. And they realized they can create something easier and more sustainable. 

Our goal is to open a new market for performance wears. We have dedicated the last 6 years to research and product development.

Join us as we continue our journey of innovating sportswear by pledging to this campaign! 

 

2 years ago, as our first step towards creating kinesiology taping sportswear, we launched our compression sleeves. We have successfully launched our sleeves on Wadiz, a Korean crowd funding platform. 

 

Meet us at FIBO Cologne 2020

 In FIBO Cologne 2020 October 1-4, our booth will be located in Hall 7/Booth No. C 61. 

We are happy to meet and hear from you! We've participated in many global sports exhibitions to communicate. We partipated in ISPO Munich, FIBO Koln, Outdoor Retailer SHOW(Salt Lake City), Rehacare Dusselforf, MegaShow Hongkong, and London Marathon Expo.

 Help us spread this idea! Email, Facebook, Twitter, ... however you like! 

 

We are honored to have your support, and we are thankful for your trust. 

Your feedback, good or bad, improves us and our products. Please let us know what you think. Don't hesitate to reach us at support@wavecompany.net

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Producing a compression wear that works comfortable on your body is never easy.

Our previous experience in manufacturing compression sleeves, high polymer technology, patterning technology, taping body mapping technology makes us better prepared for the unforeseen challenges we may encounter during the sampling, manufacturing, injection, testing and now, finally to clothes! This means we already have pre-established relationships to ensure consistent quality and testing processes.

Despite the familiarity with our supply partners, there is still a risk in successfully complete the product. In addition to the challenges that present themselves with manufacturing, we will need to continue testing the products to ensure the best performance for you.

Our target earliest shipping dates are within a month after finishing up the campaign. To run the shipping, we will do everything we can do.

 

Reusability and recyclability

WaveWear's core technology BWAS™ was developed to realize kinesiology taping and is reusable again and again and is even stronger than the fabric itself, we and you will be able to save disposable tapes to be disposed at only one use. We believe it may be a little change to make the earth a better environment!
